B00074M5J8.AAS38I3N364WH.reviewText: Innovative best describes this watch. A mirrored face with the digits and day displayed in a series of dots and the ability to decrease size and change the style of the numbers and letters.  Backlight?  Sure, but instead of the standard "blah" illumination the blueish light actually comes up through the dots making up the time and day, which is very stylish and very readable in pitch black.  This watch has quickly become my favorite in my collection of watches.I actually purchased this watch on eBay for $65 brand new.

B00076O4E0.A3PB3YQGIFPA7X.reviewText: Fast shipping to APO address, amazing watch, I love it, every one ask me where I bought it and all of my friend love my new DIESEL watch.

B000B8L6QI.ABZFCDQI9XP4E.reviewText: Oh, man! Right out of the box, the watch was one of my instant favorites.No bells and whistles on this one, just the simple time of day, hour, minute, and seconds. But, wow! What a drop-dead gorgeous presentation. The bi-color gunmetal and steel case makes a sleek combination with the bi-color gray and black wide  leather band. What a neat design concept!Though I've usually preferred round-face watches, I'm really liking this large square-cut "in depth" black dial that contrasts with the steel hour and minute indicators and a neat yellow second hand.Lately, Iv'e been rolling up my sleeves a couple of laps just to see and be seen in this Diesel. Bet you like it too.  I give it all the stars.

B000B8L6QI.A16R5ZQCMC26WJ.reviewText: Discovered the danger of buying a wristwatch on-line.  The design of this watch is pathetic.  The hour and minute hands are styled virtually the same as the hour markings on the watch face, same colors and metals.  You have to stare at the darn thing for a long time to discern the time.  Strangely the second hand is colored in yellow which makes it the only think that is easy to see, I guess that's great if your timing something but heck I just want to be able to use this thing to tell time, not so good for that!
B000B8L6QI.A16R5ZQCMC26WJ.summary: Your supposed to use these to tell time!

B000EG3WGY.A2B8OWWPN7DKR2.reviewText: This immediately became my favorite watch. Heavy stainless band underlays the sleek black enamel surface. The coating does wear off after a while (I got mine Jan. 2007, it's Aug. 2007 & I can see raw stainless under the studs at their tips). Fortunately, this weathering looks just as cool as the black shininess of the new watch. I am hoping it weathers into a really slick mad max beyond thunderdome looking watch. Will probably wear it for as long as I can. Bonus of the shiny black is it looks good with formal wear, whilst retaining a tough edge. Best watch ever.

B000GHUVRE.ACMW48QJ9P3DH.reviewText: Looks even better than on the picture. Definitely worth recommending! The leather strap is high quality, and the glass doesn't look all scratchy after a couple of weeks.Buy it!

B000GHUVRE.A3OB2P2OTCLXMV.reviewText: This is a great looking watch.  Potential purchasers should note that the watch is rather large and rather thick - do not buy if you want a thin, elegant watch or if you have small wrists.  I have pretty large wrists and was looking for a "chunky" watch, so this fit the bill.  Comes nicely packaged by Diesel (esp. considering the overall cost), and arrived much faster than the estimate.

B000GHUVRE.AHVZRTUHGIE7B.reviewText: I considered buying this watch for myself. It looked great on this picture. However, I happened to see it in an airport shop and it looked quite different. It is definitely bigger than it looks, the metal is actually pretty shiny, not with a matte finish as on the picture. The leather strap was also a bit shiny and much darker brown. It is still a great watch but not as I imagined it would look like based on this photo. So if you think if buying it, my advice is first to check out some other pictures/videos advertising this watch that are closer to how it actually looks, and then place an order. Hope this review helps those who intend to buy this watch.
B000GHUVRE.AHVZRTUHGIE7B.summary: One point to consider before buying

B000GHUW46.ADE4ZRTVBWEBZ.reviewText: I bought from Amazon com. the DZ 7035 watch that according to my opinion is a wonderful sports watch, because of it's modern design and it's nice leather bracelet with the strange and also very convinient clasp.  A lot of people have asked me about that watch. I had the same before and I was very happy wearing that, but when, one day, fell down the floor very strongly, unfortunately it crashed down. So, I decided to order the same one from Amazon com. The price was very good, but unfortunately, I didn't know that, leaving in Greece, I had to pay taxes which they coasted me the double and more than the initial price of the watch. And that is my complain, because nobody from the site informed me about the taxes I had to pay.Anyway, what done is done, I have my watch now again, which is excellent and very nice. The package came in Greece at a very short time and with very good delivery. I propose to buy that watch, if you live in the USA.Fouli Theodoridou, Greece

B000GHUW46.AWVO5WG8F85YN.reviewText: I bought this watch for my boyfriend for Valentine's Day. It looks great and he loved it but the battery died within 3 weeks and I have yet to find a dealer able to open the back to replace it.

B000GHUW46.A7622O7NIVYNF.reviewText: This is a great watch for those who want something a little different. It still provides you with the most basic essentials: time, date, and backlight. If these are the only things you find yourself asking of your watch, then this is a great choice.The face measures a little over 1 1/2" wide and negligibly slimmer for the rest of the band. I find this is perfect, as any slimmer would detract from the masculinity of the leather band, and any wider and it would be a bit too bulky. One feature I wish was a bit slimmer is the height of the face of the watch. It's about 1 3/4" wide and around 1/2" high. I don't mind the width as my wrist is pretty wide to start with, but I wish they would have slimmed down the height a little bit. I can't complain though, as in no way does it detract from the style or comfort of the watch.The wear of the watch is very comfortable. The entire band is leather, and the clasp wraps around so that you don't see the buckle, save for three very small metal pieces holding it on, giving it an even more sleek style. The backlight is dim, but is easily seen. I like this as most watches backlights are on par with how bright my iPod's backlight is, which can be distracting if you're trying to be discreet.All in all, a fresh and stylish watch that won't disappoint you!

B000GHUW46.ADS22OS5N1DUY.reviewText: I got it used and it was pretty much just like new.  Had to replace the battery but no biggy.  Was a great gift.

B000GHUW46.ARFO4VMU8RYC9.reviewText: The DZ7035 is a great looking watch. However, I was only able to enjoy it for a week as it was shipped with a bad battery.

B000GHW8M0.A2ZTQPJE3G6S4G.reviewText: I just bought this watch for my girlfriend who fell in love with MY Diesel watch of the same design. My own watch has been very reliable. It is nicely weighted and adds a nice edge. Lots of people have complemented me on it and I have worn it in the water often. Diesel makes good watches. This watch is reliable and unique.

B000GHW8M0.A1KHBCAFJIZ72E.reviewText: The watch I received was damaged and I need to send it back - I emailed Watchzone and they have not sent me a reply. I would like instructions on how to send it back for a full refund.

B000GHW8M0.A2HMS9GFR10BBR.reviewText: This is a great watch. My boyfriend loves it, and says it fits perfectly. He has recieved many compliments on it.The studs are really cool.I am glad that I bought it.

B000GHW8QG.A3U9NRF7QW5MP0.reviewText: Very stylish watch, impressive design. Seems to be a high quality, well built watch. A bit difficult to take off because of the strap being wide and the clasp has not broken in yet. But that's because the watch is still pretty new. I would definitely recommend this brand.

B000GHW8QG.A2920ZMYQWR6NB.reviewText: I bought this watch for my husband because his other Deisal's face cracked. and he LOVES THIS ONE. not only is the watch cool, the band is an awesome distressed leather and it comes on a leather pillow in a very cool white decorative box made of leather over a hard protective material. The shipping was super fast from Watch Zone and we will definately buy from again...this is a great watch that looks classy,sexy & cool for your favorite man.

The photo showed a large looking lite brown leather watch in reality once it arrived, watch was small dark leather and very girlish looking urg! very disapointing.  I gave it to a gay friend of mine.

If you are young, fashionable and want to create an impression, this watch is for YOU!!But I must say that this watch have an indiglo-like feature which makes it difficult in the night to check time.

It took the leather a while to soften and mold to my wrist, but fits very comfortably now.Easy to read numbers, but a bit harder to read in the dark, despite the hand tips that glow in the dark.Overall, I am very pleased with the watch.

B000GI063W.A3M89V1LEC3XU6.reviewText: A co-worker of mine had this in black and I liked it so much, I had to get one for myself.

It was loose and broken.  Off course, at Amazon returning and getting a refund is a breeze.  Immediately, bought the same watch at amazon, but from a different seller.  I have it for 3 months now and it's great.

B000JF86VG.A2BC5JTDI23DX0.reviewText: Great watch, easy to wear and functions as expected. Arrived without fuss and in perfect condition. Good price, good product, and on the money.

B000JFA77C.A3W4VIE95VA0Q.reviewText: I love this watch. Although my wrists are small, the watch still looks great on my hand. It's difficult for people like me to shop online and purchase a watch so I was very skeptical when making this purchase. However, my fears were indeed allayed. It's very classy - I can wear it to work, when I go out... it suits almost any occasion. I'd recommend this watch to anyone.

B000JFA77C.AIF5FN49UOUI2.reviewText: It doesn't work very well for a long time, so It did require maintenance. Here in Colombia there are no people to give support it.

B000JFA77C.A3J9Z3A11JA5ZA.reviewText: After some days to have the watch, I noticed, it was a delay in the time, then I adjust it, But it was continuing doing it. I thought it maybe be the batteries and I when to the repair store and they told me the batteries were good that the problem was the machine. I couldn't return the watch because I was out of the United States, I throw away the watch like my money.

B000JFA77C.A2LAVSDDICXFHO.reviewText: This is my first Diesel purchase and I am a fan! I have used it for more than 2 years now. I like the straight line on the right with logo, makes the watch look a whole lot different and classy.

B000JINOVK.A1ZNSSPLX0V9AP.reviewText: This watch can go with slacks and a nice leather belt, with shorts and a nice shirt, even with jeans a t-shirt and snickers.  I use it for all purposes and it fits in with all outfits.  I don't rate this watch a 5 because of the following reasons. One, it doesn't tell you the date as most watches do; second, the leather strap seems and feels very delicate and you can easily break it or cut it with the buckle. I have had this watch for about 2 months and the strap doesn't show any sign of deterioration and I hope the strap last at least two years.

B000JINOVK.AUB532282EUJO.reviewText: The watch looks really good, and is a great gift for someone who loves Diesel clothing. That being said, it isn't exactly a high quality watch. The band broke after a few months, and even before that it was starting to wear a little bit. The band replaced, I still love it, just something to be aware of.Also, a cool thing about this watch is that the right side is indented a few mm, with the 3 raised up a bit. It gives it a cool, almost 3D effect.
B000JINOVK.AUB532282EUJO.summary: Looks great, not the best quality

B000JINOVK.ADNF9TR72VTOV.reviewText: The DIESEL brand is very nice. The watches are just great, i really like them. This watch is great. It looks good in any situation. I rate it 4 stars because i had a problem with the strap band. The leather kindda got open in some places after a time been worn. It is still a great looking watch. It is not heavy at all and it is also very comfortable. I like it very much

I noticed the only other review here was a man saying that he bought it for his wife.  i should have paid more attention.  it's a nice (men's) watch but the watch band doesn't fit.  i'm built thick so i'm sure if you have a skinny wrist it will fit fine.

B000KHVGOC.A3H0CLCPWXOGV2.reviewText: Got exactly what I wanted in perfect condition well within the prescribed time limits.  It made a great Christmas present for my wife.

I try to look at quality in companies, and find that companies will put more effort into some of their products and not others.  For Diesel: jeans - YES.  watches - NO.  At least not ones with leather bands.
B000KKIIMC.A3DSHH6B2GF08A.summary: Falls apart... my last Diesel watch

B000KKO6LY.A7F5AD2SAQJQ7.reviewText: Refer to title. It has a clean cut design and you can also wear it facing inward so it just looks like a leather band around your wrist. A very cool watch. Glad I took the risk and got it.

B000KKO6LY.AI0NMYA3LKXW1.reviewerName: Bartok Kinski "A casual stroll through the lu...
B000KKO6LY.AI0NMYA3LKXW1.reviewText: Be the first in your neighborhood to look like Klong (a Japanese cartoon which hasn't caught on in America). This exciting watch has beep dial tones and a radius of 200*yards which let you catch world time and even a receptacle ad/diameter light which is perfect in complete darkness.

B000KKO6LY.A3CIONA9DQPP5E.reviewText: nice watch, I never wore a watch before in my life, this one fits well and looks good. You can wear it backwards (face facing body) too if you want it to just look like a cuff. Could be a little wider, but it looks good anyway.

B000KKO6LY.A18HCJW9FFMX9F.reviewText: I bought this watch for my husband. It's really gorgeous and he loves it, and he is not an easy person to please when you talk about watches.

B000KKO6LY.A3U3QSY4JQL6WP.reviewText: it was a gift, i was very happy with the way it was received and the way it looks! no hassles with either shipping or merchandise condition on receipt! very pleased.

B000KKO6LY.A2C5TI1JZ781ZL.reviewText: Diesel rules.. everything as advertised!! Very good quality, original design.. would recommend other products from Diesel by all means! cheers;)

B000KKO6LY.A3U2RRXMXBQB73.reviewText: Everything from the box to the grip to the material is HIGH END. I gifted myself this watch for my birthday and my oh my am I happy!Only negative? is not as thick as i expected it to be, but i just like really large bracelet looking watches, that is hardly a negative... this watch is so pretty that you will love it no matter what. Thanks amazon for another great purchase!

B000KKO6LY.A208FBQSUWCKN3.reviewText: I loved the look and style of this watch from the moment I saw it.  It looks even better in person.  But after wearing it for only about 6 months the leather band around the watch face started to come apart.  This is not covered under the Diesel warranty, because it does not cover the strap.  But since on this watch the face and strap are one piece it rendered the watch worthless.  So this watch ended up costing me $20/month for the time I was able to wear it!

B000KKO6LY.A2HA0X670NRV8I.reviewText: The watch looks great and functions great; however there is one problem when trying to check the time in the dark. The night light switch is located in the middle of the watch and trying to hit the right button is nearly impossible without accidentally hitting the time set button and changing the watches current time. Other than that the watch looks and fits great. Shipping was extremely fast 3 days only.

B000KKO6LY.A1H54P36O3KRSR.reviewText: This was a Christmas present for my boyfriend.  At first when I showed him a photo of it - he was a bit hesitant.  But he needed a watch and one that made him look 'less daggy' and can use everyday.  He absolutely loves this watch and has grown on him more and more.  It's a great size for him, it does look good and is a great statement watch - it's dressy but casual.  One minor gripe is that the latch/fastener can come off just a little to easily when he bumps into things.

B000KKO6LY.A1WRC08CDI2ROA.reviewText: i have been collecting Diesel watches for a few years and this one is my favorite.  the wide leather strap is pretty comfortable and fits well on either wrist.  the backlight for night time use is subdued and that just adds to the watch's good looks.the only (minor) complaint i have is that, when you check the date, you have to cycle through a few modes.  one button press changes the time to the date.  the next press causes the date and time to toggle back and forth every second (why?).  and the final press causes only the time to be displayed once again.  a one button press to only display the date, and only while the button was being pressed, would have been enough.  again, that's only a minor complaint.  it's kind of weird more than anything... then again, this whole watch is a little odd (but in a good way).  enjoy!

B000N5ZGYC.A1ZEAX1HNHC7OH.reviewText: I have both the DZ4124 & DZ4125. They are great looking & always get compliments from others!

B000N5ZGYC.A1YNZRRRV5ZZD0.reviewText: Chose this watch as a birthday gift for my husband, an avid watch-collector.The watch came in nice Diesel packaging, and is very attractive.When I got it, I looked it over and set the time on it.  When I checked it the next day, I was annoyed to find that the military clock was not keeping time. The watch DOES come with a warranty, but if you read it, it says that if you return it, you may not get the same model watch back, but one of equal value.  That's kind of a stupid warranty, then, isn't it?  Suspecting the watch had 2 batteries--one for each of the clocks, I took it to a local jeweler who confirmed my suspicions, and replaced the one that was run-down.  My husband loves it, I think it looks great, let's hope nothing happens to it that requires use of the idiotic warranty.  Of course, that's Diesel's idiocy.

B000N7X98K.A1D1IBGE58ZTSM.reviewText: I just got this watch today and like it already. I read a lot of reviews saying it was hard to program. I'm not sure what gave these other reviewers so much trouble. It took me 30 seconds to program and is set up EXACTLY like every other digital watch I've ever owned.The watch is nice and chunky, just like I like my watches. It looks good dressed up or down, is relatively light weight, and fits my ridiculously skinny wrist.I might buy one in brown too...

B000N7X98K.A5W90MQG4SWGV.reviewText: The watch LOOKS fantastic.  However, I was definitely disappointed:1.  The programming booklet that comes with it does not actually contain the directions on how to program this particular model.  I called Diesel and a customer service person only had that same booklet to refer to, and could not help me.  I called the Diesel/Fossil store nearest me (nearly an hour away) and they could not help over the phone as they only had the very same book I had to refer to.  They recommended I make the (one hour) drive to see it if someone there could set it.  AAAAARGH.2.  In the illustration, the read-out looks fine.  But the truth is that the light behind the digital numbers is actually very dim, even when you press the button to increase the light.It's a gorgeous, sleek watch but I was a bit embarrassed to give it as a gift once I realized how hard it was to actually read, and that there was no way for the thing to be programmed.
B000N7X98K.A5W90MQG4SWGV.summary: Sleek, but good luck setting it, or actually seeing the time!

B000N7X98K.A1MWIZVQTRD093.reviewText: When my old watch finally died for good, I spent weeks searching for a new one. Finally, I came across this watch. I wasn't too sure at first--after all, I am a woman and this is a man's watch. Would it be too big? Too butch?The watch band fits just fine despite my arms being so skinny. However, because it's so large I find myself constantly bashing it into things on accident--metal, brick walls, etc. Yet it doesn't have even a hint of a scratch or chip anywhere on it, even after months of abuse!It also goes with any outfit I wear, especially really nice fancy-restaurant clothes. I think the contrast between the big chunky watch and light, feminine clothing is great.I should note a couple of annoying things. First, when I got the watch it took a while to figure out how to program it. Second, the display can be difficult to see for those without perfect vision. Sometimes I have to look a little closer to read the time, but there's never been an instance when I haven't been able to read it.Overall a really great watch for men and women alike.

B000N7X98K.AER6D8TPPJIJD.reviewText: Hi all,I love it, fantastic as the photos. I have no words.BUY IT ! ! !Regards,Danilo

B000N7X98K.A1VM1842Q26EVU.reviewText: Looks good, has a nice finish. I hit every will I get into it and the watch still the same without scratch (for me is super).The only thing is that the light is very low, but it doesn't matter to me i am not looking at the watch every 5 minutes at night, so is not a big deal, just to people that have a hard time looking at time...it will matter.

B000N7X98K.A3L15DOOQYR0R.reviewText: Watch Beautiful and elegant watches for those who enjoy good recommend this purchase!Bold design and good applications! I recommend for sure!

B000N7X98K.AAWOBSZO3DSUQ.reviewText: I did receive the watch, but its broken... the metal part in the wrist end looses everytime I try to wear the watch... I have to assemble the watch everytime I want to wear it... It is very annoying to do this everytime I want to use it.. when I get to attach the metal part to the watch I have to wear it with extreme care because the metal part can fall off...I can't return this item to the seller because I'm from outside US, and cannot return it as easy as if I lived in the US... So I will have to bring the watch to a watchmaker to fix it...

B000N7X98K.A2KZZJ8NG0LRX3.reviewText: I bought this watch for my boyfriend for christmas lets see it's July and it's still working great and looks awesome. He loves it, it has this futuristic look to it and you press the button on the side and the numbers show saving battery. Shipping was fast. So overall great product and service.

B000N7X98K.A212NFBX2GEZXZ.reviewText: I read other reviews before purchasing this watch. To be honest, I was expecting it to under-perform, be difficult to set, and hard to see.  I bought it anyway because it looks so nice, and the price is even better.First off... this is a beautiful watch. It is a good blend of class & casual while giving a (not too nerdy) tech edge.The booklet included covers multiple watches. All I did was look at the table of contents to find my model, and flip to the section that deals with the programming for that specific one. I understand the confusion some people are having, as it is only half of one page (out of 1000 pages) that covers how to set this watch properly. It took me less than a minute from opening to get it set to the correct time & date, and to turn off the beeping that happens when pressing buttons.I haven't had any problems viewing the time & date. Sure, it's not as easy to read as black clock hands on a white background, but it's the subtlety of the watch face that makes it so unique. I have been in multiple lighting situations (indoors & out) and have been able to read it just fine.The only thing that I took a star off for is the watch band. This may not be a problem as it wears in... but the band is pretty stiff, and I don't really care for the rough texture on the leather. That's mostly a personal issue... my last watch had a really smooth leather band that I liked a lot. And since I'm the master of this review: STRIKE 1 STAR!
B000N7X98K.A212NFBX2GEZXZ.summary: Very Nice! Set and ready in less than 1 minute.

B000N7X98K.A2HA0X670NRV8I.reviewText: This watch is great, it looks great, works great and fits great. shipping was fast too.

B000N7X98K.A3TKQN5JR4SRSE.reviewText: I was skeptical at first when reading some of the other reviews about this watch before purchase and was counting on the return policy, but as soon as I opened the box, I was impressed. And that superb first impression lasted. I've worn this watch 24/7 for 2 months ago and am almost completely happy. The online pictures do not deceive; this watch does look great and true to eye. First off, the reviewers who complain about not being to read the watch are either illiterate or legally blind. Outside during the day, the black background makes the digits stand out, making the whole display 150% legible, and during dark times the backlight works marvelously. In some dusk/dim light, you may not pick out the numbers immediately, but a closer glance or using backlight solves this problem right away. Those scenarios are not very common, so I don't have much of a problem. The stainless steel casing protects against any damage, so now matter how many times I've hit/scraped this watch against objects by now, there's still not a scratch to see. This is my first leather watch, and I think I'm happy with the leather strap. I'm a guy, and I have wrists as thin as a girl's, so I do have to use the tightest or second to last notch on the strap, but it still works fine. I was initially worried about wearing a watch that looked this big, but I'm happy I got it. The wide strap makes it look like an armband, so it doesn't look odd. The rectangular display is a great size. My only complaint is that the instruction booklet definitely is worthless, but I didn't really need to to set my primary time anyway, it works just like any digital watch. So it's not that hard people. There's a review on here that shows exactly how to do. But, I do have some trouble accessing a few of the other functions without proper instructions, like the secondary time setting. Also, the lower horizontal steel line on the front of the display blocks out the display abbreviations when looking straight on at the face. I thought this was pretty stupid of the manufacturers, especially when there's all the other space in the bottom left corner box. You can still those abbreviations hidden underneath the line when tilting the watch and looking from a different angle. Not a big deal really, just dumb. By the way, the strap is starting to give off an odd odor now, but maybe that's because of my wearing habits (I keep it on when I sleep) Well worth the $84, this watch really stands out, and I usually get comments on it. The only reviews that I don't agree with are AGirlNamesTbone's and the last con by SPernel.

B000N7X98K.A2M1R56U0GN4Z7.reviewText: I've had this watch for about a week now. I really like its design and have gotten many compliments on it. I own the all black version of this watch.Pros:* Great design. The chunky casing with the wide black leather band gives an unmistakably unique look that turns heads.* Controls are easy to use and watch function is easily learned once you have spent some time with the manual. The buttons are large and easy to press.* The crystal guard grill that wraps around the watch face protects the face from scratches.* Strap works well and is comfortable.* Has two time zones, chronometer with split/lap, timer with three modes - count down and stop, count down and repeat, count up, and four separate alarms.Cons:* The display is hard to read in low light conditions. Pitch dark is not a problem, as there is a night light function. However, intermediate lighting makes it hard to read the time at a glance as the display is passive.* Some of the display is obscured by the crystal guard grill.* The smaller elements of the display, like the 'p' for time, as well as the flags in the bottom left quadrant that indicate functions such as chronometer, timer, Time1, Time2 etc. are almost impossible to see. This is the biggest drawback on this watch and might be a deal breaker for some.

B000N7X98K.AY49528HO1GTZ.reviewText: Product arrived on time. Very good delivery. Love the style. Had some trouble seeing the time in daylight but nightime vision is great.

B000N7X98K.A133OL4TYVR0JT.reviewText: The previous reviewers are right - the instructions provided with the watch don't match the item and are worthless.  But with a few minutes' search I was able to find the instructions online.  To set the time, follow these steps:1. Hold down all four buttons on the watch simultaneously.  This performs a factory reset.2. Hold down the top left button.  This puts the watch in configuration mode.3. Pressing the bottom left button will cycle you through so you can set the time and date.  For each value, pressing the top right button will increment, and pressing the lower right button will decrement.4. When done, press the top left button to save your settings.Download the document [...] for details on how to operate the watch's stopwatch and chrono functions.I like the watch a lot, but the review is -1 star due to the lack of instructions provided with the product.
B000N7X98K.A133OL4TYVR0JT.summary: Nice - once you find the instructions!

B000N7X98K.A1IILVUJFKR91M.reviewText: So, I've been looking to replace my Timex sports watch with something that doesn't have velcro that snags on everything, or irritating plastic bands that chafe, or metal bands that rip out your arm hair. I was surprised to find an instruction manual as large as the one this came with given that all the reviewers have said it doesn't include instructions for this particular watch. Thankfully they posted the instructions themselves and actually setting the watch is fairly easy. The face is pretty dim and hard to read without the light, and the lines on the face can obscure parts of the face at certain angles. Also, for some reason when you set the date it puts the day before the month, and that's just weird. It's kinda bulky, which is understandable since this is a men's watch and I had to poke a couple extra holes in so that it would fit me, but I don't think that's any excuse for the buckle digging into my wrist.Ended up finding a Timex watch with a metal band that could be replaced with a leather band. Stylish, comfy, not hard to read, and simple instructions that are pretty consistent between watches. And it was way cheaper. I miss that $50 I wasted on this thing.

B000N991YY.A3J5OUPDMMS57E.reviewText: Awesome, such a beautiful watch.I'm just afraid if the watchband (made in original leather) lasts long, and if necessary, if I'll find a replacement for it in the future (specially in Brazil, where I live).It is not the cheapest watch, but its solid contruction and beauty worth the price.

B000N991YY.A2B3CC96T14X5U.reviewText: it was my best purchase i have ever made. thanks diesel for this watch!!! highly recomend everyone to buy this item! i have this watch 2 years and it steel looks perfect!

B000N991YY.A1EBAYYD8H0NZA.reviewText: I wanted a deisel watch for some time, a browsed different models and finally got this one. And it's even better than what you see on the picture. Excelent.

B000N991YY.A1H46A2PSKWDEG.reviewText: I got this as a gift from my wife and must admit that I'd never have chosen it based on pictures.  However, in person this watch looks excellent.  The large 12/3/6/9 markers are mirror surface on the back of the crystal so they appear to "float".  The face has nice detail and depth.  The watch face is big but not too thick and the leather band is nice quality.  I've got very small wrists for a guy and it feels comfortable all day long.  Now I'm on the hunt for Diesels in other colors so I can give this one a break once in a while.  ;)

B000N995TK.A2N32Q78HFCRVZ.reviewText: I am totally satisfied witht he product and the service.Thank you

B000N995TK.A34O4PCYW5I8H8.reviewText: Does any one know why the yellow hand stop rotating and start again when you press the start button and then stop again later? is this normal? this doesn't affect the time. the seconds hand keeps going though. I like the watch a lot by the way.

B000N995TK.A1ZFOD8BQ52591.reviewText: So far, so good with the watch.  The stop watch portion is a little tricky at first but I'm assuming that's why Diesel sends you this manual of instructions on how to operate the watch.  I've bought power tools with less information.  Super cool looking, you know it's on your wrist and not a bad price.

B000N9CJ20.A29EYFI1XON3Q1.reviewText: Very nice watch to have. Esp for the people who likes chronograph and leather belts. I love diesel and especially the deal that i get on amazon. Recommended watch. can be used for casual or formal wear.

B000N9CJ20.A25SQIJZBYPN0R.reviewText: Not much more I can say, overall it looks awesome, better than anicipated, great price too!It always helps to know what your looking for and this one for me was ideal!

B000NE451S.A3SVSN4AI7E1AE.reviewText: It was the perfect gift for my boyfriend,and i appreciated the speedy shipping and the wrapping, the watch looks and works great!

B000NE451S.AXH2NBJWSQANW.reviewText: I received this as a gift from my boyfriend's parents and ohhh, I love it! The wrist clasp mechanism is easily adjustable, setting time and date is fairly intuitive (for those who are familliar with digital watches, anyhow), and I think it's just a very good looking watch to begin with (the main draw, after all). Sure, it's a men's watch but who doesn't like leather? ;)I will agree that the backlighting tends to be a little on the weak side so if you expect to spend a fair amount of time in poorly lit conditions, you might not find that to be helpful. Aside from that, I have no real complaints about this watch.It's nothing fancy, it tells the time and day, and it looks fantastic. Great gift for those who don't care if this watch may not be one James Bond's first choice.

B000NE451S.ANSPZZS5VNJBJ.reviewText: Although it is a  beautiful watch, it could have been constructed to last better. The small rivets that hold the individual leather pieces on are thin and those pieces come off the rivets easily. This happened fairly early into my ownership of the watch. I now have a entire leather patch missing and one ready to come off. Also the buttons blend to well with each other and are too recessed. Sometimes if you are in a hurry you can press the wrong one by mistake.Aside from those two things its a nice watch which fits well. Of course the look degrades more and more as you loose rivets and the leather pieces they are holding...

B000NE451S.A3CD1XK7XKYH0.reviewText: Unique and futuristic, this watch is sleek, modern with up-to-date styling.  Better on the wrist than what is actually pictured.

B000NE451S.APLGB6TT7URDQ.reviewText: This watch is a super stylish and comfortable!  The only downside is that the buttons on the side are really close together so when you want to push "light" for the background light, you can accidentally push "time" and change the time.  It would be better if there was a time lock but other than that it is one of the coolest watches I have ever seen!

B000NE451S.A1C7ZT1IX1JUO5.reviewText: Really It Is a Nice Watch Look Very Cool ..Fine Quality Till Now :D

B000NE451S.A13Y1CRGIHFTCY.reviewerName: Victor R. Bush "There can be only one"
B000NE451S.A13Y1CRGIHFTCY.reviewText: I tell you chicks dig the watch... One of the little snaps broke but nothing a little glue can't fix.  Not a fan of the clasp you really cant do things with it cause it gets caught on everything and opens.

B000NE451S.A23D2X3FQ4T3Q5.reviewText: I bought this watch from the picture alone because I thought it looked pretty cool. However, I am disappointed with its design.My first complaint is that the backlight is not very strong. In fact, when I had just received it, I tried out the light on a cloudy day and my first thought was that the backlight was not working (hence minus one star).My next complaint is that the clock/calendar set button is right next to the the backlight and mode buttons. All 3 buttons have the same feel and and a very low profile. The problem here is that if I want to check the time in the middle of the night, I can't distinguish between the buttons and hence if the light doesn't come on initially it may be because I've pushed the clock setup button or did not push hard enough. Consequently, on a second attempt to find the backlight button, I may end up changing the time. Now what good is it to stress myself in the middle of the night like that when I am trying to sleep.  I think a watch like this or any other watch should have a lock switch on the back so that you cannot accidently alter the time. Alternatively, place the setup button away from the others. (minus another star)Another complaint is that to setup the year, it only advances forward but fortunately it only goes to 2099 and then returns to 2000 again. My son accidently pushed the setup button and the year advanced to 2013. I was afraid that I would not be able to return back to 2008 and that the calendar feature would be useless.It's a pity, with all the technological advances out there and the fact that Diesel has been selling watches for some time now, you would think you could get a well designed feature rich watch. Afterall, it's digital - why not add a stop watch or countdown timer etc.My recommendation is buy this watch only if you are looking for a fashion accessory.
B000NE451S.A23D2X3FQ4T3Q5.summary: Cool watch but could be designed better

B000NE4522.A168WD5OLRNG9N.reviewText: Cool looking, my friend really liked it, I gave it to her as a gift. I think this kind of watch looks good only on a teenager.
B000NE4522.A168WD5OLRNG9N.summary: Not too big, not too small

B000NIF4H8.A2JC55M4BFADBK.reviewText: This watch is well made, stylish, easy to navigate and a must have for anyone with a funky sense of style. I bought this watch with only the image listed on the amazon page. There were no reviews at the time. When you're buying Diesel, you usually don't have to worry about the quality. And that was the case with this watch. However, I did find that the watch went through batteries more quickly than I would have expected. Other than that, I have been very satisfied with it. It's a quirky watch that always gets attention when I wear it.

B000NKIB8U.A7GCFQSJ483O4.reviewText: Ever try finding a pair of Diesels in silver? Easy? I doubt it. Well, here they are at a great price. Get 'em while they're still here. Quite comfortable & they look great.

B000NOWQ82.A2KDVPNQ3Y0Z67.reviewText: Nice looking glasses but way, way too small for any adult.  The glasses only fit my 7 yrs old son's face, and his face is not that big either.  Very disappointed, now have buy a different pair at the mall.  The title for these glasses should be: Diesel KIDS' Sunglasses.

B000NOWQ82.AALZOFKNJWPAP.reviewText: I ordered these glasses in spite of a review that said they were too small because another review made no mention of that fact and seemed to actually be very happy with his. I got them in a very nice case but were too small. I had my 12 year old nephew try them on, and they barely fit him. They fit on me like the mask of zorro fits on zorro: barely covering his eyes. I'm very skinny, so that's not the problem. These are definitely a return which is a shame cus they were only $20!

B000NOWQ82.ATIPU80ZYEUR3.reviewText: I love these glasses. They are a real bargain for 60$! It turns heads in the street and my friends keep asking me where I got them from. It actually looks a lot nicer than you see in the picture on the website. It comes in a sturdy, white Diesel case with a cleaning cloth. I simply love it!

B000NOWQ8M.A3NIV600LQ7UID.reviewerName: James W. Blair Jr. "Country Music Fan"
B000NOWQ8M.A3NIV600LQ7UID.reviewText: Nice looking,clear view!  Only downside is not made for driving as view on the sides is blocked.

B000NOWQ8M.A1HD6GOT4O1L7T.reviewText: These dark blue glasses are a steal for this price. If you have a larger face you may want to avoid them, they are smaller and fit a small-medium sized face perfectly.

B000NOWQ9G.A2HXYRSE6O0TQU.reviewText: This sunglasses are excelent I use it last week on beach and wet it whitout problems, for sunbeach are excelent you can use it without problems, i reccomend it....

B000NOYFDG.A11TFOKA4SCGP3.reviewText: I dont think they are worth the $120 list mentioned, but for $20 sunglasses these are great!

B000NP0EPI.A1TIHP0W2MH98R.reviewText: Sunglasses very modern, attractive and inexpensive, brings good presentation, I am very satisfied with my purchase...

B000NP2EYW.A1QEGSL5O9HRUL.reviewText: i love these shades but they dont fit on my face.  you need a good nose in order to hold up these heavy set of sunglasses.

B000NP2EYW.A3R2QR7ICGLEEH.reviewText: These Diesel sunglasses are stylish, but allow too much sunlight to get in.  I do own another pair of Diesel sunglasses and the lens is dark enough to block the sunlight I need it to.  I do however get a lot of comments on these sunglasses, so I would recommend them if you're looking for style.

B000OM9E6K.A2XWBQ570255SX.reviewText: I have always been fan of Diesel Glasses. I got this pair for my mother. Delivered on schedule and product was amazingly beautiful.

B000OMHDS6.AEU3L8EM8Z7UG.reviewText: I bought these sunglasses as a gift for my brother-in-law. He LOVES them. They are super hot and look great. Great quality as well!

B000OMIZKG.A3V0OA3LN0U46D.reviewText: I thought it'll be black frame, but it came with white frame, which made my the other purchase of a white CD sunglasses duplicate. B000OTA7M8.A1KVBEEKZOXI7K.reviewText: very nice shirt,good quality i am happy for my shirt i will buy again from them it fit me perfectly thx

B000OTA7M8.A1RRRODLAQX391.reviewText: This shirt looks and feels great on you. Bought it over a year ago and the quality has lasted many washes.

B000P1IE52.AAWQYRP1MSBB3.reviewText: Yes, I will buy another pair.They feel so good,just slip your feet in them and go.Very confortable,good price. They last so long they are like a good friend.Yes purchase a pair you will never regret it. Run true to size.

B000P1IE52.A3BAN6JFKI68YA.reviewText: These are great!  Very comfortable and they look great too.  Some of the fabric is very satiny... You can't really see that from looking at the picture.

B000P1IEAC.A1C1SBZFSM7OLF.reviewText: I love these sneakers, they are very comfortable and great design. The seller is reliable and on time.

B000P4GXT8.A2H6V3BX18D326.reviewText: The watch arrived on time.  But had to ship it overseas to my daughter where it did take a little longer then we all wanted but it finally arrived! B000P4GXT8.A17RG2EU03JCZ1.reviewText: I love my Deisel watch. It is my favorite casual watch that I can wear with just about any style. My only complaint is that the leather is stiff and makes it a little uncomfortable when I bend my wrist. I wish the leather was more flexible.

B000P4GXZM.A12MWPD224ZABK.reviewText: I have bought a few Diesel watches in the past but this one is probably my favorite.  The build quality is great and it looks fantastic...highly reccomended!

B000P4GXZM.A1YZ6FWSA83W40.reviewText: I've had this watch for just over a year.  It is durable and sharp looking.  The only complaint I have about it is the band is weathering quicker than I would have thought.  Overall, quite a good value.

B000P4GXZM.A21PWFG0O94P15.reviewText: What can i say about this watch?, is an amazing watch, it keeps track of time and is not ridiculously huge just the opposite, is quite small so i would recommend it for guys with small wrists.

B000P4GXZM.A14MEO0ZXIX3A7.reviewText: gave it as a gift.  Was afraid it would be smallish, but it wasn't.  It had a very nice appearance, and person receiving it was very happy with it.
B000P4GXZM.A14MEO0ZXIX3A7.summary: diesel men's dz1123 brown not-so-basic analog light blue dial

B000P4GXZM.A2Q3YK1V02V2T0.reviewText: Item arrived extremely well packaged and the recipient of this gift is very happy with the quality of the watch.

B000P4GXZM.A2BRRXSBM3F6I1.reviewText: Item received in perfect order and right on time. Great doing business.Thank you so much.Interik

B000P4GXZM.A11YAY6B424JT1.reviewText: I bought this for my friend, every holiday or special occasion we buy each other a nice watch. I bought this one without reading the dimensions on it and when it arrived in the mail I was a little disappointed in how small it was, at least to my liking. Maybe it's a girls watch and I wasn't paying attention? Or just a small guys watch? He hasn't worn it much yet and I'd need to wear it to see if I'd enjoy wearing a smaller watch as this one. Overall its a nice watch, just smaller than I expected.

B000P4GXZM.A2PJU5MFGYFZN0.reviewText: Diesel is famous for their artfully designed watches and this one proves the opinion is correct. Everything works perfectly here: the blue part matches brown band very well, the silver case has an interesting shape.The price-quality relation is very good, too.I am really happy with my purchase.

B000P4GXZM.A3LUBU2X46ORP3.reviewText: As it's already been pointed out, this is a beautiful watch for a reasonable price. The leather wristband seems to be somewhat fragile, though. Beware it's on the small side for a men's watch.

B000PC0T6S.A271FLTE20PSSY.reviewText: I've been looking EVERYWHERE for this product. It was literally nowhere to be found. When I saw that they had 1 left in stock I immediately purchased it but wondered if it was too good to be true. It wasn't. I gave it to my boyfriend as a gift and he absolutely loved it! It's a quality watch made with very nice leather. Fast delivery, packaging was all still there, great buy!

B000PC0T6S.A2LD3WPUEI90K2.reviewText: I am sending this product back. It looks nice and the design is different, but the negative aspects simply are too much at this point. First, the book they sent with the watch does not contain instructions for this particular model. Therefore, you spend hours trying to figure out how to set the time, which is not easy. There is a big problem  with actually seeing anything on the screen, you basically have to push the light button to make sense of the numbers, if you don't, it looks so pale that it is very hard to see. The watch is kind of heavy, it is not one of these light, modern designs, looks like some objects from the 60's. It is not worth the price.

B000PC0T6S.A34J5SOFQ8R5W9.reviewText: First of all this is a cool looking watch. Secondly if you're not an idiot and you can read the manual its easy to figure the workings of this watch.

B000PC0T6S.A36DCSDLMCYB0I.reviewText: I love the look of this watch and bought it as a gift for my spouse and my son-in-law.  My spouse likes the design of the watch but finds it too wide to give his wrist a full range of motion. It's not an everyday watch for active people. B000PC0T6S.A1CAWB69ORR8M1.reviewText: I purchase this watch several months ago and have loved (and hate) it ever since. I've been in a search for a wide-band leather and digital watch for sometime now. After much effort I came upon this watch and it has served me in more ways than one. My intent with this watch was to wear this on the town while in jeans or dark apparel. I needed something less formal than a metal 1k watch which I wear to work. Something I can beat up and not cry a river over.Since this is worn largely at night, I never had an issue with screen since I would have to hit a button to see the time on any watch. This time piece comes across more as a fashion bracelet than a watch. I am quite a small person (5' 5" with atlentic build) with small wrists (circumference of 17cm), and I never felt this watch was too large for me. Please read below for my critiques.Key features:- Can be set to work in two different time-zones.- Has Chrono, Timer, and 4xAlarms- Can be set to run 24 Hours or 12 Hour format- The ladies love it- Comes in a very impressive white case (I really have no use of it)Flaws:- Useless instruction Manual- Very hard to read screen when worn during the daytime (I had to set the light to "always be on" when pressing any button.- Glass is very fragile, its no crystal glass - it will get cracked if dropped. (I already cracked the entire screen in half)- The black paint and on the watch does weather-down a bit. (It adds character!)Instructions: (Courtesy from another reviewer)Instructions To Set The Time On The Diesel DZ7071 WatchOk the first and most important thing to know about this watch is that it has an unusual timezone function (unusual to me at least). This allows the watch to display two different times. Time 1 (or T1) is the primary time (the time of the place where you spend most of your time!). The time can only be adjusted whilst the watch is in the T1 mode (T1 should be displayed in the bottom left corner of the screen). Holding down the top right button for one or two seconds will temporarily replace the current T1 time with the T2 time. Holding down this same button for several seconds will toggle the current time mode to T2 and the watch will continue to function in the second time zone until you toggle it back to T1.The second most important thing to know is that you can only set the time whilst in the T1 mode. When in T1 mode hold down the top left button until the watch enters the settings menu (it should say "Light" at the top of the screen) now use the bottom left button to toggle through the settings menu until you get to the time settings. I think this part of the process if sufficiently straight forward so I'm not going to go into more details here, all I'll add is that once you have the watch set to the desired time mode 12h/24h time and date you just need to press the top left button to save the settings and return to the main time screen.To set a secondary timezone time you have to first toggle the watch to the secondary time zone mode (hold the top right button for several seconds and the T1 indicator should change to T2 (and the watch will now be displaying the time that is currently set for the secondary timezone). This time is based on the primary time by simply telling the watch a number of whole hours ahead or behind the primary time. To adjust this hold down the top left button for several seconds, the watch will then say "offset" now use the buttons on the right to add or subtract hours from the primary time. Once set press the top left button again to return to the main time screen. Finally hold down the top right button for several seconds once more to return the watch to the T1 mode.

B000PC0T90.A2C6QWV9BY2Z6J.reviewText: I started collecting watches last year and I absolutely love this one. I was looking at it online for a few days thinking if I should get it because normally I am not big on diesel watches simply because they look cheap. However this watch looks absolutely awesome in real life and better than any diesel I've ever seen.Leather band fits snug and there is a second ministrap attached to it that holds the case. The 'mineral glass' (whatever that means) is tinted yellow so it makes the glow in the dark parts of the hour and minute hand useless because you can not see them. This is the one and only thing I don't like and this forces me to give it 4 stars, but if I could it would be 4.5... it's not crucial.There is a large day dial and a large date dial on opposite sides of the second/minute/hour hands. These are much handier than busting out the cell phone, you have your day and date right in front of you and the quarts movement has for the last month kept excellent time. There is only one knob which is small and does not accidentally move as well as being easy to operate.This is a truly awesome watch if you like something with a bit of an industrial look that looks/works great on casual days off or if you are doing work that doesn't require dress clothes. This is by far my cheapest watch, but as far as days not dressing up go, this is my favorite.

B000QTFT4W.A18N1CSWPUU3P5.reviewText: This wristwatch is unique (I've received a number of positive comments) and can be worn as a dress watch or with casual wear. The numbers that list the date are correctly centered on my particular watch (another reviewer received a watch that apparently had the numbers slightly off-center).The "top" of the watch (the area that is farthest from the wrist and includes the face-cover) is rounded so that it doesn't constantly catch on long sleeves - the only downside to this aspect is that the face cover can get scratched.  I work in a building with rough brick walls, and must have brushed the watch against the wall on one occasion because the glass face cover now has 3 minor scratches on it.I have owned this watch for more than three years and overall I have been very pleased with the looks, quality and durability of this watch. I would definitely recommend it to a friend.

B000R4BCC4.A3KK4FT8XC8LWM.reviewText: I purchased these shoes last year since I decided to start wearing heeled shoes more (rather that flat boots, ballet shoes and Toms, so I thought I'd start off with a nice pair of T-strap high heels for extra stability. I wore them once walking around the city and didn't have any pain on my feet at all. The only problem that I encountered was the t-strap on the left shoe moves to the side after walking for a while, so I have to constantly straighten it. Other than that, I think it's a great pair of shoes that is very unique, comfortable and it's decently priced.

B000R4BCC4.A1TPDA650O93DK.reviewText: these shoes are very comfortable. Soft leather.  The heel is high, but practically not felt. Size coincided perfectly. Thank you.

B000R4BCC4.A1UGWK33YUL843.reviewText: Not only are these shoes beautiful - they fit beautifully and do great things for my legs. I must also thank VIRTUAL EXCHANGE for their great service.

B000R4BCC4.A2IQEYAK9F32S1.reviewText: Although the style is very cute and the fit is very good. The packaging when arrived was crushed and the heel of the shoe covered in green suade was scuffed. B000R4BCC4.A1E8UY7J8GQTP6.reviewText: I got these shoes & was amazed at how immediately comfortable they were!  I am out of the habit of wearing heels & these were perfect for readjusting.  The heel is so wide & stable & the t-strap holds your foot in perfect alignment.I got them in both the green/taupe as well as the white/plum.The colors in the green pair are gorgeous and the little pop of pink on the edge is such a great touch.  I love the shades of green because they give you some color, but are slightly muted so you can almost treat them as a neutral.The plum is a bit more blue/muted than I had hoped, but they are still really adorable.In both cases these shoes are so cute that they can elevate even a simple jeans/tee outfit to an attention grabbing look!

B000R4BCC4.A16RPCYT53ANTJ.reviewText: these were bought off my wishlist from a favourite admirer of mine.they are perfectly retro( my style is 1950s pinup/rockabilly) with the t-strap and oxford styling, but very modern with the 3.5 inch heel( unheard of back then).these are soooo comfortable thanks to the thick but not chunky heel. This type of heel, versus its stick thin counterpart, evenly supports your weight and can even help your posture- because let's face it: deliberately walking on the balls of your feet is doing NOTHING for your back.the material is real leather. you'd be surprised how many shoe companies claim their products are made with leather, but then oldly enough, they start peeling and crackling after awhile. hmm....curious. loli hope this was a substantial review- i recommend these babies to everyone!

B000R4BCC4.A1ZCZTM44C7TW3.reviewText: I read somewhere that online reviews are not reliable because most products are overrated. Well, for those shoes, this is precisely the case. I am not a fan of Diesel shoes in general (the look does not appeal to me), but this particular style with the 20s reference in the T-strap, the 30s reverse wingtip, 50s multicolour and especially the fact that it was available in green topped with the raving reviews made me curious enough to make a purchase.Pros: First - the fit - I wear 39 in shoes made in Italy and those fit perfectly length and width wise. On the little label on the inside of the shoe it says "US 8.5" so I guess opposite to the other review, it fits true to size and width. The T-strap comes high enough and the ankle strap is a good length. Second - the color combination is very modern, easy to wear with lots of stuff. The heel is in the neighbourhood of 4" but if you are used to high heels, those shoes are easy to walk on.Cons: When I first got the shoes, I was shocked that none of the reviewers mentioned the glue that was showing around the sole. Also the leather although good is not great. I had mine one time and the fine velour on the heel started to peel off where my pants were rubbing in. Basically it is a good shoe in the $30 price range, anything more is simply not worth it.Probably I am spoiled when it comes to shoes, but the craftsmanship on those is awful. And I do not believe I shall be buying this brand before seeing the shoe in person.

B000R4BCC4.AUQW8VQ1A62EO.reviewText: These shoes are beautiful and both of the other reviewers gave them 5 stars BUT...  When I read the reviews I was disappointed about the lack of useful information because while I am happy to learn that someone thinks her legs look great in the shoes I am more interested in how the shoes fit.Even though I am JUST on the sane side of being a total shoe freak, I'd never heard of Diesel shoes so I had no idea about the sizing. I normally wear 8 1/2 to a 9 in pumps, depending on the brand, but these jumped from 9 to 10 so I ordered the 10.  A 9 1/2 would have been a perfect fit and I believe a 9 would have been agony! As it is, a gel insole will take care of the excess wiggle room and just make a comfortable shoe even more so.  The company put some thought into comfort as well as beauty because there is extra cushioning in the heel as well as the ball of the foot, so a gel insert is not something that you need to factor in when figuring out what size to order.The product info states the heels are 3 1/2 inches and they are, if you only measure to the shortest point of the heel.  From the rubber tip to the top of the heel is 4" with a narrow platform which is just over a 1/4 of an inch. The heel as depicted in the pictures is a good sturdy one, as opposed to the oh so wobbly spike heel, so that extra 1/2 inch is pretty much not an issue unless there is a reason why you are limited to 3 1/2 inch heels. I have a medium width foot and the width on these shoes is perfect for me.  I think anyone with a narrow or wide foot would have problems.  The ankle strap is nice and long so for anyone who thinks she has cankles, you won't feel as though you are strangling your ankle just by trying to close your shoes.  Unfortunately, the T-strap is just a little too long so it doesn't quite lay flat along the foot as you are walking along, but it is not so bad that I would  take  away a star for it.I have walked around my house wearing these shoes for a couple of hours and so far, no rubbing or toes screaming for release.  For the cherry on top, you can stand up straight while walking, unlike some heels where the angle is so steep you look like you are about to pitch forward onto your face.  We all have great looking heels in our closet which are perfect, if you only have to walk from the car to the restaurant or theater seat.  These shoes not only look good on your feet, they still FEEL good after hours of walking or standing, which we all know is very rare.  You can dress these shoes up or down which makes them very versatile, skinny jeans or that little black dress whichever you choose, these shoes will complement the outfit perfectly!These shoes are a GREAT deal at $22.99 but when you order them in US sizes the price jumps to $57.99, for the exact same shoe and fit by the way!  I ordered the Alpine/Taupe, which turned out to be more like Sage/Moss with the lighter green in leather while the darker green, including the heel made of suede.  The White/Dk Plum/Rosedust pair is more like Purple leather with Eggshell or Offwhite suede and the Rosedust is a very understated pale pink suede scalloping between the purple leather and eggshell suede. So for those of you who live in areas where wet stuff falls from the sky these will not be shoes you can wear year round.  For others like myself, who call the desert home, there will be no reason to wait, you can order these and be raking in the compliments by next week.  One final bit of good news, even though it says $9.99 shipping per pair, this company shipped both pairs in the same box and only charged the one shipping charge, unlike some companies which hit you up for the shipping charge per pair.
B000R4BCC4.AUQW8VQ1A62EO.summary: Not just for walking from the car to another nearby seat

B000VDA5YC.A214RN9GUDNQDU.reviewText: My husband loves the watch. He also has one in black and wears them all the time. The price was great!
B000VDA5YC.A214RN9GUDNQDU.summary: Great watch for a great price

B000VDA5YC.A26XHP99P9ZA6C.reviewText: This is a first impression review because my wife gave this to me today as a Christmas gift.The watch is extremely nice to look at and comes in an impressive box to match, it's waterproof and has a clearly laid out display. I think that the watch looks a lot nicer in the real life than it does in the pictures and the quality is very good for the price.I have given the five star rating because of the overall quality, practicality and appearance of the product.The only fault I've found so far is in the provided instruction manual. The instructions booklet is fairly thick but is a generic manual that covers several Diesel watch models in several different languages. That would be perfectly acceptable if it weren't for the fact that this model itself is not covered at all.So having fiddled for quite a while I have finally managed to work out how to set the time - here is what the Diesel manual doesn't (and really should) tell you...Instructions To Set The Time On The Diesel DZ7071 WatchOk the first and most important thing to know about this watch is that it has an unusual timezone function (unusual to me at least). This allows the watch to display two different times. Time 1 (or T1) is the primary time (the time of the place where you spend most of your time!). The time can only be adjusted whilst the watch is in the T1 mode (T1 should be displayed in the bottom left corner of the screen). Holding down the top right button for one or two seconds will temporarily replace the current T1 time with the T2 time. Holding down this same button for several seconds will toggle the current time mode to T2 and the watch will continue to function in the second time zone until you toggle it back to T1.The second most important thing to know is that you can only set the time whilst in the T1 mode. When in T1 mode hold down the top left button until the watch enters the settings menu (it should say "Light" at the top of the screen) now use the bottom left button to toggle through the settings menu until you get to the time settings. I think this part of the process if sufficiently straight forward so I'm not going to go into more details here, all I'll add is that once you have the watch set to the desired time mode 12h/24h time and date you just need to press the top left button to save the settings and return to the main time screen.To set a secondary timezone time you have to first toggle the watch to the secondary time zone mode (hold the top right button for several seconds and the T1 indicator should change to T2 (and the watch will now be displaying the time that is currently set for the secondary timezone). This time is based on the primary time by simply telling the watch a number of  whole hours ahead or behind the primary time. To adjust this hold down the top left button for several seconds, the watch will then say "offset" now use the buttons on the right to add or subtract hours from the primary time. Once set press the top left button again to return to the main time screen. Finally hold down the top right button for several seconds once more to return the watch to the T1 mode.I hope these instructions prove useful to somebody out there (I know they would have been for me as I spent quite a while trying to figure it out whilst in T2 mode).If I could give a score of 4.5 (or 9/10) then I would simply because of the utterly useless manual, however since the watch itself is so good I have been good enough to overlook the manual and give the full five stars.Diesel if you are reading this please note that a simple couple of pages would have been enough to cover what people need to know about setting up this watch.
B000VDA5YC.A26XHP99P9ZA6C.summary: Great watch, shame about the instructions

B000VDA5YC.A2QV2ND9WQS88V.reviewText: I just recieved my watch today. (I suppose this means that I haven't really had it long enough to write a proper review, but I just like it that much I felt I had to.) It's a beautiful watch. The quality and attention to detail is just stunning. It's simple, elegant and cool and retro all in one, and I'm very glad I bought it.The user manual which came with the watch was over one centimeter thick, and contained information about a number of Diesel watches. Apart from this one. This meant that you had to figure out how to set it for yourself, which wasn't to hard. Still, I would have prefered to get some information about the different features and settings, rather than having to figure it all out on my own.

B000VDA5YC.A1H0Z85JV3KEEA.reviewText: It is little bigger than what I expected but good looking and classy.I've got some compliments wearing it since I started wearing it.

B000VDA5YC.A17X1FE00SH0ES.reviewText: If I could give a fractional score, I'd give this watch a 3.5. Since I can't, I'll round down to 3. (Another reviewer rounded up to 5 from 4.5, so my rounding down seems fair in balance.)Yes, it's very attractive. It also has some features that are thoughtful. For example, it's alternate time zone can be viewed either temporarily or more permanently. (Better than the Casio I had where you could accidentally change time zones too easily.) Another example: the "Auto EL" option that allows any of the four buttons to turn on the light. Or, when the chime is turned on, toggling the modes changes the pitch of the sound when you arrive back in the "time" mode. (This makes working with the watch easier when it's dark or you can't look directly at the watch all the time you're adjusting it.)However, the contrast is fairly low between the digits and the background, making it fairly hard to read the time. Secondly, the "T1" indicator that tells you you're viewing the time in the primary time zone is not only miniscule but it actually appears behind one of the metal horizontal crossbars on the watch face so you can't see it!Others have mentioned the problem with the manual: Many pages for other models, and no explicit mention of this one! (Use the instructions for MD-FL298X.) This is really inexcusable.When you figure out that MD-FL298X is the right model to use, even then not all of the instructions are there. For example, you have to find a different model (BD3000) for explanations of the "auto EL" and chime functions.I'm not going to use the chronograph or alarm functions, so I'm not reviewing them. (I'll use my iPhone's Clock application instead: much easier interface!) Since the manual is so bad, I do fear for those needing to use the more-complex functions.
B000VDA5YC.A17X1FE00SH0ES.summary: Attractive + nice features - poor ergonomics - lousy manual

B000VDA5YC.A4Z3T2CB03QWP.reviewText: Very happy with my purchase. Nice size watch. I'm 6' 1" and 240 pounds. I needed something just a little larger and this was perfect. Some watches I've seen are way to large and showy. i prefer the less "blinngy" touch. The instruction book is an inch thick but does a horrible job. I spent 10 minuets on it and figured it out. press  the upper left and lower right button at the same time and "ta duh", you can set the time. Diesel needs to make a manual for the specific watch. How much more could that cost. customers don't need a universal manual for their entire catalog in 20 languages. As I said, I'm a bigger man but not large by any means. the band is on the second to last hole for me with 10 total holes. a much larger wrist and this would not work. Solid product for the price. The display can be slightly difficult to see and the night illumination could be a little brighter, but I'm overall very happy with the quality, price and comfort.

B000VDC53G.AQIX3OIQ93D76.reviewText: Bought this watch for my Husband as a gift.He loves it!It's very stylish when worn with Jeans and a T-shirt...dressesit up with some extra ummph...lolThis watch is a bit larger then it looks to be and would notmake a good watch to be worn with a suit or slacks.It seems to be very sturdy, made with strong materials.Don't buy if you are looking for something that will be aclassic look, that will be in style for years to come.

On the upper right side of the dial, there is a button which when pressed stops the second moving hand until pressed again. B000VDEIYU.A2B3MBFOW6SNWE.reviewText: Just wanted to put in my thoughts a few months after my purchase. I've always been attracted to Diesel's style in their timepieces, and this one was no exception. They released this watch along with a brown version at the same time a few years ago, and I received the latter as a gift back then. I loved the other watch, I received a lot of compliments on it, but with its bold, yellow face, the style was (depending on the outfit and occasion) just a little too out there. Also, the leather band on it started to crease and fail on one side near the watch face after accidentally pulling that band too far backward.ANYWAYS,The time is huge and quite easy to read. If you can't read the time on this sucker you seriously (not even kidding about this) need to get your eyes checked. I don't even know how you would even attempt to read an analog watch with smaller numbers and a small needle pointing to them. This watch is huge, it's manly, the face is at least 2" x 2" and it is much brighter in person than in the product image. Also, THIS WATCH INCLUDES A nice BACKLIGHT that lights up the time only. This is another reason why I was attracted to this watch, the backlight (combined with the negative face) brightens the time only. I prefer alarm clocks that brighten the numbers only, versus shining a bright background that you have to see through to read the dark numbers within. It's efficient, it's easier on the eyes.In 6 months, I can't even count the amount of compliments I've gotten on this watch. I'll pull up my sleeves and I'll immediately get stares, mostly from women, although a few guys have commented. It's sharp, classy, and an eye-catcher. A few women even asked me to take it off to more personally check it out. Also, truth be told, it's the watch Sam Rockwell wears in the movie, Moon (2009), where he's a studly space cadet.PROS: This watch goes with any outfit. It's sexy. It has a cool backlight, a stopwatch, daily alarm clock, accurate date (month, day of the week), durable, waterproof. Compliments from people. Astronaut approved.CONS: Price(?). It's a designer watch, though, so no surprise there.

B000VDEIYU.A26IRX06F94C93.reviewText: Terrible disappointment. I thought the picture of a plain black face with nearly invisible numbers was for show, but that's what it looks like - even when you're trying to find out what time it is.  It's VERY difficult to read in ordinary room light, and IMPOSSIBLE to read in subdued light (even using the lighted dial feature). Readable in bright sunlight or total darkness, that's about it.Sent it back and bought the Phosphor DH01 which costs more but which I can read!

Pasé 10 minutos tratando de encontrar alguna funcionalidad escondida.2. la animación de la fecha y hora es muy chévere...  me gustaría que durara un poco más (solo 2 segundos). B000W9V9V8.A20IQ3PV6NFKOS.reviewText: I received this watch as ordered. The watch looks stunning and looks very good on my wrist. In case u have very small wrists then it may be big for u. If looks different and makes a statement. Amazon delivered it on it and their service was excellent.

B000W9V9V8.A2UR0HBK0EXNC8.reviewText: A confession first - I am a big fan of digital watches (or more specifically, any chronograph that tells the time in a novel or different way to the basic analog/LCD watch), so my opinion may be somewhat biased.Of the 24 digital chronographs I own, this is probably my favourite, second only to my Storm Circuit LED (...). I discovered this model from Diesel while I was searching for a drivers watch and despite being out of my price bracket, I had to have it. It always gets attention whenever I wear it out.It is beautifully crafted and the bracelet design and links are perfectly machined, the clasp snaps shut securely with a satisfying click. It is a solid, fairly heavy piece, but this I like as it gives some indication of the quality and materials. The OLED display is crisp and sharp, my battery is still going strong, almost a year after purchase, however it is much more difficult to see the display during the day, especially if you are outside in the sun. That said, this is a time piece for wearing indoors or for flashing some bling at a nightclub or bar - in the right circumstances, a great conversation starter too! ;)If you're not keen on pressing a button for the time, don't buy an OLED (or any LED) watch! But if you are a fan of unique digital watches, or just want something different yet classy, you will not be disappointed by this. 5 stars for build quality and overall design, minus 1 star because it isn't quite readable in daylight without shading the display.
B000W9V9V8.A2UR0HBK0EXNC8.summary: Not all watches are just for telling the time
