B000XQ74VY.A3Q4HA9RBL3Y0A.reviewText: I have purchased a number of diesel shoes and have been generally satisfied.  The shoe just doesn't fit. I was very suprised.

B000XQ74VY.ACW2K37PCPY9U.reviewText: Love the color & fit.  However they do run small.  I'm a 10m...not available.  Ordered 11m still a little snug.  But if I wear thin socks they are perfect.

B000XQ74VY.A1LUNI83BB8S9H.reviewText: I bought these shoes for a trip to Paris.  I wore them 7 days straight and they are so comfortable.  I did put a heel insert in them because I have Plantar Fasciitis but with that I could not have picked a better shoe for my trip.One day I walked nearly 10 miles and while I was exhausted my feet didn't hurt.  It rained every day I was there and my feet stayed dry - the leather and suede combination was perfect.Unfortunately I really trashed these after walking through the Tuileries Gardens in enormous puddles day after day.  Had I been home I would have tried to salvage them when I got home, but I was traveling with just a carry on and bought too much, so I left them behind.  I got more than $50 worth out of them and I'm seriously considering purchasing another pair as they look nice with jeans, are super comfy and are perfect traveling shoes.As other reviewers have stated these do run small, I always wear a 41, and went up to a 42 and they were perfect.

B000XQ74VY.A2NM1EBGCDPISQ.reviewText: love these sneakers. Anything Diesel just reminds me of Europe. Goeswith any sporty outfit you may have.

B000XQ74VY.A2IDC5B3L6Q2UE.reviewText: The diesel Baffin is a great casual shoe.  It is comfortable and the style is great with jeans.  I now have two pairs in two different colors.

B000XQ75SQ.A6J02T044GA42.reviewText: i agree with previous reports (that i should have read BEFORE ordering the shoes).  Not sure if it is this distributer, or the shoe style itself, but they were definitely a little too snug.  Unfortunately, returning or exchanged costs just as much as just buying another pair.

B000XQ75SQ.A2RGT7IKB4PMOI.reviewText: This shoe is worth it. I purchased it in the pink and grey as well and they are still in great condition today. Heavy rotation in my wardrobe. I wear these all the time and they are comfy and have lasted. They do run small so consider orderin 1/2 size to one full size up. I am pleased with this purchase
B000XQ75SQ.A2RGT7IKB4PMOI.summary: nice shoe still looks brand new

B000XQ75SQ.A1RTKPCLPNZZ9I.reviewText: Shoes are very beautiful. Weight light, shoe body soft.Wear comfortable, should be very good to walk.Ready to have been put in the bag as backup.

B000XQ75SQ.A2ETW2DIPF8MBL.reviewText: Loved the way these looked on the computer but once I got them...... not only were they small but really uncomfortable!

B000XQ75SQ.A1VSAZW397B189.reviewText: Pros - Pretty shoe, good construction overallCons - This shoe seemed about 1/2 size smaller and was very tight in the toe.  I will have to pay to have it stretched in order to wear.I ordered this because of a great Diesel shoe I purchased in the past.  I like the distictive style of the Diesel brand.
B000XQ75SQ.A1VSAZW397B189.summary: tight fit - order one size larger

B000XQ75SQ.A3W1X57OUU2K4H.reviewText: I love the look of these shoes and having noted other reviews I ordered half a size larger than I usually wear.  They are still too small. I should have ordered a full size larger.  Hopefully a shoe repairer can stretch them enough that I'll be able to wear them. If you order this shoe, go up one full size.Because I am overseas the postage cost of return and exchange is prohibitive.Edited to add.  Don't give up if you find these shoes to be a bit small.  I wore the shoes around the house for two days with fairly thick socks on and they stretched enough to be quite comfortable to wear out and about.

B000XQ75SQ.A1FJYJEYQ48WYX.reviewText: THis is my third pair of these shoes. I read the reviews before I ordered them the first time. They run a full size to small. I always order an 8 and I wear a 7. THese shoes always get noticed. Cute cute cute shoes. FYI they do stretch.
B000XQ75SQ.A1FJYJEYQ48WYX.summary: read the reviews. They run very small!

B000XQ75SQ.A2JFGTRLRQA1GN.reviewText: I am usually a size 7.5 (sometimes an 8) but in slip ons like this almost always a 7.5, so I ordered the 7.5, when they arrived, I was SOOOO excited, they looked even better than in the picture, BUT they were SO SMALL!!!!  I ended up ordering the 8 and when they arrived, they too were too small!!!  Diesel has totally stuffed up their sizings for this gorgeous shoe!  I suggest you order a full size bigger (2, half sizes) than you normally wear. I should have got the 8.5They are very cute shoes though and will go with denim skirts and 3/4s, little wee dresses, minis, etc.
B000XQ75SQ.A2JFGTRLRQA1GN.summary: Look GREAT.... The FIT is TERRIBLE!!!

B000XQ75SQ.A2AII8NVJIT0U7.reviewText: This is a nice shoe however i found it to be a small fit. I have always fitted into an 8.5 wihtout any problems. In fact normally it is slightly large on one foot. These however are very small for an 8.5. Tight even on my smaller foot. I would suggest buying 1/2 size bigger.
B000XQ75SQ.A2AII8NVJIT0U7.summary: Good shoe but fit is small

B000XQ75SQ.A2GDX8X591G67N.reviewText: I own about 4 pairs of Diesel shoes currently.  I am aware they almost always run small so I did order a full size bigger than my normal show size and that worked okay.  The shoes however are not very cute and dig into the tops and the back of my feet! After one day of wearing them I had horrible blisters on the backs of my feet and deep red lines all along the top of my feet.  Completely uncomfortable! I even tried lining them with moleskin until I was able to break them in but the moleskin wouldn't even stay on.  I could have purchased any other pair of $25 ahoes and been at least 50% happier then I am with these.

B000XQ75SQ.A20ZR5Z2BLXO8C.reviewText: Diesel is one of my most favorite shoes, as they are comfy and fit my strange foot easily.  This is the first time I have bought shoes without trying them on... they fit perfectly and are the envy of the young at heart.  Thanks amazon.

B000XQ75SQ.A1B00KH2QBWE65.reviewText: I ordered these shoes in the Champagne color.  I was very excited when I opened the box because they are very stylish and cute.  However when I tried them on I was beyond disappointed!!  First they ran about a half size too small, secondly the heel with all the detail was so painful on my feet.  What a big disappointment - needless to say I am returning these asap!

B000XQ75SQ.A2M2CK5ZJQ0I4S.reviewText: The shoes aren't bad, although not quite as cute as the picture.  They run incredibly small though--make sure to order at least a size up. I've worn them for a couple of months now and thankfully, they do stretch a bit, but if my feet are swollen in the least, they are uncomfortable because they are relatively narrow.  I bought the purple/red versions and I made sure to put a suede protector on them because they will stain easily.

B000XQ75SQ.AQK4WNA897ND5.reviewText: These shoes are super cute and the color is great.  But they do in fact run way too small.  This is because the leather that goes around the shoe has no give.  I gave it 3 stars because I just cut the leather in the back and they fit good now. Get an entire size bigger at least...

B000XQ75SQ.A30F2KEU3FES13.reviewText: They run horribly small and I wish it had noted that somewhere in the product description.  The sellers are even worse.

B000XQ75SQ.A1QDFEZHEH1IQQ.reviewText: These are no different then the picture, very easy to slip in and out of and true to size.

B000XQ75SQ.A1JBGXJ61NNV3F.reviewText: I purchased the beige style, a neutral tone that I find matches most anything. For flats they are well-cushioned and flexible - very comfortable! I wear them every chance I get.

B000XQ75SQ.A1OS7A35ZQUBWS.reviewText: After reading ALL the helpful reviews,Here's mine: I am a 7.5 or 8 so after reading the reviews I decided on the 8 and a half(8.5)It arrived exactly on time. I was thrilled, put them on and immediatley felt the top and heel portion "digging" into my skin. They JUST fit. An adorable shoe, but I can already tell I will only wear these in a pinch. Like if I am desperate or in a hurry to just "throw something on" I would never wear these for a long period of time for theese shoes seem and feel as if they were not intended for human feet. Maybe they will feel comfortable if they were inceredibly broken in but im not sure if I am willing to take the time to do that. Right off the bat, they were not very comfortable but they will "do" thank GOD i didnt get anything smaller, in fact I wish I would have even got the size 9 instead.

B000XQ75SQ.A3600VEV4LW01N.reviewText: I know one foot is slightly bigger than another but on this case. One shoe fit too snug. Since I wore them, I was unable to return them. Waste of $50.

B000XQ75SQ.A3V9I626E72ADZ.reviewText: Ordered a size larger than normal and they fit nicely. They don't hurt my feet but they aren't comfort shoes by any means. They make up for that by looking great.

B000XQ75SQ.A2YDJEEQKPH3QY.reviewText: I would have loved to have been able to actually wear these shoes.  I bought a ladies size 9, which is what I wear in every other shoe, but the way these fit, they felt like an 8.  They run what seems at least one size too small, and that is unfortunate, since buying them off of the internet requires that customers must trust the online company they are buying from to have proper sizing.  It's too bad customers can't trust this company for that.  I should have researched this company beforehand... had I done so, I would have seen that other customers have had the same complaint.
B000XQ75SQ.A2YDJEEQKPH3QY.summary: pretty but fit is too small

B000XQ75SQ.AWYQXZSD4I8NM.reviewText: The shoes are absolutely beautiful but do run at least a 1/2 size too small. I normally wear size 9 shoes but these 9's are definitely too small. I have tried to strecth them but alas, they are still too small. I can wear these for a short walk but would definitely hurt my toes if I wore them any longer. They are lovely and confortable though... just order a 1/2 size up.

B000XQ75SQ.A12CPPY9OIRRK2.reviewText: I was very disappointed when I received these sneakers as I don't agree with the reviews about them being "cute".  They are made with cheap materials and look awkward on your feet.

B000XQ75SQ.A3NE0U63OF66J0.reviewText: If your size is US 7.5, order US 8.5 will fit perfectly. The shoe is very cute,comfortable, and unbeatable price.
B000XQ75SQ.A3NE0U63OF66J0.summary: Nice shoe, just order 1 full size up will be fine

B000XQ75SQ.A3N8RWNXP4O278.reviewText: Somewhat small and the quality I'm not sure because it looks better on the picture than it actually does when you have it in front of your eyes.

B000XQ75SQ.A3HHNCEFGJVUA9.reviewText: Hello.. This is the 3er pair of shoes that i bought of this model, i just love it.. and the store delivered before i expected, they were so fast.thank you
B000XQ75SQ.A3HHNCEFGJVUA9.summary: perfect size and comfort in a shoe

B000XQ78KQ.A1YCL6FLUZXXA1.reviewText: These shoes are perfect city shoes. They are comfy and light weight and very durable too. They look great with all colors. Good for walking and even at the gym for things like weight lifting, stretching, etc. They are also less expensive online than at most shoe stores.

B000XQ78KQ.AD0XGI18N5X4G.reviewText: i am wearing than almost every day , in summer they are wonderful and in winter just perfect , !

B000XQBLGS.AA0GHLQ13M8HL.reviewText: I bought these shoes in the black/pink combo in July. By December, with only average wear, they were in the trash. The leather on the outside was torn up beyond explanation. What a waste of money. It sucks, because they were really cute. I loved the fact that they didn't have laces, and they were nice and comfortable.
B000XQBLGS.AA0GHLQ13M8HL.summary: Were really cute, while they lasted.

B000XQD4YU.AXGTFT5LVZUZH.reviewText: I ordered the violet, there a pretty sharp shoe. They're comfy now but I normally wear a 7.5 or 8 and I should have ordered the 8. They hurt my feet for a minute...so if you wear a range of sizes order the largest size you wear.

B000XQDKJ4.AYCQWZUB8R1Y8.reviewText: I purchase this for my wife and she love them, they are light and comfortable, you feel like you don't have anything on.
B000XQDKJ4.AYCQWZUB8R1Y8.summary: Good For not to big of price.

B000XQGWSU.A2J4N4S85PJF3.reviewText: I love these shoes - and I have received a lot of compliments while wearing them. They fit well and feel pretty good. I would not wear them if you're doing a lot of walking, because they'll rub against your heel, but that's true of any shoe like this. Now I only wish I had more clothes to match them so I could wear them more often.

B000XQGWSU.A10DVNIVICK0K2.reviewText: When I opened the box i thought " O oo,wrong size", but i was wrong they fit perfectly, but they look  huge but it's ok, they are very cute. I'll wear them  definitely .Some  of  the white parts were  dyed in red , but i have washed only dyed parts with  water and some washing -gel,  very accurate  and they disappeared.

B000XQGWSU.A1RQJM5J79DP6K.reviewText: I couldn't believe the price that this seller offered.I got the shoes sooner than I expected...they look better than the picture and fit perfectly!A word of advice the conversion between continental  European  and American sizes is not accurate, I order my size according to the Italian one and they fit perfectly, but if you order from U.S. calculate an extra half size, or if you have wide feet a whole size.

B000XQGWSU.A382XK5XQUYCHM.reviewText: These shoes are cute for sure, but the fabric is exceptionally hard. They are really uncomfy to wear ... to the point that I'll have to give them away. Another small complaint is that the white looks a little dirty in person. I gave it 2 stars rather than one because the price was so low.

B000XQGWSU.A3SFS8R1T6JJM9.reviewText: Bought these several months ago from another retailer.  Paid $24.99 for them and that included shipping.First of all, when they arrived, they were not white with red, they were white with red blotches.  The dye from the rest of the shoe had gotten onto the white areas.  I made an attempt to wipe off the dye with a dry rag and then I tried a wet paper towel to no avail.  When I contacted the seller about this, they told me that Diesel is known for its unusual style and that they like to sell their stuff so that every shoe looks different...  Okay, whatever.Then I tried them on.  Whoa, my feet hurt...  I will probably donate these to a squirrel family in my backyard.

B000XQGWSU.A1BPL1U71YBU1W.reviewText: I purchased these mainly because of the great reviews and they're cute. I am a size 8. They run small (no, my foot has not grown lately). They feel like a 7.5. The material is also rigid and not comfortable at all. Too bad.

B000XR8DR2.A1YFM3HLHDJ99R.reviewText: This is a very comfortable pair of shoes.  One thing that I do want to point out is that they are made in Vietnam, not China like it has described in the product info.

B000XR8DR2.A222L7Z7H0A1DL.reviewText: When I first got the snickers they didn't feel right and I was almost sorry about this purchase, but after about two weeks they became very comfortable and now I wear them almost every day and must say that this product is exactly what I was looking for casual use.Pros: Very easy to put on - no laces to fight with in a hurry. Feel very comfortable. Nice looks especially when worn together with jeans. Leather and internal lining are good quality, soft and pleasant to touch.Cons: May not feel right at first (hence 4 stars).

B000XR8DR2.A2PGD5ZN2S45PH.reviewText: most comfortable pair of sneakers i've worn in a long time.  My one complaint is the difficulty finding big sizes i.e size 13

B000XR9TIO.A9Z8PZH0OICWT.reviewText: they are light. diesel store doesn't sell them anymore . i got mine from diesel shoes about 5 years ago.  this shoes last for so long..i . i have pair 7US. NOW I WANT 7 1/2US SIZE....  let me know if you have that size., i won't think twice to get a pair!!!!  i definitely , i recommend to others buyer..... awesome deal..........

B000XR9TIO.A1YUXS5QZO9EOO.reviewText: I have the mudd color version and they are great shoes.  Very comfortable from the first day and getting even better (been 2-3 weeks).  I can wear these to school or out somewhere nice.  I recommend getting very low cut socks preferably a darker color.  The only problems is the arch on the right foot feels kinda funny, but I used to wear orthotics (arch support), if you don't have real normal feet you might want to try these on.  They run true to size.  Great!

B000XRJ7B8.A1YKC82L3HWRJQ.reviewText: I loved my first pair so much that I looked everywhere to find the second pair.  They're great - comfortable, stylish, and durable.  I'll probably go for pair number three soon!  (I wear them everywhere, and I walk everywhere).

B000Y43MZM.A6RZTEF2YH08X.reviewText: I love these boots.  I got pairs in brown and also in black and I couldn't be happier for my purchase.  I have large calfs and they actually zip up and don't cut off circulation.  I definitely can't tuck my pants in them, but it's ok to have them folded right above them.  They look like something from space...Jetson boots. LoL.  I am glad I went by a review I read about these boots because they guy was right.  I'm soooo happy I trusted their recommendation and got them (especially for the price I did- on sale around Thanksgiving).  Thanks again Amazon!

B000Y43MZM.A2QN0L8YFWU19R.reviewText: great boot, great quality, size! color...fit great...love them...I wish I could find this boots in black!!! I love to wear them! good choice of boots! diesel always great!

B000Y43MZM.A2MOI0WWD69PGL.reviewText: The excellent footwear with modern and unusual, inside a heater, the size corresponds, it is convenient to carry. Were pleasant to all acquaintances. I advise to buy, they it is better, than on a picture!

B000Y43MZM.ABRT5CDITQ8X5.reviewText: These boots are AWESOME. I wanted boots I could wear on snowy days that would actually look cute at work and running around town. These are it! They're super comfortable, waterproof, and have a sole that's great in ice and snow. They run true to size if not a little small- I ordered a 1/2 size larger so I could wear thick socks, but they don't feel that big. I was nervous about the weird colors, but the beige/champagne is really cute. Love these! I'm going to order more in black!

B000Y43MZM.A2EAUM6BZ3C2VO.reviewText: these are great, a little narrow for my feet, but i suspect they will stretch with more wear on the dance floor, i got lots of compliments at burning man, where they made their fantastic debut

B000Y43MZM.A30FWWM2Q38PWX.reviewText: The Diesel boots are super comfortable and cute! I love the design and the color! They look great with dresses as well!

B000Y43MZM.A6T646P5F4ZNO.reviewText: Great boots but I had to return them because of the calf size being too small!  Really wished I could have kept them!  Super cute

B000Y43MZM.A1M4FTY4V63VRA.reviewText: They are very cute and comfortable.  I normally wear size 6 and have a small calf.  I purchased size 6.5 because size 6 was not available.  6.5 is a bit lose on me.

B000Y43MZM.AS8J78UGXATLT.reviewText: wow!!  I did well, they are a lovely cocoa brown & they do fit!  they are sturdy & good looking!  I think they are water proof but I will spray them just in case!

B000Y43MZM.AN7I664YPJSHS.reviewText: Totally not waterproof, and definitely run small, but very cute! I have gotten many compliments. They are kind of sci-fi :-)

B000Y43MZM.A2MZ7ZSB6ETOTH.reviewText: Love Diesel products, and this one didn't let me down. this pair of boots is very unique and cool. I did freak out at first, as they felt like don't fit right, but wearing them at home a little, they streached out a bit, and now they are perfect.thank you

B000Y43MZM.A1YJT4L247EW0L.reviewText: I love Diesel shoes, as well as this item. These boots have a very awesome sporty look. The soft fabric lining inside makes you feel very comfortable and warm. The rugged zippers are very well designed, I love the way they look but they are really hard to work with, very stiff and don't run smooth at all, so you will have to use some force in order to pull them each time. But once you're done with the zipper, it becomes really easy to put on and off your feet. Love them!

B000Y43MZM.A1YO39XUT9299I.reviewText: I love the look of these boots.  The fit did throw me off a bit.  It is the first Diesel shoe I purchased so I was not too familiar with how their fit was.  I have to wear a thinner sock so that the boot is not too snug.

B000Y43MZM.A1SDY0Q38CSR5Z.reviewText: I love this boots, I made a blind online purchase and it worked out.  Great quality and craftsmenship.  You need to wear them a couple of days in a row and they break in great.  I was worried they would stain easily but so far they have not let me down.

B000Y43MZM.A1BDYH9QV159XZ.reviewText: The shoes are just as shown on pictures! They are wery comfortable and nice looking at the same time. You can run around all day long and don't fill that you have them on! I love them. And plus, I can were them when it's raining and my feet are always dry!
B000Y43MZM.A1BDYH9QV159XZ.summary: These shoes are made for you!

B000YEMBDG.A3POAWC2JPQQQP.reviewText: If you are unsure of what size to get, get one size bigger. The size of this particular underwear runs somewhat small.

B0010J2UGW.A1D1IBGE58ZTSM.reviewText: I have owned this watch for over a year and wear it every day. It's quite durable and I constantly receive compliments on it. Some other reviewers have commented on the band being of low quality. I disagree. My watch has worn very well. If you want a watch band to stay in pristine condition, buy a watch with a metal, or even plastic, band. Leather is meant to wear.

B0010J2UGW.AIQZ97S8Y4FL4.reviewText: This Diesel watch its a good example of a fashion watch thats match with all styles.

B0010J6WW0.A32JAD9PWZ0B9N.reviewText: The watch was broken at arrival and does not work! I must send it from Brazil to USA...  quite boringI am disappointed with Amazon's quality control

B0010J8T9E.A1X0ZVP2TQMTKW.reviewText: I bought this as a gift.  It arrived on time.  It was in Deisel's signature packaging and made a really nice gift.  The next one is for me!

B0012IZF7W.A2L4BZ7E2FFY7M.reviewText: These shoes look good but, they do not treat your feet good at all.The elastic strings are very painful after having the shoes on for a couple of hours.Very disappointing.

B0012IZF7W.A1D0268K73CTYQ.reviewText: These shoes are cute but the elastic lacings are torture devices!  I bought the shoes to wear when I work in the Library on Saturdays, when I am on my feet 9 hours, and by the end of two hours I was looking for the scissors to cut the laces.

B0013AQ3RK.A1FNHDWSN2KA0G.reviewText: I collect watches and I keep noticing I grab this one more often than many others... I also love the way it looks and the hands glow a bit in the dark too, not that much mind you, but still enough for you to see the time.This watch will be noticed by people, its case isn't oversized but it's still a big watch. All my friends really like it and even though Diesel watches are not that expensive, they sure look like it.

B0013AQ3RK.A224YGZPPDGT8E.reviewText: Very good watch.  I got it for my brother for X-Mas and he liked it so much that I even decided to buy one for myself and for my father.  Great watch.  You can wear it out, you can wear it work or at any function.

B0013AQ3RK.A1DFQ9PBQMZ63V.reviewText: Good lookin' watch, made with high quality materials. Comfortable to wear and easy to read. Love the face style and the wide heavy duty band.

B0013FNOWC.A2QZEQK17IQUCU.reviewText: I love this watch and it has served me for years, keeps excellent time and it feels nice on my wrist and everybody likes it .........

B00144N85U.A17T2NW8ZXCE91.reviewText: This t-shirt was made in China.  If you buy this t-shirt for $74, please give me so money, because you have alot of money to waste.
B00144N85U.A17T2NW8ZXCE91.summary: If you buy this t-shirt, you are a fool.

B0014E9S7C.AL4ZP6UG6QXCW.reviewText: These are really ugly in person. They look kind of like weird dance shoes from the 80's. they really don't work.

B0014E9S7C.AIH2VQ9982IJ3.reviewText: I bought two pairs - in black and white. I adore the white ones, they are gorgious and they fit well with all jeans I have. The black ones aren't bad, but I don't like there the shiny part in the front - it is too visible.

B0014E9XRW.A4FT1XK3VSOB3.reviewText: I truly love these sneakers. Love the look, comfortable fit too. But the size is a lot smaller. I usually ware 6.5-7. Bought these in 7 but 8 would be definitely better. Actually I did not understand it at first, thought it's just a little bit tight, but no, now I see - 8 would be perfect. In fact my feet are thin.

B0014E9XRW.A3SJBGPUAXIXP.reviewText: I love these shoes! I had been looking for a pair of high tops that were not Chuck Taylors and these were perfect. I initially saw them on Zappos for $85 and fell in love (they were a slightly different color, but for $50 less I don't mind). They seem to fit true to size, maybe a little snug for a sneaker, but not enough to warrant buying a size up, unless perhaps you have wide feet. When I bought these, the description said leather, but they seem to have corrected that and they are indeed canvas as the picture suggests (which I was grateful for). Only time will tell how comfortable they are, but they seem great so far. If I have any issues, I will update.

B0014EBQ40.AXKGZQXC2ISUF.reviewText: A great basic flat with a bit of flare--the D'Orsay cut and pleating around the toe give it interest.  A little tight around the vamp but probably fine for someone with feet not as wide as mine.

B0014EBQ40.A1I54Y1LU1L39P.reviewText: The shoe was pretty, but runs way too small. There was also yellow glue showing in places. had to return because larger size was unavailable.

B0014EBQ40.A2ADTWWUYJW65.reviewText: I bought them because they are so cute... But I was terribly disappointed with how hard the leather is. I only wore them around the house for a test and realized that if I were to walk in them long enough, they would give me blisters in front and back. Because they are so pretty, I took them to the shoe shop to see if they can be stretched and I was told that this isn't real lather, so they can't be stretched. I had to return them.In other words - they were just unwearable, so the cuteness doesn't count.

B0014EBQ40.A10ON7VRRR03TH.reviewText: Great shoes, but they do rub around the top front which tends to hurt my feet.  If I would have tried them on first, probably wouldn't have bought them... Regular diesels more comfortable!

B0014ED8MI.A3KLNW5UHIXU68.reviewText: They are comfortable and stylish.It has arch support.I wish I had ordered 8.5 size but half size bigger doesn't slip off.

B0014ED8MI.A1UC66WXXW9XDP.reviewText: these sneakers are extremely comfortable and fit just the size. Mine food is normal(M), so for me are ok

B0014EDSGY.A24HT9FC6OU1J2.reviewText: I wore these shoes 3 times, and the suede in the front started "peeling" off.  Good price, but once again you get what you pay for.
B0014EDSGY.A24HT9FC6OU1J2.summary: Cute, but these do not last

B0014EDSGY.A1Q5O65V2SKM4J.reviewText: These are the cutest sneakers. They go with everything and are very comfortable. There is no break-in time, they are roomy and bendable and would recommend them to others.

B0014EDSGY.A3O0NB5QNWRUP7.reviewText: this is a great pair of sneakers in looks and comfort.  worth way over the price i bought it for!

B0014EDSGY.A2XJDCDGOSPZAR.reviewText: I like this product. I actually bought different color of these sneakers. The price is very affordable as well.

B0014EDSGY.A1WZ5CMSFAXQHC.reviewText: I love Diesels! The red and white look great together. They are extremely comfortable. Cute candy striped laces. They arrived in good shape.

B0014EDSGY.A1JEH5LWBGE23.reviewText: I love these shoes.  I was able to wear them home from work (I walk 4 miles a day).  They are sturdy and light.  The only thing is they run big.  I'm a size 71/2-8. I bought the 8 just in case and they are more like a 9.  I have to wear 2 thick pair of socks every time I wear them.  I think for the price it's a good buy.

B0014EE6PG.ACHLMUXQXUMVN.reviewText: I adore these shoes. I'm not sure what the other user is talking about; they fit my feet perfectly.

B0014EE6PG.A31FJEVN8C5V9T.reviewText: The tongue of the shoe has too much fabric and causes grief when trying to put the shoe on.
B0014EE6PG.A31FJEVN8C5V9T.summary: Too much fabric in the toe of the shoe.

B0014EE6PG.A1KLL7NNOA93OY.reviewText: These shoes are perfect! They fit very well and look great in person. They are a bargain for the price since they can sell upwards to $100.00! I ordered them in the 'white' which is a nice dark tan with thin navy blue lines. They go perfect with any outfit, I highly recommend these shoes!Also, I experienced no problem with the fabric of the shoes causing discomfort when putting the shoes on.
B0014EE6PG.A1KLL7NNOA93OY.summary: These shoes are a must have!

B0014EE6PG.A216T9L76SWSBX.reviewText: I love the look and comfort of these shoes.  My only minor complaint is that you really have to untie the shoe everytime you put it on... you can't just squeeze your feet in.

B0014EE6PG.A1P67F2YGDUC7A.reviewText: the only thing that is not good enough about them is the size, it is a little smaller than it should be. A half size larger will fit better.

B0014EEO6C.A2BLO6F3PODA49.reviewText: I love these shoes.  They are super comfortable and fit perfectly!  I've had them for a while now and they have held up nicely.

B0014EFR4A.AHR8MU8TR7KW9.reviewText: I got these shoes in silver/rose red, and they were way cuter in person than online.  The "red" is really a hot pink, which looks cute against the silver.  However, that part of the shoe dug into my ankle bone which was really uncomfortable.  After reading other reviews, I ordered a 6.5 rather than my usual 7, and the length fit well, but they were way too wide around the arch area.  This made them look really awkward since they were snug around the toes and roomy around the middle of the foot.  I thought they were really cute shoes until I put them on.  Sadly, I'll be sending these back.

B0014EFR4A.A2690GUW23Z1EU.reviewText: these are the best sneakers. they dont lace and theyre really comfy and light weight.

B0014EFR4A.A3RPV85AKVYWGH.reviewText: These shoes were perfect to exercise in or just slip on to run errands. Great price and comfort. I loved not having to tie the shoelaces. Everywhere I went people stopped me wanting to know where I got them!

B0014EFR4A.A2E09C7N0OV73B.reviewText: I bought these in silver and they are SO UGLY in person that I'm donating them to charity. The slits on the side just look stupid because you can see your socks. And the lace up thing looks weird and doesn't even open wide enough for you to easily get your foot into the shoe. And the net that goes all the way around the shoes is very prominent in person and makes them look like a fisherman's shoe. The only good thing about them is that once your foot is inside, the shoe is very comfortable. And FYI, they run a little big so you might want to order a half size down.

B0014EFR4A.A12W3OGQVDRXM4.reviewText: This is a very attractive shoe.  There seems to be problems with the design/construction.  I tightened the laces up, but there appears to be, what is best described as, excess space on the outer part of the shoe.  It was "baggy". The length was true to fit, but the structure did not provide support width-wise, or for the arch.Bottom line, although a cute style, looked saggy on foot and provided no support.
B0014EFR4A.A12W3OGQVDRXM4.summary: Bought it, loved it, sent it back...

B0014EFR4A.A307YFSORUAXSQ.reviewText: I love Diesel sneakers and these were no exception. I normally wear an 8 but due to pregnancy have been fitting in an 8.5. I bought an 8.5 and they fit well. They do seem slightly loose but they aren't big. They're just not tight. So if you like your shoes tight, these are not for you. They have laces but don't lace. It has a tighteneing device which you push up and down, very similar to what is found on backpacks and such. It is very convenient for me being pregnant so I don't have to bend and lace. I just slip on and go. So far I've worn them with and w/o socks and they look and feel fabulous. My husband thought they were hot and my daughter wishes they made them in her size. I got them in blue and white and since I got them on sale so cheap i might just buy another pair. I had a pair of Diesels about 10 years ago and got my hubby and sister in law  addicted to their shoes. Since then it's been hard to find women's Diesel sneaks. I'm so glad I got these.

B0014EFR4A.AQ3DLP7DT21P5.reviewText: I bought these sneakers before my trip to Europe. I wore them brand new and I never got blisters-- didn't even have to break them in, they were SO COMFY. They were a fantastic deal and held up well to all the walking. They're also trendy and compact (not some big honking tennis shoes with springs and foam!). My favorite thing is the laces. You don't have to tie them, they're held on my a springy clasp, so you just adjust the clasp! :)

B0014EFR4A.A2PWVNLANA08KR.reviewText: i like this sneaker its cut big but its real comfortable next time ill order a half size smaller .but i really like it

B0014EGWJO.A2AC82V2I09VLP.reviewText: I was soooo excited to receive these shoes. I wanted an alternative option besides the chuck taylor sneakers and I have been a fan of diesel for years. When I received these shoes the fit is a little misleading. The shoes were a little uncomfortable to wear at first then I guess I got used to them. I still love diesel and will definitely be ordering more of their products.

B0014EJVBA.A1IGDZRW1MI5YN.reviewText: Love these! However, you may buy the size up b/c they are very snug!! I have a very narrow foot (7 1/2) and they are still hard to get my foot situated into. If you have a wider foot, these may not be for you.

B0014EJVBA.AKWXG0SJ66I9Z.reviewText: These shoes are very nice but run a bit short.  I wear an 8 and ordered 8.5 but found that I should have ordered a 9.  I have never worn a 9 in my life.  Disappointed!

B0014EJVBA.A2QAFK2YOHEACK.reviewText: Unfortunately those shoes were a disappointment of the year. First of all- the ruffle in the front didnt look cute and appealing- more like oversized... 2ndly once it rained I had stains on the leather portion that never went away. And lastly- they didnt survive the first wash- huge regret.

B0014EK6R8.A8QLLYJDEPC3O.reviewText: I can't explain how much I love this shoes :p the color is gorgeous. They are super comfy and very well made :) the price is reasonable too. They look great with dark jeans and mini skirts :) they are true to size I am 6.5 and they fit perfectly :D I wish they had them in MORE COLORS!! I have over 30 pairs of shoes, mostly flats and this are my favorite pair <3

B0014EK6R8.A2KGLJQG07S1BN.reviewText: Very cute and stylish, and the price, you cannot beat that!!! I got these in white/black. Did not wear them yet, im waiting for spring.i would say the fit true  to size, they are not wide, as some flats tent to be. They snug your feet and are very comfy. I had a chance to try a .5 size up and they fit wide and big.

B0014EK6R8.A2PCGYNROY67GJ.reviewText: i love this shoes . they`re so comfy and i get a lot of compliments on then ;averybody wanst to know where i get them .!!!

B0014EK6R8.A254LCNPCDKEDY.reviewText: I wasn't too sure about these when I saw them online, but the reviews helped me make the decision to buy them.  I am glad I ordered them, they are so cute and comrfortable!  I wasn't sure how the footbed would feel sicne some flats lack any sup[port at all.  These were soft and not restricting at all.  Got them in the pinkand they are super cute!  looks great with shorts!

B0014EK6R8.A23CK8HZZ8GP4I.reviewText: I bought this shoe in white/black. They run a little small, so I got a 1/2 size bigger.  Comfortable, with a non-slip bottom.  A cute little peep toe and it looks great on your foot.  Great price too!!!

B0014EK6R8.AUKARXKO8ZBZ1.reviewText: I simply love this shoes. They are true to their size, comfortable, and flexible, yet giving enough support to your feet.

B0014EK6R8.A3PVFZPA97F3W9.reviewText: How about making them in narrow sizes?  My wife liked the looks but she is a 10N.  She has a hard time finding shoes that fit.  I'd like to see her in these but she can only wear sandals because no one wants to make narrow shoes.

B0014EMELY.A3KMNP6T8U34JF.reviewText: These are a nice alternative to the ratty flip flop in the summer at the pool or beach.

B0014EMELY.AB7YEDBLPZLQY.reviewText: not as comfortable as I expected but when I think the price, it is wonderful :)

B0014EML1C.A1ODAX6HZA675C.reviewText: I got these in Camellia Rose, and yes, they are really pretty! But when walking in these, they'd make my feet really uncomfortable. Nice padded but the back lining is somehow rough and hard like rock, especially the foot ball area. So after a couple minutes wearing, my feet got blisters. So sad, they are sooo cute!

B0014EPAIS.A2PPR42442X0YN.reviewText: I have these flip flop in white/clear colour. They don't fit property when you are walking. Every step thinking how to hold them on my feet, cause the strings are not on the middle of the flip flop. Really waist of money.

B0014ERLPI.A2KGQVD2ATECRH.reviewText: Fast shipping. I bought it as a gift but unfortunately it did not fit as other brands with the same shoes size. I recommend to get larger size.

B0014ERLPI.A3LHI0LG2HBJCL.reviewText: I've never owned any diesel's before but i thought they'd would be made of higher quality.  they are kind of flimsy and not all that comfortable, but are cute.

B0014ERLPI.A2ZZ4VFF5Z8SCN.reviewText: These sneakers look exactly the same in real, and they are so comfortable you want to wear them all the time! The material is very good and durable.

B0014ERLPI.A9BT27CQTM44U.reviewText: This pair of shoes is very comfortable to wear.  It was very nice looking when it was new.  However, it does get dirty very easy, mainly due to the white color.  I still like it very much.

B0014ERLPI.A1TF8JGEYISD82.reviewText: These shoes survived our 44th presidential inauguration.  What more can I say---comfy shoe.  Of course, with them being white it's hard to keep them clean but they are definitely shoe stoppers.  Grabbed plenty of comments for their sporty look.

B0014ERLPI.A1MEMXBKAXJ0G1.reviewerName: Summer M. Herline "Summer wants you to know t...
B0014ERLPI.A1MEMXBKAXJ0G1.reviewText: These are my (next to) favorite sneakers. They run about a half size larger than normal but I like the extra room.

B0014VF70M.A2VKYD5PKDU14Y.reviewText: What can I say, This was money well spent. Watch is unique and gets attention all the time. I swim with it ,go to work and hang out.Am waiting to get a second watch from the new Diesel collection the DZ4255 (once it hits Amazon), to complement this.

B0014XOZ0S.A256XWYROA468.reviewText: These are mean looking shoes at great $53.99 price! I bought a pair for a gift for my husband. They look fantastic!!! Super fast shipping! Highly recommended.

B0014XOZ0S.A1LDHIQSFY290L.reviewText: When u unwrapped them from the box they looked too small to fit. But I slipped them on and they fit superbly, are handsome and comfortable. I usually wear 14 sneakers but the shape of this shoe allowed me to wear the size 13, which incidentally is the largest.

B0014XOZ0S.AAEIGJXY6WKXF.reviewText: These shoes are pretty awesome. They hug my feet just the way I like it. I bought the Mudd design and I am super happy with my purchase.

B0014XOZ0S.A3NGB36F77LUWD.reviewText: Very unique and well made, beautiful design. I LOVE cool shoes so I had to by this for my husband. He too loves them. They go well with a lot of clothes and he can wear them to work as well. They make a statement.I got him the "mudd" color.

B0014XOZ0S.AR8BPMAREHIJ7.reviewText: they look great, terrible for daily activities - walking, not staying "tight enough" on my feet
B0014XOZ0S.AR8BPMAREHIJ7.summary: they look great, terrible for daily activities - walking

B0014XUHQE.A2GE0NVZM3U27Z.reviewText: The shoes aren't exactly pitch black-- slight fade on the top portion. What's on the picture is exactly what you get. Shoes look more like boots from far away mainly because of the tip- they look a lot more nice with skinny/ slim fitting jeans if anything. My problem with this purchase was that one of the shoes had a very snug fit- both were size 12 but one felt like it was squeezing my foot- i fixed this problem however by slightly cutting the small rubber bands under the hood of the shoe slightly enough so that it isn't noticeable and they feel better. I agree with other reviews that this definitely feels better when your not wearing any socks or if you wearing very thin socks- my main recommendation  would be to get these shoes a size bigger than from what you wear- mainly because they're very tight fitting. Oh yeah and these shoes show a lot of lint and hair because of the strange black fade- i have two siamese cats and their light brownish hairs kinda show on the shoe- so I also recommend staying away from shedding animals or at least buy a lint remover. Otherwise for $30.... this purchase kinda felt like a steal- three and a half star product but im giving a four to help out from the other reviewers low scores. Happy buying everyone! ={D

B0014XUHQE.A124FI89C5003W.reviewText: The shoes were not exactly what I had expected. I think it is better to see them in person to make sure they fit. I will wear them sometime.

B0014XUHQE.A2XZYTBQHFEOCK.reviewText: These shoes are only comfortable with no socks.  Other then that they fit well, are very snug.  I comonly where a 11.5 - 12, and these were a very snug fit at a size 12.

B0014XVQ3W.A2THVAB1YPPS3J.reviewText: wasn't quite what the picture showed; bought for my son; he wasn't too pleased at first but really seems to like the shoes now and wears them frequentlhy

B0014XW42Y.AI2RNN8RLOGOQ.reviewText: I bought the white and red pair and they look awesome. I am more than satisfied.

B0014XW42Y.A35UBRDK0EA6QL.reviewText: I also bought the "white" (red and white) and they look great.can't complain for $28.49 shippedmade in taiwan if it matters

B0014Y089Y.A2DB83N46I9S36.reviewText: the look of the diesel playground's made me want them as soon as i saw them, but i had no other reason to purchase them other than want.  i looked for a pair of the blue and yellow colored ones, because they first caught my eye.  i had to buy the pink/green pair to find my correct size though.  and then a friend had an 80's party and we all dressed accordingly, and the dj would only play 80's music, so i had my reason to add to cart.  i love them, they are comfortable, the style is really great, they're just enough retro style, and modern with the materials diesel chose.  i recommend them, especially since the styles are coming back anyway!
B0014Y089Y.A2DB83N46I9S36.summary: need a reason to buy hi-tops again?

B00150GUCG.A1EQIJDP8OPV8B.reviewText: These are very trendy, very cute shoes for girls! My daughter loved them.They are very well made and a great price on amazon.

B00150OUP0.AJ1VA6VBGSYJH.reviewText: These are adorable! My girl wears a size 12 and I wish I would have gotten the size 13's so there was room to grow. But overall they are wonderful boots.

B00151D00K.A29HLAQAVHKI29.reviewText: like everything from this brand: AWESOME!! i was lucky to work for them for almost two years...and i'm addicted to it.LOVE DIESEL and this watch its not exception.

B00151D00K.A1GFMXKO8FKJ8O.reviewText: Excelente producto, es identico al de la foto, el producto llegó en perfecto estado y a tiempo, el tamaño del reloj es el mismo que está en la descripción.

B00151D00K.AWE3WHUPSAT3C.reviewText: After much research, I decided on this striking Diesel watch (my first).  It looks more expensive then it actually is (which is fine by me!)  When it arrived, it was bigger and heavier than I first thought but I've gotten use to it.  I also purchased the 16 piece watch tool kit through Amazon to fine-tune the band.  Now, it fits like a glove.  I recommend this watch to others!

B00151D00K.A1R6DGMZ6SDJIM.reviewText: I bought this watch for myself.  It's my 3rd Diesel watch and by far my favorite.  I needed a dress watch for work and wanted one with a little bit of swagger to it.  It is a big watch, but that's what I liked about it.  It sort of has a "go hard or go home" personality to it.  It also looks awesome with a suit.  If your looking for a subtle practical watch (and why would you if you're looking at Diesel), keep on searching.

B00151D00K.A2Z6TG1ZQ5WRCH.reviewText: Excelent quality watch diésel is a excellent brand I wish you enjoy if your purchase this item . Always buy diesel

B00151D00K.A2E4OZHOFRQRH8.reviewText: I bought this for my boyfriend for his birthday.  He thought it may be too big which in other reviews, other people thought the same thing.  However, since hes been wearing it on special occasions... He has had nothing but compliments.  big is in now and it looks super sexy on him.  Great deal and great looking watch.  I highly recommend this product.  Plus hes a Diesel boy.  Thought it would go nice.

B00151D00K.ASTOZC85DVJD0.reviewText: Very nice watch! It's a little too big for my wrist to wear as an everyday watch, but I throw it on when going out and I want people to notice. I get compliments on it a lot!

B00151D00K.A1WA0SMFVCM6S0.reviewText: This watch has a swag. Get too many stairs and compliments as this watch has a unique and bold personality. I wore it with a dark suit to an interview and the convo started with this watch. It portrays a confident and chic personality. I highly recommend this watch and Deisel brand in general. Other watch brands have name recognition but only Deisel has the personality recognition.

B00151D00K.A2DEB4V1RBRV8F.reviewText: I bought this watch for my younger brother for his birthday. It is a really nice watch and it comes in a "Diesel Box" which we thought was funny.  Unfortunately, after about 5 days of wearing it there was already a little chip in the glass.  The face of the watch is enormous, it takes up his whole wrist, but I guess that's the trend now.  Great product!

B00151D00K.A5BJ1WRF7959J.reviewText: Bought this watch for my mid twenties son. He loved it and wears it every day. Sturdy, large faced, and stylist.

B00160W1MI.A2Y4EWZ85VTVNX.reviewText: I am not a lable chaser so I didn't buy this for the Diesel label.  A friend gave me a watch like this one with a broken band.  I got a new band but simply wore the watch out!  (I am sort of rough on watches, never taking them off for anything!)  I liked it so much that I went online looking for another and apparently found the last one in captivity on Amazon.  Glad I did.  It's a great watch!

B0016MLUNM.A1H41M1TUIBS6L.reviewText: I was completely satisfied with ordering my Diesel Watch through Amazon.  The watch, price and delivery were all excellent.

B0016MLUNM.A3QORA6KPLH7WK.reviewText: This watch is a true attention grabber- it looks great even on a small wrist with it's unique face and classy, thick, black leather band. The numbers glow at night- that is a nice feauture- but mostly, the face is timeless. If someone loves this color- you have found a winner- but even still, don't be overly concerned that the green is overwhelming. It isn't. It is a subtle, opalescent hue which encased in silver makes this watch unique, setting it apart from the everyday. It is durable, classy, and can be both dressy or casual. It was a well-received gift and continues to receive compliments. Diesel is a great brand with a solid reputation for quality and proved that when this was received.

B0016MLUNW.AWCIG7R91GKMT.reviewText: Very stylish, comes in a very cool white box and it's a lot bigger than it appears on the pictures. The only con I found is the quality of the belt, it's already kinda worn out when you fold it.

B0016MLUNW.A227IQAF55VX24.reviewText: The shipping was faster than expected and Looks great and original As well !! The packaging was in a White Box looks Cool, The watch sits perfect on the wrist, The Dial is trendy especially the blue seconds hand was unique,Cons a bit heavy than expected.

B0016MLUNW.A1TN764OZR22EC.reviewText: I liked a lot the squared design and the materials and colors combinations. Although is made from steel is not very heavy and the stripe fits for a small arm.

B0016MLUNW.A1LK72AZ38GTYG.reviewText: After a month or so I am still extremely pleased with this watch.  It looks great and has been rugged so far.  It doesn't disappoint.

B0016MLUNW.ABBRGRR0XDFLH.reviewText: a nice everyday casual watch. not my favorite but a solid buy and a solid addition to the collection  Im happy with the purchase

B0016MLUNW.A3LIA3IC1ERMUA.reviewText: The product is of excellent quality and arrived in perfect condition.I am totally pleased with this purchase.thank you very much

B0016MLUNW.A1L2D17T6LCWBB.reviewText: I like it, very beautiful an d elegant!! Good fit and comfortable, I recomended this product and I purchase again!!

B0016MSIH8.A4MA47V5D7TX3.reviewText: Nice looking, fully fuctional, stylish watch.  Bought it as a Christmas gift for my oldest son and he loves it.
B0016MSIH8.A4MA47V5D7TX3.summary: Gift for my oldest son and he loves it!

B0016MSIH8.AWHIE2FVQNW46.reviewText: This is a great watch, came quickly and seems to be very sturdy. I am a big fan of watches so it says something for me to rate it a 5.

B0016MSIH8.A23B8CEZAMMGVS.reviewText: Gave this watch to my husband for our anniversary.  It is a beautiful watch, great quality and the price couldn't be beat!  He loves it and it looks great on him.

B0016MSIH8.A2VWGZO3I1TO1I.reviewText: its a beautifull watch. i bought it for myself and im really happy. iT is elegant and at the same time casual....The delivery was fast. I really recomended this watch

B0016MSIH8.AGPKI3Z1W9LG9.reviewText: Bought this watch as gift.  It arrived ahead of schedule and the look is pretty cool.  The leather band is nice looking and I expect the recepient will be very happy with the watch.

B0016MSIH8.AX22BKFIWC1GW.reviewText: Very Good Watch for the price paid. . Watch has a perfect size and really appears to be more expensive than it is. Good quality and perfect delivery

B0016MSIH8.A3GP5AYP4POL1E.reviewText: Perfect match with any look! this machine is beautiful in design and quality. The leather is great very confortable and nice texture.

B0016MSIH8.A2KRVD9KMJVSTE.reviewText: I have a bit of a collection of nicer watches - nothing too fancy - but a Swiss Army, a Movado, a couple of ESQ watches.  I just got this today, and even though it is the least expensive of them, it actually might look the best.  I will not be taking this watch off for quite some time.  I had my eye on it for awhile, and am happy I decided to pull the trigger.  It is like other people have said - it is pretty understated, but has some edge and class to it.  I will wear it with suits for work, but with t-shirts on the weekends.  Great deal on a cool watch...

B0016MSIH8.A1UOCNKSM5FLSJ.reviewText: This is my third and least favorite Diesel watch in 3 years. The slim-profile face is nice, but the leather strap is too short and too tight compared to the other Diesel watches I've owned -- the leather doesn't have much flexibility, and I can't seem to find a comfortable notch on the strap. And I've got rather thin, girlish wrists. :(That said, it does look a little dressier than the usual Diesel design, and the price is right. But if you prefer your watch to have a little more "give" and hang slightly loose, look elsewhere.
B0016MSIH8.A1UOCNKSM5FLSJ.summary: Sleek, but too tight compared to previous Diesel watches

B0016MSIH8.A1PZ6A13GJFNB7.reviewText: This is a well crafted sport watch by Deisel. Rugged yet classy - makes a nice addition to my collection.

B0016MSIH8.AO9URUX8YT9MF.reviewText: Been searching for a nice watch for around $100 for quite a while (I refuse to spend a ton on a watch).  After years of wearing cheap digital plastic watches I decided to add a little style to my wardrobe.  For me, this is a perfect cross between adult dress and casual.  Just enough bulk without looking like one of those uber-trendy gigantic watches kids wear these days.  Classic style with a tasteful nod to modern design.  The face is actually sunken in a little so you get the appearance of depth when looking at it.  Looks great with jeans and a t-shirts or with a suit.  I just got it today, so I can't speak to durability or precision, but it appears to be very solidly built.  Nothing flimsy about this watch.
B0016MSIH8.AO9URUX8YT9MF.summary: After long search, am very happy with this!

B0016MSIH8.A1PZJA9R7GLM0I.reviewText: I really like this watch. I like it so much I don't want to see anyone else wearing it. I hope they discontinue it.Until then, I think if you're looking for a good looking basic watch with a touch of edginess, you should pick this guy up.

B001706L2S.AHPU45JSAYO67.reviewText: i have it on right now,it's too flashy.i guess it looks more expensive than it really is. (bling?).. not a good thing if u live in Venezuela.

B0018HNDO4.AD5HYS4CRB6OW.reviewText: I was really excited to get these shoes.  After reading a previous review on getting a size bigger, I am really glad I did go for a bigger size.  I normally wear an 8-8.5 and I went with a 9.  They fit nicely.  Also, I looked around at other sites to check prices and I noticed the colour on amazon was a bit off.  I ordered Urban Chic and while it looks rather light black here, it is a medium-dark gray.  While walking, the heel of the shoe felt a little funny at first and the arches are a bit different than I am used to.  Overall though, a great shoe and pretty looking.  I will definitely order Diesels in the future.

B0018HNDO4.A1I5HX4H81DLUY.reviewText: The shoes are cute and comfortable.  However, I gave them 4 of 5 stars because the color in the photo is misleading.  I didn't realize that the shoes are a metallic gray color.  On amazon.com they appear to be very dark gray, almost black.  These shoes do run a bit small.  I normally wear size 8 1/2 but in diesels I wear a 9.

B0018HNDO4.A3PAS7NV8CG3Q6.reviewText: I just recieved this shoe today.  It is of good quality but I have to return it, way too small.  I ordered my normal size and could barely get it on my foot!  My recomendation is you order one size up.  Unfortunatly I have to pay to return the item.  I will try again in a size larger.

B0018HNDO4.A1EPZEMB8263SX.reviewText: I just received those sneakers, the fit is right and they are very comfortable. At that price, it is a GREAT deal. Not to mention the trendy design...

B0018HNDO4.A37KPN66F10JP9.reviewText: I am enjoying these shoes.  I needed a pair of black tennis shoes to wear to work and these are very comfortable.  I am on my feet all day and my feet have great support with these shoes.  Plus, I get a lot of complements.

B0018HNGDW.A1JVIHWM36VK9C.reviewText: it's so comfortable and very nice look.. i bought the white color it got a small circle of dirt on the side of the shoe. but thats ok i can clean it :)and it fits my foot great.Thank You<3 Diesel

B0018HNGDW.A122C488CULR1J.reviewText: i am in agreement with the other reviews.get a 1/2 larger than your normal shoe size.i would say that the length is ok, but it wasmore that the toe area was crowded and narrow ...so keep that in mind.the sole is very cushy and comfortable.i purchased these when they were on sale for $25.i would not pay $70 / $80 for these.shop around a little before you make your purchase.i like the white pair over the other color choices.enjoy!

B0018HNJLG.A63D1CRJELOYG.reviewText: I like them. They go with many outfits. . .skirts, jeans, leggings.  I rated it 4 stars because the inside stitching rubbed my toes and hurt. I used a band-aid to cover the inside stitching and now the shoes are perfectly comfortable.

Recently threw them away because they got wet (damn the rain!) and the dye turned my feet black. -__-  So keep them dry and they'll keep you comfy. :D

B0018HPJDC.A31XVGQMC4G95N.reviewText: I absolutely adore these shoes--as a woman with relatively big feet (9 1/2 -10) it is sometimes difficult to find sneakers that fit well and look good. The Diesel Paradi Sneakers accomplish both.

B0018HR9Z8.A26RWLUUJ73WJR.reviewText: I bought these shoes for my twenty year old sister and she loved them. They're definitely bright, purple and orange, but hey she's a twenty-something! We got a great deal on these shoes. I always buy from Amazon Direct!

B0018HR9Z8.A1YLLT2MQNHL4O.reviewText: These are different from the "cookie cutter" sneakers you find in the mall.  Seem well made and were comfy right out of the box.  I ordered my usual size and they were spot on. I didn't give a "5 star" because they do lack an arch support so I had to add an insert, but for the price I didn't mind.Too cute!!

B0018HR9Z8.AD76CX14UVXKE.reviewText: These look really cute with jeans! I got the white ones, and they are off-white with some metallic trim... and I can wear them with anything. True to size, but there is not much arch support. Also, because of the type of traction in the front half, the shoes can really grip on to carpeted surfaces/grassy and dirt floors, but are actually kind of slippery on tile floors (not enough surface contact for enough stability). That is a really trivial complaint about the shoes, though. I definitely recommend them.

B0018HR9Z8.A20A5VHAFTKACI.reviewText: These are so flippin' cute it's unreal. The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is that for some reason the toe gets real dirty real fast. I mean, I look at these babies crosswise and they tarnish. But otherwise they are comfortable, stylish (well, for a 38-year-old) and go great with jeans and a tee.

B0018HR9Z8.A1PLAAUNKM1G65.reviewText: I was glad i bought those. I like Diesel and these sneakers rock. Feel true to size very soft and lightweight. I have size 9.5 and my feet look actually tiny which is very important for me. I would recommend them to a friend

B0018HRNEK.A1YLLT2MQNHL4O.reviewText: These are really cute, and the colors in the photo are the colors you get. It's fun to wear something not very many people are wearing. They don't have any arch support but my insert fits the shoe just fine.Definitely not your boring white sneaker...bleh.

B0018HRNEK.A3EPQYX2P6TYG4.reviewText: These sneakers are true to size and very comfortable! If you want a bright sneaker, these are the ones to get.

B0018HRNEK.A20A5VHAFTKACI.reviewText: I used Facebook to get my friends' opinions on my new kicks and got overwhelming "fab." Indeed, every time I wear them, I get comments. Totally cute and comfortable, too.

B0018HW6II.A3WTHQ52J22UZ.reviewText: Ordered this shoe in an 8 but fits pretty tight. If you plan on not wearing socks with these order a half size smaller than you normally wear.

B0018HW6II.A1DRS62F5606GH.reviewText: These shoes are stylish and comfortable.  They didn't need any "break-in" time and I never got any blisters, etc.  I love how the soles are like tennis shoes - no slipping like in regular flats.  I would definitely purchase again... and did, in the pink color.

Tightening the lace just made the toe situation worse and did nothing for the width of the shoes.  If you have very wide feet, these would likely be comfy, but purchase a full size bigger than you usually wear.  I'll be sending these back.

B0018HW6II.A1M7XOFQ604639.reviewText: I bought these shoes in a size 8 my feet measure 7.5 so always go 1/2 size larger, the problem i have with these shoes are that while fitting great, any larger they would slip on and off my heel, but my toe comes right up to the tip of the shoes, and as i read other reviews apparently i'm not the only one that had this problem w/these shoes, i think because they start wide but get narrow at the tip, I gave 2 stars only because these shoes are super cute and i really wanted to like them but just not built to ones feet!

B0018HWBRY.A34JL2UZT3WMM5.reviewText: This shoe arrived today in "chestnut" I could hardly contain myself I was so anxious, I thought it was so cute and it is but, the toe box is too short my two toes before the "pinky" are just plain cramped I couldn't stand up straight in them and the heel is too high for my taste, sadly I'm returning them, even if I ordered ahalf size larger the shoe  would still be too high just not the shoe I thought it was....

B0018HWBRY.A2I733EP3B5API.reviewText: i order it in "Surf Blue". the color is so Chic. i Love it. the heel is a little high and the shoe is half size large. but i love it, it's pretty than than pictures.

B0018HWBYW.A3CO0PR9ONXWLC.reviewText: I bought these ankle boots about a year ago and the zipper was busted. Amazon refused to trade them in for a different pair and Diesel company would not repair or trade either. I had to spend $40 extra dollars to repair the zipper before I ever got to wear them . Once  I was able to wear them I discovered that the top part of the boot jabs right underneath the ankle majing walking very uncomfortable and at times painful. I have tried the band-aid trick but it does not work.The positive aspect is that they are very beautiful and classy which makes them parable with most casual and dress up outfits.If you like pain then these shoes are for you!

B0018HWBYW.AML7J0M5Y5UPS.summary: Diesel Boots are Edgy and Cute

B0018HYCJE.A21PEJ0IT0SR94.reviewText: My boots are still in a box, looking for a seller. Can not wear it because I can't even stand in them, not comfortable at all.

B0018HYCJE.A1LP6LV9IW51JU.reviewText: Love this boots,comfortable,with perfect shape, and form of the hill which lets u walk as if u are wearing flats from morning till the end of the work-day..

B0018INF3M.A3ITAQ7LC8U2TV.reviewText: I was really impressed when I received these shoes. Anyway they are narrow, but fit very well on my feet.

B0018INOR4.A3KGDWPT5OL82U.reviewText: Pretty comfortable shoes, filled up with style and made up from great materials... little slippery on wet surfaces, but overall great shoes...

B0018INOR4.A295B6WO0E8R8W.reviewText: Super comfortable shoes, I don't know what physics they use to design shoes, I walked nearly all day long wearing these shoes and no pain in the feet, earlier with the earlier shoe I was getting pain after walking some distance.The look is cool too.My first buy at amazon and it is a success.Thank You!

B0018INOR4.A384WOVRF1BUV8.reviewText: I own a pair of diesel pants, but this is my first experience with their shoes. First off, the shoe seems to be very high grade. The leather is soft and supple.The tag claims a man made sole for the shoe as well, and most of the stitching is to a high standard, but the padding insert on the right shoe was poorly aligned and defective.This causes the insert to bunch up on the outside and the sole is left bare on the inside. The shoe deserves 2 if all are like this, though I may have gotten an exception to Diesel's shoe quality. I know the 1st pair I received and returned that was too large was very well made, so I will give Diesel the benefit of the doubt.Fortunately the left shoe is perfect and based on that shoe, this is indeed a very comfortable choice. Now after 3 months of wearing them 4-5 days a week typically ( I usually have 3 pairs of shoes I use for different purposes), I have found the right shoe wearing prematurely. The left shoe has maintained a high comfort level and the leather has proven durable for a sneaker by not tearing up when I incdentally beat on them.Though the color offerings are all good with several distinctly different and creative combos, I chose the classic black/black. The shoe looks great, though I would have preferred the painted diesel logo had been in gold rather than white, as on the black/white color. The #78 raised in the leather on back of the heel adds a great touch and is something you would only see in a high-design shoe like this.I prefer the style of this over my Adidas Sambas. These look so much more unique. The Sambas lasted 3 years roughly, and are not yet beat beyond being wearable. I hope these diesels hold up as well.This shoe seems to run true to size, contrary to what  many other reviews of Diesel shoes say by claiming they run small. This caused me to order the fisrt pair too large. So it must be only certain styles that run small in deisel men's shoes. Also, the shoe is made in Vietnam and not China.-----------------------Well, it has been nearly 5 months and my Diesels are still holding up, despite having had a defective right shoe (amazon did refund me for this pair). The mis-aligned insert sort of formed to my foot finally and broke away where it was overhanging. So, it is not so noticeable now after a very, very lengthy break in.The left shoe is just as comfrotable as ever, Though because of the initial problems with the right foot shoe, It is wearing ahead of the left. I will be picking up a new, non-defective pair of these now in and post a long term review based upon that pair.
B0018INOR4.A384WOVRF1BUV8.summary: A somewhat unique, good looking shoe.

B0018INOR4.AN4XWHF7YP0WM.reviewText: very good i love it The leather is very soft and high standard i would buy this product again

B0018INOR4.A17WJ14DHCVPIY.reviewText: Every pair I've had has lasted 2-3 years minimum. This pair was no exception, they fit great and were comfortable. I think the thing I liked the most was just how lightweight Diesel shoes are! It's ridiculous, and it makes a big difference when you're walking. Now, keep in mind you don't get much sole - but the thinness and lightweight tradeoff make them comfortable for all day walking.

B0018IR1Y6.A2G409MF5KN1XU.reviewText: Two details that might be helpful - They wear a little small, so order a half-size up from your usual (I have another pair of Diesel's in 10.5, but ordered these in 11's and they fit fine, maybe even a touch snug in the arches). Other than that, they're great!  Well-fitted, comfortable, and (at the time I bought them)  very nicely discounted.

Extremely comfortable, wraps around your feet as if it's custom made for you. Only reason I am stripping off one star is that the tongue is a bit too long and it brushes against the ankle.

B0018IX3WK.A2UXY3ZH1V6PYX.reviewText: These Diesel boots are terrific..nicely made, very comfortable, great looking..the only down side is the straps that buckle like a belt look "cool" but are sure not very convenient when you're in a hurry..the price you pay for looking good, I guess.

B0018NVZ9I.A3I2ORH48KEU4A.reviewText: Nice leather band, good visability [with or without the "backlight"], better in person than in the pictures. I really did like this watch (even if it did make me miss having an alarm and timer like my previous watches had), but I just felt like I was wearing a super hero's wrist guard because it was so bulky. It wasn't heavy though. I didn't notice any difference from regular digital watches as far as weight on my wrist goes. It's just big from the style (the works behind the clock and the wrapping band). Other cuff watches for women have the same complaints, so I decided a cuff watch is not for me unless I were to wear short sleeves or sleeveless shirts all the time. That's not possible. So I returned this watch and bought a slim sport watch instead. This watch also has a clapse that's hard to figure out if you've never seen one before. It's a hinge you have to snap oven first before you attach the other end of the band to it. I noticed Nike's cuff watches for women has the same style fasteners. This makes it really easy to take the watch off and put it on. And even with a really small wrist, the smallest hole fit just right. That was my biggest worry. Still, not the only worry. I'm better off with small watches.
B0018NVZ9I.A3I2ORH48KEU4A.summary: Nice watch, but too bulky for womens long sleeves.

B0018NVZ9I.AD6R2YCOYDK1R.reviewText: I had this watch in brown, and actually added what I thought was a white one to my "wish list".  As you can see it's silver.  What an awesome mistake I made.  I was a little nervous after opening it that it would be weird to have a silver watch, but I get a TON of compliments on it.  Its just as comfortable as the brown one and once you adjust it you just snap it on every time.  No need to continually adjust the size on it.My brown one ran out of batteries ages ago, and I've been to lazy to get a new one put in, but I still continue to wear it (thats how much i love it).

B0018NVZA2.A3GIACYEUCJ043.reviewText: This watch looks pretty sweet, it's big, but not really much bigger than any other watch.The scrolling works fine, the time is easy to program..I found it uncomfortable to wear to be honest, since it's a completely straight horizontal edge on the right/left side it tends to dig into my wrist bones unless I tighten it up so much my hand swells up from blood loss :-OAlso it's a pain in the ass to reprogram the message, I've done it once.

B0018NVZA2.AHR66GGCZJKMX.reviewText: i bought this watch for my husband as a gift. the design is beautiful , it gets noticed all the time. its not that hard to change the time and the messege on the watch, you just need to find the section in the manual for the watch , it took all of 5 minutes for me to find it in the manual and change the messege on the watch.the only con is that you cant really set an alarm on it, the only function it has is to tell , the time , date and you can put a messege on it, That being said the design is way too cool that you wouldnt really miss or want any other function. check the youtube reviews of the watch .
