B00192WLP0.A28TS96ANWITOT.reviewText: The seller was great. The watch is really beatiful, just like the picture shows. It is indicated for men, as the size is big (does not really fit a woman's wrist).

B00192WLP0.A3IBLI6OLVFOK0.reviewText: I was extremely happy with the Diesel watch I purchased for my boyfriends birthday present.It arrived in excellent condition and for the price even although I paid tax and shipping it was still an excellent price.I would recommend Amazon to anyone.

B00192WLP0.APSPC93EXV45S.reviewText: I bought this watch for my hubby and he definitely loved it, I even bought a similar one for myself, in a smaller more rectangular version... the only bad thing about it, is that the battery went dead in less than 6 months of having it.... but overall is a very elegant and fashionable watch, the wristband smells great, genuine leather; not for women though, its too big, check the Diesel site and look for the UNISEX watches, those will suit a smaller wrist, but look big enough to be trendy ...

B00192YGSK.A20SOJHBIN8L22.reviewText: It's a really elegant and stylish watch. It's really comfortable although it's size though. I get compliments on it pretty much even by random people on the street! Recommended!!:)

B00192YGSK.AL78WRT6RFBCP.reviewText: I love love love this watch! I'm writing a late review because I never got around to it a while back. The seller sent a new product in great condition, and just as advertised! I've had this product before, and they do tend to chip around the edge of the glass if you are rough with them as I am, however for the amount of compliments I got and still get from this watch, I would continue to repurchase it. I can no longer find it! It's discontinued! I am sooooo utterly mad right now! I what to buy it again! A new fresh shiny attention grabbing Diesel watch! Pleeeeease come back! I can't find this anywhere on the internet!

B00192ZVC0.A2QF6JR6RERRFB.reviewText: This watch is very nice, like fine wine and brandy. The leather is of superior quality. I wouldn't want to swim with it on, it's more luxurious than sporty. It is however quite larger than I expect a watch to be, but that is part of it's style or intended design. It is excellent, especially for the price. I've never had a problem with it.

B00192ZVCA.ALEGIDJDF7D4E.reviewText: It arrived not working but the seller was Fantastic to deal with. When I contacted the seller, they said if I replaced the battery and sent them the receipt they would refund that money spent.  When I tried to replace the battery the watch tech said the watch itself was not working.  On the second contact with the dealer, they said I could return it, the process was easy and the money was returned to my account immediately.  I was also emailed every step of their return process; when they received the returned watch, when I could expect money, ect.  the money was in my account fasted than they anticipated.The watch itself was beautiful and I would buy again from this dealer even though I returned the product.
B00192ZVCA.ALEGIDJDF7D4E.summary: received not working but Seller was FANTASTIC to deal with.

B00192ZVD4.A2REB93ZPND986.reviewText: Good watch - quite a flair and sharp looking.  Instructions not that easy to follow though - had to look online for help.

B00192ZVD4.AWJV72DAZG1ZT.reviewText: I have this watch in brown.  Get lots of compliments on it- but, the leather band started to smell bad over time- I think that happens to most leather bands.  Finding a replacement band has been near impossible.

B00192ZVD4.A3IU7S2IZ33P7O.reviewText: The 272-page instruction book that came with the watch (in 8 languages) has no information about this particular watch.  There is nothing that helps one figure out how to set the time or perform other funcitons.  A huge disappointment, since it was a Christmas gift for our son.
B00192ZVD4.A3IU7S2IZ33P7O.summary: A complete mystery how to set this watch

B0019UI7EQ.A2JVHS87R70Q8Y.reviewText: I love this watch!  It looks fantastic and is eye-catching without being garish.  The only warning is that it is VERY heavy.  The first week of wearing it was like having weights on my wrist.

B0019UKBC2.A17BXXUW0HPLHQ.reviewText: This is one of the best looking Diesel watches out there.  I get compliments daily and the watch is fairly sturdy - it doesn't feel cheap like a lot of the other watches out there.  GREAT buy!
B0019UKBC2.A17BXXUW0HPLHQ.summary: One of my favorite watches - got compliments daily!

B001AHTJXG.AJBB6CQ8DBIC9.reviewText: I purchased two of these as Christmas gifts, but one watch arrived DOA.  I returned it and received a repalcement that works correctly.  It is large and easy to see.

B001AHVLIM.A1Z8IFUGIMDV5D.reviewText: I havent received mine yet, but I have seen it on someone else and that is why I am buying it regardless of the horrible photo. When I saw this watch on this guy in my cafe from 10ft away I thought it was a $3000.00 watch for sure. When I asked him who made it and he said diesel, I was in disbelief! This watch looks way better than the picture or the price suggests!

B001AHVLIM.AHPU45JSAYO67.reviewText: it's MUCH BETTER in person.beautiful design.amazing.diesel once more.
B001AHVLIM.AHPU45JSAYO67.summary: the picture doesn't do it justice

B001AHVLIM.A2T7M8SDHK9OVB.reviewText: I have to say that this watch shape and looks is what it makes it stand out from the rest. I have to reckon that some of my friends do not like it, but I have received several comments from strangers in the street that ask me where did I get it from. The case is big so it is best suited for someone with a big wrist or not skinny.Is a watch that is not to wear for every occasion or with just any set of clothes, I guess that is a watch that fits if the owner has the right style and attitude to wear it.What is for sure is that you will stand out for wearing something original...

B001AHVLIM.A1UNJ46NSB352E.reviewText: I love this watch.  The face is more subtle than is shown on the picture (check it out at a Diesel store if you are curious and have one nearby), and the oversized face goes great with casual dress.  I wouldn't consider using this watch while dressing up, but this watch is an eye-catcher and I've already received a few compliments on it.

B001B0K1RU.A37KO6OVBPLDA5.reviewText: This Diesel automatic feels great on the wrist. It is a weighty watch, partly due to the 2 independent movements on the side. They look great and everyone else seems to love the look too. The small dials are day and date, easily set with a pushbutton by the stem. No winding ever! Use a winder if you don't wear it every day.Treat yourself or the special man you love.
B001B0K1RU.A37KO6OVBPLDA5.summary: This hefty beauty is a pleasure to own!

B001B0RRV8.A2CPN0LJH03RYU.reviewText: If you like watches that will stand out, then this one is for you.  It is a basic time piece, but the looks set it a part.

B001BS7MT2.A2DDL42POPAHUR.reviewText: ive never owned a watch like this before and it seems like no one else in the south does either (although it shipped from florida). People rarely wear watches anymore and i decided that i wanted to bring it back. This was the 1st watch i decided to do it with. I get TONS of compliments on it.Its large, its unique, its shiny, and its just a beautiful timepiece. a lot of people are into large-faced watches but they look gaudy and cheap with gold and fake diamonds in them. This one is larger than it looks in the picture but it doesnt have either of those characteristics. Its a "peacocking" type of watch but its still very classy.The band - its leather, extremely sturdy, and thick. it practically bolted onto the body and doesnt bend/move until about halfway down on each side (where you have to bend it to put it around your wrist).The body - very solid metal and glass. ive knocked it up against a few things a few times and there still isnt a scratch or dent on either the glass or the large metal body. if you arent used to wearing something on your wrist then it will feel a little heavy. the body itself is about half an inch thick.The clock - 2 analog clocks and one digital clock that shows a variety of things (i leave it on the date). Overkill and unnecessary? yes. does it make it uncool? no! there will be people who say something about it (or about you having a watch in general). who cares?? i wear it proudly and with confidence. it can really set off a matching outfit.overall: 10/10

B001BS7MT2.A3S5JYMVQFB8TY.reviewText: Just had this watch 4 a couple of days....will not go over all the details because the previous review is very accurate.But I must say it looks very durable and solid....and it stands from the rest....everyone has to see it because looks very modern and cool...highly recommend this watch.

B001BS7MT2.A37JV08ZG7JXFK.reviewText: It`s a great design but the leather band does not last long at all.It is getting torned off already.

B001BS7MT2.AQZKR4C6EY4MW.reviewText: We searched for not classic, not round, original model for my boyfriend.Diesel models are all very original.This one is looking like small radio set on your hand :-)My friend is kidding some people who never saw such watches that there is radio inside:-))They are rather big and heavy, be ready to feel weight while wearing them. The band is from thick leather but it fits tightly the wrist.Watch-case is stainless steel, the glass is big (no scratches for 2 months wear), dial plate looking like carbon.If you are searching for something more that a watch, something original, stylish that will catch everybody's eye - it's your choice.Cool watch, recommend!
B001BS7MT2.AQZKR4C6EY4MW.summary: Cool, stylish, very original men's watch

B001BXJWNG.ABLUW533DJ03T.reviewText: These boots are at least half to one size bigger (to better accomodate thick socks)and comfy to use. No zipper necessary, it's a pull-on although very easy to get on and leather looks nice and expensive. I am especially impressed at the price since another website sells it for 30% more. Definitely made for walking in dry conditions, not meant for a snowy day unless you plan on sliding or falling. Received the product 2 days after ordering.Update: 2 years later, after much abuse and usage - this pair of boots looks even better.

B001BXLJ0K.AJTP8CML78HST.reviewText: This shoes are really comfortable...I bought a pair in 2009 and they're still in excelletn conditions. Though they are not meant for running or exercising, they behave in a good way....Recemmended fron the bottom of my heart....Buy Diesel shoes next time guys...

B001BXUM8A.A1W3MRE62XXBC0.reviewText: I do not disappoint, as usual diesel has an excellent finish on all its products. The shoes are comfortable and looks great.

B001BXUMF8.ANG9IB3INBVWZ.reviewText: this is truly a very Hot style from Diesel, looks amazing with Jeans. The slightly worn out toe & the great burnt orange color go well with most clothes..its extremely comfortable and whoever picks the last pair that I see available 'in stock' will be glad that they did.

B001CJE9FU.A2UQ30D18Q56SQ.reviewText: I oredered White, but when the sho arrived it was more of a light blue gray colour. Returned the shoes.

B001D01SP2.A2ANPKNGV4J9FF.reviewText: bad product, coating the lens brings all wrinkled, did not last two years, the hoops that brings as holes in the wings broke off, not worth buying this product

B001DIIYPG.A287CCB20FJBNP.reviewText: I received this watch as a gift. It fit great and I really liked the look of it. I really liked the leather band and size of the watch face.

B001DIIYPG.ATCB3ACB46N2F.reviewText: I paid $156 for this watch after taxes from a reputable retailer.  I had this watch a week, wearing it to an office work environment, nothing special or rough, and the crystal was scratched to hell after only 7 days.  Diesel must put crappy crystals in their watches, because I've never had a watch crystal scratch so easily.  I tried to find out what exact mineral is used in their watches, but I can't find ANY literature on Diesel's web site or anywhere else. It certainly isn't manufactured sapphire.  AVOID Diesel watches.  Once the crystal gets scratched, it doesn't matter how cool the rest of the piece looks. Since they don't report what crystal mineral they use, I can only assume they're fully aware of the poor quality.

B001DIIYPG.A17N5P097MAO0X.reviewText: I have had this watch for years and unlike the previous comment I have no scratches in it. It looks cool and everybody compliments me on it. Drawbacks: I don't know where to find a replacement leather strap if it gets damaged and the metallic cover that goes over the knob to change the date/time tends to open numerous times through out the day.

B001DIIYPG.ADWCM2B0ALLEB.reviewText: I have had this watch for years and unlike the previous comment I have no scratches in it. Very good stuff.
B001DIIYPG.ADWCM2B0ALLEB.summary: Diesel -Quartz Black Leather with Black Dial

B001EDRWK8.A2M8NFNRNAEO7N.reviewText: I like all designs by diesel watches. I like this watch too. The shape and quality of leather is really nice. You can not go wrong with Diesel watch. This is an add on to my watch collection, only problem I found is too bulky in my thin wrist.
B001EDRWK8.A2M8NFNRNAEO7N.summary: Nice build and design, but a bit bulky

B001EDRWK8.A1UNJ46NSB352E.reviewText: I've recently become a fan of Diesel watches.  I like this watch a lot.  It's very comfortable on the wrist, it stands out without being gaudy, and is fun to wear.  I've been wearing this in casual settings and people have consistently been asking me about it and asking to try it on, so I guess that's a good sign.

B001EOUUWO.A3OZM22CGRW43T.reviewText: Very ugly and cheap looking watch. Really big and bulky. I have big arms and wrists, and it was still too much. I have never worn it.

B001EWETW8.A14S2AY6NVRZQH.reviewText: Like the title says, the shoes I received doesn't match the photo. Instead I got all black with diesel (shiny black type) going across the left/right side. Just a little disappointed in the misleading.

B001EWETXM.APIP9UZLEKBDT.reviewText: Before I purchased this shoe, I was content with my converse all stars.  Boy was I wrong.  You can tell right out of the box these shoes are no ordinary canvas basic shoe.  The cloth material screams quality, and the product is solid. The shoes are comfortable from the outset, no breaking in required.  The Magnet Exposure also contains much needed padding that Converse shoe's lack.  The main downside here of course is price.  These shoes are considerably more expensive than converse, and there is no garuntee they will hold up very long due to the fact the shoe is basically modeled after the all-star, which are notorious for falling apart after a few months of wear.  I have owned the shoe for about a month now and have seen no problems.  I would recommend this shoe to anyone wanting a better versian of the converse classic design, but with the trade-off of a higher price.
B001EWETXM.APIP9UZLEKBDT.summary: The higher quality versian of converse.

B001EWETXM.A3DO5ISNHSVEY8.reviewText: It's a beautiful sneaker, but lasted only a couple of months.I haven't used that much, but the times I did I believe I put it to test.Started to detach on the sides, and when it got very dirty it was impossible to clean.Maybe you can be a little luckier.

B001EWETXM.A3J44JXUNFUEOS.reviewText: I really, really want to like this shoe. I should start with the positives, these shoes look great. I have gotten lots of compliments on them. Also the little pockets on the side are really cool and more useful than you might think. Beyond that I can't really think of anything else nice to say about these things. These shoes are as uncomfortable as sin, the stupid rubber toe thing wears holes through brand new socks in about a day of wear and also makes you constantly have to check to be sure your toes aren't bleeding. Take heed of the words of a previous reviewer and get at least a half size larger than what you might normally wear, everything else I wear a 10, I bought 10 and a half on these, and sometimes wish I had gotten an 11. I thought that perhaps the lack of comfort was due to some breaking in process, as I have worn them about 20-25 times, but they have already begun to come apart. For as expensive as they were, I would expect at least an ounce of quality in the craftmanship. Do yourself a favor and get something else. I'm stuck with these little beasts until my 5.11's get here.

B001EWETXM.A1KYA7QCCOP6DC.reviewText: I like these shoes. They are very bright (I have the red color), and have a classic sneaker look to them. They are different then chuck taylors, and I really like the diesel logo and the pockets on the sides of the shoes. They feel more comfortable then chucks and seem to me feel like the size of the shoe is identified correctly by manufacturer. Would by them again.

B001EWETXM.AEUPZJDOR1TL0.reviewText: Tried these shoes out.........VERY comfortable......very unique......however they run SMALL...... size up 1/2 - 1 size up!  Had to return mine because it was too small

B001EWETXM.A2CCD6FS2SU03A.reviewText: nicely made and good quality for canvas very durable and super nice looking..stylish and the price was not bad either

B001EWEUOK.A9W994BNQR110.reviewText: Nice shoes. I've received lots of compliments since buying them. The actual shoes (I bought the black version) look a little more leathery than the picture, but they are very nice looking. Only complaint is that they are showing wear almost immediately. From simple walking the shoes are already showing white lines in the leather. Had these less than a week and they look several months old. Comfortable though. I would definitely recommend these shoes to anyone who'd rather not be barefoot.
B001EWEUOK.A9W994BNQR110.summary: Offers more protection against the earth than my bare feet.

B001EWEUOK.A2DAF3E0C98ZON.reviewText: Hi, I want to buy this product and I choose the 10 size (what is availible), but when I procced to checkout, appear some warning box, and I can't buy it.what's the reason???the item is availible in 9.5 and 10 size.Thanks

B001EWEUOK.A1T6XWIU3YEI6Y.reviewText: I have bought this shoes and when I received it I was very impressed with what I've read on the papers that came inside the box, congratulating me for buying a Diesel shoe but, as I started using this shoes, it started to get an old aspect, the black and bright color became dingy and after a few months it started to unstick.I don't know if it was a problem with this specific model, but I'll certainly not buy Diesel again just because of this bad experience.
B001EWEUOK.A1T6XWIU3YEI6Y.summary: Bad quality for a good trade

B001EWEUOK.A1VQ61UT9WKCV2.reviewText: This is a very comfortable sneaker.  It is true to size.  The toe cap is little bigger than comparable shoes (e.g., Converse All-Stars) which is a better look in my opinion
B001EWEUOK.A1VQ61UT9WKCV2.summary: Very comfortable and like the look

B001EWEV3A.A2WJS31DXTMKS4.reviewText: i really dig these shoes. kinda swaggerrific! I have them in white with red check looking thing on them. They fit much better than converse, which feel like painful cardboard on my feet. My feet are supported, and unlike Mr. clown-man, I really like the design.

B001EWEV3A.A119TTJRICH186.reviewText: These are my favorite shoes I've had. Unfortunately, they don't have my size (I wear a size 14...you can imagine that my body is proportional) but this shoe has amazing give. I tried the size 13 on a lark, because the upward lace-ocity drew me to them, and I just knew I had to have them. Had to.When the shoes got to me in two days (don't mess with Amazon Prime) I tried them on immediately. With a little stretching and tugging, these Peruvian dreamboats were coating my feet like a layer of breading over some chicken.Not only did they fit, they made others on the street have a fit, because I wore them outside right after I snuggled them onto my feet. People were yelling things like, "Those are shoes!" and "Dag...you got some SHOES on!".Right they were. Right they were.

B001EWEV3A.AEUPZJDOR1TL0.reviewText: The design of these shoes is just horrible!!!.......it looks like a damn Clown shoes.  If you want to look like a clown be sure to buy these shoes........otherwise steer clear!

B001EWEV3A.A2BTO8AFMRGT5M.reviewText: im giving it 1 star because you cannot give it zero stars.i loved the look of these shoes and the fit,but after ONE!!!! day the "leather" started cracking and turning white.i was going to live with that as it made the shoes look broken in but by the end of the week the upper part of the shoe was separating from the sole and that was it for mei sent them back.and of course 3 weeks later i am still waiting for my refund!!!!

B001EWEVZS.A2DZHMTGAK2SKP.reviewText: Nice modern sneaker. Great brand and nice comfortable fit. Easy to wear for an extended period, with no compromise on comfort
B001EWEVZS.A2DZHMTGAK2SKP.summary: rocking my diesel i'm pression sneaks

B001EWEW4I.A2ECW0HJ1SOK7B.reviewText: The shoe arrived in mint condition earlier then expected.  I would definitely buy from street moda again.

B001EWEWDY.A3REQPHAFYS0UW.reviewText: this is a great looking shoe.. and reasonably priced for  diesel.i wear them everywhere.the only problem with the low profile soles is lack of cushion.i just add a $2 pair of insoles from wal-mart and they are good to go.

B001EWEWDY.A2LSX3TEUQVEFY.reviewText: This sneaker is really stylish and comfortable. And friends are saying I am looking younger wearing it :)

B001EWEWDY.A3OSC3ENW2K05V.reviewText: Time and time again I buy these.  It's one of the most comfortable shoes I own.  This was my first pair of Diesels and now that's all I buy.  Diesel makes a good quality, light, and comfortable shoe.

B001EWEWDY.A2DCXB781IQKAD.reviewText: This shoe is very comfortable, the leather wraps your feet and allows for free movement.  It's a smooth shoe to walk with, plus it goes with almost everything!

B001EWEWDY.AP3NI6M3WW14Z.reviewText: I discovered Diesel shoes a few years ago and have been buying them ever since for work and casual wear. These are some of the most comfortable shoes you will ever put your feet in. The insoles are incredibly padded and springy. After a few days, they mold to your feet, making them even more comfortable. I work in retail, so I'm on my feet 9+ hours a day. When I wear these shoes, my feet feel great at the end of the day. The leather is both good looking and durable, these are some pretty sturdy shoes. With that said, they are still soft enough to give wide feet some room when they break in.The only issues I've ever had with Diesel shoes are that the stitched on fabric designs (whether it be DIESEL wording or stripes) start falling off before the shoes are ready to be replaced and that they don't give good traction on wet surfaces at all, so be careful on wet floors! Otherwise, these shoes are awesome. They look great with a lot of outfits, everyone always comments on the shoes.

B001EWEWDY.A1K4VCBSVV7TJE.reviewText: this shoe looks even better in real life than it does on the website. it is also very comfortable to wear for long periods of time. the only downside is the price, but its diesel and i think the quality is worth it

B001EWEWO8.A1A4IXT7ZCCAE1.reviewText: Soy de Venezuela, no tengo ningun tipo de reclamo. El producto llegó al lugar indicado en una semana sin problemas.Thanks!

B001EWEXE2.A11URKTJ1IALR2.reviewText: This is one of the best shoes I have ever had, true to size, very comfortable and fashionable. love it.I bought 2 pairs , one for my son, beautiful. great price.

B001EWEXE2.A24NF50XXG4Y71.reviewText: I bought the DIESEL Runaway in the Ivory/Coffee Bean color combination, and I have to say that I love them! Because the weather is so slushy here in Minnesota I have not worn them outside yet, however, I wore them to a restaurant and I received a compliment from the waiter on them!Theses shoes are definitely statement-makers. They are very bold and catch people's attention, but in a good way. They're comfy, flexible, and made of genuine leather. The tongue features the sleek DIESEL: Only The Brave logo, and the side and bottom of the shoes say "DIESEL" also.Amazon shipped them extremely fast too! I ordered them on a Sunday, and I received them Tuesday afternoon. ...and that was STANDARD shipping. I recommend not paying extra money for "2-3" business day shipping because it will probably get to you in 2-3 business days with standard shipping alone, so long as you live in the continental U.S.Overall, they are the best shoes I've ever owned. Five stars.

B001FBYOXM.A1R698CMWZXCS3.reviewText: Excellent product. Elegant & classy look. makes a complete look to any outfit, causal or formal. Makes heads turn twice once seen on your wrist. Diesel is great at one of a kind design when it comes to watches.

B001FBYOXM.A3GG61OZLWD69V.reviewText: I fell in love with the watch the instance I saw it,but just couldnt make up my mind to get it.then I had a little tour of the diesel store,and boy was I surprised.Just had to get it.It obviously has 3 sets of clocks,and if you order yours and find that the digital part isnt working,no sweat,get a pair of screwdrivers AND replace the battery.In all,this watch always makes heads turn,I LOVE the effect it has on people who work at other **registered stores. jaw droppin':)))thanks Diesel

B001FWYQQG.ADHHB8BDMVTOO.reviewText: I saw this watch a year ago and loved it but I couldn't find it anywhere for sale. Amazon had it and the price was fantastic. I love the watch, the look and the feel. I highly recommend it.

B001FWYQRK.AZ4X0OMGLFJ6F.reviewText: still going strong, I have not changed the battery, still working like new.i love this watch. stands out, the color is perfect

B001FWYQS4.A1SB0TGN0Y0POV.reviewText: its a BIG watch. no chronograph just timer. 50m/169ft Water-resistant but manual says not for swimming, so why 50m/169ft just for a shower (btw "cold water" shower). Works ok, looks awesome. The blue its a little darker than the picture.

B001FWYQSE.A4JFXN833N2S5.reviewText: Bought this watch two years ago for $75 at Fossil. Replaced both batteries once ($25). Strap has finally show it's wear and needs to be replaced (I'm very active. Under normal use, the strap will likely last for years longer).To be honest, I don't use the extra features. This watch simply caught my eye and I bought it. And, the best purchase I've made.It *LOOKS* and feels like a much higher grade watch, and the glass has no scratches (unlike bargain brand watches). I receive compliments on my watch from my coworkers. I let them think I spent much more, because it really does have that European design that appeals. It goes with anything from jeans and t-shirt to a suit and tie.Oh, be warned: the strap is 34mm and I think may need to be special ordered. Still searching around.

B001FWYQSE.A16KWEBV9N8E26.reviewText: Gift for 6"3' - 200lbs+ guy. Loved the design, size, and look of the watch. He received many compliments! After about a year and a half, the leather band started to separate and I've had to replace the battery twice. I don't wear watched so I don't know if that's normal or not.

B001FWYQSO.A329GHT3TL5JWO.reviewText: a great watch and it looks exactly like it does in the picture.  only downfall is that it is very heavy. other than that, it looks great and I get a lot of compliments

B001FWYQU2.A96XMQO8QYNWQ.reviewText: The Watch itself is pretty good looking, its modernly designed but there is one defect that I would like to mention: the strap is very short, it seems like it is designed for women, my wrist is average size and it's on its last clip and still is pretty tight.  Otherwise the Watch is great!!!

B001FWYQU2.A29D8ZC6EI2WLE.reviewText: the watch i received does not match the picture displayed, the date dial on the right is not there.

B001FZWRF0.A1OWY56HOLO7Y3.reviewText: These are one of my favorites. Although they did run at least half size small at first. But after wearing them for about 2-3 days, they broke in. I'm happy I've purchased them.

B001GIOTMA.A37KO6OVBPLDA5.reviewText: This Diesel automatic caught my eye at once. Certainly one of the most distinctive automatics on the market. It is just the right weight. I have never liked very  lightweight watches. No winding ever if you wear it every day or use a winder. I have received numerous compliments. There is no date function which is fine with me, Just elegant simplicity.Watch Zone was great. Excellent communication and fast shipping.Either treat yourself or buy for a man in your life. I am sure they will be greatfull.
B001GIOTMA.A37KO6OVBPLDA5.summary: This watch is a pleasure to own!

B001GIOTMA.A2CMFWM39YUIXO.reviewText: I love this watch.  it really looks as great as it shows in the picture.

B001GIOTMA.A1J1MN3FVP61BU.reviewText: This watch is just too good looking for words.When I first saw it, I instantly fell in love with it.It was a bit expensive so I bought it somewhere else. (near the bay winkwink)When I got it, it looked even better than the picture did.What's ironic is, I didn't even know what "automatic" meant. And its being anautomatic watch makes it cooler.Anyhow, I really recommend this watch if you want to look like a BAMF.Looks very modern and sleek. Probably looks best on teenagers and people in their 20s.I really like this watch!

B001GIOTMU.A2BCVLFJTYWV96.reviewText: this diesel is by far the best watch i own, and i am a watch person.

B001GIOTMU.AUCTXRG1WYQBI.reviewText: What a cool watch this is. It has that steam punk look to it and yet you can get away wearing it with a suit and tie. Among my many watches this one will always be one of my favorites. I am not into skeleton dials but when I saw this with the square face and the big screws I had to buy it. Lately I noticed Diesel watches have been getting bigger and bigger. This one is still in the mid-size category and doesn't look like a wall clock on your wrist.

B001GIOTN4.A2C84OC4D0UPMP.reviewText: Here are my general points of review for watchesAppeal, function and appropriate useAppeal:I've had this watch complimented several times and I've just owned it for a few weeks. I've waited for the price to drop, for it to come back in stock and when it did, I just HAD to have it because I didn't want the risk of losing it forever. And let me tell you, I'm overjoyed I did. There is 0 watches out there like this.Function:It's clearly not made for guys with small wrists, but that's to be expected as most of my bigger watches I always have to clip off an extra slot. After doing that via 5 minutes help from a kitchen knife, I was in action and felt like a million bucks. Regardless of the adjustment, I still prefer to read the smaller bottom left dial as my current time zone as I don't even have to flick my wrist, it's already angled.Appropriate useIf you're feeling like a fresh urbanite...Rock this.That's it. You're welcome :-)

B001GIOTNO.A2I2LR1NS30Q0Q.reviewText: I bought this for my husband as another going out watch. It has a really great design and he likes wearing it. I've always liked Diesel clothes & now I like their accessories too.

But this is exactly the watch i`ve been looking for..cute & comptable! & really thank you for my husband i was so suprised! Love it...

B001HXWL3S.AUJKUYHSJGY1Z.reviewText: These are made by DSL 55 and not Diesel like its advertised. DSL55 is a seperate company and operates under diff mgmnt. If you care about your authentication to be displayed by logo, you will be disappointed. This will only say they are DSL 55. My issue was not with the glasses but the extra effort put in description as "Authentic Diesel". Make your own call.

B001HXYVUO.A3M89V1LEC3XU6.reviewText: I like the way these things look and who can argue with a $40 price tag for some high fashion shades?

B001IDZAQW.A2496BDAI5SO9X.reviewText: it's diesel and i am very comfortable with the shoes! i am wearing it now because it arrived as i expected and i get it for free shipping! thank you seller!

B001IDZB5M.A2CA0YOBNN8JR.reviewText: This shoes was my last Diesel shoes I will bought. I bought another 2 and I got one for present and can wear them only for less than a year. This pair were the worst. They had very bad quality in the fabric. They are really cute but it's a shame that they broke so easyly when I just wear them for hang out with my friends, like going to mall or somewhere out. I never wear them to run or strong activities (for that I have my Columbia shoes).They are not too bad, but expect you can only wear them few months.

B001IDZB5M.A3OBK0MZK757WQ.reviewText: This sneaker is very good looking and very comfortable inside. The one problem is size. They are half size less than the standard sizes. If you order them order half size higher.

B001IDZBZW.A1GK6TLHN9M8Q9.reviewText: Super comfortable, true to size - I got them in US size 9.5 (they weren't available in my size - US 9) and they feel a little too large. I'm still able to wear them, but I think US size 9 would've been a better fit. Good quality, however, I'm not sure I like the look. They look a bit different than pictured - the white parts (the upper) are made of patent leather, I think one can't really see it here (in the online images) very well...I mean, I can see it now when I look at the images, now that I've seen these sneakers in person and *know* that the upper is mostly made of patent leather, but I really didn't notice it when I was purchasing these sneakers. Also, the upper is this off white, milky white color, not bright white as pictured. And the soles are bright white (just like pictured) and it just doesn't look good. And I was disappointed by how wrinkled the surface was (the patent leather parts), it looks like the shoes were subjected to too much direct sunlight and/or heat/hot temperatures and got all wrinkled up and turned slightly yellow (and may be that actually is what happened). Also, they look humongous and make feet look bigger than they actually are so I don't know...They are really-really comfortable, easy to put on and a pleasure to walk in, and I LOVE them for their comfort, but I don't think I like the way they look. I think I'll keep them because they are one of the most comfortable sneakers I've ever worn and may be they'll start growing on me and I'll like the look better after I've worn them for a while.
B001IDZBZW.A1GK6TLHN9M8Q9.summary: Very comfortable and true to size

B001IDZC2O.ARQAYBLN8Y2P0.reviewText: I purchased these sneakers because I love Diesel sneakers. They are so light and comfortable. I have arthritis in my feet and a heavy sneaker just adds to the misery. I am on my feet all day and without these sneakers I would be miserable. They are stylish, good value, and can't live without them.

This thing would look appropriate on the battle field or at the dance club. The leather is quality and the buckle is heavy duty to hold everything together. Once you get used to how big it looks on your wrist, you'll never want to go back to that dinky thing you used to wear.

B001J4R0XQ.A2RT4N4HGJQI4K.reviewText: I'm a fan of wristwatches but I am also careful with my expenses this days. Amazon's vendor price wasn't too far from the local's and with free shipping it was a decent bargain.The design was just perfect for business casual or even in casual attire. Nice steel polish case, copper toned face and the fork-like collar around the clown emphasizing the day name and number. The leather strap is not as flexible as to some other watches I had or have but hopefully after some time it'll loosen up. I own this for about 2 days so I can't say much about the endurance of the watch but the initial quality is impressive.

I'll see how long it last but I've heard Diesel makes great watches. I have no complaints about the seller. It was delivered on time and I had no problems with the condition or anything.

B001KZJKJ6.A3091VQNO377YC.reviewText: I spent many many hours browsing here on Amazon for the perfect watch. I seriously am far to indecisive and had a certain price range, but i stuck with it. I wanted something on the larger size with a leather band that was sturdy and felt like it was made well.This watch stands out for sure when you wear it. Its actually bigger than i thought it would be, but i have no complaints with that at all. If you are looking for a watch that feels light on the wrist, this one is not for you.You definitely will notice that its there and it will take some getting use to as i'm sure this is the case with most Diesel watches. I am 5'10" and weigh 180 and have a thin build. My wrists aren't large... it looks great on me!! So if you are worried about it being to large, don't be, it fits nice! The actual watch is more like chrome around the edges and it has a nice shine to it which draws attention while the metal in the center around the crystal is a brushed finish. I have only worn it out once since i got it and it got compliments instantly. As of now, i will be thinking about buying another Diesel in the future. I am happy with the choice i made to pick this beauty up. If you are eyeballing this one... just do yourself a favor and click the "Buy" button.. haha. You won't be disappointed!

B001KZJKJ6.A3UCL9RFEPZ720.reviewText: Wow this watch is gorgeous I'm in love with this watch, beautiful watch and great seller, is big enough but fits well in the wrist it doesn't matter if you're skinny fits well anyway because the strap isn't larger, in resume great watch.

Much more comfortable now that I got the right size. It has this worn look to it which is part of the design and style.

B001N4463Y.A2IMF5CJV36RU7.reviewText: These shoes are cute and comfy.The best part about them to me is their sole, even though people dont usually see that part. the sole has a picture of hearts on it.They are comfy and easy to put on.They tend to make screeching noises on floors but thats not really a big deal.It sounds like when people playing basketball are switching their feet around on the court and their shoes make that screech sound.

B001N44706.A2BLRJV8X54026.reviewText: I literally got these boots two days after I ordered! Great seller! The packaging was exellent, arrived in a sturdy box, boots were double wrapped in water-tight bags and in mint condition. These rainboots are functional AND fashionable. I get tons of compliments when I wear them, and they are very comfortable-- I walk around in them on a huge outdoor college campus all day and my feet feel perfect at the end of it. They look exactly like they do in the picture, no weird surprises. Love these boots!

B001N44706.A3D2V4C7RRJCDX.reviewText: The toe area is a bit too roomy, and the length was good.  I usually wear a 9 1/2. I've only worn them one time, but it seems to be pretty sturdy.  It's eye-catching without being glaring. I got a lot of compliments when I wore them.  Great deal for the price, and I received them pretty quickly.

B001N44706.A1I23G22I9U4ML.reviewText: The boots are great. I like the design, not too colorful. I didn't want just plain black boots, and I also didn't like a very colorful design, so this just fit my desire perfectly. The size is just correct, I ordered my normal shoe size of 7.5, and they fit just perfectly. They are just a little heavy, but that should be expected.The order arrived on time and I had nothing to complain about.

B001N44706.A1Y602W6N3EM9X.reviewText: It looked great on the picture, but I had to return it, since it was too wide for my calfs.

B001P80M54.A24A4WQA0SMTX.reviewText: Got what I wanted, the size is perfect just ! I like buying product from this store ! Would be better if more ppl write reviews of what they buy !
B001P80M54.A24A4WQA0SMTX.summary: Most of product is what I expected

B001P80M54.A3FDJLE7SAMXVL.reviewText: I like it, the only problem was that the flops fit somewhat large. But I love the product. The seller was very good.

B001P80M54.AIOO5QDEQ5ZBE.reviewText: these shoes ran small, which I should have expected from my experience with anything made by diesel, so that's kind of my bad.  but the strap is denim, which really irritates your feet if you wear them for very long.

B001P80M54.A2XD2W9Y6SELID.reviewText: I was so excited when I ordered this pair of sandals, so imagine my surprise when the arrived and I tried them on to discover that the construction is low/middle grade (they were curving toward the soles) and that the straps were so wide on my foot that there was no way I could keep them on AND walk at the same time
B001P80M54.A2XD2W9Y6SELID.summary: Diesel in name only ---- where is the quality control?

B001P80M54.AT7WTX3A84ZQB.reviewText: I like style but they fitted somewhat large for size 10.  They were also hard to walk in after a stroll down the street. I prefer my havaianas lees expensive and more comfy

B001P80M54.A26CURXRFQBM0R.reviewText: I like it and it fits perfectly. I read in a previous review that the sandals are too narrow on sides but for me works fine

B001P80M54.A28LJOLY2NFVM.reviewText: Flip flops were VERY narrow and soles were very thin and flimsy.  Had to return them.

B001P80MVS.A37PBCO7W2ENKM.reviewText: Nice stylish shoes, not too flashy and not too simple. Though keep in mind that it fits a bit tight so you may want to choose 1/2 size larger than your usual size.Not the most comfortable shoe I have, but again that may be because of being 1/2 size tight.Overall its good for the price.

B001P80NEE.A201JPMQ7NYBIN.reviewText: I love this sneaker...it's hip, sportish, and durable. I just love the how the straps rope around the shoes - giving it a unique look. I have to get the canvas black and the toupe. It's simply the best.
B001P80NEE.A201JPMQ7NYBIN.summary: I have to get the toupe and the canvas black!!

B001P80NOO.A2SB2IZ1DJX1PW.reviewText: I use black or white shoes. This ones were a good product, they're a bit soft, but still being nice.

B001P80O5M.A2ZJ013U5LT6QD.reviewText: These are very cheap Diesel's--the blue part of the is starting to like deterate. Very disappointed i wasted my money & plus it was a gift.

B001P80P92.A35JHP29545JFI.reviewText: I purchased these sandals in the summer of '09 and put them through the test of wearing them almost every day.  It is winter now and they are still in great condition.  I find Diesel Sandals to be durable and quite comfortable with a hint of style.  Product was shipped quick and the quality I expected.
B001P80P92.A35JHP29545JFI.summary: Diesel Sandals: Need I say more

B001P80QGE.A2HB9R7LTN7A7O.reviewText: This shoes are just amazing! I got them over four years ago and I still have them and they still have a lot of time in them

B001P80R3G.A2KNPZ3HEICUWP.reviewText: A handsome, comfortable, versatile shoe. I couldn't have been happier, until I scuffed one of the heels on some pavement. The scuff soon became a hole and the hole rapidly turned into a huge gash separating the sole from the upper. In a matter of weeks the shoes were rendered unwearable. The Diesel Revenge might appear to be made of luxurious hand-stitched leather, but it holds up about as well as cardboard.

B001P80TYS.A201JPMQ7NYBIN.reviewText: Comfortable, stylish and at an okay price....This shoe is excellent. I will buy more diesel footwaer pretty soon.

B001P80TYS.A1GFMXKO8FKJ8O.reviewText: Los zapatos llegaron en excelente estado, son identicos a la foto, la talla es la americana, no hubo ningun contratiempo con la entrega, el producto es recomendado. son mucho más bonitos que la imagen

B001P80TYS.A29KJ1B32SL5FD.reviewText: I am very pleased with this shoe but not pleased enough for a five star rating. I was surprised at how much lighter the gray was when I opened the box. The picture seems darker than the actual shoes. I followed the advice of other reviews and bought a full size bigger than my normal size and I'm glad I did. The shoe does not feel narrow to me as others have said. Again, I am very happy with these shoes as they look and feel great. This is a very flat lightweight shoe. I would not want to walk long distances with these shoes on. They are casual and comfortable but they are very thin and flat.

B001P80TYS.A3LI5XA2ZRNCZ.reviewText: The Best shoes is Veryyyyyyyyyyyy Goooooooooood i love you forever in the life i m happy of have that i

B001P80TYS.A19PY6J4DOIYIG.reviewText: Bought these for my boyfriend. He is usually a size 11.5 and I wasn't sure to go with an 11 or 12, I opted for the 12 and they fit perfect on him. He says they are the most comfortable shoe he has ever worn. Also, very stylish for a white runner in my opinion.

B001P80TYS.A33LB11X1Z69EG.reviewText: I bought these shoes for my husband, he loved them, it looks very cute and excellent quality.  He tells me they are very comfortable, but I had to buy a half bigger than it normally uses and are perfect size

B001P80TYS.A3OY2S1QL7WOI4.reviewText: Those are great casual sneakers! Color balance OK, very versatile, wearable with pretty much everything casual - jeans, shorts, light long paints, etc. Summer treat!

B001P80TYS.A3PE86S6QB6ZWC.reviewText: These shoes are very comfortable and light weight. One step above wearing nothing, definitely not a sport shoe, does not have a lot of material between your foot and the floor.

B001P80TYS.A1RAWJW1MT1WG2.reviewText: comfortable right out of the box, lightweight, almost like martial arts shoes and seem to be very well made.  I would definitely buy again.

B001P80TYS.A139SEYWL3V5PF.reviewText: I have 5 pairs of Diesel shoes and all are the best for me. Very comfortable, looks modern, also price is very nice, because in EU is price 100% more.

B001P80TYS.AUKCIXL773JBB.reviewText: I bought this show thinking that the cream or white area was leather but it actually has this modern synthetic canvas feel to it. I thought it would be a return after I received it but "no way". It's a little pricey but comfortable but once you wear it you will always spare it to the side due to worry that you don't want it to wear sooner than you would expect. It also has embossed "leather" Diesel lettering on the side. I wore it to work and I could notice peoples eyes glance at a split second, it does catch the eye. I guess I have a good taste lolI would recommend it but maybe at a slightly lower price just because its not made in the U.S. All the same, its a nice shoe!!

B001P80TYS.A2IHX2MFFFYAFW.reviewText: I love these shoes, such a nice look!But they are fitting really small. I always take 11 but this time I should have ordered 12. I had to return them. Really easy to send them back by the way...I will have to find other shoes because I could not find this model in 12.So sad..

B001P80TYS.AN6T6AW7AMSJX.reviewText: After i purchased these shoes for my husband we discovered the size doesn't fit properly.It's very short and tight,so i reordered half size bigger.Still too tight and not good fit.My husband purchased in the past some diesel already so maybe just pattern on these shoes is so tight,so i would recommend it to men with no wide feet at all.The shoes are very nice in reality even though all is man made so you consider your purchase....

B001P80TYS.AOX9NIIQXQDO4.reviewText: Me encanta la forma y el diseño, son ligeros y cómodos, material de buena calidad y llaman la atención. Aunque lo estoy usando, me quedan un poco ajustado, soy 9.5 en otras marcas, pero para una próxima vez eligiré size 10.

B001P80TYS.A1MC4RY3QN4ZAZ.reviewText: Diesel shoes are probably the most comfortable shoes you can buy in my humble opinion... and these are no exception.  They're great. This particular pair was a little bigger than my black pair of Diesel's, which seem to fit a little better, but these are close enough for me.  I wear a 13 in almost all shoe brands except Steve Madden, and these fit pretty true to my size 13 feet.Not all that form fitting overall though and they have high laces, so these wouldn't go particularly well with shorts, but are perfect for jeans in the office. I wear them everyday.

B001P80TYS.AN2BC2ZSKEHI7.reviewText: all ok  great fit diesels are the most comfortable shoes i have  i now have over 10 pairs of theirs  they break in great

B001P80TYS.A210I68OVMFPFN.reviewText: I have been searching for the shoes since I left Europe in 2008. Thank goodness I found them love them they are so light. Feels like your not wearing them at all.

B001P80TYS.AA6U7CFONUFML.reviewText: This is first time i am buying  Diesel Shoe that too online . Was little scared regarding size but it fit perfactly.i just select the size according to cms . May this help u to get right size.now i can buy anytime online

B001P80TYS.A5IEGS5NZJ38C.reviewText: Comfortable and sexy look with a perfect fitting with my size. almost a year now and its good now too.

B001P80TYS.A1196DC0PL9H9M.reviewText: This was my second set of Diesel shoes I've owned. I bought a pair of spikes last year on a trip, and only got a half size bigger(12.5) than what I normally wear. They seemed to fit fine, but they started hurting little toe a lot. After about a month of wear in they fit fine. So with these I picked up a set of thirteens and I have not had a problem with them yet. They are very comfortable.

B001P80TYS.A38GZODJMC08N4.reviewText: just put on this new shoes and it fits me good but somewhat tight from sides but it may be becuase they're new :D

B001P80UGA.A2O0BJMG9ME3N7.reviewText: Zapatos muy comodos, aun los tengo despues de tantos meses de usarlos, en verdad que me gustaron mucho, los recomiendo!

B001P80UGA.A2GIT11DPMDN8S.reviewText: This shoe is stylish and fit great. It's worth the price and would recommend it to everyone. Thanks.

B001PIM3J2.AORWNNHM4IDJY.reviewText: I bought these for myself, in pink! They fit very well and are very comfortable through the whole day & though a night out. Those who've seen these on, say I look good, and that's what matters most. lol

B001Q3KQC2.A3DPQLR4M6INKH.reviewText: I'm 32DD(natural),my boobs pop out sometimes so I guess it does not give me enough support.Why 4 stars? because it works perfectly as a push up bra (push it up and makes it round just likein the picture)and I'm probable a 32DDD, so I will give it the benefict of the doubt.

B001Q3KQUO.A3D6NVTBRKQPOZ.reviewText: Very comfortable! Fast shipping! I got the pink because I already had the black and loved how comfortable they were! Very worth it

B001Q3KRJ4.A153V94C6HVK2N.reviewText: The top is not great: it fits very small and is very stretchy. Plus it is kind of hard to wear since the front is kind of feminin but the back is very sporty.
