B001Q3KRJ4.A153V94C6HVK2N.summary: Only for tall and skinny women!

B001Q3KROO.A2KVEGS8OG14J5.reviewText: i bought these or my wife for xmas...and she says there the most comfortable underwear shes ever had and they look sexy to boot. cant beat these.

B001Q3KROO.A2OWU1SB3EHX68.reviewText: These were picked up for my gf as a fun gift, (yeah I had to specify sexual orientation... Otherwise I'd feel mad self-conscieous... Pssssh!). They did the trick! She liked them alot and said they were true to size, and really comfortable. The colors are pretty cool, plus when she turns around they flash some cheek for you. Def fun.

B001Q9C7X2.AUJKUYHSJGY1Z.reviewText: These are DSL55. Despite the fact that they were once related they are 2 separate companies now. These are not Diesels!! If you really want Diesel glasses look for another pair. These are okay.

B001RMC3JQ.ADBKVTYKFTOSL.reviewText: I'm very satisfied with my new watch. It's just as beautiful as it looks in the picture, I think more, and bigger. All of my friends have gone crazy about it, they say they love it.

B001RMD2VE.A2471P2D2R4MF0.reviewText: It is a super different and great looking watch. I collect watches & it is about the most different one I own.

B001RMD2VE.AU9HDDSK8A4FT.reviewerName: Ethan E. Brown "Propably not quite as helpful...
B001RMD2VE.AU9HDDSK8A4FT.reviewText: Little help, Amazon! Your photo shows a black piece of metal bolted to an arm band. A little bit of an explanation about how this actually tells time would be nice. Does it talk? Does it shoot a hologram out of its strangely smooth face suspending the numbers an inch or two above your arm? Who can tell - apparently, you don't feel like telling us. Perhaps when you push one of those strange gray buttons, it sends and electric signal directly to your brain? Is this Cobra Commander's watch? Perhaps Super Man owns this watch and sees the time by using his x-ray vision to penetrate the protective metal housing. It certainly is different though. It's the most different watch I own. All my other watches follow the bland, trite, predictable pattern of being time keeping devices that actually allow their owners to know what time it is. This watch cannot be bothered with such trivialities. It is too important for you silly time-wanting-to-know people.
B001RMD2VE.AU9HDDSK8A4FT.summary: The Most Excellent Watch I Own That Doesn't Bother to Tell You the Time

B001RTS258.A1W5IPOS5HTK7Z.reviewText: I'm 6'8'' and I was looking for a big ass watch.  This did the trick.Only problem I have is with the seller, TERRIBLE service.  The box was all dusty on the inside and out.  The watch itself was very dusty.  And the worst part about it, there was a crack under the glass of the bottom left dial.  Do they not inspect their watches before sending them out?Especially one that is this pricey.And it looks like they bumped up the price on this one.Buyer beware.

B001RTS258.A12FQ94NZO0AJJ.reviewText: Bought this watch as a gift for my husband and I couldn't believe how incredibly cool this watch was when I received it!  It looks HUGE on his wrist and he is a big guy!  The sonar light is pretty cool, but it can be hard to see at times.  The quality was excellent and I would so buy another style by Diesel in a heartbeat!  BTW,  husband LOVES this watch!!!  Buy it...don't give it a second thought!

B001RTS258.AHIF7QTVSZ0CS.reviewText: Bad batteries. I have had many diesel watches and I love them. However the seller shipped me a watch with BAD BATTERIES so I hope when I have them replaced the watch will work...

B001RTS258.A9Q2B40880KWQ.reviewText: With no instruction info for this model, don't know how chronograph functions. Need info foe this model. It is not included.
B001RTS258.A9Q2B40880KWQ.summary: like the style, The first one I receiced was not working. It is accurate. No instruction booklet for this model

B001RTS258.A58HHUMAV36B.reviewText: Came on time,right color.Arrived a little dusty,but dust wipes off.Gets lots of compliments,neat design.Too early to report on the getting-laid factor,however.

B001RTS258.A3FDJTK26CIBFS.reviewText: Excellent watch, if you picture Yourself wearing it than don't think twice just get it. Amazing craftsmanship. Excellent prize. I remember seeing this watch along time ago before I used Amazon and than it was on sale for $250.

B001RTS258.A1AQ7JCAIC999Y.reviewText: i bought this watch because i felt it would match my admirals hat. well once i bought this watch i was incredibly happy with myself and could not wait for it to arrive. when i received my watch i was impressed. i have no complaints about it, except maybe one. this watch is too cool for me. since i started wearing my watch i have been laid upwards of five times a week, once by japanese twins. be warned once you put on this watch (which was clearly crafted by the gods) you will get laid, and hard, by everyone.

B001RTS258.ARLGU8CMT2O3G.reviewText: If this watch catches your eye, buy it. I wanted a wide band watch, but this monster looked nutty when I first saw it, but I kept coming back to it. I looked at hundreds of large, over-sized, wide-band type watches from Diesel and others and nothing stood out to me like this one.  The style reminds me of the old Rolleiflex cameras. Retro-tech, I guess.The construction is really solid and the animated "radar/sonar" sweeping second hand (4 seconds per revolution) just adds so much to an already sweet wrist piece. Check the YouTube videos to see it in motion. The real leather band is nice and solid as well. It is large and pretty heavy for a watch, but not uncomfortable, and I don't have huge arms or wrists. At work I take it off and prop it up with the wrist band and use it as a clock!

B001RTS258.AVWEK0XWLP2HX.reviewText: Ok look I bought this watch cheap for all its worth and to be honest my first day wearing it i was complimented three times. It was like the watch was the life of the party. Its a mans watch I will tell you that. I am 6'4 309lbs and it fits my massive wrist like a glove. I am telling you if you have a small hand do not buy, because it is overwhelmingly massive. A mans watch! Enough said!

B001RTS258.A1UP5CIELABXA7.reviewText: picture intrigued me. When I received the watch, I was less impressed with the appearance. Very bulky, which isn't always bad IMHO, but this one lacked style. I've got other Diesel watches which I love.
B001RTS258.A1UP5CIELABXA7.summary: Not as cutting edge in person

B001RTS258.A2D0L8A243TOF0.reviewText: If you like watches, and you are looking for something different to add to your collection this is one to consider. I've never seen the sonar function on another watch. It's quite catchy. In a word this watch is awesome! Three time zones make it a perfect travel watch and it's audacious size are likely going to be conversations starters for anyone "brave" enough to sport this watch. Love it!

B001RTS258.A1GC8J1A8FAINW.reviewText: I bought this for my son who loves all things unique and different and I think he will love it, because it is so different.

B001RTS258.A2JJOD74SXPMUW.reviewText: Super cool, really stylish, and very different. It's definitely an eye catcher. I bought it for my husband and he loves it.

B001RTS258.AF0L6RUWIUEV3.reviewText: Just received my Diesel and it's better in person than the photos. It's a little hard to judge some watches depending on your frame of reference. I really like Invicta watches, so I'm used to big heavy watches. Is this watch big? Maybe, I would use the term oversized. Is it heavy? Not really, but it does have some weight to it.The thing that attracted me to this watch was the "vintage" look it has. I don't generally like leather bands on my watches, but this one is great because of the width it has and the fact that the face has inset leather look between the dials, a really nice touch. The leather band really fits the style of this watch. The sweeping radar is a nice touch and adds to the interesting factor. This is a great watch for the price. Best thing is how unique it is. I've never seen a watch like this, which was it's biggest selling point for me. I will happily add this to the collection and rotation of my other time pieces.

B001RTS258.A23T4984QKKLGU.reviewText: The watch was delivered promptly, looks great, however packed poorly because it moved around in box when handled. When opened, watch was not in working condition. took to have looked at by a watch company. the watch had no batteries installed and on top of that required 4 to operate the watch.once the batteries installed the watch was as expected.."SBA"! just wish it was working properly when received.

B001RTS258.A1RXRFMRNSPQ1J.reviewText: This is a great watch and a great conversation starter with everyone that sees it. It has a very solid quality feel to it.

B001RTS258.A3SLUSWUA78IMQ.reviewText: very nice seller,very nice watch. Actually when I saw this watch, I thought it's a little strange. It's big, heavy, and cool. The reason why I bought is the "sonar". It's an awesome design!!! The shape is great when you put it on. It's not like a watch in your wrist, it's like a barcer!!! If you want to be outstanding and cool, try it.

B001RTTZK4.A20E1EMADEY7ER.reviewText: This watch is horrible. The band is wayyyy too thin, the watch face itself is too small, and the band isn't long enough. i'm only 6'2" and 175 lbs, and it barely even fit on my wrist. i've actually seen women's watches that are bigger than this.

B001RTTZK4.AIXY5CI3Y9KTF.reviewText: This is a GREAT-looking watch!  Yeah, it's smaller than some men's watches, but it still looks like a men's watch, and it's nice not to have a HUGE thing on my wrist.  It's about the size of the Nixon graduate watch (which I also love).This watch is funky and different looking without being too weird or overstated.  I could wear it with anything from jeans and a T-shirt (though not shorts) to out on a date with a shirt and tie (though not a suit).  I don't know how long the leather band is going to last, but it looks pretty well made.  (It is shiny).Seriously, this watch has STYLE.  I love it.
B001RTTZK4.AIXY5CI3Y9KTF.summary: Even cooler than it looks in the picture!!

B001RTTZK4.A1TVZYBVEITM0Z.reviewText: The watch is too small for a man's wrist, it didn't even fit on my wrist. It might fit a youth's wrist.I'm returning this the same day I recieved it.

B001RTU3U0.AIDX2XAMLTIHX.reviewText: I own multiple Diesel watches and I am thoroughly impressed with each of them.  This is by far the biggest watch I have ever worn.  At first it felt weird but after a few hours did not notice its size much.  Its simple and very easy to use.  There are three dials with three knobs to set the time on each.  The larger have a sweeping sonar backing which does nothing other than look cool.  I do wish it had a date indicator but, I am still happy with my purchase.

B001RTU3U0.AQ9KE0N66OQLG.reviewText: this watch was my first buy in amazon,with a white case.if you like big and special watch,this is it.it has a brown leather so fit for even basic wear.DIESEL alway has good designed watch.don't think just buy it!

B001RTU3U0.A3IQ53GB5CFV2O.reviewText: This is a cracking watch - though not small!!  Love the way the sonar/radar sweeps round though they could probably have put in a bit more animation.  Good quality - I like the use of real leather so it even smells good.

B001RTU3U0.A11M59Q51I96D9.reviewText: The watch is a great novelty item.  The band is comfortable and the watch is nice and big...but pretty useless other than it is a different kind of watch.  For the price aself-setting option would have been nice and a calendar, too...and a backlight would have been great.

B001RTU3U0.A2ILROHFIZY7W6.reviewText: If your're thinking about buying this watch.  STOP thinking and just it.  It's FANTASTIC... The Oversized case covers an entire arm it seems like.  The leather is soo soft...and the warm brown look makes it a fit for any attire, whether casual or formal.  This is how you step your game up.  Boooom!!!!

B001S2ZMJI.A2S6UVK5Q8OXDZ.reviewText: One of my favorite watches to wear when I got out at night or evening wear. I get lots comps on it, even my friend of my got one as well. Comes in gold, silver and my Gunmetal which I love. Not work well out in the brightlight, as when the sun is beaming down on you while outdoors in the sun. Use another watch for that. This will be a keeper for me for a long time. Maybe someday they will have a simliar style that you can easliy read during the outdoor sunlight.

B001S2ZMJI.A2JTLTCXZSCP1F.reviewText: ordered this watch on a monday, arrived at my door on wednesday with standard shipping! great watch, looks great and have gotten a lot of compliments already and im only 2 hours into my workday. the only problem i had with this watch was the button that you have to press in order to see the time gets stuck and will work half of the time. i have read reviews and no one else has had this problem so i have ordered the watch again and requested a return label to send this perticular watch back. hopefully this issue will not occur with the replacement.

B001S2ZMJI.A22Y1J2S2TQ1GX.reviewText: This is a nice, well-built watch, similar to one that used to be made by Tokyoflash. In comparison: the Diesel watch is easier to set, although it can be easy to not see the thick manual that comes with it. It fits into the bottom of the box so tight, I had to shake it loose once I saw it was in there.The main problem is the Diesel display isn't very bright and flashes very quickly. It's impossible for me to read it in daylight, even if I held my palm over it. At dusk and in low light, it works just fine.So, if you like the style and use a watch during the day, try to find one of the old Tokyoflash watches. If you want something cool-looking for evening wear, you can go with the Diesel.

B001S2ZMJI.A272J3KM0943PK.reviewText: This is my second day of use. The watch does not display time when key is tapped. It displays at times but not most of the time...Im just acking my finger...I should've have been delivered with a faulty one or this model is a failure...Beware!!!Watch was delivered on time. It is a great looking watch. Loved it during my first day of usage...
B001S2ZMJI.A272J3KM0943PK.summary: Watch does not work at all times

B001S2ZMJI.ALRX63KJKSPJO.reviewText: Good looking watch it combines style and modern design, before buy this product I read some reviews, in some of them people was complaining about the display "is not bright during daylight", "only last for a second", etc. What I found so far is you press the display when you want to know the time and is off that's great because it save energy and the SS Gunmetal looks strong and give character to the user. The seller send it inmediately without any delays in transit, Quality of the product as avertise 100% Diesel...Inmaculate

B001S2ZMJI.A2ZFQEQ57Z0AV.reviewText: the disign is really nice, fits well, macths with everything. the future looking was what caugth my eyes, and i am not disapointed,great piece

B001S2ZMJI.AQ35SM8BFEZ0Z.reviewText: First things first. I have never had a watch that I've been asked about or that's been commented on as much as this watch.It's a beautiful watch that looks amazing. It's has a great futuristic design where you have press a button and the time scrolls across. The only downside is that it is a bit hard (not impossible) to read the time on a sunny day. Now I know this is the purpose of a watch but for me the design is so great that it's still worth the 5 stars I have given it.Sometimes style over substance matters.

B001S2ZMJI.A2G0TUH9634DZF.reviewText: This watch is awesome. It is totally cool. But the display is 100% unreadable if you are outside. That's why 4 and not 5 stars.
B001S2ZMJI.A2G0TUH9634DZF.summary: Awesomely cool. Can't view in sunlight

B001S2ZMJI.A3K55SHF4MN6RR.reviewText: This along with 5 other diesel watches failed to work after 1 year.  For repairs you ship to Fossil, apparently they make make these watches imported from China.  Only one watch I have worked but the band snapped.  Don't support these guys...Suckered into what is actually a pretty cool watch with the slick band.

B001SASA4Y.A3CFM7RG87PXUR.reviewText: I am an art student and liked the design on these along with the diesel name.....they are pretty cute. the rubber sole makes the shoe super durable and very comfortable.  I do wish there had been a wide option.  the top of my toes feel a little cramped but i think that may get better with wear.

B001SASAJY.A3BGZR08V3D36F.reviewText: Estos zapatos son super lindos y comodos, el numero es acorde a mi talla y el color increible...

B001SASAJY.ANKUU629E98KQ.reviewText: These shoes are awesome, the color is gorgeous, and the style is legit...unfortunately I never got a chance to wear them since they were TOO SMALL.  I've purchased other Diesel shoes and typically I can wear a smaller size comfortably.  I wear a size 8 normally and all i know was this 7.5 was too small.  I don't know if the 8 would have been perfect, or if an 8.5 would have been perfect....oh well.  Best of luck to you and I hope it works out because I really did love these shoes and I wish I could've sported them around a bit.
B001SASAJY.ANKUU629E98KQ.summary: Buy a size larger than what you wear.

B001SASC2Y.A01840101UF5F1HRUKDD6.reviewText: I love them. They are simply awesome. Looks good with all kinds of wear. Color and Style are true to picture.

B001SASC2Y.A34BNDD9TJ20XM.reviewText: I ordered a black pair. I own many pair of flats, but this one stands out. Very stylish and chic, surprisingly well made considering the price I paid on Amazon. Love the sequin detail. The peep toe is merely a peep hole could have been a bit bigger, but still cute. The side buckle is not a decorative fake one, you can adjust to make it tight/loose if you want. Minus one star because the heel tab is a bit high and rubs at Achilles' tendon. I'm thinking to get a silicone pad or something to attach. Besides that I really love this shoes.

B001T0IK9S.A34BBG8D819MIK.reviewText: These look SOOO much better when you get them. I love these sneakers and they fit true to size.

B001T0ILHY.ACSK8EKRZGJBG.reviewText: I bought these rain boots for my three year old grandson.  The boots are of excellent quality, and my grandson loves the cute dinosaur design.  I'll probably have to get him the same boot in a bigger size next year.

B001T0ILHY.A3RCPYFNFZVHVM.reviewText: These are good boots.  Our son is now a size 12 and these still fit him.  He loves jumping in the mud puddles out back after a rain and these rinse easily with a hose.

B001T0ITUI.A107NK52SBSYDH.reviewText: these sneakers were cut small. I tried two sizes.I also had to pay the return shipping twice.
B001T0ITUI.A107NK52SBSYDH.summary: item cut very small. I had to return two pairs.

B001T4XKOE.A1G9FNC7R26NNG.reviewText: These shoes are fantastic! Not only do they look great, but the genuine leather is thick but very soft. I can only imagine how comfortable these shoes would be to a baby boy! The design and execution quality is highest class.

B001TH8UXM.A313W0XMXCRI0U.reviewText: If you like to look fashionable, this is has to be your first choice. The shoes, altough casual can even be worn with a semi-dressy outfit due to the shiny leather. You will get the looks! The shoes are super soft, comfortable, and will definately give a new look. I strongly recomend this product, you will not regret buying these shoes. One thing I must say though, I usually fit in 10 but for some reason 10s looked too big on me (because of its long design), 9.5s looked and fit just fine on me.Enjoy!
B001TH8UXM.A313W0XMXCRI0U.summary: A Must for the Fashion Conscious

B001TMEJ78.A3IQ53GB5CFV2O.reviewText: another cracking watch from Diesel - its a bit more purple that in the pictures but thats not necessarily a bad thing.  Its a big watch that looks more like a bracelet till you press the buttons.

B001TMEJ78.A6GK0CTEXPELV.reviewText: Great watch, get lot of compliments.But it is a bit stupid, that the time doesn't stay on. Youll have to push the buttons.Also setting the time and text is a nightmare operation. Not easy.
B001TMEJ78.A6GK0CTEXPELV.summary: Cool looking watch, but to get time need to press buttons

B001TMEJ78.AC0KBS4GAXLZR.reviewText: def. more purple/blueish than shown in the pic, especially the band.I was even kinda disappointed when opening the box; i thought the band would be entirely stainless steel while it is not (looks too blue/gadget during daytime).BUT it is actually a great watch/bracelet for going out, it looks great at night (without using the watch function).kinda big and heavy yes, but it is meant to be seen and people love it.

B001TMEJ78.AZ9IYXEPRM41Q.reviewText: This is a real Diesel that makes from a real heavy steel. I just got it today and put it on my hand. I feel holding 5 pounds of steel on my hand. If you want to buy this one, you should go to the store selling this product and try to wear it on your hand before you buy this from Amazon.

B001VIV842.A2N5MP2MKB58KT.reviewText: The watch catches everyone's eye. Its a simple timepiece - wish if it had more features apart from date & time.I really liked this bangle watch...looks nice & jazz.

B001VIV842.A3LTRNKLCGFH1.reviewText: The watch is very nice, most people do not think it is a watch. the scrolling is cool, you can change it to say what you want. I am a big man and the watch was to small so i contacted Diesel and they sent me two links for free, all I had to pay was shipping. The links are very easy to put in, the info. on how to do it is on there web site.

B001W8OIFM.A36DEO045FFTH5.reviewText: I bought this watch for my husband for Christmas two years ago and he absolutley loved it!  He still wears it today and it still looks brand new.  Great quality watch!

B001XCX87G.A3H0ZQ0YJOT2WK.reviewText: Sleek and stylish without being loud. Very light, but feel "solid" with good support. Excellent fit for my size 13 and somewhat narrow feet.

B001XCX87G.A1XGJ257YYVZGX.reviewText: hello my name is Luis Venegas live in Costa Rica and I am interested in your shoes but only big steps, I ask please get me a pair of size 7.5 or 8.any questions can contact me email luisvene28@yahoo.esthanks

B001XCX87G.A234CILOIN0F18.reviewText: I was hesitant about buying Diesel shoes because I've heard mixed reviews. After wearing them out for a night, and receiving several compliments, I'm sold. They fit true to size and the width is perfect. Very comfortable.

B001XCX87G.A2XYLAIRB1CSNR.reviewText: Hello, i like these shoes very much but i can't find anywhere size 10 or 10.5 (anywhere i mean online shops which i trust) if someone knows or something like that please contact me. krazana08@yahoo.comthanks

B001XCX8G2.APUH0EXS7HSJF.reviewText: I very liked this model of Diesel shoes. I have bought them for my husband, but I was very disapointed because of its size. My husband uses 9.5 (42 EU) size. But when I got, them, the size was suitable for women (40.5 EU). In the site shoes are suitable for men, so I have bought them. But on the box was written, that these shoes are for women. So, be careful, buying them.
B001XCX8G2.APUH0EXS7HSJF.summary: These shoes are for women, not for men!

B001XCX8G2.A3AWCQHFRCQA7G.reviewText: I would suggest trying them first and then actually buying.  I bought them at a store in Manhattan and so far they are awesome.  Try, then buy....  Common Sense.

B001XCX9JI.A1ZGKU0Q4CP621.reviewText: Saw these in a local shop but they had the size below what I needed so I had the luxury of knowing what they were like before ordering online.The delivery came swiftly (well, as swiftly as it can to Australia) and they look and feel great. They're bold without being garish and go with most of my wardrobe. They've lasted really well and I really can't fault them.
B001XCX9JI.A1ZGKU0Q4CP621.summary: Still love em after a year!

B001XCX9JI.A1SB0TGN0Y0POV.reviewText: This are great Diesels, but try to no get em dirty. When I tried to clean them the yellow tainted the white parts.

B001XCXAG0.A6Q44RCBVQDSY.reviewText: Shoes delivered in good order and matching description/photo. Only issue was sizing. Too small. Worked from published size charts which suggested they were 45 Euro size. Actually 44.5 Euro size and therefore too small. Picked up on way through US on international travel, so now trying to find an owner for them :-(

B001XCXGEQ.A19OZPK0ODTT9A.reviewText: I bought this shoes and after 2 times of wearing they started to destroy...I am very upset about Diesel now... Bad quality product!

B001XCXGUU.A1JHMJOUFPVZ59.reviewText: I was in USA for few days and I bought these shoes. They delivered it in 3 days and i did not make an effort to own it. I seached, liked, bought. And photos describes the item well.Thanks.

B001XCXGUU.A3QIJKZSD81DI1.reviewText: Price: Normally the prices is around 100 dollars, but the discount of 40% was great.Product: The shoes were in perfect conditions, no scratches or anything.Shipment: The product arrived in the diesel shoe box and it arrived on time.Fit: The shoes fit perfectly, i know already my diesel shoe size so i didn't have any trouble.Great product great seller!

B001XCXGUU.A2E7GVWJU80BHK.reviewText: Everything is well made except for the back of the shoe where the sole attaches to the heel. The sole just separates. I've had to do damage control with crazy glue but that only holds for so long.. Not sure why but my other paif or diesels does the same thing.

B001XCXGUU.A2QKE4O5I5J51R.reviewText: Hello everyone I have been buying shoes on amazon.com for ages and never had any issues until I bought these these Diesel shoes.The weather was terrible so I left the shoes in the box until 2 weeks, the weather finally cleared up, and I have worn 4 times, and today I noted the heel is peeling off.  NOT IMPRESSED Diesel products are usally great quality this is my 3rd pair of Diesel shoes and they did not even last 4 wears.
B001XCXGUU.A2QKE4O5I5J51R.summary: Sole is Peeling off after 4 wears

B001XCXGUU.A1S7KEFC70VPXZ.reviewText: My husband has exactly the same pair of Diesel shoes in size 10 but Brown color. Since he liked them so much, i went ahead and purchased another pair in Black, size 10. Unfortunately, had to return them because they didn't fit him and seemed to run about a 1/2 size smaller. My husband said they also feel a bit too tight in the mid section area. Other than that they are a great pair of shoes!

B001XCXGUU.A2ACW7I2CDGYU0.reviewText: Diesel Men's Run-Away Sneaker,Black/Silver good night, I make a purchase of diesel shoes, but I was wrong in the size and buy us and were size 9 size 10 us if you can please make the change because they do not .... nothing else to add my farewell ........... thanksEscucharLeer fonéticamente

B001XCXGUU.A2JKH4VPREA1OB.reviewText: The shoes that were sent to me were defective.  After three wears, the sole started coming apart in both shoes.  I've now left two voice mails and an email and have yet to hear back from them.  They say they will respond within 24 hours but that's not the case.BEWARE OF THIS VENDOR.  I WOULD NOT PURCHASE FROM THEM AGAIN!!!!!

B001XCXGUU.A13N4QGUWIZM8N.reviewText: They delivered exactly what I asked for, really fast, I'm VERY happy and would definitely purchase from them again. I saved at least 20 box (price on store) + gas, + time, very happy!

B001XCXGUU.AGI2E095J6SMG.reviewText: I feel cheated by shoemania shoes are not what these are shoes select an older model, if you do not have to send another model that scam do not buy a shoemania

B001XCXGUU.AJTP8CML78HST.reviewText: These shoes were bought because I particularly like the brand for shoes. Diesel shoes are amazing, That's for granted. I tried the parabarny ones and they were great. However, These shoes, these black ones started to be unglued in the sole and that's no good obviously. Especially in the back part, the one you put your heel on. You may think I was running with them or something, but you're wrong. So these ones didn't work with me. Sorry Amazon, Sorry Diesel. Just for fashion.
B001XCXGUU.AJTP8CML78HST.summary: Not so good but they are okay

B001XCXHK4.A2WKP9MTBPX8MP.reviewText: Very Snug fit, but they are well made. The shoes seems to be high quality and form to your feet somewhat.

B001XCXHK4.AXX5P368QUYC3.reviewText: This shoes styling and confortability is outstanding. The moment you put it on you wouldnt want to take it off anymore. Highly recomended

B001XCXHK4.AN3KPG8OSKXLT.reviewText: Always receive positive comments from friends when they see these shoes and they are very comfortable for everyday use. Perfect!

B001XCXHK4.A10DTN32JRDKCX.reviewText: Wow!  Finally a pair of sneakers that are as lightweight and comfortable as moccasins!  Comfortable, light-weight, and stylish, these sneakers are the next best thing to going barefoot!  Great shoes!

B001XCXHK4.A1JM0IBV4MQD9Q.reviewText: I own several Diesel items and my wife had found some Diesel shoes online that she loved but they were sold out and NOBODY on the planet seemed to have them.  So instead of trying to get the phone number of a boutique shoe store in Kashmir, she settled on this pair as a Christmas gift.  My first impression was that they looked like bowling shoes.  However, everything I've bought from Diesel is inherently hip right and up my alley and these shoes are no exception.  They go with just about everything I wear and after a couple of times out with them, they're perfectly broken in and totally comfortable.  I wear orthotics and they fit nicely in these shoes, as well.

B001XCXHK4.A16F8PDQO68VLW.reviewText: great shoes, easy to wash, very soft and comfortable, i think i'm about to get another pair of a different color ;)

B001XUQGMW.A2EGRYY0OG4XDW.reviewText: Diesel has always been one of my favorite makers of denim and their shoes are made with the same quality and fit. This is my second pair of shoes from Diesel and they are unsurpassed in quality, comfort, and fit. My feet are not always easy to fit. They are flat and narrow - hardly a shoe maker's template. But Diesel has managed to design shoes that not only fit my feet extremely well but offer comfort and style rarely found in other shoes. Great job!

B001XURQ3U.AFWK9Q6EQDC78.reviewText: Overall good it.  I like the thinner material in these shorts.  They do ride a little lower than most and I'm not a huge fan of the lining.

B0021AFNJK.A2NYVCS3PBW9I9.reviewText: these shoes are wonderfully designed, at first I ordered size 8 US which is usually 42. but it turned out it is much smaller than other shoe I have sized 8 US,actually it came with 40.5. it seemed smaller by 1.5 or so.Anyone thinks of the shoe, order 1.5 to 2 larger than your usual size.I have replaced the shoe with 10 US. It's so comfortable and dressed fine.I'd give it 4 out of 5,just because of the size matching.

B0021AFNJK.A2TV3IVOBH08OJ.reviewText: My boyfriend really loved these shoes, he said they are really comfortable and I have to say that they make him looks really handsome.

B0021AFOSK.A3L5BVNZFV9YMF.reviewText: I am very familiar with the Diesel brand, because I have bought from there store for years. This is the first time I have bought Diesel through Amazon.com. The sneakers are awesome. Absolutely would recommend buying this product. Also, the price is great too. It is hard to find good sale prices in store at Diesel because they usually sell out fast. Very Happy.

B0021AFOSK.APK0RTZ4YUTBB.reviewText: This is the second time I've bought these shoes, and I've never bought a pair of the same shoes twice. I've been wearing Diesel for years and I have over 20 pairs of shoes and these are the most durable and stylish of them all, my favorite pair by far. My first pair is still intact and I wear pretty regularly, it's been a year and a half since I bought them at full price for $150, I just bought them today for $60. I honestly would have paid full price for them the second time they're such a great pair. A MUST buy if you like the design. They run a tad big but fit me perfectly, the fit really snug and are extremely comfortable.

B0021AFRSW.A1JBHJG3AQ08GH.reviewText: Love the boots.Not really for wet weather.Confortable and great looking.Leather in and out.Superb rock and roll kick ass moonwalkers.Probably I would find another name for the product...

B0021AFRSW.A11B72ER5DEAFW.reviewText: I bought these a while ago and I really liked them. However, after wearing them for about 3 months the sole and the heel were just terrible. They have both worn through far more than I have ever seen on any other shoes/boots. My last good pair of boots I wore for 10 years before the heel had worn down this much. Due to the material the heel/sole is made of, it now sounds like I'm wearing high heels when I walk on a hard floor. Not exactly what I was going for. Also, the heel cracked and I ended up using glue to hold it on.It's been a while since I've worn these, but when I was wearing them they weren't unusually stressed. I work at a desk most of my day and don't get to walk much. I hadn't been hiking or anything that may have stressed these boots boyond their design. All in all they just didn't hold up at all to what I would expect from any descent pair of shoes/boots.

B0021AFRSW.A1JZI3YT1DPDI4.reviewText: I saw this boots at the Diesel store and it was not on sale so I tried on my proper size and bought it on amazon.The boots arrived on time and fits perfectly.A good buy.

B0021AFS90.A1M93G5VXX7ASD.reviewText: As a casual boot around town, these are pretty cool.  They look good, and are lightweight and comfortable.  But they are definitely not work boots; they are designer shoes that look like work boots.  The rubber sole is thick and has good tread, but the upper is made of paper-thin leather which I don't expect to last long.  If you're expecting something like a Timberland workboot, you'll be very disappointed.  I got a great deal so I'm happy, but I wouldn't pay list price or even half that.

B0021AFS90.A29VSRBN86Q7BN.reviewText: I bought these boots because I like Diesel products. I have had some jeans and shirts from this company, and I liked the looks of them online. However, when I got them they did not look very good on my feet. They fit fine, but they are narrow. They don't look rugged. They just look blah! The quality is good and the fit is good, but the style is not for me.

B0021AFV8I.A2GIN7LGMIWAW8.reviewText: Soooo firstly you need to know how to rock these. Dark or black semi-slim fit black jean tucked into the boots and you are good to go. The boots rock and they look totally vintage. Work!

B0021AFWZA.AX53K9BNND4KL.reviewText: I've received more compliments on this shoe.  It took a while to break in, but it's both stylish and comfortable now.

B0021AFZ6Q.A3KCLNVVPAAK5A.reviewText: I am really happy with these boots.  They are really comfy, practical and look great with jeans and pants if you need to dress them up.

B0021KKM9Q.A314LG5568F9LR.reviewText: I am a watch snob. With that said, I have watches for all occasions. Dressy, flashy, casual, etc. This is a great casual watch that pairs nicely with jeans and a button-down shirt. It has a great face size without being too big and making you look like and idiot. I get regular compliments on this watch and would recommend it to just about anyone. However, keep it mind it is a casual watch. If you try and sport this with a suit or business-casual attire, you're going to look terrible.

B0021KKM9Q.AH8ARXZB1IM24.reviewText: This is my favorite watch I own. The first day that I wore it I received multiple compliments, from men and women alike. It is a larger watch, which I prefer.

B0021KSV3U.AHAWL9ZEWS709.reviewText: I received this watch as a gift. the gesture exceeded my expectations of course and im very happy for the gift. Now, the watch is not really my type. i like big watches but this one is huge and heavy. im most concerned about the strap though, it's hard to put and take off, and it feels like it wouldn't last a year without getting ripped. It doesn't show the date. It's a watch for young fashionable guys that like huge watches and have a bunch of watches to fit with what they're wearing at the time.

B0021KSV3U.A1IS5MA76EM1FL.reviewText: I'm huge and tall guy and the diameter, thickness and weight of that timepiece fit well on my wrist. The watch is better looking in real life than on photo, I personally find them lightweight for that size of a watch. The only thing I'm concerned about is that the bracelet is not long enough - I have to use the last hole at the end of it when I put them on. I have other diesel watch with leather bracelet and it's holding ok for more than a year now and I used to wear it almost every day.Overall, excellent look and feel, very good manufacturing quality and materials, just mind the wrist width, I suggest to take a tape measure of your wrist and compare that to the manufacturer's specs if you are of heroic proportions (normal should fit like it should).I recommend it for those who appreciate design and good time precision above all else.

B0021KUBNS.AXP7HWV5M5O09.reviewText: The dz1259 came out with Diesel's 2010 Spring/Summer line, but I picked it out recently for its earthy, autumn tones, thinking it might look good with a fall wardrobe.  Unlike the default product photo, the case is actually shiny chrome.  Concerning the fit, the watch face is very large, but the case curves slightly at the ends so that it doesn't stick straight out from your wrist.  It'll pretty much cover the entire wrist of an average-size man.  This adds concern for increased chances for scratching, due to its large surface area, though it does have scratch-resistant glass.  Depth is actually less than that of a Casio G-Shock.  In summary, this watch is an eye-catcher with a short-sleeve shirt, but I'm afraid it'll look a bit gaudy under the cuff of a long-sleeve or hoodie.

B0021L9DU4.A387OVMBX52HAW.reviewText: I saw these shoes online (in black) and immediately fell in love with the picture.  However, when I received them in the mail they were a shiny metallic black.  Terrible.  I immediately returned them (I didn't even try them on).

B0021L9EJO.A3LRI006BI0MZC.reviewText: I love these boots. I have had them for a couple of years. They are comfortable and cute, and taller than most rain boots.

B0021L9EJO.AWTOY8G57KE45.reviewText: never took them cos they sent it to GREECE through Fedex and charge me too much fees for this product.Dont buy if postage to Greece is through UPS and Fedex

B0021L9EJO.A17K134ZHSR5HJ.reviewText: I loved the design. It is a shame that after a while the boots were like cut in the front above the ankle because the plastic doesn't take too much bend, that is made while walking. I put sailor tape on it but it looks dirty, what a shame I loved those boots!

B0021L9EXA.ATG56XFYEEGHR.reviewText: I purchased a purple color in size 7.5M although my regular size is 7M for athletic shoes. When I opened the shoe box,I was so glad that the shoes are so beautiful. It was little bit heavy, but was manageable. I would like to recommend this shoes as a fashion sneaker rather than shopping shoes. (I cannot imagine that I could walk more than two hours for shopping wearing this shoes.)

B0021L9GM4.AEIS7Z2R0PM33.reviewText: Good looking sneakers, true to picture, but runs a little bit small. I bought a 7 and should have ordered half a size bigger.

B0021L9OJE.A2JIERJ8E5IS0O.reviewText: Beautiful. These are so comfortable, stylish and very warm- could even be too warm if you are a hot foot kinda gal...My only complaint is they are totally smooth on bottom and I have almost wiped out a few times so I would definitly reccommend some sole gripper sticky things on the bottom.

B0021L9TCG.A1KMF1BY87MP27.reviewText: super cute! and super comfy! got them in less then a week and I live in Canada! so happy!!

B0021L9TCG.A27R2FFAP5X925.reviewText: These shoes are soooo ugly! I am trying to return them, only I sent the package over three weeks ago, and they say they did not receive them.

B0021L9TCG.A22JTNF39PAMTK.reviewText: When I saw these in the Blue/Yellow, I knew I had to have them. They're trendy, sporty, comfortable and I got many compliments right off the bat. The insole is just flat, so I took it out and put in a "SuperFeet" insole. They're more comfortable that way. The only real complaint I have is that the sole of the shoe has such a thin stubby traction surface that the sole will be completely worn down to nothing within 4months. However, I still loved these shoes so much that I kept buying them again and again. I've got 3pr of Blue/Yellow and 2pr or Purple/Wht. They are both awesome!

B0021L9TCG.A3MR9PGVB32957.reviewText: These shoes are everything I thought about them, comfortable and smooth, I bought the paloma/lilac color and they are so cute in this color, they fit well, I love them.

B0022QKIZW.A3J40JUCYGXNPN.reviewText: Just what I expected from a Diesel brand product. Very pleased with the quality & features in this bag.

B00236QLIE.AQEGVXGP66CDK.reviewText: Diesel makes great jeans, no doubt but on the product description it lists "Fitting: Regular Slim", then below that "Five pockets. Straight leg cut."What I received in the mail today was a boot cut jean.  Too bad I will be returning these.  The other reviewers are accurate however - they are dark blue, and the crease should go away after one wash.

B00236QLIE.AR95PCD0MPBOD.reviewText: This jeans look very classy and can be combined with formal shoes. Very good denim, cloth for pockets could be better.
B00236QLIE.AR95PCD0MPBOD.summary: Great jeans, bought another pair later.

B00236QLIE.AJSNS1ZK0FREM.reviewText: Love the feel of diesel's denim, and this dark color means these jeans can be dressed up or down.  Very odd photo used for these jeans on Amazon: the front crease completely disappears after the first washing (which I'm perfectly happy with).  Ironed jeans seem very odd to me, unless maybe you'll be wearing boots and a cowboy hat as well.
B00236QLIE.AJSNS1ZK0FREM.summary: Great pair of diesels, ignore the ironed crease in the photo

B00236QLIE.A3CB4L73LOPA2J.reviewText: Product I received is NOTHING like described, color is dark navy, cut is completely different than pictured.  I waited 6 months pondering on whether to purchase these jeans, wish I hadn't!

B00236QLIE.A39BBEWSOB3I3E.reviewText: I'm a big fan of Diesel jeans and have several pairs.  I expected these to be a grayish color, but they are actually a very dark blue.  That was OK, even though it wasn't what I expected, but the particular pair that I got seem to be slightly oversized.  I don't know if I'd recommend ordering down a size to everyone, but I'm normally a 33x34 in Diesel and I'm returning these for a pair of 32s.

B00236QLIE.AO1W34SOLL9E1.reviewText: Good quality and I really liked the dark blue color, you can dress it up for an evening out with your special someone.  Another great fit for my short rise, 33 x 30.  The Micro-Bootcut is just right, nice amount of flare.  Diesel I know are pricey but this low rise style fits me just right and best of all my wife likes the fit.  I think I will replace my inventory of jeans with similar low rise Diesel jeans.

B00236QLIE.A1XT9EPFHOI349.reviewText: I think I said enough right?! Diesel the name is premium yet economical. The jean are dress but casual! Dress up or down but quality and style all there. I get compliments all the time and that says much when they just appear to be a dark blue denim jean. You will not be disappointed. The boot cut it perfect.. Just wide enough!

B00236QLIE.A2L99C78YV68D5.reviewText: Have only just received these so only take the review from that point of view but trying them on out of the bag was great. They fit nicely although the thighs are a bit tight. I like the dual belt loops (outer for thicker belts, inner for narrow) and the flare isn't over stated. The sizing compared to the Levis I usually wear seems very small; my typcial Levi size is 32W x 32L but ended up needing a 31W x 30L in the Diesel Zatiny.
B00236QLIE.A2L99C78YV68D5.summary: Thighs a bit tight otherwise a very nice fit.

B00236QLIE.A1U0VBH0E69EY3.reviewText: I would highly recommend these jeans! They go with anything, t-shirt, dress shirt anything! Must have in your wardrobe if you like Diesel.

B00236QLIE.AVN8QEFL6G7N7.reviewText: Fits great around the waste and thigh. They're a lot longer than I expected. The color is a dark grey almost blue wash. They seem to be of quality denim. Don't know if I'd pay 150 for a pair of jeans again. It's a one time thing for me.

B00236QLIE.A8ZDKV6E1ICYD.reviewText: These jeans fit well and are a bit more true to size than the regular boot cuts which are a bit bigger in the waist and the leg bottoms.
B00236QLIE.A8ZDKV6E1ICYD.summary: Fits well and the Micro-bootcut is great

B00236QLIE.A2LU7220HCMWG3.reviewText: They are a good pair of jeans, but it is more relaxed fit rather than slim, compared to the other Zatiny jeans.
B00236QLIE.A2LU7220HCMWG3.summary: Doesn't Fit Exactly Like The Other Zatiny

B00236QLIE.A3DU6BVNFJEF11.reviewText: These jeans were purchased for my boyfriend, he absolutely loves them! He's on his third pair in four years because he wears them so often (not because they're of poor quality).  We've only had to replaced them after a few too many scrapes and falls, etc. This is our second pair purchased from Amazon, and we've paid about $50 under retail both times.The denim arrives exactly as pictured, a dark, sleek wash great for 'dress' jeans or a night out (although handsome anytime of day). Over time, extensive wear, and laundering, the color fades into a more casual deep blue, but has never lightened up to show thigh-distress and cell phone chalk lines like many jeans often do. The fit/construction has stayed true since the day of purchase.Definitely recommended, and will likely purchase again. 👍👍
B00236QLIE.A3DU6BVNFJEF11.summary: Our third pair of these jeans--our second purchased through Amazon!

B00236QLIE.A1SUXM95B35MIE.reviewText: First off.... as other reviewers have mentioned, this picture is either wrong, or I suspect bad lighting. These jeans almost look grey-ish black in this picture but are in fact perfectly dark blue. Which didn't turn me away in the slightest.I have been wearing Diesel denim for almost a decade now, and they are by far in my opinion still the most well made high end denim around. These are no exception. What you can't tell from the picture, is these are almost a raw material. Very rough even for Diesel standards, but wear them a few times and they will loosen up and form to your body. So perfect. Also, before buying I questioned if the Diesel logo would be on the front pocket (as it looks conspicuously absent in this picture). But don't worry, its there.I feel the Zatiny is the best make from Diesel. Truly the best. But since I prefer a bit of a tapered fit, I get all my Zatiny's bootcut brought in a little for a more skinny look. Now, that of course is up to you, but I'd highly recommend it if you love the style but question the cut! Enjoy.

B00236QLIE.A20DY3RJ7BUO4B.reviewText: already loved these jeans - so if you know your size, you can get a great deal buying Diesel jeans online
B00236QLIE.A20DY3RJ7BUO4B.summary: know your size, get a great deal buying Diesel jeans online

B00236QLIE.A3U774VHGT0WQI.reviewText: These are quality jeans from Diesel as expected, as other reviews have stated they are a deep blue as compared to the pictures.  The denim is heavyweight in comparison to other jeans but an I like that fact.

B00236QLIE.A12TPXTP6P1Z4X.reviewText: We'd be far better served if they just took a picture of the tags.This is real simple - these are in fact "ZATINY 0088Z Bootcut Spring Summer 12" (description from Diesel website) with the super cool (not) front crease added by how the pants are folded/packed/shipped.  And that's it really, you either like the ZANITY fit or you dont and you should probably figure that out at the brick-and-mortar before you buy something online.  That said the fit is 100% consistent to my other Zanity jeans in all aspects - again you like the fit or you don't.  The material is dark and medium stiff which I like but not as heavy as some of the less dark Zanity jeans I own.If you like Zanity don't hesitate because Diesel.com runs them for 150 USD, pretty significant delta.

B00236QLIE.A24SD3J0BNXR8W.reviewText: I just got these a couple weeks ago, and they are amazing! They are a bit thicker than my other jeans, but they are comfortable and fit pretty well. Also, can say that they are authentic!
B00236QLIE.A24SD3J0BNXR8W.summary: First pair of diesels- won't be the last!

B00236QLIE.A2XP9N56MUNDUK.reviewText: Diesel hit a home run IMO with their zatiny jean: perfect jeans to wear to work on casual day, out to the club on a sat night, or just to lounge around in.  Perfect low rise fit, comfortable material.  I like the dark blue shade.  I am a perfect 31 waist and these jeans size 31 fit to perfection.  Luckily I did read the reviews that they run a little long: normally I wear a 34 length jeans however based on accurate Amazon review, others claims they run a little long.  So I got a 32 length and they are perfect- zero need for alterations.  Diesel remains my favorite jean.

B00236QLIE.A319TWJGVR97W5.reviewText: These are now my favorite jeans.  The material is high quality and looks stunning in the sunlight.  The blue stitching compliments the jeans just right.

B00236QLIE.A1EVEZR98IVU3R.reviewText: This pair of jeans arrived promptly and fit me perfectly. They were wide enough and the color is a nice dark blue

B00236QLIE.A3HNQLK4NUFL4V.reviewText: I bought a pair of these about 4 years ago and am reordering another pair now. The color is a very dark blue and goes well with anything. The boot cut is very close to a straight fit, but enough of a boot cut that it looks good with shoes/boots. Out of all the designer pairs of jeans and washes I own, this is one that always seems to be on my daily rotation.Sizing:The waist is pretty much on target with this wash, so if you wear a 30 get a 30, but there is enough room to size down if you do want a tighter fit.For example my waist in other brands:Gap jeans: 28-29Rock and Republic: 30Levis: 29-30Diesel: 29True Religion: 28Seven: 29

B00236QLIE.A1ME1QNAK9YU1Z.reviewText: I purchased these for my 22 year old son who asked for clothes for Christmas.  He has never worn Diesel jeans before (he usually wears 7, Joe's, or AG), but I have in the past and was familiar with their quality and fit.  When they arrived, I knew that he would love them as they were made of an excellent quality denim in a very rich shade.  The fact that they were made in Italy doesn't hurt either.Needless to say, on Christmas afternoon when he finally made it over for brunch and to open his gifts, he was very happy with these jeans when he laid eyes on them.  Now of course he hasn't worn them yet, but as far as style and overall quality...these jeans definitely hit the mark!

B00236QLIE.A2R8VJ1DT9TQ1P.reviewText: Very pleased with these Diesel jeans... If you like a bootcut style jean you'll appreciate this "Zatiny" model. The dark blue denim looks great and the jean quality is very high. I've had these jeans about three months now and they continue to be my go to pair. I really like the cut and the feel of the denim. I say go for it.

B00236QLIE.A2CV1X4A5E5YKB.reviewText: ..the material is a bit stiff.  I'm washing them often trying to get them to soften up.  I would say they are about a 3.5 to a 4 star jean and this is mostly because I wish the material was softer.  They are dark- at night I would suspect they look close to black.  With more washing I'm sure they will lighten a bit.  I like the slight flare at the bottom.I'm 5 ft 7 155 lbs and got the 31/30.  I had to hem the bottoms as Diesels alwwwwways run long.  They are a good jean for when you are trying to do a dressier night.  You could couple them with a slim fitting sport jacket for a good look.  They are a bit snugger than I'd like right now in the crotch but Diesels have a tendency to get bigger over time so I'm hoping in 6 months they'll be a bit roomier.

B00236QLIE.AP1D4G7C7PQ7Q.reviewText: Let me start with....I have been looking for another pair of dressy jeans that I could wear for nicer occasions. In terms of color and style, these are perfect for that.My only complaint (and I know some people like this), is that the area from the main button to below the zipper (I think its called inseam) is very short and thus makes that area very small. I have other jeans like this (versace is like this for guys jeans), but if you are not used to it I can see many people hating it. It can even be slightly uncomfortable.If you are okay with that part though, these are a great pair of dressy jeans. Diesel is always high quality and the wash is perfect.If you have not owned any Diesel jeans, I would say they are on the stiffer side for material. They will not be as soft feeling as a 7 for all mankind.
B00236QLIE.AP1D4G7C7PQ7Q.summary: Great dark/dressy jeans but a bit snug on the inseam

B00236SNTY.A1TUT2Q8AWX7AS.reviewText: very confortable, good looking pair of jeans. size fits great. hope to see more of theese around to purchase. Diesel is a great brand.

B00236SNTY.A39VNIAA8LM28H.reviewText: These pants seemed to be the correct waist size for me, correct inseam... but the crotch was stitched weird. The thing was sort of feeling too wide a space between the legs. When I put on the pants the extra wide area between the legs hit me where the sun doesn't shine. If I tried to button the pants it hurt and was rather tight, providing somewhat an obvious lump.When wearing these pants it felt like some sort of very uncomfortable, too small jockstrap. The jeans are made for a unick >> I tried 2 sizes of these pants and both fit the same way

B00236SNTY.A2CBE4YWWZQ3UE.reviewText: The pair of jeans I received was not manufactured in Italy, as advertized. They are clearly stamped, "Made in Morocco."
B00236SNTY.A2CBE4YWWZQ3UE.summary: This pair of jeans NOT made in Italy, as advertized by Amazon above

B00236SNTY.A1IWT6KM1X8PNS.reviewText: These are not made in Italy as advertised.Quality is not as good as other Diesel jeans I have purchased,Size is significantly smaller and these are low rise, not as pictured.

B00236SNTY.A25VPKZGGCBITW.reviewText: These are extremely comfortable and fit perfectly.  Diesel tends to run a little bit large, normally I wear a 32x32 in most jeans (lucky brand, AG, 7's), but I wear a 31x30 in these.  The 32's are extremely large in the waste for me, and the 32 length drags on the ground.  Overall, the fit, feel, and look of these is awesome.  I would highly recommend them.

B00236SNTY.A219S4WT0W5U71.reviewText: Watch out. Small. These jeans were tight. I sent back. Quality did not feel right. Price is high even on deal.

B00236SNTY.A3VYC70ZGUPQJ4.reviewText: Doesn't need to say anything about this jean. It is a Diesel. Great jean! I will definitely get more stuffs from this brand.

B00236SNTY.A3KCY298G3WQW8.reviewText: I loved the product since it was authentic and exactly what I was looking for.Thank you very much for this.

B00236SNTY.A3ESMG31XIRL1R.reviewText: Nice color...true to the picture on this website.The waist and the 36" length inseam lives up the advertised measurements.

B00236SNTY.AAZ6B5VUFH7AT.reviewText: The stitching looked awful.  The fit was miserable.  They were not even remotely close to the style or fit of my prior Diesel Larkee jeans.  I've since received a pair of Safado's that looked 100% better, but the fit was off in an entirely different way.  I'm of the mind that Diesel jeans are being made by unauthorized parties with poor fit/quality or that Diesel simply allows too many sources of manufacturing with varying quality--Italy, Tunisia, Romania.  These were listed as Italian and were far and away the worst of 3.  My Larkee's from Tunisia fit perfect, but I expect others would disagree.  Again, there seems to a quality issue or a knock off issue.  Thankfully, Amazon is wonderful with returns to date of these.

B00236SNTY.A10AP50J3LVJ6.reviewText: Probably trying to get in touch with my youth. Needed some new jeans and these were not what I expected. Return was easy.  If you don't have the body for them they will portray an image that ought not to be seen.... But we had a good laugh.
B00236SNTY.A10AP50J3LVJ6.summary: Good Quality but not a fit for an older body.

B00236SNTY.AHNUGUQX9TYKO.reviewText: My husband loves these jeans.  He has 4 pairs of these….the quality and color are great. True to it's size.

B00236SNTY.AWCCVZQ9J92JU.reviewText: It's too large for me.So I refund the pants.i am so sorryI wanna slim straight leg jean.

B00236SNTY.A12EXCHGG5OMX.reviewText: Great jeans all around and they actually fit my thighs perfectly. But I can't keep them because the waistline is too low and there is no space for my junk... Sitting is painful.

B00236SNTY.ADC9FEUAMMVNM.reviewText: Ordered these as a gift for my husband, as he just loves Diesel denim.  These fit awesome and really run true to size.  They are dark and can absolutely bed dressed up or down.  Great purchase!

B00236SNTY.A26HTK78BI1W9G.reviewText: I have been meaning to buy a pair of Diesel jeans for a long time and boy can I say that they are a lot more comfortable than the usual Levis and Lees I get (they also cost a lot more too). I was lucky to get these on special, but even at normal price I wouldn't hesitate to buy another pair!

B00236SNTY.A2TLYZF61JNEP6.reviewText: The picture looks like straight cut but these felt like baggy.  I'm pretty trim.  6'2, 185 w long legs so I was happy to find another jean that comes in 36 long.  Also - I have another pair of Diesel and they fit better but be prepared for ink on everything.  I've rinsed and washed following all guidelines and there is still blue fade.  You cannot wear a white shirt (tucked or not)with Diesel jeans.  I really wanted to like Diesels but just don't want the worry of all that ink.  I'll stick to Levis.

B00236SNTY.A13BX9O5UDBILC.reviewText: I've purchased 4 of these and wear them daily. more sturdy compared to some other styles although not made in Italy anymore compared to the older products. It's the same cut as the old 'Kratt' version so happy to find the replacement.
B00236SNTY.A13BX9O5UDBILC.summary: this is the old Kratt if you liked that style

B00236SNTY.AZV1UV9PYBGDC.reviewText: The fabric feels good, it fits very well, and are very comfortable.  I can now understand the price, not cheap, but worth it as a jeans for a better occasion.

B00236SNTY.A1U4A9O249ATQF.reviewText: My sons loves Diesel jeans and this dark denim will work great with a crisp white shirt for "dress" occasions.

B00236SNTY.A41B2D2RPK123.reviewText: I only wear Diesel jeans and have the exact same cut, in a different wash. These are no where near the same fit. The waist is roughly the same, but the legs are enormous. There is absolutely no tapering from the thigh to the cuff, resulting in enormous billows of fabric around the calfs. I'm a runner, and tend to have fairly large legs so this was a bit of a surprise to me.Yes, I understand that they are straight cut, but again, I have a pair of Larkee that do not fit like this. My guess is that because they are made in Tunisia rather than Italy, the quality isn't the same.I had to return these.

B00236SNTY.A25GO9ZUJR5CL5.reviewText: Great pair of jeans.  Comfortable and the color has not faded.  Enjoyed the 50% sale, making them very affordable to purchase.

B00236SNTY.AOBIQ40MTKY8U.reviewText: I can not imagine myself not to wear jeans from DieselDiesel actually proved that all the jeans on the quality and designRecommended

B00236SNTY.A1W1B802LAHX0I.reviewText: Great jeans: giving you the straight fit looks while at the same time allowing some extra room for the thighs. The best jeans I've ever had.

B00236SNTY.AUS70EXHC3KR8.reviewText: It is so amazing that Amazon does these offerings of 50% off, and the like, for items like diesel that I other wise would not fit into my budget! They are the BEST jeans on the market, in my opinion, especially if you live in a rural area and cannot shop anywhere but online!!!

B00236SNTY.A1FQBDFFZKE63E.reviewText: I liked the style of the pants, sadly they didn't fit me very well.  Some may not like the low waist band so make sure you are aware of that before you make a purchase.  Thankfully since Amazon is so awesome I returned them with no problem and received a credit rather quickly.

B00236SNTY.AWDTP3OQXZ92Z.reviewText: I just got these jeans, and they fit great.  You get a nice straight leg look that doesn't make you look like someone who is trying to wear 'skinny' jeans like a child.The color is good too.  They are a smidge bit longer than most 32" jeans I buy, buy this is a plus for me.  YMMV.Highly recommended.

B00236SNTY.A1YZGWKAJAT3VX.reviewText: I had hopes for these when I first took them out of the shipping bag:  High quality packaging, what appeared to be a nice cut, and a comfortable waistband. These would be the jeans I wear to work when I have to work late, or on weekends, or so I thought.The minute I buttoned them I realized that there was literally no room in the crotch for my boys. NONE. These were so nice in every other way that I, in good faith, tried "repositioning", to no avail.In summary, if you have very tiny privates, these might be for you. If not, I would continue the search. (I ended up with Levis 511 selvedge jeans, and the boys and I are both happy with that decision.)
B00236SNTY.A1YZGWKAJAT3VX.summary: Not for those with conventional male genitalia

B00236SNTY.AOI81AB9625WK.reviewText: These are Straight-Leg cut so expect them to have more room and fit looser than form fitting jeans.  I prefer more fitted jeans for my build but these jeans are perfectly fine for what I would consider a more relaxed fit.Like: the color and feel of the denim.  The denim feels high quality, all of the stitching appears to be of high quality.  The waistline does feel true to size.Dislike: Limited selection of lengths from amazon, I had to tailor the length for my height.Great feel, look and quality along with goldbox pricing makes for a near perfect combination.  The cut is less flattering for your backside than form fitting cuts is the reason why it didn't get 5 stars from me.
B00236SNTY.AOI81AB9625WK.summary: Deep rich color, good fill, relaxed cut.

B00236SNTY.A34QVOTFUSTQMT.reviewText: I have been on the quest for the "perfect" fitting jean for all my life...and I am 44.  Wellllll....I finally found the pair that fits me perfectly.  I am not a brand snob and could give a crap less who makes it.  But...like anything...if you want something that fits better...well you have to pay a little more.  No, these aren't crazy expensive, but they are more than your usual gap jeans.  They fit nice and snug in the crotch and butt.  Not as super tight in the legs, but not baggy at all...and not tight in the calves.  Here are my measurements....go get a tape measure and compare along with me!  I am 6'2", 205.  I normally wear about a 34x34.  I ordered both the 33x34 and 34x34 and found the 33x34 fit best.  I have thinner legs, so hopefully this will help someone out there.  My thighs measure 22.5" to 23"....my calves about 14.5"  and my butt  (took the tape measure and put in middle of butt and went around to front)... about 40".  Also, this color 0088Z is exactly what I was looking for in a dark dress jean.  Perfect with sport coats and nice shoes!
B00236SNTY.A34QVOTFUSTQMT.summary: I think most guys will understand this review...

B00236SNTY.A3QY0MXQ9ACAXQ.reviewText: They fit perfect, in the inseam and waste, really nice color.  A durable quality pant, also great by fot the price!
B00236SNTY.A3QY0MXQ9ACAXQ.summary: Great highend jean for a tall guy

B00236SNTY.AUBI4LETMBJX7.reviewText: These Diesel jeans are a great price and the fit is perfect.I highly recommend them to anyone looking for Diesel jeans

B00236SNTY.A23KDWN235S6ZJ.reviewText: Fit was perfect. Jean wash was as described. very quickly shipped. Bought more jeans through this vendor as well. Highly recommeneded

B00261WXX8.A8MQGOR7N3TXA.reviewText: Big/oversized watch, but not too big even on my birdlike wrists. Well made with split face and metal/leather band like two watches fused together diagonally across the face - even the minute hand and hour hand differ from each other! Nice use of blue and orange on the metal half. Has date window and three dial chronograph. Beveled crystal sticks up from watch edge 2mm and is a nice touch.

B00261WXX8.A2KALRLCS6OFCG.reviewText: Hi:The watch is very different and attractive. It looks every bit as good on the wrist as on the monitor. I have a 6 1/4 to 6 1/2 inch wrist, and it fits perfectly on the innermost hole. So if you have a smaller wrist, you may have to punch your own hole. The case is a bit large, but I like oversized.My one complaint is that it did not come with instructions for that particular model. I called Diesel directly and spoke to a customer rep who spoke to a supervisor, who said to match my watch up with the correct dial from about 30 different diagrams of different models. None matched exactly. Eventually, after corresponding with the rep by email over several days, it was determined my model was the same as VD55B or VD57B on page 16 of my instruction booklet. The subdials are all stopwatch functions.Good luck!!Barry

B0026205Z0.A3EVZM0D9QEFY1.reviewText: I love this watch. Looks great, feels solid and gets a lot of compliments. Surprisingly even women like it which is rare since they usually dislike larger watches. Don't buy it though ... so mine stands out ;)
B0026205Z0.A3EVZM0D9QEFY1.summary: Great watch, don't buy is though ;)

B0026205Z0.AM6BISXLA7ZIN.reviewText: I get nothing but compliments on the watch.  This is my everyday work watch and the price had alot to do with it.  Most people do not believe how much I paid for the watch (120).

B002623M0U.AF158457FXID0.reviewText: PROs: I wanted a watch that didn't look like the same old design. What I got is a very good looking timepiece that is very big (but not enormous), black and accurate. It's been on my wrist for 20 months now and I still get compliments. The rashes from cheap metal clasps and other metal surfaces are no longer a problem with this one.(+5 stars)COULD BE BETTERs: I find the day/date window indispensable - one of the reasons I settled on this particular model - although the minute and hour hands do obscure it when pointing at or near 3 o'clock. This should have been better handled in the design phase. Also, I would like to have a design on the rubber wristband to carry the look of the watch around the wrist. The plainness of the band is a bit of a let down.(-0 stars)CONs: I just mailed the watch back to be fixed under the 2 year warrantee. I  have to pay the shipping both ways according to Diesel. The head of the watch stem came off and I couldn't reattach it although I tried several times. There is also condensate inside the watch crystal that concerns me. Not sure how this will affect the life of the watch. The watch has been treated carefully - no rough stuff - so that hasn't been an issue. I'm in my 60's so touch football isn't part of my routine. I believe a great design deserves better construction than it apparently has. (-1 star)SUMMARY: My old Seiko is on my wrist now and running like a champ. I have tape on the back of the Seiko to keep the cheap metal from giving me a skin rash. Looking forward to a repaired Diesel and many years of use. Its a great looking timepiece that I'm otherwise very happy to own. If it fails again, I may revisit and be less generous in my rating.(+4 stars - final rating).

B002623M0U.A2EXHZDC2UHVYX.reviewText: Watch shipped loose in the Diesel Box. The "seconds" hand fell off. I guess its not shockproof. Amazon however has the best return policy only its just a a waste of time and hasel returning.  I ended up with no new watch. The watch looks good however but afraid to order another one.

B002623M0U.ATBS8XX7O3RZG.reviewText: After a few days of using the clock stopped working out of reason I do not know ... Now what do I do with it if you can help me ....

B002623M0U.A2K8KTZ5GTXX7K.reviewText: It,s big easy to see the time&date.Its a good looking watch.Its comfortable watch to ware. Its a bit heavy but I like the watch.

B002623M0U.AV149VSX36STO.reviewText: I bought a watch thinking it was black and it was gunmetal color and smaller than the ad said. So, I bought this Diesel and it is large and very black.  Since I wear black a lot, it goes well with my clothes, and I also like the simplicity of the face--just the hands, a second hand and the day/date. You can make the day show up in English or Spanish, a nice extra touch (although I just keep it set on English). My son, who also likes watches, had a Diesel that lasted for many years even though it received some rough treatment. I like this watch and wear it regularly. It's cool!

B002623M0U.A2M6RPQUF6VAR7.reviewText: Purchased this watch for my daughter's boyfriend. He loved the look but two months later it is broken. Fell off his wrist while he was literally sitting watching tv. What a waste of $$.I want to contact the seller and see if they will make good on the purchase but seriously, what good is a watch that does not stay on your wrist?!
B002623M0U.A2M6RPQUF6VAR7.summary: Nice looking but does not last very long

B002623M0U.A180M9H4EXLBBT.reviewText: Watch came on time and was a good price. Came in original box and looked good. No issues with battery or cracked face plate, etc. Works fine thus far and boyfriend is enjoying it!
B002623M0U.A180M9H4EXLBBT.summary: Watch came on time and was a good price

B002623M0U.A2YLEX2DRPLBMY.reviewText: Very happy with this watch.  I get compliments on it all the time.  If you're looking for a blacked-out, stealthy watch...this is the one.  I also find the rubber band to be more comfortable then an all metal one.

B002623M0U.A3PCSGVS7HXG9B.reviewText: The package was ok, and when I opened the box, the watch was cover with dust and I have to clean it I have no idea where this dust came from, also didnt have the plastic cover new watches usually have in the front part.

B002623M0U.A5NOUTDVBF79N.reviewText: I've had this watch for a while. very light and good looks. dont trust the water resistant on it though because a few drops of water on the face will start making it collect condensation.also the strap is kinda wierd. the back of it collects germs and dirt and it starts smelling after a while so i have to keep cleaning it with a tooth brush.
B002623M0U.A5NOUTDVBF79N.summary: good watch.. but smells after a while

B002623M0U.A2BTR1X9JIMHOQ.reviewText: My son loves this watch, stylish and flexible.  He's 16 yrs old. I did not ask specs but he really loves it.

B002623M0U.AFGVOQVRC9Q1P.reviewText: Great watch my boyfriend really loved it only bad thing is when I received it had white dust all over it but it was easily removed with cloth... And I will purchase one again in the near future for someone I love....

B0026FBRRW.ANR50TZMBWJL8.reviewText: Lo compre para un regalo y fue lo que esperaba, la calidad y las medidas  están muy bien, es ligero y de tamaño pequeño.

B0026FBRRW.AXGIRWCQRRGFO.reviewText: I wanted a small pouch type bag for everyday use, something to keep my wallet, pill case, small digital camera & mobile phone and maybe a pen. The size of the bag is perfect EXCEPT, the fabric is TOO flimsy. It's well made, comes with the diesel card of authenticity but it just hangs BECAUSE THE MATERIAL USED TO MAKE IT IS NOT RIGID ENOUGH. It's almost too soft and the shoulder strap is so big it overpowers the overall shape of the bag. I rarely use this bag because it hangs so poorly, when I do use it I insert an incase brand travelcase to give it a rigid solid feel. That's the main problem, it's not rigid enough to retain it's shape. It also has no key chain insert.

B0026FBSI0.A2X2GKYA37FVLO.reviewText: I was looking for a casual black leather handbag and I loved this one, with its many pockets. Very practical and well-made

B0026FBSKS.A29SGZGMICMBNL.reviewText: I bought this wallet even though it was pricey but, I don't regret it one bit.It is a unique piece and it looks awesome :) Although, if you are looking to fit more that a few credit cards and a bit of cash, this might be too small...

B0026FBT6G.A19VPYWK5X8SOP.reviewText: It's a nice wallet, especially with the zipper pocket for the change. Only think it's a little thick, so if you carry your wallet in your back pocket, I don't know how comfortable that would be.

B0026FBUCE.A2YLMNAIYQI1HK.reviewText: I ordered this because I was looking for a grey bag, and I love the color and stitching details.  I like to carry a bag on my shoulder, and was confident that a 10" drop would accommodate my arm and shoulder.  I've ordered bags from Amazon before and have found the strap drop length to be accurate.  Not so in this case.  It is more like 4".  There was no way I could comfortably carry this bag on my shoulder.  I liked the style, but I had to return it because I wouldn't be able to carry it.

B0026FBW18.A1U6DBCI9E4DBW.reviewText: Beautiful high quality bag. I purchased this item to withstand the daily use as a teacher who needed something that looked great and held up. I often get stopped and asked where I purchased this bag and I am quick to refer them to Amazon. Roomy, high quality leather, heavy and strong strap, extra pockets, just the quality you would expect from Diesel at a great price!

B0026FD0EU.A3QD7F0DVW4R68.reviewText: I really think these are one of my best purchases, I bought them for my son, they were a bit big but last year around this time he wore them for the first time even when they were a little bigger than his actual size but as they are a bit narrow he could wear them.  They were one of my favorite and he wore them everywhere, finally a few weeks ago these were still on his wardrobe (almost 1 year of use), the soles are really worn off on the sides because, as toddlers are, he plays on the floor all the time, but for one year of use these are perfectly made, even the laces are perfect, and the denim is perfect...I would deffinitely buy another pair if I found one :)

B0026FD0EU.A2ZBED1Y2PA2W3.reviewText: My adorable little 12 month old was the talk of the mall in these fabulous little shoes! They are old and worn looking with the denim fading on the soles of the shoe. I was disappointed at first because I thought that they were faded but once I looked back at the picture, they looked exactly as they had appeared. I paired them up with a pair of dirty washed denim distresses shorts and a vintage tee and the combination was AWESOME! If you love dressing your little prince with the hottest fashion decor, then you will love this shoe!

B0026FD3JM.A28973L3OU3OVV.reviewText: We bought two sizes in brown and are soooo glad we did b/c they are no where to be found now! They are actually pretty comfortable for our daughter and keep her very warm. She loves them too. I bought her two types of boots and probably only needed one pair. They are super stylish too and look great with everything.
B0026FD3JM.A28973L3OU3OVV.summary: so glad we bought two pairs!

B0026FD3JM.A1GK6TLHN9M8Q9.reviewText: Very pretty boots. They are even prettier than pictured. I got mine (my daughter's, to be exact) in purple and the color is very nice, nicer than pictured, it's a warmer, deeper purple. They also appear to be very warm and fairly comfortable and lightweight, though I'm a bit concerned that the sole is not very flexible, it hardly bends. I love the fact that these boots double as snowboots and just regular everyday winter boots - they are waterproof and make great snowboots, but they are also pretty, dressy and comfy enough for everyday wear. The upper is made of suede and nylon, the texture is similar to that of a puffer jacket, and the material is rather thick, which makes the boots really warm. The inside is lined with very soft corduroy and the inner sole is made of leather. The velcro closures make it fast and easy to put the boots on and take them off. The only thing that sort of surprised me was the fur - I had no idea it was real. It does say here that they are rabbit fur trimmed, but I didn't purchase these boots on Amazon, I bought them from another website that didn't mention anything about real fur. I assumed that the fur was fake, it did look fake to me when I was looking at the images of the boots online. When the boots arrived, I was surprised by how soft the fur felt to the touch - much softer than I expected, and then I found a label on the inside of the boots that said "100% rabbit fur". I was rather unpleasantly surprised, because it never even occured to me that the fur could be real. It was used only for trimming, the inside of the boot is not lined with fur, it was used for decoration purposes only...I didn't think they would use real fur in children's boots just for decoration purposes. I know that a lot of people feel very strongly about real fur and real fur products and do not wish to buy them so I thought I'd write a review to let everyone know that the fur is real, not fake. However, if that's not a concern, then you and your child will probably like these boots - they are warm, cozy, comfy, very good quality boots, not to mention pretty, especially in purple.

B0026FD3O2.A3TSUEDADPG84L.reviewText: Love these boots. My daughter try them on and wouldn't take them off. It's a combination of sneaker and boots. She can wear them in the cold winter and running and jumping like she does in her sneaker. We bought the purple sneaker. The color is much richer and darker than the picture. The trimming of rabbit fur is another plus. It will go beautifully with any winter coat.

B0026FD3O2.A3W1511URY17E4.reviewText: Ended up returning these.  They look great, maybe a bit on the cheap side.  My daughter found them uncomfortable - the velcro strap across the top of the foot was too tight for her. Pity.
B0026FD3O2.A3W1511URY17E4.summary: Looks ok but it didnt work

B0026FD5FY.A12BTLUI68Z4TV.reviewText: My son's foot is wide so this shoe didn't get much wear. He often complained of it hurting his foot. It's a really narrow gymshoe. Other than that a cool looking shoe and true to size in length.

By the way, my girl is 3 1/2 and has somewhat wide/chubby feet, and we have no problem at all with the width of the shoe being too narrow as some mentioned.

The under-the-glass portion is what really stands out, unfortunately the image shown does not capture its true glory (its hard to do that with a jpeg image). The numbers are chrome (except 18 & 24) and the dial is like a brushed silver metal with a good shine. To sum up, its like I said...better than expected.
