B0028ZY1GE.A3NAI3O35MHNXS.reviewText: This is a great watch.  I really like it so much had one just like it with the brown band.  The one hidden issue is when you need to change the battery it is a unbelievable pain in the...well you know what... to get the back secured on there again.  I tried a watch mallet and tapping the corners back in one at a time but the opposite corner would pop back up.  A no win situation it seems.  So finally in desperation I found an old orange adjustable spring clamp just about the same width as the watch back and used that to squeeze the watch back flush with the case one side at a time.  Also the manual in my opinion is a joke.  I think there are 2 pages for this watch in the whole thing. Nothing about replacing the battery that I saw.  So if you want a great watch then this is it just remember it may be a terrible pain to replace the battery.
B0028ZY1GE.A3NAI3O35MHNXS.summary: Great Watch...But there is a hidden issue...

I am a bigger guy 5'7" 250lbs and it fit just fine but i like my watches and bracelets and other accessories to be a little lose fitting. B002JJWBT8.A22IV4N51DEGU.reviewText: I know most people buy this because of the huge face and mostly for fashion, I have the same one and I actually use all 4 of the times. I use the large face for home time, medium for my friends in the pacific time zone, small upper for friends in afghanistan (still to this day), and the digital for Germany as I have a lot of friends stationed there as well.  My only slight complaint is that it is pretty heavy (obviously) and after a while you just need to take it off, other than that I would recommend this watch to anyone looking for something that stands out of the crowd.

B002JJWBT8.A1AKAC8VSCS824.reviewText: Mine was bought from Amazon vendor Dexclusive and is the orange and black dial version.Description Correction.  The width between strap lugs is 28mm rather than the listed 25mm so if you want a steel band version order it that way as per Diesel in the USA the metal bands are not available separately and a web search does not show 28mm wide metal watch bracelets as available from any other sources.Mine arrived with a dead battery installed for the smallest analog dial watch movement.  Before returning the watch as defective I had the battery replaced to determine if it was a battery or movement problem.  It turned out to be the battery fortunately.  I have no idea how long the watch was in stock or if the battery was actually defective or itself old stock.With the included band the weight is a relatively reasonable 144 grams or about 5 ounces.  I have several considerably heavier watches with steel bracelet bands.Having had the watch open for battery replacemen I can say that it uses four separate quartz movements, each with its own separate battery.

No. I have a very small wrist just like I do ankles but i'm a little more than average built guy so i personally think it is all about how you wear it and with what. I have a big bike and i like silver jewelry and big rings but in good taste and not to exagerated so with two rings on one hand a thick silver bracelet on same hand, nice medium thick necklace and my big watch on the other hand it makes a cool statement of a confident man in my opinion. When other guys see it the go "deng man, that is a big watch, and then they look and look and start to like it" they start to see confidence and attitude in me and i like that. Will i wear it with a Toxedo? maybe not but when i get on my bike and put on my jacket and all that and i'm hanging with my friends. Everyone loves the look. I personnaly bought it because of the convinience in having different times set for different countries that i visit or people i call. All i hae to do is look and immediately know what time it is in Thailand where my girlfriend lives, or when it is a good time to call my mother in North Click. The leader band on this watch is also of very good quality and feel with the two screwss on the side that gives it a very thought manly look. Boy i love it.

B002LASCZ2.A17NH8PVDUTWTM.reviewText: This is, hands down, my favorite undershirt I've ever owned. For a slender man like myself (180cm/5'11", 55-60kg/121-131lbs depending on how much muscle I add at the gym), the small fits me perfectly, which is apparently very uncommon. The material is soft and holds up well after several washes. I don't love the little pocket by the hip, but it doesn't interfere with anything. The only room for improvement I can imagine is making it tagless, though I can't recall ever being bothered by the tag when wearing the shirt.I would recommend this in a heartbeat to anyone with a slender frame.

I got them dirty the other day and it was relatively easy to clean them (with only water); they look as good as new.

Really light runners shoes - I guess to my own fault expecting different and getting for style not literal marathons. They looked good when worn, except socks show through nylon. I thought it would have leather backing underneath the nylon layer like other nylon topped shoes I've had. Anyways... always risky that way ordering online. But Amazon's great with these type of returns.

I bought these for my brother, who is normally a size 10, and he confirmed that these shoes fit true to size, but snug.  He was very pleased with the look and is in the 18-25 age range.

B002MXXDGG.A2F9VDL158Q8WT.reviewText: Another pair of casual shoes for my husband. Looks great but with most Diesel-branded shoes, only for looks not for comfort.

B002MXXEEM.A37Z9GKGDLNVIZ.reviewText: Bought these shoes when they were on sale for a ridiculously cheap price. I ALWAYS buy Diesel shoes, usually about one pair per year because they're pricey but last long. These were on sale for 30 some dollars when I bought them, and I have gotten so many comments on them. The cheap price also enabled me to buy a SECOND pair of Diesel shoes, which I regularly receive comments on. Recommendation: Waterproof your shoes! It makes them last so much longer.Side note: I'm in college, and I walk in shoes all day. I have them on for hours upon hours walking around campus and even in my room. It has been about a month now and I've worn them at least ten times through snow, rain and dirt. I waterproofed them, and because of this they still look brand new. It's great.Buy these shoes.

B002MXXEEM.A1BQPQK00GCIG5.reviewText: They have a great design, the large placement of the Diesel name on the back gives nice shoe contrast. They are well made and comfortable for long walking. True to size.

The heel is finally wearing down though, so I might have to toss them soon.  I will definitely consider buying another pair.

B002N2XTH4.A4BTV4KW2AFD4.reviewText: This is a tough bag and great bag. It has some tougher material on the bottom of the bag to help it stand up to normal useage.  I really like this bag, it feels great on me, the strap doesn't dig into my shoulder, and it fits a lot of things without looking over stuffed. I am able to fit a small spiral notebook (smaller size than a reg notebook), a small reading book, normal everyday items, like wallet, keys, pens, gum, etc. (I put the pens and other small items in the front pocket of the bag. I also like the small inside zippered pocket on it.  I am also able to hold a package of markers (thin markers) with cream (sm. bottle) sm hair brush, chapstick, mirror, makeup compact (medium size) and still have room to put more items into it. I am rough with my bags, and I have thrown this one around, and there isn't much damage to it at all! Great bag, I wish it came in blue though, I'd have the black and blue then, I'd get that one too.

B002NKMFPS.A2VDLUPTPTWQSU.reviewText: I bought one of each design.  Very comfortable fit and great looking designs.  The fabric is smooth and soft and fits very well.

B002P68B4O.A3CDQIM1FLGPCR.reviewText: This is a really nice looking watch with some pretty neat functions built into it, but it's really not built to last. If you're wearing it even daily to an office job, you're probably expecting too much of it. The band broke after less than two weeks with it when I accidentally bumped it against a doorknob. Mind you, this wasn't even a hard, direct hit. I bumped it from the side, next to the buttons and the thing just fell off my wrist. I thought the clasp had come undone, but nope, it was the band, it completely separated from the body, just like that. I called Amazon and Diesel to get a replacement and they told me only the body was under warranty, and that the warranty, in any case, did not cover damage by the owner.I carried the damn thing around for a few weeks anyway, just so I could tell the time while traveling out of country, so I wouldn't need to bring my phone. I dropped it once, and the glass on the front cracked and the screen went dead.This watch looks super cool, but it's practically designed to break so you'll go to Diesel and buy another watch right away. Save the money. Go with Fossil or something.
B002P68B4O.A3CDQIM1FLGPCR.summary: Right out of the box, this watch comes ready to break.

B002P68B4O.A3EB172P7B7WAW.reviewText: i liked the design but the clasp part is wayy to thick.it ended up looking too bulky and i returned it.

Needless to say you shouldn't be scratching your watch. Anyway this was a satisfying purchase.

B002R8DSGQ.AB4GC39U9GBSS.reviewText: just got it. nice watch, as picture shows. only thing is: it says callendar with day and date, but unfortunately the one i received got only date on it, no day at all. check the model and all is fine DZ 1295.

B002RH6ZYO.A24ZEOIU7E2Z2M.reviewText: When I saw this watch I thought, I have to have it, as a connoiseur of watches I like the design and looks of it, when I got it in the mail I was even more pleased, it is heavy, bulky and very neat looking in person.  This watch is a looker not a tech device, so if you are looking for alot of features this watch may not be for you, it has no alarms or frilly things, just a setup, time mode and date option along with the little analog clock.  The only downside for me was the band was to small, but as I have gigantor wrists I just ordered a black leather band, which looks nice, but not as nice as the band it came with.  Still definite watch for the collector of timepieces.  Four outa five stars.

B002RH6ZYO.A20UIS64HKJZB6.reviewText: I bought this watch for my fiance (male) who fell in love instantly.  The design is unique and I have yet to find another man with a similar watch, nor have I found this watch in stores - seems to be an online exclusive.  Before purchasing, just know that it requires TWO batteries as there is a battery for the top clock and bottom clock.  The band is rubber and the watch face is resistent to scratches.  It also lights and has a variety of time display functions.  Hard to go wrong with this one.

B002RL9C9A.AI7225K3BGC7C.reviewText: These trunks are the perfect length. Not tiny like some trunks, but not down to your knees either - allowing for lots of sun exposure while looking good  I probably could have done without the enormous Diesel Indian head logo, but at least it doesn't scream label either.

B002RL9CIG.A2491XD8E3YTBQ.reviewText: Love the design and quality. I would suggest sizing up. If you are a L order an XL etc. It is def a smaller fit than normal but the design and quality are top notch.

B002RS4NDS.A1ULZVJXUDKBJ2.reviewText: i got this in a large blue and it fits me perfect. 5'10" 185.its diesel but u wouldnt know unless u saw the label. either way it is nice quality and i got many compliments on it,
B002RS4NDS.A1ULZVJXUDKBJ2.summary: very nice shirt. sixe is true and looks great w/ a v-neck

B002RS6ETY.A1UTHPPDRXDF7C.reviewText: This jacket runs at least 2 sizes small. Buy XL if need M. It's a very good quality item, looks a lot better than in the picture.

B002RS6F1G.A3TJLR2GOIEW8A.reviewText: I bought this Diesel jacket for myself a few months ago when it was on sale.Pros:1. Superb outer. The feel of the lambskin is fantastic. It looks very glossy in the Amazon product picture but in reality it looks like regular faded cow leather (but SO MUCH softer). It's NOT a deep black color at all. Keep in mind that there may be grain or color "imperfections" due to this being premium custom leather product. Personally I think these imperfections add to the character of the jacket. The inner is made of cotton and is very plain and thin for such an expensive jacket, so I'm taking off a star for that.2. Unique Fit. Size tends to run smaller than expected. A typical size S jacket is loose for me, but this jacket size S is very snug. You will not be able to comfortably layer more than 1 piece (tee/long-sleeve/sweater) under this jacket. It does stretch out to your body contours after wearing it a few times for an even better fit. This jacket is cut and fits like a slim-fit/modern-fit SHIRT and is made to be worn buttoned up. This jacket looks like GARBAGE if you wear it completely unbuttoned.3. Unusual collar. Pay close attention to the jacket collar before purchase. This collar is very unique for a leather jacket. It will NOT combine well with everything and you may hate it or love it. At first the collar made me consider returning it, but after I wore it with different types of shirts, it really grew on me.Summary: Leather jackets are usually lumped together in the "Outerwear" category. I hesitate to call this jacket outwear. Think of it as more like a leather "blazer". It's fairly thin for a jacket and would not keep you very warm. With the right shirt combination, you can have a very unique and stylish look with this jacket. Wearing it all buttoned up gives you a stuffy, martial look.I would NOT recommend this for top-heavy people (broad back or wide chest).

B002RS6HBY.AX2B54SXI0IPM.reviewText: First off, the jacket runs a bit small - large on 6'1 180 is pretty snug, though it gives the jacket a nice fitted look.  Definitely consider going up a size if you don't want a snug fit from your normal jacket size.  (This includes the sleeves - there is very little extra room in the sleeves as well so consider that if you plan to wear this layered with heavy sweaters/ sweatshirts.)The jacket is fairly light weight - just a thick cotton shell, no extra lining/ padding.  For me this is a plus as well as I have plenty of heavier jackerts and was looking for something light weight for the Fall.I would have rated it 4 stars (very good jacket, but nothing spectacular), but it loses a star for the snap buttons.  When I opened the jacket, I noticed it came with a small zip lock bag full of tons of extra snap button components which I thought was a bit odd.  (Having a few extra buttons is pretty standard, but this is a bag full of the parts that make up a snap button, which would need special tools to actually replace on the jacket.)  As soon as I tried on the jacket, I unbottoned the first snap on the collar to test out the fold out hood, and the snap completely broke.  I don't have the tools needed to assemble/attach a new snap so until I can get those, my brand new jacket is missing a snap on the collar -_-All in all it appears to be a good jacket for the Amazone sale price, and it has a great look in my opinion, but I would only recommend this product at the sale price, definitely not worth the full listed price.
B002RS6HBY.AX2B54SXI0IPM.summary: Nice Light-Weight Jacket With A Couple Of Issues

B002RS6HTQ.A1DSBI82UWZBS8.reviewText: This is a great product, I'm totally satisfied. I have purcased a few more Diesel items as well, and they fit really well and look good. You won't have problems with the quality neither. 5stars

B002SSTVAW.A3IDCBP0W2VZGJ.reviewText: So beautiful, more than the pictures, great design, the pictures can't show the beatiful details of this watch, The functions are the normal functions of a traditional watch, easy operation, I'm very happy with this watch, the package is so DIESEL, so Italian.

B002SXMKL4.A1GK6TLHN9M8Q9.reviewText: The Good:  The sneakers are gorgeous! I got them in white/pink/fuchsia and they look beautiful. The upper is made of suede and nylon, the inside is lined with very soft suedelike fabric. Lightweight, very comfortable, with flexible, bendable soles. They feature velcro closures and studded Diesel logo on the side. True to size, great for the price, seemed like a great buy at first.The Bad: Not durable at all! They were worn for may be a few months and the soles on both sneakers started to fall apart - the bottom parts of the soles (the ones with the relief design on them) came almost completely unglued and are about to fall off.The Ugly: The light fabric and especially suede these sneakers are made of get dirty very easily and are very difficult, almost impossible to clean. When I first noticed that the shoes were starting to get (and look) dirty I was able to clean them and almost completely restore them to their original look, after that - not so much. No matter what I tried or how much I cleaned them, I was only able to make them look a little less dirty, but never completely clean. Right now white fabric and light pink suede parts look almost completely grey, and all suede looks completely worn out. The sneakers still fit my daughter, but they are completely destroyed, I have to throw them out and get something else.
B002SXMKL4.A1GK6TLHN9M8Q9.summary: Very pretty, but not at all durable.

B002U9JNMU.A2H83DLP4ZBJGL.reviewText: I bought this for my fiancee because he needed a watch for functionality, but he likes digital.  For the amount of friends that make fun of him for having a digital watch, he gets twice as many compliments for its beautiful look.

B002U9JNMU.A1ZPDO6NT7CMRX.reviewText: The watch looks great and fits comfortably on your wrist. Like the other Diesel watch I own it is a little on the bulky side. The instruction manual that comes with it has instructions for about 30 different watches, so it can be a little confusing until you find the right one. The watch itself is great. The only downside is the wriststrap. It can be a little stiff and hard to take on and off. I am also wary that it might start fracturing and coming apart like the plastic strap on my other Diesel watch. So far it had not done so, and I will update review if it does(so if no edit assume it's still fine).If you like the look of the watch, it's well worth the price; Diesel makes a great quality product, and even if the strap on this one breaks like my last one it'll last a couple years first.EDIT: I've had this watch for awhile and finally something went wrong with it. The silver colored bar along the side of the watch popped off. It's just glued on there it seems. Considering I've had the watch almost a year, and it's an easy fix, not worried about it. Superglue ftw. Besides that it is going strong, no signs of wear on the band, and I'm rough on my watches usually.

B002U9JNMU.AAYU0HA541FAE.reviewText: I think this was a great present for my boyfriend. He loved it. My only issue was when I received the package it was partially opened. Almost as if it was tampered with. But besides that, the watch was great.

B002U9JNMU.AV8VHUMOHI2ND.reviewText: Diesel is a quality watch maker and they didn't skimp on quality here. While this watch is nothing extremely fancy it has a very classy look that has gotten many compliments. The silver is bright and shiny and is a nice contrast with the black. The amazon 360 degree video is an accurate representation of the watch. You do need to be somewhat careful with the face because it is flat and the bezel has no lifted edge to protect the glass but it is scratch resistant and hasn't scratched yet. The screen contrast is decent, not excellent but good enough to see the numbers even when it's light outside. Overall very pleased with this watch.

B002U9JNMU.A2MSNMX40LBRIN.reviewText: I bought this for my husband as a birthday gift and he loved it! He is a total watch guy and this piece is a great blend of casual an d clique. He wears it work ( to a major corp) an it still looks cool and edgy but also appropriate for client meetings and whatnot. The size is great. It looks big but that's what the guys like these days. It is also very comfortable too. The light isnt too bright so if you check the time at night it's not like staring into a sun! All in all I recommend this watch!

I still love it though - especially the blue color - and just make sure to wear an outfit that matches/blends in with it.I have a couple other watches of the same width and they look fine; this watch is just a couple millimeters too tall and the effect is amplified by the color, which in real life is a tad darker than the picture. The 4 modes - timer, alarm, etc. - come in handy and the watch is surprisingly light.

B002U9RHI2.A37DEPYABBT4F5.reviewText: I would give the product 3 stars. But since after-sale service is an important component, the rating is downgraded to 1 star.The watch is a eye-catcher. This function could easily consume a lot of battery power after frequent usage.The moment I received this product, I found the fatal flaw and wanted to return it. But I could not get through the phone number and I have sent them emails but no reply so far. The reason I contacted them before I return the product is that they require a RMA# before returning (most of the sellers on Amazon never request that ridiculous number, it is just one additional bar they set to turn down some return requests) and I can find this number no where. Even there is such a number somewhere, I think I can say fairly that they DO NOT make the number explicit or obvious (maybe they want to set some obstacles so that they can deal less return requests.)So I have a pretty bad impression of this seller--Jomashop.

B002UKQI0Y.A2N5KYWIEPJQ0V.reviewText: Been wearing these for a year now and they haven't given up on me yet! Great for those of us who don't have twiggy legs but still dont want something sloppy or flared. Diesel jeans are no longer made in Italy (for the most part) but these haven't disappointed.

I bought the tanks with a special deal: $25 off $100. Free shipping and free returns made it a worry-free purchase ( which is still available, as of today, 8/22/10.)

B002UNLYPK.A15T7OICUPDI6.reviewText: Very Diesel-like top with a simple front but unique cut in the back.  I think this makes a great piece as a cover up for the beach or a casual top to throw on for everyday wear. I think it's because the models arms covered up the sides so it looks like a slim fit.  Not a big deal except I wouldn't wear this for a night out on the town.

B002UNM45Y.A2F9VDL158Q8WT.reviewText: SUPER cute jacket for work or casual wear. True to size, fits me perfectly. I have a small frame and usually have a hard time finding a jacket tha fits.

B002UNM5D0.A1GK6TLHN9M8Q9.reviewText: I've been looking forward to receiving this shirt - I love Diesel and have never been disappointed by the brand's quality/style before. Well, the shirt arrived today and I like the quality, the fit, the material it's made of (super soft pure cotton), the shirt is true to size (size Medium fits US size 6) and is soft and comfortable...I like everything except the design and the overall look. The design is a lot bolder and brighter than it appears in the photos and even though I absolutely love the concept (golden foil print on black or white), I wish it were executed a bit better. The design takes up the entire front of the shirt, it's too big for my liking, and the way the whole thing is shaped makes for a really unflattering look - it looks like you are wearing a breastplate. And since a medieval knight in (really-really) shining armor is not quite the look I was opting for, I'm now considering sending this shirt back. I'm giving it three stars because I wasn't disappointed in its quality, fit or sizing - it's the design and the look that I didn't like, and I don't want to rate this item too low just because of that. Somebody else might like this shirt a lot - but keep in mind that the foil print is really bright, bold and shiny, it was a little bit too much for my liking. But if you like metallic colors, foil prints and bold, bright clothing you might like this shirt. I got mine in black and it looks pretty good with jeans...I just think it would look a lot better if the design were smaller and a little bit more tasteful.UPDATE: I purchased the same shirt in white and I think it looks much better than the one in black - the foil print doesn't stand out on it as much as it does on the black shirt, it looks a lot more subtle and tasteful.

B002VBWBIA.AYQO1JN4J0K10.reviewText: Poor Quality TShirt for the Price paid,  just because it has a Diesel Logo on it and even that is just a poor quality Iron on.  The one you picutre here is NOT what I ordered nore received.  I just ordered a regular short sleeve TShirt not the long sleeve sleep shirt that you are showing.  And the TShirt is like I said poor quality for what is suppose to be a high quality DIESEL SHIRT.  Feel like someone got a hold of a "Diesel Logo Iron On" and just did that - Ironed it on some cheap tshirt and sold it for the Diesel Brand price.

The logo's flaking isn't a critical flaw, but these ARE $40 pants.  It's a shame really because the rest of the pants are excellent--just such a critical cosmetic flaw IMHO....

B002VJJTV4.A356UT3ML003OT.reviewText: Nothing to do with the company, they were great in being able to return things with no problem. The company did send it immediately which was great as well. The problem was with the watch in itself, which was too small for a normal wrist.

B002VJK1S4.A3TWUU22RM2A7N.reviewText: I tried to get my son to wear them for fashion purposes and he complained about the inside material and the straps. Not for an athletic kid at all.

B002VJK8RS.A2RGT7IKB4PMOI.reviewText: Purchased alot of diesel brand shoes and have always been more that satisfied. These are no exception. They are nice stylish and comfortable. What I will say about tis brand is that you never quite know your size. The sizing is inconsistant and that can be frustrating. These run extremely big (like one full size big). My son loved them though as did I.

B002XDQZAG.A3JCFB58MY1ZHX.reviewText: I am still searching for an ideal backpack/purse. I need it big but not huge, colorful but not cheap, universal and convertible but convenient; the one that has lots of pockets but easy to search inside. This bag is almost it but not yet, so I give it 4 stars.

B002Y31N98.A2XBTTOIX4ZJQA.reviewText: Hi, I live in Brazil and here Diesel is too expansive. I buy many jeans here, but I decided to buy on Amazon. And I'm glad, because the jeans is perfectly same that cames to Brazil!

B002YVI8L6.A1TREQ6VR8P7EG.reviewText: I purchased this watch for myself and I was a little disappointed when I received it.  Even though the watch has a great look to it, for me, it looked better in the picture. I wasn't impressed.

B002ZCXUY4.ACREENVO0OHBB.reviewText: I love so many things about this bag! It is huge I can fit every thing I need inside! The color is beautiful! The lining reminds me of a space suit! The bag is well made and I can tell it will stand up for quite a while! I get so many compliments on this bag. Love it!

B0030IMR6E.A1UCY9U5GAI2UR.reviewText: I like Diesel jeans, and Viker is my favourite model. But take into account that Diesel runs 1 or 2 sizes wider and about a half size longer. For example, I wear Levi's 28x30 and Diesel 26-27x30

B0030IMR6E.AAPG20JWCRSWC.reviewText: These pants fit perfect and look great.I saved many dollars and I didnt have to go to the store to find them!

B0030IMR6E.A3B3WX7B4WA2GE.reviewText: I have this style in the lighter weight, distressed, slightly stretch 885K wash so I knew I'd like these too. The fabric is slightly heavier and doesn't stretch, so they're not as comfortable as my other pair but the darker colour makes them more suitable for those "tailored shirt and dressy jeans" occasions.
B0030IMR6E.A3B3WX7B4WA2GE.summary: A dressier wash of my favourite jeans

B0030IMR6E.AWNZC6MEVGIM8.reviewText: Knee to ankle too wide and it seems longer than 34 inseam.  Really fitted in the thigh area too.  Like then but might have to get some work done on them

B0030IMR6E.A1P7NDKPQL5NNE.reviewText: i wear a size 34 in almost all brandspreviously has 34x34 larkee which fit well but a little loose around the calves and anklesthese fit absolutely perfect and are better fitting through the legs than the larkee. they are ever so slightly too long and required about 1.5cm to be taken up so in actual fact are not a true 34 in length more like a 34.5quality is great.

B0030IMR6E.A2FEL8YEAMJ1YV.reviewText: This one is my second pair of Diesel Viker 0088Z. They last forever. Color stays like new for years.Highly recomend it!

B0030IMR6E.A30MEZUGLHHTMS.reviewText: I love these jeans. They're very stylish, and they fit as expected (I'd read some reviews that said Diesel pants and shirts both ran small, but that wasn't true in my case). I'm definitely interested in purchasing more Diesel in the future.

B0030IMR6E.A3TWON58BQR1XX.reviewText: Previous experience with Diesel wash 0088Z was good; previously had enjoyed another pair of Viker jeans except that legs were a bit big and cuffs larger than desired. When I saw these with the notation "Slim Straight Leg" I thought it was a chance to have a pair of Vikers I'd like a lot. Rather than slim, these legs and cuffs are even bigger than the previous pair. Half-cuff measured 9.25" vs 8.75" on older pair (that adds a full inch to circumference). Good quality as usual with Diesel, and sturdy, heavy fabric. I hated to return them, but they didn't fulfill what I needed and expected.

B0030IMR6E.AVZNJHLDMKG6V.reviewText: This is my second pair of Viker. Similar to the Larkee, but just a better fit and not as loose. They break in after three or four wears.
B0030IMR6E.AVZNJHLDMKG6V.summary: but just a better fit and not as loose

B0030IMR6E.AL0M18QSIN88Z.reviewText: Fit was excellent as expected, quality of the jeans were great. Great color wash on jeans. Would buy diesel again.

B0030IMR6E.A33SD38GTC9OBS.reviewText: I would say that the pants fit a little bit larger than most 34x32. The waist is a little larger and the length is definately closer to a 33 or 33.5 Overall nice jeans as they look great with a dress shirt or causual shirt.
B0030IMR6E.A33SD38GTC9OBS.summary: Nice jeans, they fit as expected. Great material and very nice looking.

B0030IMRUU.A39Z8BX5GCCSD3.reviewText: i have ordered a slim micro-boot cut, and what i have received is regular boot cut.every thing else is OK

B0030IMRUU.A2X7CW8VAT99RB.reviewText: Typical of Diesel, the tailoring is superb. The quality of the denim and the stitching are excellent and the front thigh bleaching is not excessive. The pattern on the hip pockets is distinctive but not overdone but It remains to be seen as to whether the pattern will rub off with wear. Overall, I am very satisfied with my purchase.

B0030IMRUU.A2BJHOVI1Z27D.reviewText: I purchased these as a gift for someone (this style is hard to find now and they only wanted this exact pair) and they arrived fairly quickly, but I opened the package and my first reaction was "are these used"?  I have the EXACT same pair and mine are 6 months old and look new compared to these. The bottom of one of the legs looks like someone walked around with the pants catching under their shoe in the dirt. There was also a post-it note with a phone number in one of the pockets!  Also, there were NO TAGS on the pants.... That just makes me assume they are Used! Very disappointed in this purchase. Step it up Amazon.

B0030IMRUU.AHP6F8CA3DSGJ.reviewText: I ordered these for my husband who mainly wears Diesel jeans. If you KNOW the fit & wear Diesel jeans a lot, you will know that these ones suck (says my husband). He said that they were not slim-fitting enough and were way too short for his inseam (34"). These are NOT for tall guys. He tried the same ones on in the store and they fit the same, so these are not knock-offs like we originally suspected (and one other reviewer). BUT these jeans are not made in Italy and are made in Indonesia instead. After seeing the poor fit this again made us think they were fakes, but the people at the Diesel store said that this is where they "expanded" their production to because of "high demand". Whatever, they just wanted the cheap labor and are creating a cheaper product instead. You no longer get the Italian colors stitched onto the waistband like the more high quality Diesels. Don't get these jeans if you are tall and want the long slim fit of your old Diesels. We returned both pairs he tried.
B0030IMRUU.AHP6F8CA3DSGJ.summary: Poor quality, Diesel has gone downhill

B0030IMRUU.AQVO7BPLIG2AI.reviewText: Diesel jeans are made with the utmost quality and with the help and efficiency that Amazon offers not to mention speed. I am able to attain some of my best, most desirable jeans to date. I have continued to purchase this product many, many times over the years, but not until I started using Amazon was I able to purchase them at the best of prices ever! Thank-you Amazon.Extremely satisfied customer,Cody Watts

B0030IMRUU.A10BNBRPEBJMLQ.reviewText: At a time when clothing designers are trying to keep the short fat man out of their pants, the Zatiny has made it so that a man of my shape can wear high-quality jeans.  I can finally tuck those lousy Levis away in the back of my closet and throw away my burlap sack with leg holes.  I'm a Diesel man, folks.  A frumpy Diesel man, but a Diesel man.

B0030IMRUU.A1T9EJ7XCVPFXY.reviewText: Just what I want it!!! A bit expensive; but brands costs money! Very good feel, look and long lasting jeans!

B0030IMRUU.A39IC1DPII4QND.reviewText: I've gone to the mall and I loved looking at the Diesel jeans. Great pants, but  their pants are like 180 bucks. So I searched amazon and found these pants. 126 dollars is a lot easier to stomach. These pants are high quality and are worth the price. I wish they had it in more sizes, but I had the pants altered to fit me properly so it's all good. Looks great, but it's important to note that the picture online makes the pants looks lighter in color than they actually are. They'll fade in time, so I didn't get worked up over that. Enjoy!

B0030IMRUU.A3AAXTEENDINIW.reviewText: great jeans, high quality...it actually over passed my expectations! I wasn't sure if ordering jeans through amazon would be a good idea, but it s just what you ask for. Great product

B0030IMRUU.A3EU676OAXTNVW.reviewText: I wore these a moderate amount, and didn't wash them unnecessarily or incessantly. But they still managed to come apart at the crotch. I didn't even get a year out of jeans I didn't wear on a daily basis. I've had other pairs of Diesel Jeans and never had this issue, but all of those were purchased directly from Diesel.

B0030IMRUU.A363DB08146FWS.reviewText: They fit cool.  I like the pattern on the back pocket.  Button fly is cool, except when you are wearing a belt and have to pee.  They are expensive, but way cooler than Levi.

B0030IMRUU.A2EZ8CPVBMOOMB.reviewText: I usually buy diesel jeans from the diesel store which is 80 miles from me. I normally don't buy clothes off line but thought I try it out. The jeans fit well and I like them very much.

B0030IMRUU.A37ZHV6VNYFZWQ.reviewText: I really do like this jeans. Material that was used for the manufacturing is excellent they are definitely ones I can see wearing 10 years from now ( unless I gain couple of pounds). The main feature I did not like about them is the fit around the waist, I am fairly large guy  at 5'10 and 188 Lbs my waist is around 35 inches, I got the size 36/32 so the length is right where it is suppose  to be, while the waist is a bit loose, probably around and whole 2 inches of slack. But if I would get 34/32 size I am positive my thigh would not proceed thru the opening because of the girth. I should've got regular fit not slim, but I can adjust my running routine to make this pants look even better on me. Thank you Diesel!

B0030IMRUU.A1E6EGSZIEO2OK.reviewText: These Jeans are really low rise and sit right on the shoe just as the picture shows with a gentle break. I am 36 waist and 6ft 5" tall, I ordered the 36X34 and it fits me just like the model in the picture. Seats significantly below the waist and the break on the shoes are just like the picture shows. This will be good for semi-formal occasions. Example combination will be with a white slim fit or fully fitted shirt tucked in with a black sport coat to top it off. You can sport any combination of jacket provided you wear the appropriate matching shoes and belt. I like them for this reason and I will keep mine.
B0030IMRUU.A1E6EGSZIEO2OK.summary: Low Rise just as depicted in the picture

B0030IMRUU.A133E6QSPTOZRT.reviewText: The Item looks like really nice blue. Yet the item I've received is kind of dark. honestly i wouldn't buy it if i knew the real color. I Think the Item was shouted with effects or I have received a different color which i really doubt.

B0030IMRUU.A2UVQZE61ISHON.reviewText: my regular size is 31 but it turns out that in this model in need 32 or more . ..
B0030IMRUU.A2UVQZE61ISHON.summary: The size is too small. i need one size up at least

B0030IMRUU.A1PDJ71GMUL423.reviewText: They fit perfectly with an exception of the length of the pants. I thought he needed 32s but I should have ordered 30s.Other than that, both me and hubby love the jeans! Fast shipping too.

B0030IMRUU.A38ZYJGF1YX5B4.reviewText: These jeans are expensive, but I figured that they would last more than 10 years.I am satisfied with the fit, length, waste, and the color. I was surprised that they look like the picture. Usually the model pictures way better than the actual product.

B0030IMRUU.A2CW0FXUQQCO3L.reviewText: Fit nice and looks as I expected. These are the jeans to buy if you like Diesel Jeans. Will buy more when I can.

Just ...ya know, buyer beware if you order from that seller. I think its  a pretty dishonest practice, and these things arent cheap!
B0031R22N2.ADEFD8L3I7YFR.summary: The cut is more like briefs.

Based on the other reviews this is not a problem for some people but if it is, stay clear of these....buy some underarmour instead.

B0031R22N2.A2EZE7QATE43RS.reviewText: these are not only super comfortable; they are super sexy, too.  you'll be glad you are wearing them, and so will your girlfriend.  hell, i bet my girlfriend would look terrific in them, as well.

B0031R22N2.A1DUFFSH4G9K96.reviewText: I choose this rating because I believe its the perfect underwear I ever bought, It fits and forms to your body like it should, and I recommend this product to anyone.

B0031R22N2.A31FYGE53VGBH7.reviewText: For some time I bought this brand only, and are durable, very comfortable and above all, are one of my favorite brands.The money you paid for it is worth every dollar. I recommend them.

B0031R22N2.A1H0H48KY3YYS6.reviewText: Bought cause looked good, kind of fit I was looking for. then my friend told me they were made for people like him and his boyfriend. I am gonna wear them anyway.  I look good in them
B0031R22N2.A1H0H48KY3YYS6.summary: Good fit looks good found out clothing company is not heterosexual I found out though

B0031R22N2.A51ED1ZKSP2M8.reviewText: I bought these anticipating I would replace some old Jockey underwear but found these slightly uncomfortable. The room in the pouch leaves much to be desired. It doesn't provide (at least for me) enough space for the private area. I also found that the leg openings to be on the small side. I am a college athlete so I do have larger thighs but I could see this being an issue for many customers. That being said, It is unfair to review a product without stating the positives. The fabric is extremely soft and of high quality. Also, unlike some underwear these trunks do not stretch out throughout the day which is very nice. Although I will not be purchasing another pair I could see thiner customers really enjoying these trunks based on the quality and craftsmanship.

B0031R22N2.A1NTRTHG8BUR9O.reviewText: Best fit I've ever had. Can't go back to cheap old Hanes after this kind of quality. I was actually expecting it to be one of those situations where you were buying a name and not a product, but these are extremely well tailored. They also have great support for those of us who need a bit of extra room in front than a lot of cheaper brands keep in mind in their designs.The waistband is much thicker than I'm used to, but it was a pleasant change that I'll be looking for in my future purchases. I was actually expecting the material around the legs to be short enough to crawl up constantly like a lot of other boxer-briefs I've worn, but they actually stay down quite well. Like... really well. That was probably the biggest surprise.The material is extremely stretchy and snaps back very well. It has a very smooth spandex feel, but breathes a lot better. It feels very thin, but very strong.I'll admit, I'm normally a notorious penny pincher when it comes to products like this, but the price is an accurate representation of quality here. With major labeled brands, it seems you don't get what you pay for very often. In this case, I was pleasantly surprised to be wrong.Also, the girlfriend loves em'. She even tried to steal a pair!

B0031R22N2.A2U2MG0JUPIE5V.reviewText: These are great for daily wear.  I also found these are perfect for use in your home or where appropriate to wear underwear as workout gear.  These allow me full motion in Thai Kick-Boxing practice and 'breath' well for serious sweating. So, I use these more for working out in the privacy of my home.
B0031R22N2.A2U2MG0JUPIE5V.summary: Well made with no fading noted after multiple washes

B0031R22N2.A13K0LD2BZXDVQ.reviewText: Iam very happy with my Diesel korys that fit nice she like them also would like to have an x small Rather then just small but my Package still fits nicely😜

So if your size is large go with medium to get that perfect fit you're looking for. I'm medium size so I ordered small.

B0031R22N2.A1M70PS7P7AQBJ.reviewText: Good quality product, doesn't stretch or loose fit like some other brands of similar style.  Very comfortable for all day wear.

B0031R22N2.A2YFNI0TXCT5YI.reviewText: Great fitting pair of sport trunks.  Material is very nice and soft but seems like they will be long lasting.  The Diesel branding on the waist band is a little in your face, I would prefer if they made a black on black.  Good length, not too short, not too long, just right.  These would get 5 stars if they were a little cheaper.

B0031R22N2.A1ZBEDKE0E2L27.reviewText: Bought a ton of underwear to impress in bed and other general near-naked activities. These are great undies that provide excellent support with very little ride up (there is some, but it's not too bad). The lack of a fly means you'll have to stretch your sausage out from the bottom of a leg opening. The bold lettering lets everyone know you're wearing Diesel. I like these better than the under denim line because these are lighter weight and feel more smooth on me. Same elasticity though. These are sexy briefs and show off your thighs and jewels.
B0031R22N2.A1ZBEDKE0E2L27.summary: Stretchy, Comfy, Little/None Ride up, Look Great

B0035MNS72.A3TCDNKXVFFN2G.reviewText: Leigh Bowery's macabre and shocking creations - half human, half monster, half fashion mannequin. Check out this fantastic book. WE LOVE YOU LEIGH!

B0035MNS72.A3UCI9K0Q5B404.reviewText: This watch is totally a man's watch. Cool lines, sleek design and on trend without being trendy. What the description fails to make clear is that this watch is for a lefty. Meaning a left hand dominant person who wears a watch on their right hand can change time and date with the crown being situated on the left...and it is a big crown with easy turning. My guy is 6'7 and a lefty. He loves it. Problem is that the band is for a wrist up to 7.5 inches large. I  need 8.5 inches but will go to Diesel direct for this. The band is great quality too. Very nice leather that is not stiff or hard like so many others these days. Seems thick enough to handle regular use for some time. Replacing the band requires you go to a good watch shop as it is a non-standard width at 28mm. Overall, a great looking man's watch that I would highly recommend. It is a quality watch through and through.

B0035MNSBI.ABHTIZPK2F7RP.reviewText: I was looking for a nice dress watch with a brown band. This is a great watch and the delivery was super fast.Another great Diesel product!

This watch is thin, much thinner than I expected, but makes it look more streamline. I would buy this in every color.

B00361FGW2.A1AZJP73X7956C.reviewText: I only give out 5 stars if I can't find anything substantive to criticize.  This is my first Diesel. Only drawbacks here are legibility and thickness.A few observations:  It's a nice looking watch, thicker than I was expecting - a good 12mm - which makes it look a tad awkward IMO, protruding from the wrist. Gotta lash it down tight to compensate. Face + bezel is a good 47mm from side to side, but it doesn't look much oversized because the strap is nice and wide - almost 1" wide - complementing the fat face.The leftmost and bottom subdial are a stopwatch.  Left is the minutes elapsed and bottom is seconds elapsed. Hit the reset button and the hands unwind however many rotations it takes to undo the time measured. Rightmost dial simply shows the 24-hour cycle.Note the dial markings and hands are chromed, except the luminescent spots, which means it helps to have reflected light to read the time.  Not a problem outdoors, but indoors markings can be low-contrast. At times takes a few seconds to figure out the hand positions.  Speaking of luminescence, it's nice, but usefulness is marginal as it fades pretty soon.Supposedly it's water resistant enough to take skin diving (according to the manual)- 10 BAR. My watch did not come with the correct manual.  The manual that came in the box covers maybe a dozen watches, but not this model (DZ 4165). :( oh well - I decided I don't need it badly enough to contact the seller, Dexclusive.The backplate is screwed down. The window crystal is domed for strength, yet the bulge means it'll contact rough surfaces if given the opportunity. Not sure how scratch-proof it is. I've only had it for a week or so and it doesn't appear to be running fast or slow.We wary of Amazon's "black/blue" color description. I figured it was simply wrong, but discovered after ordering that Diesel does make a black/blue model (blue faced).  However, vendor Dexclusive shipped the pictured black/silver/yellow color scheme I was hoping for.  Crisis averted.*** July 18 2012 update ***The watch fell a couple feet onto a tile floor.  The chrome trim that rings the date window broke loose and now rattles freely around the watch face.  No longer glued in place, it can (and did) interfere with movement of the hands.*** July 30 2012 update ***Still ticking after visiting a water park.  Submerged the watch many times and it was not affected by the water.  Window crystal is still unscratched. <3 The loose trim piece (mentioned above) has wedged itself into a corner so it's not currently interfering with the hands. I plan to open the case and remove it at some point.

B00361FGW2.A1XR29HBOVDYRG.reviewText: Amazing design, great watch and it fits perfect on you!! Looks awesome with any type of clothing that you are wearing.The band is very comfortable and really nice!!

B00361FGWM.A2SOQX5POENTO9.reviewText: I wanted a watch with all the features that were listed with this Diesel DZ7150 watch. I was very pleased when I received the watch except for the fact that the display brightness was very dim and hard to see in normal lighting. The backlight does very little to illuminate the display. I checked the picture displayed on Amazon  and it is nothing like the watch display brightness in the ad. I went to my local  mall and saw the same model and it too is very dim. I double checked the manual and web to see if there is a way to adjust the brightness but there is not. Great watch for style and functionality but way below average for display brightness. I also don't like vendors representing a product differently that it really is in real life.

B00361FGWM.A1SQ0CK2TLQEXO.reviewText: Ordered this watch as a sort of "beater" to wear to work that will still look good. I wear it every day and I love it. The screen may scratch easily because it is elevated very slightly, though mine hasn't yet. Water resistant indeed, though I take it off when washing my hands (which is often, considering my job). The screen is slightly dark, and you will have to get used to it - especially in bright light (it tends to reflect the light, thus proving difficult to read). Overall a great watch, very comfortable, and quality that I would expect from a company like Diesel. Also, the light is a nice feature at night or when you're in a dim setting. Perhaps a bit too pricy for what it is, but still, not a cheap watch. I enjoy having it.

B00361FGWM.A13PNA8L44S77.reviewText: I bought this for my husband for his birthday. He loves it! It has no cloth or leather parts that are difficult to clean.  The entire watch is black, clasps and all, which is a feature that he likes alot. The watch will match with his work uniform and regular clothes alike. The screen is difficult to read when it is not illuminated, but this adds to the "blacked out" look. Not a huge inconvenience for him to illuminate the background, since the dark face of the watch adds to the look he is going for. He's been wearing it for about a week with no complaints, and he actually loves it. The picture provided by Amazon is misleading, however, since the letters and numbers are not even close to being that bright.
B00361FGWM.A13PNA8L44S77.summary: Great watch if you like the "blacked out" look

B00361FGWM.A2OORUYYONG2UF.reviewText: This watch is a very nice affordable time piece. I have seen lots of comments that speak of the display being too dim and not lit up. Depending on the provider, you very well may need to replace the battery. There is no telling how long some watches have been running waiting to be sold. My watch came and looks clear to me. What I think is, people are looking at the display picture, thinking the watch face is permanently back lit ( which is not the case) the picture is misleading. But this is a digital watch under $100, not the Galaxy Gear. I am very satisfied with this watch, it is a nice size compared to most of the other over-sized gaudy digital watches that are prevalent. It is easy to operate, quite water resistant, durable, and the design is superb. One of the better watches Diesel makes...

B003642LTU.A1GUFOYQ9ROUBI.reviewText: Los zapatos son muy cómodos, y el descuento fue una ganga. Vivo en Ecuador y me llegó sin ninguna novedad. Los recomiendo.

B003642LTU.ARR532R8A84QF.reviewText: my husband likes it!!! thank you.and it's good design and also cheap!and it's good design and also cheap!

B00368SRRQ.A224CSSYFMQIH5.reviewText: Gorgeous watch but men beware that this is a woman's watch.  Face is small and the band did not fit around my wrist and I'm pretty average sized.

B0036DEV5I.A2UXY3ZH1V6PYX.reviewText: Diesel is known for their quality clothing and accessories..and this shirt is no exception. Warning...this shirt runs small, I generally wear large so that's what I ordered, it was VERY small, so I returned and ordered XL it too runs a little small ( except for the sleeve length  )..I like it, I kept it, but keep the sizing issue in mind when ordering Diesel product.

B0036DEVR6.A63EYYY3QH1WW.reviewText: I purchased this shirt as a gift for my son. He reported that there was faulty stitching at the neckline and the material was thin and almost see through. This is not a simple black T-shirt for the typical guy.

B0036DEW2K.A2TO2BN3P4C00L.reviewText: I assume that Amazon got a bad batch of the large size purple color of this shirt.  The first one I received had a hole in the collar seam which I assumed was simply a rip.  I just received a replacement and it has the exact same problem.  Upon further inspection, it's clear that the shirt wasn't manufactured properly to begin with as the ribbed collar is bunched up where the hole occurs and the stitching is intact.  In other words, whoever made these shirts for Diesel actually put these together so sloppily that the collar isn't even sewn on properly.  Unless you want to risk having to go through the hassle of returning this item, I'd suggest not ordering it.  I'm sure that Amazon will do right and simply accept my second return without question, but it will mean a second trip to the post office in as many days for me this week.

B0036DEXBU.A227WC7J5SQSMI.reviewText: It's a decent shirt. Looks cool. Nothing premium about the material or stitching. The Diesel name is all you will be paying for if you spend over $15. Also, that Diesel tag that you are paying a premium on... is freaking huge and it's located on the side of the shirt right around your rib cage. It's so annoying and uncomfortable. So have fun with that constant nagging desire to cut the label off... that oh so special Diesel label that people feel a need to spend extra money for. If I didn't get this at a deep discount, it would get less than 3 stars.
B0036DEXBU.A227WC7J5SQSMI.summary: It's decent looking. Nothing premium about it.

B0036DEXYM.A19EGK3PZRV781.reviewText: If you are a size Medium--go for a large. These run small. For 25$ it's a great fitting t-shirt. I ordered 2 of them.

B0036DEXYM.A3HNQLK4NUFL4V.reviewText: I own the diesel Tos t shirts in grey/white/black while they all fit nice and slim to my body, this one is extremely tight. I wear the others in small, but would have to get this in a medium. 5'7 and 155 pounds.
B0036DEXYM.A3HNQLK4NUFL4V.summary: Extremely small compared to other diesel Tos shirts

B0036DEYDC.A3W52N4ENG0ZX7.reviewText: These shirts SUCK !  Ive bought 3 shirts on seporate dates.  I wont learn will I ?I order  3x and they are so small a ken doll wouldnt be able to squeeze into them.  I write a letter each time to the seller but they dont care.  I guess being 6'3" and weighing 215# means I need a 15 X

B0036I9KN6.AIVVPS9F9KZ61.reviewText: I have been testing out the Diesel brand since I don't have good luck with the 2xist brand.  These fit well, I am a 32" waist and I buy the large and they are still snug on me.  But they keep everything in place and nothing falls out.  This is my 2nd pair of Diesel and they wash well and are holding up.  I have not noticed them shrinking or the elastic loosening up, which is a plus.

B0036I9KN6.A3NAFZO62760M4.reviewText: The fabric is very soft, but that is the only good thing about them. The seam in the middle is to noticable. They do not cover the area between the upper thigh and you family jewels if you know what I mean. Also, there really is NO POUCH so if you are well endowed, you are just being compressed into the underwear, not comfortable for wearing 8-10 hours a day.

B0036I9KN6.A34M6ROJW6C0LX.reviewText: I happen to be one of those individual who has a pendulous package.  I need good support in the pouch.  These don't quite do the job. My review is based totally on my  physical anatomy but, there is a transverse seam across the lower butt area which is uncomfortable for sitting.

B0036I9KN6.AASY6NYOHJLZ7.reviewText: I got this for a close friend of mine.  He is always complaining about the price of high end fashion under garments.  This price was excellent!  Not only that but the wear and fit were immaculate and he says they were so comfortable.  He wants a few more pair!  This is definitely worth getting for a friend, family member or significant other!

B0036I9KN6.A3KXLMZDD3DPXX.reviewText: Very comfortable and extremely stylish briefs, one of my favorite pairs, even better in person, true to size. Came in a great packaging and got a great price on amazon as always! Highly recommended!

B00375LG9O.A3DO1MG1GHJUMV.reviewText: Nice diesel trunk but nothing special. It also a bit tight for XXL and material is good but not great. Still - it's a nice pair.

B00375LGNU.A8ZOAYFYH4Y7N.reviewText: Very nice material and a great design, however these shirts run VERY small.  I normally wear medium to large shirts and always order large t-shirts, just because I like a little room.  The large size in this shirt is really a small to medium.  Nice shirt.  Really wish it had been larger.

B00375LGRG.ARI3OEGXRTAII.reviewText: This shirt is so well made. It was a wonderful gift for the man who cares how he looks. Wonderful.

B00375LGRG.A2HLCKN1558FUH.reviewText: Price is good, looks great and it's very confortable. It fits really nice for me. I would buy another colors in the future.

B00375LGRG.A2HQIWBL58IGPX.reviewText: The V neck is very comfortable. I love the fabric ... soft and stretchy. I bought a black one and came back to buy the white one. They fit my body like a glove.

B00375LGRG.AZPAXJ335TI9Y.reviewText: great shirt, nice material.  fits well as expected from Diesel.  will consider ordering more of the same in different colors.

B00375LGRG.A32D4K0PD3UNKK.reviewText: i bought an xl, and its a nice shirt dont get me wrong but its skin tight as an XL

B00375LGRG.A1Z5Z63H425KJ8.reviewText: Liked it but the colour is greyer than the one in the photo.to be fair it is great and comfort to wear.

B00375LGRG.A2CJPCHQ37HYVE.reviewText: It fits perfect and it's good quality. I purchased a L since Diesel runs a little small and it fits just perfect. I love it so much that I bought 2 more.

B00375LGRG.A2MYO5H5U2EOXZ.reviewText: Brought the Michael t shirt in white though its a basic t shirt its really well made purchased a size larger because it has elastene in them its really a tight fitting t shirt which i personally like. .if you are a built guy this t shirt will no way fit like the way its pictured so if you looking for a regular fitting t shirt this is not the one its really a body fitting t shirt fabric,quality everything s outstanding no second thoughts, great buy

B00375LGRG.A11CJH8KMA1N00.reviewText: I have always been a fan of Diesel. They usually make a great product.  However, I am a bigger guy so I recommend ordering a size larger.

B00375LGRG.AQTBF6WJSH8Z9.reviewText: The shirt is a little tight, but I've found that they tend to go by Euro standards so if you are a medium and you don't want it skin tight, order a large.

B00375LGW6.A1INTG3F1Y86O6.reviewText: It looks like a girls Tank Top. Very thin straps and the chest goes down too deep. But Nice quality fabric.

B00375LGW6.A2VBTN6ZR67YOF.reviewText: This is just a tank top - I thought it came with the shorts sorta like a body suit. Light and comfortable.
B00375LGW6.A2VBTN6ZR67YOF.summary: Singlet is just a tank top

B00375LHJS.A1OULSS3AIWS2X.reviewText: I love these undies!! they fit really well, hold up after washing and look great. The phrase on the back is hilarious!!!!

B00375LI2E.A1AEWC7WW6Q9UF.reviewText: Diesel may have expensive products, but these underwear are amazingly comfortable! Not to mention extremely stylish. This is my second pair, and I will continue to buy

B00375LI6U.AK70BKCBPGZ9M.reviewText: These boxers are not only my favorite pair of boxers, but my most stylish as well. Now, you may be asking yourself, "But Mac, why do I need stylish undergarments? You must be prepared for that.Oh. Also. They feel reeeeeaal nice.
B00375LI6U.AK70BKCBPGZ9M.summary: Feels like deep fried Nirvana would taste.

B00375LJD2.A2VP0D8XKRQJVY.reviewText: I received these as a Christmas gift from my wife. I am 6' with a 34" waist and the XL she ordered me fits just right. Any smaller size would have been too small. The fabric is really soft and the waistband is comfortable.

B00375LJIM.AAQC9GZJPHIJQ.reviewText: Not much to say - pretty straight forward. They are pajama shorts, to lounge in around the house. Roomy and comfortable, cotton is soft, elastic waistband is thick and comfortable as well - overall, superior in quality to CK or RL. However, in comparison to Diesel's other clothing (including underwear), these run a little large in the waist, about half a size larger than usual.

B0037LTY6A.A1OQK5ZAHSGDAR.reviewText: Its come up now as a 'men's' watch which is the first time I've seen that title with this as I was of the understanding it is a women's watch the whole time and bought it on that premise.That aside, I love this watch. B0037SQ3ZI.A8PNW8PDS63SV.reviewText: muy bonito en color azul me encantan estos relojes diesel ya llevo comprados 3 iguales uno rojo uno blanco y este azul

B0037Z876O.A3BBC9HUYALKR2.reviewText: Although this product is of good quality, I am not use that the button shut waist is very stylish after trying on. I returned this product, and recommend potential buyers to carefully consider there preference in buttons and waist strings.

B0037Z89CG.A2HM50JKTQ6SB5.reviewText: I purchased these for my European boyfriend who is from Norway. He absolutely loves them! He also wears regular swim from time to time but finds these comfortable and not too short to wear out boating. In my opinion, all guys should wear these!

B00382NN5Q.AEDUHLGWJHH95.reviewText: The watch was a little larger than I expected, this is probably due to the fact that it is square and not round.  The shape makes it look a little bigger. This is my second Diesel watch, definitely something you can wear everyday.
B00382NN5Q.AEDUHLGWJHH95.summary: good deal on a different style watch

B00389Q6SA.A3FLK40AEPBVRR.reviewText: I debated on several other brands of watches, Nixon, Fossil, Invicta, but after going and looking at the Diesel in person, it was not even close.  I received my watch yesterday, and its just an amazing piece.  Tough, artistic, and just the right size.  I love the diesel brand watches, and will be buying more to expand my collection.  This watch is a must buy for the price.

B00389Q6SA.A3RJ6KJKUY1IZQ.reviewText: Yes the DieselDz4263 is truly a fine timepiece; Wears well on your wrist, has the appropiate wight for a good watch.  For those who are collectors is truly a good choice for the collection.  The white band is strong enough does not flop, like a cheap band would, again the white band representing cleanliness. Get one you will not regret. A workmans watch, and good price. Thanx Jojo

B00389Q6SA.A2XU8734GF8ZGL.reviewText: I was looking for a masculine watch to buy and I found this very nice watch, I have purchased the black one as well. Nothing to complain about it. Quick delivery as well.

B00389Q6SA.A1UV6NY7050MW3.reviewText: This watch is just so pretty! I love it.The cool factor of this watch seems to be a drawback as well. The white colour makes it a little easy to get stained. I've decided to keep it in the box it came with, whenever I'm not using it.

B00389Q6SA.ACILV3V2Q8517.reviewText: I am LOVING Diesel watches because they are pushing the limits with style that commands attention.  I wanted a white watch because they are becoming more fashionable and, in my opinion, they make quite a statement.  The watch is by no means loud or obnoxious but you can't help but to notice it.  With the right outfit, I find the watch to be clean, trendy and will be in style for years to come.  I'd definitely recommend this watch to someone if they want to be noticed and have a good, quality watch that's not all that expensive.  My name is Mike and I approve this message.

B00389Q6SA.A14709Y02WJ60Z.reviewText: Just bought this watch for my hubby. It looks better than I thought it would.  Nice heavy manly watch and it looks flashy.  Great for the summer.  Soft rubber strap.  Exceeded my expectations.  I would recommend this watch.

B0038YWPEO.A1BBROZGAIS4UN.reviewText: Very nice top. Very good quality - as always when we talk about Diesel ;) Definitely I will buy it gain.

B0038YWPW6.A1BBROZGAIS4UN.reviewText: Very nice top. Very good quality - as always when we talk about Diesel ; )  Definitely I will buy it gain.

B0038YWQA2.A258XY2PMRGGQI.reviewText: I got a Medium, and the top fit perfectly.  However, the bottom was not true to size and runs small.

B0038YWRWY.A2B28G5B9V6FKP.reviewText: Very thin, poor quality materials.  In the product name, it says "padded" but this is not the case at all.  I returned this product as soon as I took it out of the box.

B0038YX7IM.A2SJ9CQQ9X8UK2.reviewText: The bag is nice. But it's too big for me, I didn't expect it from the picture view. And the bad thing is that the belt couldn't be unfastened, so you can only remove the bag through the neck, that is sometimes inconvenient. The other bad thing is that the outside pocket is only one. Usually such bags are fitted with extra smaller pocket.

B0038YX7IM.A9SQN31NXCPUE.reviewText: Pretty cool & compact. Perfect for small stuff while shopping, movies, and quick trips. Leather look-a-like is pretty cool too.

B0038YX7IM.A2T6Z9JG9SYA3O.reviewText: I use this bag every time I fly. Holds all my passports, important info, chapstick, tictacs, extra pair of undies (never know when your luggage is going to be delayed!)It is very good quality, fits/feels great, looks baller.Thank you Diesel <3

B0038YX7IM.A1ZWG3ETGDJIR5.reviewText: Exactly as described! I love it. Hope I can find the other bag that I am looking for . .

B0038YX7IM.AKA42T88YJBC5.reviewText: love it love it love it love it!!!! ...................... the size its pretty good and easy to carry on..... the price is pretty good ....LOVE DIESEL

B0038YX7IM.A1XOXQBURST3XL.reviewText: The bag is decent but I was looking for a bigger airliner bag so I kinda wasted the money. I'm a big guy and this bag looks lol a hand purse on me. the strap was too shotl as well, if it would've been longer I might have tried to work with it as I only need it to hold my nexus 7 tablet and my shades, but the bag itself is nice and very functional for a woman or smaller man.
B0038YX7IM.A1XOXQBURST3XL.summary: good bag for a thin man, woman or child

B0038YX7IM.A1SGWZ9QI7RUNV.reviewText: If you are looking for a casual, fashionable male purse (murse) don't look any further. This compact size bag is perfect to hold your wallet, super phone, coins and more. Well designed and perfectly executed in a Diesel fashion style, it's a perfect day to day companion.Available in three colors, blue, black and white, material is faux leather and thick fabric strap with stylish logo of the Italian fashion brand.I highly recommend this product to fashion people who like to keep their pockets empty, without bulky wallets or keys.5 stars.

B0038YX7IM.A2EMJQ4SCMWZN8.reviewText: Love it. Small enough to be comfort to carry and big enough to take wallet, sunglasses, cellphone and car keys. Really recommend

B0038YX7IM.A2U5RJGDLLVRDX.reviewText: I got this bag for my trip to cancun and it was very handy for the plane and to run around town with my phone, wallet and other things.  This bag came the next day.  Awesome services.

B0038YX8EK.A24Y6A8131B7XK.reviewText: product is Sturdy cool and stylish does not have a lot of individual slots for storage within the bag its self

B0038YX944.A2PS6F2U27KT3L.reviewText: This purse is everything I hoped it would be. It is roomy and stylish. The color is unique, the hardware is sturdy, and the leather is so incredibly soft. People are always touching my purse, oohing and aahing. The 2 bottom pockets are unique for a purse, but pretty convenient, if you can remember to rezip, which I have forgotten a couple of times. This is my new favorite purse!

B0039HX8XM.A2E9V7QBPEX0KQ.reviewText: Great Watch.  Getting lots of complement and it is a great conversation piece. The ladies loves it.  Great watch!!! Diesel is by far the best brand of watch I have ever had.

B0039HX8XM.A8N1SRGRO462G.reviewText: This is a super cool watch. It is a little bulky and big, but if you like that sorta thing, then you'll love it. My boyfriend get's tons of compliments on it.

B0039HX8XM.A22JSOOCXIEM1U.reviewText: This watch lives up to typical Diesel standards in appearance, and feels solid on the wrist. However the watch band is very delicate. I was taking the watch off and the leather broke on my third day of wearing it. I have managed to fix it with some discreet and highly masterful duct tape work. Wear with Caution, and don't think it will live up to any sort of active lifestyle.

B0039HX8XM.A3FMIL81SDY258.reviewText: This watch was by far the coolest watch ever. It was true to its description and picture. I was very disappointed however that I couldn't get the box with it.

B0039HX8XM.A1XQFDV3VVOZ7V.reviewText: This was a gift for my husband. We love diesel designs and this watch has a typical diesel design which is unsual and extraordinary. My husband is happy with the watch. Looks cool in person.

B003AVN2W4.A3RIRESBBRUD8K.reviewText: I love my new jeans. Nice color, very good quality fabric and the sale price was very reasonable.

B003AVN3CI.A1NYXTRZ6KR9ZI.reviewText: ALthough this is a lovely shirt and the material so soft and light, the sizing is too small. I purchased an XL for my husband and the sleeves were narrow and the body small. I would not purchase this again.

B003AVN3KK.A2QO9SH6XTPYE3.reviewText: i received this shirt and was excited to see that it fit great and the design was amazing, but by the end of the day the print started to fade away, even without being washed, so I was extremely dissapointed. Every time I buy something from a brand such as Diesel I know that the price I pay is worth the quality I get, but not this time.
B003AVN3KK.A2QO9SH6XTPYE3.summary: great fit, really poor print quality

B003BPEOEO.A2EHYJ28EU9H9A.reviewText: Totally what I expected.Seems to be made well.Looks great.It's not the most comfortable thing ever.I say it is definitely worth $81.

B003BPF44I.A2V9GW3F5BGIY5.reviewText: The watch comes in good packaging with a nice Diesel box with a the right watch inside.Pros:-Solid stainless steel-3 atm-Rubber band seems to be good-Really good looking-AccurateCons:-A little big and thick for my small wrist (I have a really this Vestal watch)-Doesn't show all the minute lines on the watch, but thats okOverall Diesel seems like a good well build brand.

B003BPF44I.A17D3ZSC306LRG.reviewText: What can I say, I love the look, love the feel, love the weight, love the color!! Gave this watch as a gift but I am going to purchase one for myself!!

B003BPF44I.A3T2MOF9TP4QTI.reviewText: I ordered this watch for my son as a graduation gift. He really love it.  It came in a really awesome packaging perfect for a gift it look really classy and expensive. The watch looks really nice and clean and it goes great with every outfit. all my sons friends really like it.

B003BPF44I.A24FF1FG4GAIAK.reviewText: We searched for white watches.  The picture when we ordered appeared white.  We were sent a gray watch and were told by an Amazon Rep, that it could appear to be gray... left to interpretation of lighting!!!  The description did not specify band color, only material.  We like the watch but we are highly upset about this major error!  We paid extra to have the watch here in time for a special occassion and now we will be returning the item, waiting for a refund, and not having anything for our special event!
B003BPF44I.A24FF1FG4GAIAK.summary: sent us the wrong color!!! NOT HAPPY!

B003BPF44I.AB3MR5L3PHZHK.reviewText: J'aime beaucoup cette montre design  et moderne. Cette montre est de très bonne qualité et a un beau look.Aussi, elle est précise et légère.Merci beaucoup.

B003BPF44I.AKH729O5S973G.reviewText: This watch is absolutely awesome. It isn't a small watch by any means, but i wouldn't say it is a large watch either. The neutral coloration is perfect for any situation, and the silicone strap makes the watch comfortable to wear. Absolutely no complaints at all, have received many compliments on the watch since purchased. Great watch for the price!

B003BPFBG4.A1N7D8F0UB439C.reviewText: I think this is a very cool watch...it looks big on your wrist, simplistic and modern face, and it glows in the dark!!! Very brightly, I might add.  I also like the material used for the wristband.  I'm not sure if it is a kind of rubber or silicone blend, but it is soft and flexible.  Hope this review helps.

B003BPFBG4.A15POOBAJ7DH14.reviewText: This watch is fantastic.  At first when I was looking at it online I wasn't sure of two things, how well it would actually glow, and the greenish colour it looks like.  When I got it both of my fears were immediately tossed aside.  Once exposed to reasonable light, this watch glows quite well in the dark! I even notice it glowing at times I don't expect like when walking down a slightly darker hall, reaching into my locker, or grabbing something from my backpack, which is always a nice surprise! As for the colour, the picture I don't feel accurately portrays this.  When I got the watch it looked white to me!  However, when wearing it outside where the snow is it showed more of a yellowish greenish colour, but never appeared the colour it is in the picture.  Much more of a toned down colour.  Also, this watch is not transparent in any way.  In the picture it looked to be slightly see through to me, but it is definitely an opague silicone that is used for it!  Size is great for a guy like me that likes watches to be bigger than your average Timex but not a saucer on my wrist!

B003BPFBG4.A2IT52MUYJD3VV.reviewText: I wasn't sure of the color of the watch when it wasn't glowing as I couldn't find any good pictures but think of it as Ghostbuster-ish. Kinda that ectoplasmic, dingy neon green. So when it's not lit up it's nothing special. But man, after a while in the light and you go into a dark place like a bar or club you have about 45 minutes of the best conversational piece of jewelry in there before it fades away.Very low profile, and the silicon/rubber band is comfortable as well.If you want a brighter color get the lime green, bright orange or the red version of this watch.I live in Arizona, so this watch actually sees sunlight and can charge up in a day of walking around campus. So if you live in Seattle (where I used to live), you'll have to take my word for how awesome it looks after it sees that bright thing in the sky you guys see twice a year. At least it's waterproof!(Just kidding, Seattle-ites. It'll absorb any light you throw at it so put it under a lamp before that next rave)

B003BPFBG4.A1UKK3RMW97NW8.reviewText: I love this watch, I get complements on it when it's not even glowing. It's just that stylish!When i walk around outside and head indoors, even it's not that dark inside this thing glows so hard. And when its completely dark, after the "charging" period this thing becomes a flashlight!!Only small gripe I have with it is that it's not waterproof :( oh well....Love this watch, I plan to keep it for the next 3-4 years.
B003BPFBG4.A1UKK3RMW97NW8.summary: I can use this as a secondary flashlight

B003BPFBG4.AMJF3UJEUUFAP.reviewText: Watch is very cheaply made. It glows great under a Black Light but it's so flimsy it feels like I'm gonna break it.NotWorthDaPrice!!!
B003BPFBG4.AMJF3UJEUUFAP.summary: Not what I expected for the price :-/

B003BPP8NU.A1YW03TD02IT9R.reviewText: It's BIG, ...... indeedy. It REPRESENTS and in a very modern RIGHT NOW way. This is a wicked pissah timepiece that will stop people in their tracks and be like " OH DAYUM ". Yeah, it's a nice chunky funky DIESEL watch. The band is very comfortable and the entire watch is lightweight. The photo here doesn't do the NEON justice because it is WICKED NEON GREEN BRIGHT.... This is a RARE watch that will not be made again. If you sort of like it, BUY IT NOW because IT IS one of a kind. TRUST!  ( super major kudos to the people who helped make this piece of art a realized design... major kudos!!! )

B003BPP8NU.AXJ8Z5U8A9DFK.reviewText: It's a solid piece of watch if you're into chunky wrist pieces.My brother bought one and i liked it so much, i bought myself another one.I wanted the blue/black though. Wasn't available. So I'm happy with this.

B003BPP8NU.A3AIFZG9JNSL9I.reviewText: Always I prefere to buy Diesel watches look very nice bigger and strong, also all my friends their very suprise all time to see me with nice new Diesel watch.

B003BPP8NU.A19R3AV6IDSWVI.reviewText: i got this watch a couple of months ago and i love it this is a very unique watch  this should have put a light on the green part

B003BPP8NU.A218XUX8AVMYUG.reviewText: The design is what I like the most with this watch! It definitely stands out from the crowd of similar watches.The only flaw is that it is really hard to tell the time because the time hands are so difficult to notice! You really need to put yourself into the watch like basically staring at your hand longer than usual just to tell the time especially if the lighting is less than very bright!They really should have made the hands more noticeable!

B003BPP8NU.A1BW8J64GQ9ZQ8.reviewText: This watch is really cool. I love the color and design.However, if this watch is smaller, it would be great for me.
B003BPP8NU.A1BW8J64GQ9ZQ8.summary: It's cool but some how it's quite bigger than I thought

B003BPS4NG.A276OU7UV82WPM.reviewText: It's a fantastic watch that glows in the dark and it's very elegant. Everybody looks at it and ask me how much because here in Colombia they are very expensive. It was a great deal and I'm very happy with my purchase.

B003BPS4NG.AXP7HWV5M5O09.reviewText: I didn't see any mention in the description or product specifications about the fact that this watch 'glows'.  The bands on the DZ1346 are full-on, glow-in-the-dark resin, and the face has quite a bit of luminescence, also.  If you're looking for somewhat of an eye-catcher, or, like me, you enjoy dressing festively for the October/Halloween season, then this might be the watch for you.  This watch is, after all, a fashion watch.  Pair this with any black or orange clothing (except burnt orange, perhaps), and you'll be ready for the Halloween festivities.  Apart from Halloween, the DZ1346 would wear well with nearly anything in blue.

B003DQPAX0.A29KJ1B32SL5FD.reviewText: These are great pair of sneakers for $60. They feel form fitting to the feet and are very comfortable. The unique style and blue bottom makes them an interesting item and people ask what brand they are. I love these shoes. Most Diesel shoes are over $100 and some, in my experience, are poor quality and the soles separate, etc. These shoes are well made, unique, comfortable, and worth the money.+ Very Comfortable+ Price+ Quality+ Unique- The shiny material on the back will have wrinkles or creases if you are not careful when putting these one. Requires extra time to loosen these to get the feet in properly to protect the shoe because the backs are taller than other shoes._Bottom Line_ Yes, I would recommend these to a friend just for the comfort alone. The fit is true to size. The shoes have to be loosened/unlaced quite a bit to get each foot inside the shoe. But your feet will thank you once you lace these up and head out the door! Easy 5 stars on these.

The sole is very flat, so if you're lookin' for any arch support, I advise you seek elsewhere (I'm a HUGE Skechers fan, m'self.. Oops. Did I mention that?). Wearing these shoes is almost like walking around in your bare feet - Take that as you may, if that's something you prefer, this is the kick for YOU!
