B003F76QWG.A8Y4MA7FRFV0P.reviewText: Yes, I bought these boots in size 8.5US, it was suppouse to be my size, but was not, right after that I bought them in size 7 and it wasn't neither, so I purchased the ones in size 8US, 40 1/2 EUR. these boots are confortable, look vintage new, good leather (the best you can find for boots like that), in fact I think I'm going to buy another pair in green and probably in brown, the detail in the laces, a little bit shinny adds class and style, I love everything about these boots. you just need to find the right size, these boots are almost sold out everywhere, and I mean everywhere, Miami, Ny. You can find it in diesel online, but is a little pain in the ... because the right 1 day after the checkout ask you for an authorization code or a scan copy of your credit card and right after that the shipping will be made, I just don't like it there, I like the checkout here on amazon and the speed of delivery it was great, another fact is that in amazon.com this is the price, final price, in the diesel store you'll pay taxes and if you want expedited shipping 14$ more, it's like 20$ more, so the best place to buy is here. B003F76QWG.AJTUZ2B942Y4R.reviewText: I bought these boots a while ago.  It took me a while to get the right size (thanks Amazon for letting me exchange them so many times!), but now they are perfect.  I love the small details, like the stitching, the give this classic design subtle flair.  I was looking for a new boot that was functional enough to be my new motorcycle boots (and therefore must have a quality sole) yet also stylish enough to wear out on a night on the town.  I have had these boots for a while now, but it wasn't until my recent experience riding my motorcycle in the rain that prompted me to write a review.  After my rain-soaked journey, I got home, took off the boots & was pleasantly surprised to find my feet *completely dry*!!!!  I thought for sure some rain would've seeped in for a soggy sock, but nope!  Dry!  I love these boots even more now!

B003F76SVU.A2GW2QV1N2RQFQ.reviewText: It's around that time of the year again, but rather than going to the mall to buy new shoes, I decided to go online with Amazon.  I wanted a pair of shoes that would match pretty much any casual outfit, and these looked to fit the bill.  When they arrived, I tried them on, and they were rather comfortable.  It also seemed pretty well-made - not "glued" together like some other shoes I've owned.Unfortunately, the shoes were much lighter in color than they looked in the photos.  I was expecting a nice, neutral-looking pair of shoes, but the white coloring on these shoes stuck out more than anything else.  I ended up returning them and taking Amazon's $4.98 charge for it.These shoes are very nice, but they just don't fit with the style of clothes I have, and the type of work I do.  They would definitely "fit" into an office environment (jeans, khakis, etc.), but they wouldn't last too long outdoors.

B003F76UO0.ATJPFXI4ZSQIO.reviewText: I saw the same shoes in the store for 80 dls, so I couldn't stop my self to buy these when I saw the price. My husband in very happy with his shoes. They are high quality, the package arrived on time and in great conditions. We are very happy with the purchase.

B003F76UO0.A13013LOG2KQUU.reviewText: It's a nice looking shoe and it fit me very well. But there were some issues with it.  First for a sneaker it's still pretty thin on the padding.  It really wasn't much more than some dress shoes.  The difference being it's super flexible and it's not stiff at all.  Just an observation not a criticism.But the one thing that really annoyed me was the shape of the heel and I guess the height of the sole. It curves in so much and isn't very high (the sole) that my pant legs would get under the sole of the shoes.  I'm not one of those people who like long pant legs that drag on the ground.  I don't have this problem with any of my other shoes or sneakers.  I bought to wear these for slightly dressier situations but I look a little silly because I have to roll my pants up so they look short on me (which I don't need to do for my other shoes).  It's not that my pants are dragging on the ground.  The issue isn't when you're just standing there.  But when you move and "swing" your leg at some point in the arc the pant leg gets under the sole and gets a little caught so you feel like something is messing with your walk.  Once your feet are on the ground, the pant leg is fine.  It feels like there a little hiccup in your step as you walk.If I had bought these for the Amazon price, I'd be returning them no question.  But I actually got them during a lightning deal for about 1/2 the price so I'm dealing with it.

B003F76UO0.A43KWV19WOMYP.reviewText: Fit like a glove and I get many compliments on them. Highly recommend if you're  looking for something comfortable that looks good and feels light weight.

B003F76UO0.A36ZA4LWVNJ1RE.reviewText: I purchased this shoe because I needed a black shoe for work.. It fit well. It was very comfortable. It was a cross between a shoe and a tennis shoe.

B003F76UO0.A2WTI4FCZ2H66Z.reviewText: I have been wearing it regularly for last couple of years, it's my weekend shoes. very lightweight, comfy, good quality.I love them.

B003F76UO0.A1ZTU84KZGNV52.reviewText: comfy and stylish can go to work or out or hang at Starbucks. definitely  recommended to anyone looking for great shoes

B003F76UUE.A1OOWZKVR2SJXP.reviewText: I just couldn't resist these sneakers since Diesel is one of my favorite brands and they were under $35 for my size (13). My favorite thing about them is the map of Manhattan, New York on the bottom. I now have the same shoes in four different colors. The tongue is a bit large and puffy, but it doesn't affect the look or feel of the shoes. Sometimes I wear a size down in Diesel (and other European style brands), but these fit perfectly true to size.

B003F95ZX0.A2E2M52Q3TWAQZ.reviewText: I usually stick to Keens because they provide a lot of support when I'm on my feet for over 12 hours a day, however I thought these shoes were really cute and decided to give them a try. I really like these shoes because they are comfortable, lightweight and they keep my feet cool. The material they are made out of is like nylon, so they allow my feet to breathe. My only problem is that they are white, and I got them dirty.

B003H9NJWW.A3C37PY7TLR536.reviewText: they were my second pair from Amazon...but reality...they are  my # 1....I simple love them...and they look fantastic!!! 100% quality, great colour and shape...

B003HC7QL4.A3DE0SNPHU1RZG.reviewText: Fall 2011 had me on a quest to get boots in about every possible color. They say the platform wedge is 'out' for 2012, but darn if I haven't loved the recent sky high trend in platform boots. So because I have so many 6 inch-ers in the closet, the more modest heel and fabulous bright but not glaringly bold color really caught my eye. (Think the shade of a grape popsicle dipped in plum sauce.) Diesel's price had me questioning this tho...as the intentional weathering/scuffing thing so many designers are doing really just makes shoes look beat up, not cool. (in case the photos here don't show up well, there is a lot of intentional abuse to the toe and heel.) But the Unkle Jessy has some redeeming factors: color, comfort, casual chic-ness. The lighter colored canvas toggle embellishment on the shaft distracts a bit, IMO, but overall I found these ideal for tees and jeans. The boot runs a wee bit large, on me, a size 9. But the material used on the sole/heel feels nice and cushy and is non-slip too. Always a good thing, tho it'll be hard to dress them up if that's your goal.  It's challenging to rate the quality of suede because it's rather thin, and, as mentioned, beat up. Had these not been pre-aged, I don't think the suede would be anything to write home about. The toe box is roomy and the shaft dimension is generous-- too generous if you don't want to tuck your skinny jeans. I'd prefer a more form fitting opening for versatility. Bottom line is if you catch them on sale and feel your wardrobe is lacking purple boots, I think these are comfy enough to take a gamble on and unique enough to know not every other chick in the room will be rocking this exact style.

B003HC7QL4.A11SP3CV5BBJUZ.reviewText: Shoe arrived in great shape but too high and no arch support. Will keep but only wear occasionally . Color is a nice taupe brown and looks good with skinny jeans. Runs half size bigger in my opinion and a bit wide.

B003HC7QL4.AKM6AGRSCE0GP.reviewText: The quality of these shoes is amazing! They're beautiful, just the right amount of distressing. True to size. The color of the bottoms are darker than shown on line like some of the dye from the suede rubbed off on them but I think they look better like that. They're exactly what I was looking for for fall. And you absolutely cannot beat the price!! I bought them in black I will definitely be purchasing them in the brown as well!

B003HC7QUU.A9FKQZEZ2RWYC.reviewText: Not only are these boots easy on the eye, but the fit is perfect.  They are as comfortable as can be, as a matter of fact these are the kind of boots that you wish you had bought two pair because you like them so much that when the first pair wears out, you are ready with a back up pair. The reason for that is, they change up every year and the style just disappears never to be seen again. I still mourn for some old ones that were classics yet bit the dust.  Anyway, great sturdy boot you can dress up or down and will last quite a while.  Being a aficionado on anything that you wear on your feet, take it from me............these are a great buy and worth every penny.

B003HC7R2M.A356AYXL7IXMB6.reviewText: Beautiful and luxury shoes, the color is exactly what ist. Size is real.Very confortable and feathery. Suitable for skirts and jeans.

B003HC7R7M.A2EHY83XSV81MD.reviewText: Love these bootie. Very good support. I have pretty high arch and it fits great.Grey has quite a bit purple tone in it. Still looks great.

As soon as I removed the junk around the ankle, I decided they were well worth the $80.  I wear a size 9 and they are a little big. All in all a good alternative to Frye if you are wanting that style of boot but not willing to cough up the dough.

B003U6II6Y.A3QM5KBMFUFM35.reviewText: These Diesel V-necks have a great quality and fit, especially if you have a tall frame and are lean and/or muscular. As a result, I have to wear the XXL for these shirts, and they still fit cleanly and tightly.  These will be the crown jewels of your v-neck collection, I highly recommend them!

B003U6II6Y.A2HLCKN1558FUH.reviewText: Following the other amazon reviews I decided to buy L (I normally wear Medium), and fits me really really good. Really cool V-Neck, with nice design and quiality. I would buy other colors in the future.

I usually wear a medium but ordered a large and it fits perfectly.

B003U6II6Y.A3FX3GJ3CDPO8L.reviewText: I got this shirt for $20 and nordstroms was selling it for $60. Not a bad way to save some money. I really like the color, it hasn't fade much in the was nor shrank. I do allow it to hang dry because its a tighter shirt anyways.

B003U6II6Y.AI07XKYJ2KZYL.reviewText: I've bought quite a few of these over time for the gentleman friend because I like them on him so much. It's a really good-looking shirt, casual enough to wear on a day trip around town but dressy enough to wear on a night out around town. Made of a thicker material than most tees, they've held up really well through multiple machine washes. True to Diesel's "legacy" the sizing definitely runs small and the fit is very much for a trim/slim build. Please note that their slim fit is truly SLIM fit - he's 6' and a pretty lean guy at 170 so a Medium fit him perfectly, but if he were any meatier (and by that I mean muscled and/or chunky) he would probably be looking at Larges, minimum. I highly recommend trying it on before buying, but if that is not an option than order at least 1 size up if you're slim and possibly 2 sizes up if you're bigger.

B003U6II6Y.A1HLBXSDTNY7AC.reviewText: Got this fast and neatly packed.  However, it is extremely small.  I usually wear a size XL in Calvin Klein v-neck tshirts and know that diesel run pretty small, so I ordered a XXLarge size, however, it fits as tight as a medium tshirt.  Sleeves are pretty short, almost cap sleeve, so if you have big arms expect issues.  The shirt was nice in quality, looked cool and everything, and amazon was amazing as always in refunding me completely, I just want to warn those of you out there, these run very small.  I would also say that they are definitely for a slim body type.

I have found that I must order an XL when I am a medium to large in every other brand and even then about half the time the Diesel shirt is too small in the shoulders and the sleeves are too short. The only exception I've found is T-shirts which consistently fit nicely if I order an XL.  This shirt I ordered in XL and I felt like I had put on a boys shirt.  Sizing was very strange.

B003U6IRUG.A1WHYP92CA4HNW.reviewText: I purchased the blue one size Large for my husband. The color is true to what is shown. But I was very disappointed that the cardigan is so light, thinner, and run smaller than I anticipated. I guess I had never purchased Diesel products before so I didn't know better. My husband has a size 40 chest, and when he put on this cardigan, it was skin tight. We had recently purchased a Ben Sherman cardigan size L for him and that one fit perfectly over his dress shirt, even though Ben Sherman size chart is the same as Diesel. I don't really mind the size running small, because I could have exchanged for a larger one, but it's the thickness, or lack thereof, that made me return it for a refund.

B003ULON1I.A211FHCSBYP5KS.reviewText: The material is very comfortable; soft and smooth.  I have an athletic figure.  I'm around 5'8", weigh 158, and have a 32" waist.  I love to run so I have pretty big legs.  That's why it's been almost impossible for me to find a pair of underwear that I like.  All other underwear have either bunched up, given me wedgies, ridden up, or have failed my manhood in some other form.  I ride a bike when I'm taking classes so these do get pulled up, but they are not uncomfortable. Sometimes I don't even notice it.They've never given me wedgies and I haven't had to adjust myself down there in public yet.  They're sort of like a compression short boxer-brief hybrid.  The style of these looks great. They make me more motivated to keep improving my body because these are not meant to complement a figure that's not athletic.So far they've been pretty durable.  All things considered--quality, value, comfort, look, etc..--I would recommend these to anyone who is looking for better underwear.

B003ULONEA.A1X6AUGEKBH4PV.reviewText: For awhile I spent my time trying out different brands of boxer briefs to see which were the most durable while feeling comfortable all day. I've found that the diesel brand is definitely on my top two. These here are not only comfy, but they have an amusing print on the bum, which my fiance seems to enjoy.

B003UREDNA.ADQHE7729ZV5W.reviewText: I'm on my THIRD Brown pair. My first pair was stolen at work, I sat on the second pair, and I'm on my third now. In addition to Brown I bought this, Black one. I wear sunglasses pretty much year-round (sunny summers, and snowy winters... This black pair is fairly dark, so I can only wear them in high-sun times, or on the beach.The glasses are perfect for small and medium size heads, men and women, young or old. Really sleek, beautiful black leather-accent and neat black tips are unique and sexy.

B003V74G36.A8RZR3N0UW6PA.reviewText: Came very quickly and wasn't even an Amazon fulfillment. These boxers came in a nice box with their own tag and even came with an extra button, they are very high quality and are a cotton blend so they have some stretch to them which is nice, usually 100 percent cotton boxer shorts are stiff so i like the blend, very good item would recommend, but Diesel is my favorite clothing company so i could be a little biased.

B003VYB3TY.A2S1LHMBHHPSOQ.reviewText: I bought a size 2XL at my local Lord & Taylor and it fits me PERFECTLY (I'm 6'4" and about 165lb; finding jackets that fit in both the arms and the chest is nearly impossible).  It looks great, keeps me plenty warm, and the metal neck clasp is a nice touch.  I'm not crazy about the leather strap, but it's sort of tucked under the collar so it's not really noticeable unless you're using it.  I have to agree with Sean Mackey's review though - the buttons on this jacket are not sewn on very well at all.  I expect to have to re-attach one or more of them before spring.

B003VYB3TY.A3S6OZXTIP9HXP.reviewText: Both reviewers before me are right, this is a fantastic looking peacoat, excelent quality.  And i must also agree that this is by FAR the best designed peacoat i've seen on the net so far.  It's a little expensive but Diesel is not known for cheap garments, also you are paying for the best design on a peacoat bar none. You could see by yoursefl by checking Neiman & Marcus website and look for Gucci or Burberry and compare this coat againts 900 USD + prices for those brands.  I must also agree with them in regards to the poorly sewn buttons.  I suggest the first thing you do is grab a needle and sew them tighter.This is a fantastic peacoat, if you look for a great looking & designed peacoat, you won't be dissapointed.  Highly recommended.

B003VYB3TY.A1IKN46VG3NP8A.reviewText: This was, after much searching, the best-looking men's peacoat that I could find on the internet. And by all means the pictures don't lie, it's a fantastic looking jacket, with plenty of material between you and the elements. While most people will have the collar popped down, you can use that leather strap to protect your neck, though the latches are very intricate and you need a mirror in order to fasten it. It's lined on the inside with a silk-like fabric, much to my relief, and has an interior pocket in the left breast (so its very possible to do the Napoleon look). As well, I went against previous experiences with online orders and got a medium instead of a small, and it's a perfect fit, very slim-fitting.BUT, the reason I give it 3 stars is because of a very important flaw. The dozen or so buttons all over the coat are extremely poorly sewn onto the coat, and to my great annoyance, after ONE, just one use, I came home to find two of those buttons missing from the coat! Now provided with the coat are three replacement buttons of varying size, and while I was able to repair the coat, I will need to re-sew all of the other buttons to ensure they are not lost as well. It's ridiculous to think that I should have to 'finish' the coat myself given the price-tag of this, and while I'm willing to forgive the flaw to enjoy a fantastic coat, I'm sure others will not be so patient. I hope this helps!!
B003VYB3TY.A1IKN46VG3NP8A.summary: A very good jacket, when disregarding one major flaw

B003VYB3Y4.A7GCFQSJ483O4.reviewText: If you can manage to scoop up this coat, you won't be sorry. I just had mine delivered and its even better than it looks in the picture. It arrived in perfect condition and fits like a glove. Can't wait till winter to start wearing it.

B003VYB41Q.AX10B70IBKF7E.reviewText: AMAZING shirt. Soft, great detailing, very classy. I just hope I lose the ten pounds, so It'll look great on me...

B003VYB41Q.A2YEHVCNUZXSI9.reviewText: I love this shirt. Excellent quality, looks great.  Seems to fit looser around the torso than picture but excellent fit across the shoulders. Also appears slightly shorter in length in front than picture.  I've bought many Diesel items from Amazon and as usual, I'm really pleased with my purchase.

B003VYB43Y.A2VKXF6SZITN68.reviewText: This is a great cool weather jacket, although I agree that it has the lightness of a shirt jacket versus a true denim jacket.  It's definitely more of a fashion statement.  I already have a collection of "heavy" denim, so this one was refreshing.  It's slim-fitting for those of us who are thin or athletic types.  The metal buttons make this jacket really stand out.  Best to be worn open and not buttoned up all the way.  Yes, it runs small as most european styles do for us Americans.  I'm a medium but have learned to order large with Diesel tops.  Since I got it at a deep discount and not full price, I'm very pleased with it.

B003VYB43Y.A3FWII7TLUTK.reviewText: Nice looking jacket but it's too pricy for what you get, the one I tried on was made in Romania, the fabric is thin and the sizing runs small, it's more like a denim overshirt instead of a jacket, no welted pockets too (lame), a Levi's trucker jacket has thicker denim, an updated fit for us tall slim guys and it's priced right, so unless you are a Diesel fan and you love this model over all the rest I'd look elsewhere, at a Diesel store I just saw the same model in a lighter colored denim go for $275.00 and at their official online store it goes for $220.00 jeez, are they nuts ? It's not twice as good as a Levis jacket to be that pricy, If I'd were to spend that much on a denim jacket I'd get a Nudie or a True Religion, this one is just not worth that much.

B003VYB4EI.A7GCFQSJ483O4.reviewText: I just received this yesterday-right on time, and in perfect condition-and could not be more pleased. I'll admit to being a bit biased when it comes to Diesel. They maked great clothes, and, being an italian designer, they fit me perfect...not like most American labels. This vest (waist coat) fits like a glove-the way they should. i cant wait for the cooler weather to get here and try it out. I tried it on for size yesterday, and was roasting in it...Warning: Not to be worn on a 90 degree day! If its still available, scoop it up. At this price it is a Steal.

B003VYB4H0.A7GCFQSJ483O4.reviewText: If you can still find this item here in your size, Grab It! With or without the hood it is a very classy/casual look. You'll get plenty of compliments, believe me. And at this price it is a steal!

B003VYB4H0.AO3U2LMQXZ2IR.reviewText: This is really cool looking sweater and feels comfortable.Fit is more of an european fit.I'm 6 2 and 200 lbs and got the XL, which fits perfectly (not a bit loose), so I would advise to go one size larger to the usual american sizing.

B003VYB4H0.A139SEYWL3V5PF.reviewText: I like this sweater too much. Is the best sweater what I have. You can us it wit jeans(with hoodie) or with without and it will looks more like evening dress.

B003VYB4H0.A1J0KX4SHXIQ66.reviewText: All my other jackets/sweaters are size Small. I bought this one size Medium, yet it is still way too tight. I'd like to exchange it with size Large, but I can only imagine it goes down very far down on my thigh (this thing is long), not to mention the sleeves will need to be pulled up.The quality is also very poor. The inner "flaps" (or whatever you call them) are longer than the sweater itself, so when you zip it up, those flaps will hang, looking silly in the bottom. The left flap is longer than the right flap.The buttons are also very fragile. The tag looks as if it's almost pulled off (and that seems like by design).The picture looks really cool, too bad it really is not in reality. Going back to Amazon!

The product now is it with me , in Norwaysince recently i been to States in a short vacation to my friend in Sevierville -Tennessee and have taken over .I am very disapointed about that , and i don't know if i will get back to you again..The jeans are ok ; i wear them and fits well.If you can get me any hint , i 'll appreciate .Thanks

B003VYB64Q.A2ILU9Q0P9AQ91.reviewText: I ordered this jacket for my husband for Christmas.  It was beautiful - a great and funky leather design with interesting details and great workmanship.  Unfortunately, while my husband was ecstatic when he opened the gift, he was terribly disappointed when he tried on the jacket.  My husband takes an XL because he has broad shoulders.  He has never had a problem with fitting into XL jackets, and sometimes, they are even a little loose on him, which is ok.  However, this jacket was so tight, he could barely get his arms into the sleeves.  What a shame!  Apparently, Diesel seems to think that XL sizing should fit much smaller people and the product did not run true to size as one should expect.  Very disappointed.Gone are Nick's dreams of looking like a guy about to zoom off on his Italian motorcycle...so sad!

B003VYB68M.A3JMC6OH95JYO5.reviewText: I just ordered this pants, but the size is wrong, I just want to change the size of the pants to 32W x 32L, but still with the same pants (type and brand). Thank you

B003VYB6KA.A3JPPOJ6KKD0MX.reviewText: normally i buy large if it's Diesel , but amazon had only XL. still fit me really well, have no regret that i bought it in XL. quality is excellent like every Diesel product that I've bought.

B003VYB6NM.A36GT2P4L68CLN.reviewText: I absolutely love the prints on the Diesel shirts I purchased, but the shirts themselves run VERY small. I bought my husband an XL (he's a standard XL in most brands) and it was too short and too tight on him. It's unfortunate that they didn't fit because he really liked them.

The band fits really well. The color is dark purple.

B003XU76II.A2COC6GX6WKJ78.reviewText: I will say I get a lot of, "What is that on your writst?", I have not been totally happy with the watch. First, you have to hit a button on the side to display the time. Some people may not mind the extra step, but it kind of defeats the purpose of having it on your wrist. Second problem, is that it is hard to see the time in direct sunlight, since its read LED. Other then these two problems the watch is very nice as a fashion accessory, but sucks as a watch.

B003XU76II.A1YONWZ1TK81VS.reviewText: I bought this as a present and everyone loves it. It doesn't look like a watch so it always a conversation piece. and the personalized messages are great. The shipping time was great overall great product and seller.

B003XU76II.A6KI53Q4FN7Z6.reviewText: This is an exelent product, I would buy this product again if it was available. thaks, I recommend this  watch.

B003XU76II.A1XVBM883CRBLA.reviewText: I purchased this watch on 4/14/11, but at Macy's, so I paid full price, $100. This is a great unisex sized watch. I own the white version, it's cool and futuristic, doesn't look like a watch at all. It is difficult to read in the sun, but I enjoy owning unique watches. The red l.e.d. text looks awesome at night/in the dark. The watch displays time in 12/24 hr format, date and a message setting, max of 10 characters--the default setting "BE STUPID."

B003XU76II.A1DK8MOFSY4QEH.reviewText: This watch looks great and feels very solid. As the previous reviewer mentioned, it doesn't feel cheap.I personally love this watch very much.However only draw back is that it gets dirty easily and it's hard to clean it.I have been wearing this watch for 4~5 month and the color looks a bit brownish. Tried to clean it but it wouldn't get as white as it was when I purchased.Strip is silicon and it doesn't get dirty. but the white part on the watch itself is soft rubberish plastic material and I couldn't figure out how to clean it without damaging the material. If anyone knows, please let me know.
B003XU76II.A1DK8MOFSY4QEH.summary: Looks great. High Quality. However Hard to Clean.

B003XU76II.A3PGCSU97KCFAW.reviewText: Great watch, ideal for the night! This is the second I have, first one is black... Only problem is to see hours during the day, but for me the purpose is to wear it at night!

B003Y7F72M.A3416CZ8NX8CVL.reviewText: My husband likes these pants. They actually do fit him very nicely. I don't like this particular style and color tho (dark blue). I prefer the lighter denim.

B003Y7F72M.A1SLXOMPTWNCK7.reviewText: Diesel makes awesome Jeans, I have 5 or 6 pairs so far and they are pretty much all I buy aside from John Varvatos.

B003Y7F72M.A2C2EN3E0V3GND.reviewText: My Diesel jeans fit like glove, make me look good!! I'm afraid to order clothes online but this was great experence.

B003Y7F72M.A3A1KQQNYO6AMA.reviewText: Quality and price come together for this pair of jeans. The tailoring is perfect, and I would recommend with out hesitation.

B003Y7F72M.A1GVZKFAT4BLGU.reviewText: Upon closer inspection, I came to the conclusion that these pair of Diesel jeans are indeed unauthentic, as mentioned in a different review here.  I say this because I had previously returned an authentic pair to a Buckle store because they were too short, plus a much better price was available on Amazon.  This was a big mistake though since the pair that I received from Amazon appeared to have a thicker denim, which was much different than what I had worn the day before from Buckle, and the sizing was way off.  Authentic Diesel jeans such as this model use a thin, quality denim that has a somewhat smooth elastic feel while fake Diesel jeans often use a thicker denim of less quality.  Even though these pair of jeans seem to have a genuine label that features tiny, hard to read numbers that appear below the Indian head tag, the overall quality is not up to par.  Now I know not to purchase denim on Amazon, regardless of the seller being verified and/or trusted as in this case.

B003Y7F72M.A3ESMG31XIRL1R.reviewText: I ordered the 36" inseam length as I'm 6'4".  Size fit me perfectly.The wash is much cooler in person than in the picture.  It has a nicer sheen and fade in person.The material is thick and I think it's coated in starch as the material is stiff.  I think the stiffness will wash away after the first wash.The fit is a little lower than mid waist but won't fall off your butt.  It also has a flattering cut in the respect as well for the ladies.  ;)

B003Y7F72M.A38YGVD208Y2J4.reviewText: This is my fifth pair of Diesels (fourth larkees). These are great jeans and are built to last. My wife loves the fit.

B003Y7F72M.ATQ88LTZBSFBN.reviewText: Its hard to order clothing online, but with Diesel yo can never go wrong. It fits great, the price is great, and will definitely order again in the near future.

I am usually 30x32 and I bought 29x30. The waist is great while the length is still a little long, but I knew they would be like this from trying them on in the store. If the sale and promotion go on again grab them

There area few quirks stemming form the fact that it is a "normal" chronograph with the dial mounted 180 degress out:The start stop button for the timer is on the bottom (usually on the top); the calendar window is oh the right not the left and the timer dials are opposite where one would expect them.  At least I can set the watch without removing from my wrist.It seems to be a well built watch at a very reasonable price.Left on.

B0040G9W2M.A27GMGOFQIWHXU.reviewText: These are great jeans; in my case there there pros and cons that can be easily fixedProscolor, feel, material, looks.Conssizing - yes the jeans run a size bigger lengthwise, i'm a 32 length and had to get 30, not a big deal.waist  I'm a size 30 and had to get the 29 in this specific model - zatiny.I found out that larkee and zatiny run a bit bigger in waist, so if you are a 30 like me get the 29; viker and safado run true to waist maybe because they are slim low waist so it does make a difference where the jean belt sits on you; and as I said lengthwise you have to go a size smaller.Diesel is a bit tricky in some model sizings so you have to go to the store and try them all first, for me the 0073N wash is my favorite, I just wished they had the Viker.These are the SAME jeans you get retail, at least from Amazon as the seller; for the price you cannot go wrong people.

B0040G9W2M.A3U774VHGT0WQI.reviewText: These jeans are good quality denim, however they do fit a little large.  In other jeans I am a 32, however, in Diesel I am a 31.  The length seems to be spot on in comparison to a few pairs of Levis I own.

I think the double belt loops are a nice touch: There are loops the right size for a dress/chino belt underneath the wide belt loops so the waist is neat with either a wide or narrow belt. The price was not unreasonable, especially as I took advantage of a promotional discount.
B0040G9W2M.A3VLC2OO4BTFY1.summary: Spouse enjoys seeing me wear these

B0040UGC4Y.A3S7ABR03174XB.reviewText: It was cool at first.  It did get the attention of others, BUT after about a month or so, it stopped working.  Took it to a watch repair shop and the person working on the watch stated that the screws were locked and fearing damaging it, wouldn't even bother trying to open it.  For about three weeks I was stuck with a very expensive paperweight and rather than going through the hassle of trying to go through Amazon for a repair (odds are the company would just send a refurbished watch), I decided to look around for a repair shop.  Finally locating one, it took the watch repair person well over 1 hour attempting to take out the screws.  He had mentioned that who ever had installed the screws, didn't do it right, so finally being able to get the back of the watch opened up he changed out the battery.  It works!  Awesome, or so I thought.  After about another month or so, it died again.  This time around I'm not going to even bother trying to get it fixed.  Not worth it.  Maybe I got a bad watch but never again.

It was too big, so we had to take a couple of links out. Otherwise a really nice watch and worth every penny. This is the cheapest I found from all over the internet.

I was afraid this watch was too much black, but he loves black, and I decided to give it a try. When the watch arrived I was not dissapointed. It IS very black, but it's almost like a matte gunmetal militant look, which is totally my husband. It's a good looking watch. Can easily go from work to out on the town because it's just that versatile and can go with everything. It's not too flashy, but is actually cool enough to attract some attention.

I travel and conduct business in m ultiple time zones. This watch functions in three time zones simultainously and maintains it's accuracy.That's why I already owned one and was purchasing a second one for gift purposes.This was my initial Amazon purchase other than music downloaded to my tablet. B0040UOGRO.A2WMA5RMIQMZHO.reviewText: It's a big watch, but one that doesn't really look like it's bulky. I've worn it only for a short time, yet it's been complimented on by pretty much everyone who saw it. Although, the picture doesn't do it justice. The band is stainless steel silver metal, the dial is black with silver numbers - By the picture, I thought they were actually white.I would definetely recommend this watch to anyone, specially at this price. It's a quality piece which I guarantee you will like.Updated April 19, 2014:I've had the watch now for nearly a year, and have worn it practically every single day. I couldn't be more pleased with it. Despite the heavy use, there's only one very minor scratch, which was my fault. According to the atomic clock I check every now and then to keep my clocks working, it has not missed a single second in a year of use. That's pretty amazing for a $90 watch. Even after a year, I still get complimented on it, and I have to say, I am very pleased with it.Diesel have won a customer. I will definetely purchase more of their watches in the future. And again, I greatly recommend this piece. It is absolutely wonderful.

I've always liked Diesel watches and thought I'd take a shot on this stainless-steel beauty...I was not disappointed. The watch arrived as advertised, in a white Diesel box and pillow with instruction booklet. The DZ1370 looks fantastic, has a great feel/weight and large face. I can honestly say that I do not own a better watch in its price range....very well built!! I'm very impressed with Diesel and will be purchasing anther watch from them very soon!

I had to remove three links to better fit my wrist but it was only $77 at a jewelry store in my local mall.

B0040URQJE.A1WVZV4BESAJ3V.reviewText: This watch does not disappoint. The jet black color really does look better in person than it does in the amazon photo and the watch is pretty big. For reference I'm 6ft 6in tall with a strong build and it looks perfectly at home on my wrist. Is weighty and feels substantial, not cheap in the least and is really versatile; I've used it in both casual and semi formal occasions and it always turns heads and gets compliments. I'm really happy with this watch and I recommend it to anyone who wants a strong masculine looking wristband.
B0040URQJE.A1WVZV4BESAJ3V.summary: Classy with a touch of Rugged.

B0040URQJE.A1TZ9KLURGLEXA.reviewText: The watch is perfect for all types of dress. Whether I'm going out for a night with the boys, or just wearing jeans and a t-shirt, I'm always getting compliments from strangers.

B0040URQJE.A3GLNKRMY150LF.reviewText: My fiance is a huge collector of watches, so when searching for a present this was an incredible find.Now my fiance is VERY picky about watches, so if he says its a good find, its a good find. It is very durable, has a sleek look. The price really isn't that bad for the product that you get. It comes in a snazzy box with the instructions. I purchased this watch at Yonkers, and was able to get a guarantee that the battery can be replaced for at least two years. That was incredible because nearly half his watches have dead batteries.He uses this in country (Afghanistan) and it gets abused, but still works flawlessly. Of course, because it has links they can be adjusted to size, so keep that in mind.

B0040URQJE.A2JIO1OLZ4QZBW.reviewText: Really quick shipping. I had my local jeweler to resize it; took out 3 links for $6.I just wish it will last for a long time!I will update the review next month and tell you all how it is then.

B0040URRJS.A17QHBMM03XXD9.reviewText: Good, fun casual watch. It has a nice heft to it, and the design is rectilinear and very industrial. If you're looking for elegant understatement, you're probably not looking for a Diesel watch anyway. So, that being said, this watch is very Diesel. The three time zones are potentially useful, though I wouldn't take it on an expedition to the top of Everest. All I'm saying is it's a fashion watch, not a globe trotting bulletproof chronograph.Build quality seems solid and very tight. No funny seams or flaws to be seen. The adjuster stems are nice and solid feeling, though they're not the kind that screw shut, so it's definitely not a diver's watch. If you're looking for an interesting watch that's modern and not so expensive that you'd be afraid to wear it, give this one a try.One note, though: like many Diesel watches, this one is wide and thick. Smallish men may want to find it in a store to try it on before buying. An average-to-large-sized arm can accommodate this watch, but slender or small guys may want to try first.

B0040URRJS.AOUO4TQQHR1O9.reviewText: I am a chic who wears men watches and this is, by far, the best watch I have ever received! First, the price was reasonable and well worth it. The presentation of the packaging was excellent. It came in a collector's box with the watch on a pillow. A pillow! The watch itself is nice and heavy and definitely a conversation-starter! It is freaking HUGE on my wrist but I like it that way! I feel like there's a Transformer on my wrist that will animate in any moment! I like having the three time zone options and the indiglo light feature that I discovered on accident is most helpful. If you are reading this, stop your browsing and buy this watch. You will not be disappointed!

The analog part was not working at all. Don't know if it needed a new battery? but a customer should not receive a product with a dead battery if that is the case. Product had to be returned for a refund. As i mentioned before, Beautiful watch but the item should be inspected for full functionality before its shipped to the customer. Guess I will try another watch....Thank you...

B00472MHAS.A3Q3HEKKBZEV45.reviewText: The boot has a suggested retail price of $225.00.  Amazon has it for $180.00. Someone else compared the boot to Doc Martens. Now lets be real. I paid $66.00 for the boots and is questioning that. In fact, the money that I paid should be the suggested retail price. Yes I am aware of the brand name Diesel, and extension of Fossil, yaddie ya, ya. I own a pair of Fossil leather boots that I paid $79.00 for and they are of a much higher quality than these. The boots in all practical appearances seem rugged, (triple stitching, sole sewn to boot, etc.) The toe and heel are not sturdy, and flimsy at best. People let me tell you, NO LINING WHAT SO EVER. The leather outer doubles as the lining. The boot is reinforce with another material at the heel and toe, surely not leather and closer to cardboard. I only got one set of shoe strings. The padded collar, cloth material, is not soft, so you better have on some socks. This boot is great for looks only and will do fine in cool dry weather. Water proof; NOT! Defense against cold weather; NOT! Work boot related; NOT! PROFILING ONLY; yes. So just what did I pay for; you got it, the Diesel name. I have wore boots for almost 30 years, Guess, Doc Martens, The Timberland Boot Company, Aldo, Georgia Boot, Red Wing, etc., no comparison even remotely other than the fact, it falls into the boot category. Top notch Cambodian quality. China would have definitely been a better choice for outsourcing.So, from strictly a fashion stand point, I can work with them, but not for $180.00. Personally, these boots should be the free portion of a buy one get one free campaign of a half decent boot maker. Gave it two stars because of the price I paid and the Diesel logo is spelled right.
B00472MHAS.A3Q3HEKKBZEV45.summary: I call it as I see it.

B0047BWFHO.ACWOTHSWCPE7B.reviewText: Since I realized there is such a thing as style and that fashion wasn't complete hokum, I went out to find my personal style and was disappointed time and time again by what's out there. I was losing hope and considering making my own clothes when I discovered Diesel and was instantly taken back as if a revelation had hit me. I've never been disappointed with their merchandise and now they've given me another reason to buy again.The Loop On is very comfortable (comfort and style rarely go hand in hand), seems to built well, and feels more like a sports shoe wrapped in a pretty package. I appreciate the subtlety of the design, especially the small and unapparent Diesel logos (some other brands love to use you as a billboard). There are no laces as I initially thought, they are simulated elastic laces, so say goodbye to wasting time tying your shoes, there are more important things to do, like seduce various women with your awesome shoes. The materials are not waterproof but they seem to have a dust-repelling quality, which I appreciate since white shoes can turn into brown ones within a few hours of living in a rainy place like I do. I'm looking forward to another year of being superfly and it cost me less than a hundred bones. Thanks again, Diesel.

They did shrink a little in the wash, which in this case was a good thing. I haven't had them very long but they so I can't comment on longevity, but they seem decent enough.

B0047ZFWT8.A2SIKWV4B086GA.reviewText: These socks are ok, except a size medium is big (I wear a 7.5-8). So unless you are 8.5+, a medium would be too big for your feet.

B00485D0VY.A2K3D4H7FEM2GG.reviewText: I love these more than anything, well-worth the [...] I'd paid. They are very thin but seem to be durable. They fit great and dont ride up at all. I love the color schemes (I have blak w/pink trim, lt blue w/pink trim), I just wish they'd remember not everyone is a California size zero. Seriously...their XL is only a size SIX! I had to return medium, then large, and XL is still a little snug after washing.
B00485D0VY.A2K3D4H7FEM2GG.summary: XL is actually an American 6 for Diesel panties.

B0049SPEKA.A303W7G5PZ32GR.reviewText: Nothing feels better than new socks and chonies (that's what we call underwear in our house). But absolutely NOTHING feels better to my husband than a fresh pair of DIESEL chonies! He is in LOVE with the fit (fitted, but not tight), the rise (low rise), the width of the band (doesn't roll) and the length of the leg (long enough to prevent chaffing, but not so long it's uncomfortable). In his eyes, these are THE chonies!

B0049ZNEK0.A3O5C6IPCN54M8.reviewText: Soft leather, nice color, nice fit. I live in a caribean hot place, sometimes it's 36C outside and they feel great. I used to wear some Adidas to go to work and they got really hot by noon, I don't feel that with this new ones.

B0049ZNEK0.A3EWUT021YJ9YH.reviewText: THIS PRODUCT IS UP TO THE STANDARD OF DIESEL. GREAT QUALITY AND VERY COMFORTABLE. I DIDN'T GIVE IT 5 STARS BECAUSE I FELT THE ARE SOMEWHAT A LITTLE BIG LARGER THAN OTHERS DIESES I PURCHASED OF THE SAME SIZE (10.5)

B0049ZNEK0.A2Q2TLXR4IPQ49.reviewText: they are very comfortable  and seem to be very well made but the upper leather is very different from one pair to other, the left pair is made out of a much softer leather then the right, next to each other right looks brand new left looks like it has been worn a while, even though its brand new

B004AM65XA.A1LDUGQP0BWGNQ.reviewText: The shirt is very appropriate for me the size of the cloth is also good, and consistent picture of the washing effect, that is, for me some clothes long to short point like, perfect, crop cultivation,buttons jade buckle, place of origin is China, a little depressed, or like the Indian middle-class or other origin

B004B8XY8W.A12BJ8D2UKWVPE.reviewText: I'm not a fan of huge watches but in this case it is so well designed that I like the look of it. I have a collection of watches and this clearly stands out as the most different but in a good way. It has strong bold lines and is fun to wear. The one problem is that it can be hard to read at times and using the back light becomes necessary. You also need shirt sleeves that fit loosely at the wrist so that they can go over the watch.

B004B95LKU.A3636OYLMR8SZV.reviewText: If you are into watches, Diesel offers this amazing hybrid! every time I wear a Diesel Watch people stop me to ask me where I got it from. :)

B004B95LKU.A3MHOO4QXT6W6R.reviewText: Wow, did I underestimate how freaking large and heavy this watch was. The display format is really cool, but dear god... The thing is massive... and feels like a cheap Timex.

B004BQUB80.A3ATMDY4031Q0X.reviewText: These are my first pair of Diesel shoes ever. I was glad to see the color I wanted (white/silver birch) at a reasonable price, since I'd never purchase shoes for over $70 just because they're fashionable. The shoes are soft and more comfortable than I expected and I wear these shoes mostly on the weekends. On a few occasions I also wore them while traveling for a few days and sometimes I'll have them on while riding my bike. I've had these shoes since August 2013, and so far they've held up pretty well. Since this shoe is made of mostly leather, it does require some effort to keep them clean from all of the dirt that will inevitably stick onto it. With weekly maintenance (using a leather cleaner), my shoes still look pristine and sharp. As long as the shoes will last through my normal wear and tear routine, I'll probably consider getting another pair of Diesel shoes in the future.

B004BQUB80.A2SN9AEHD08XMQ.reviewText: You get what you pay for. Don't be fooled, take a closer look. Looks like a knockoff esp the silver ones (selling for dirty five, no way).

B004BQUB80.A1GFMXKO8FKJ8O.reviewText: Compré estos zapatos hace 10 días y llegaron perfectos, la talla es la que corresponde, y los zapatos llegaron impecables, excelente terminación, como es común en los zapatos Diesel, la suela es muy angosta, pero ya estoy acostumbrado a ese tipo de zapatos, en general, le doy 4 estrellas.

B004BQUB80.A2E0KVPZGJ0VYI.reviewText: I love these shoes. I have bought 6 pairs so far.  They dont seem to last as long as other sneakers ive owned.  And they do tend to show it more with the lighter colors. (as with any shoe).  But the style and appearance are unmatched.  I like these shoes so much i could just sit and stare at them haha.  Like another reviewer stated the price range varies ive paid $70 - $120.

B004BQUB80.A2V6X3PG1LITEM.reviewText: Wore it twice during the evenings. The shoes are not tearing up at the seams for me yet. But I can see a blue outline at the edge of the leather. As you can see at the picture above that should not be the case. I really like the look of the shoes but the quality is not worth spending $80 or above. I suggest you check out adidas slvr instead, the are having a sale.

B004BQUB80.A1G7N44Q91UTIL.reviewText: It started tearing at the seams on me... I have a bigger foot, but not exaggerated...I returned them for a full refund.. Nice looking product, just not a fan of the quality

B004BQUB80.A1ESN82XWMICPU.reviewText: The shoes look great and fit perfectly.  These are such nice shoes and go with any style!  Would recommend to anyone!

B004BQUB80.A3R4794K2RVU1S.reviewText: The style on the Korbin fashion sneakers is very sharp. There are many exquisite, fine details and precise cuts. Different angles, materials, and contrasting colors all mesh for a unique, stylish sneaker.The fit is perfect. Not too tight and not too rounded on the toe. The shoe has a long, sleek look.The price is upwards to a $100 but a good deal could be found for $70 - $80. I found my pair on eBay.Highly recommended fashion sneaker!

B004BQUB80.AHLLJRQAD1TO6.reviewText: I love this shoe. It is light fits great on average width feet and are very comfortable from the start. There was no "break in period". The only thing that would have given it 5 stars is better arch support that some of the similar style diesel shoes have. Other than that love it.

B004BQUB80.A3HS6HO7Y5PDSZ.reviewText: I just received my sneakers today. I love them! Very lightweight and comfortable to wear. Diesel continues to be one of my favorite brands. Always fashionable, quality products.

B004BQUB80.A25S5JNCRWS5HY.reviewText: Son buenisimos personalmente los recomiendo, los zapatos son tal cual se ven en la imagen y son de muy buena calidad.

B004BQUB80.A3L3HLH2U0ZP6C.reviewText: I owned a pair of these before as my everyday shoes.  They are incredibly comfortable like a sneaker, but look nice enough that you usually don't have problems with places with dresscodes.Well worth it.

B004BQUB80.ANEVAXDS9LG65.reviewText: These sneakers were lost in shipping but I bought a black colored version of these and they were very comfortable. They lasted me almost two years without even wearing them down like crazy . In fact I loved them so much I wanted the same shoes in a different color just for a change, I was reimbursed for the item by Amazon and ended up buying other sneakers localy.

B004BQUB80.A1LGR0OEC13FAY.reviewText: fits perfect, my son stay happy with these shoes are of good quality and presentation, I recommend to casual apparel

B004BQUB80.A2P0TH9853TE8O.reviewText: This was a gift for my husband and he loves them and wears them all the time. highly recommend ..Thank You!

B004BQUB80.A2LM6ZUG2BE4L4.reviewText: This shoes look great and the material/stitching has lasted me a while. However, on my other pair, since the sole is so narrow, my left heel would slide to the right while walking (and I walk a lot). It was so bad that I decided to get new shoes.I purchased another pair of these to see if I got a bad pair and a pair of Sketchers. The Sketchers are not as stylish and the material isn't as soft (and the stitching is bound to break after about 6 months), but the heel is wider and it feels much more better. The second set of Korbins I got (the pair I am reviewing here) seem better. However, the sole is still a bit narrow and it would be awesome if they made them slightly wider.I do not have to wear wide sizes on any shoes that I own and have never had this issue with any others. These fashion shoes have narrow soles. It's mainly my heel that I can feel it on, but I can also feel it on the balls of my feet.I'd recommend these shoes, but make sure you try them out at home plenty before committing to them.
B004BQUB80.A2LM6ZUG2BE4L4.summary: Great looking shoes--soles could be a bit wider

B004BQUB80.AA1QYUE47CYT.reviewText: The quality was very poor with frayed edges on the leather surround and poor stitching on one of the shoes  - would not accept if It was a shoe in a store.

B004BQUB80.ACKWW07BWOLLB.reviewText: Got these for my boyfriend, he has a hard time buying shoes because he claims he has 'skis' for feet.  They are very long and flat so he doesn't like arch support in his shoes at all.  He loved these shoes, they fit him perfect.  We even bought a second pair of the same ones when these got dirty.

B004BQUB80.A3QNX5KWHDV0GD.reviewText: At size 12 , I often have trouble finding shoes that look as good in my size as they do in the pictures. These are one example. They are nice and soft and comfortable. And I think they are particularly attractive. I hate shoes with turned up toes, or thick soles. These have neither.I can't comment on whether they are a good value. I haven't worn them enough to tell if they'll hold up. I also paid quite a bit less than the current $100 price, but a few years ago I wouldn't be caught dead paying more tha forty dollars for any footwear. I guess any nice sneakers will cost that much, despie the fact that most of that is profit, and mediocre quality is a given.I am quite pleased with this purchase.

B004BQUB80.A2JQOGSVNMT7YK.reviewText: Loved my original Korbins, these are nice too.

B004BQUB80.AV308I8SF9K3G.reviewText: Great shoes!  Positive comments everywhere I go.  Very comfortable fit.  Tend to get scuffed up in front a bit but still look great.

B004BQUB80.AFL2ML77ZTB1O.reviewText: I had another pair of these prior to ordering this pair and I've gotta say both pairs were very comfortable and easy to clean.  I'm not a runner, but for general use these are great.  The only drawback is that the soles are quite thin, so they don't last forever, and the sole near the toe starts to peel back after about a year of heavy wearing.  The laces have metal tips that can become a little noisy while walking if you're in a low volume area. I'd recommend to anyone for general use or around the office.

B004BQUB80.ASMDAZHBO7MMS.reviewText: I got this pair of sneakers for my husband as his B-Day present.  He absolutely loves them.  He thought the shoes may not be wide enough in the front but it turns out to be true to size and fits comfortably.  He has been looking for a new pair of casual fashion sneakers since Steve Madden no longer carries the old style he liked so much.  He has gotten the Puma Squash 2000 (off white), Adidas Samba Classic, and Adidas Gazelle (a bit narrow in the front) but this pair beats them all.

B004BQUCPW.A26USWZFF5V3T6.reviewText: These shoes have a slightly higher profile than what I'm used to, but I suppose that's to be expected from an activewear shoe. When there is a brisk breeze these shoes don't have much more coverage than a sandal.Other than that they fit comfortably and they're holding up well. I can tell they'll be tough to keep clean though, the color and material are dirt and stain magnets.

B004BQVRP6.ARZID7BU7F3TR.reviewText: They were bought for my mom as a gift.She is thrilled and that can not be put into scale.

The back of the shoe also cuts into my skin so much so that it swelled up a bit and i could only wear them for a few hours the first time.  I don't think its worth $95 but if you can get them on sale then i would def recommend.

Also the leather is really nice and soft, not cheap at all, these are great shoes and look great!

B004BROEMS.AEUWW0UIBS0B4.reviewText: Very nice product.i am satisfied and happy with this purchase . Price was very cheap and the quality was 5 star.

B004C5SD58.AG0LBH0P030U7.reviewText: This is a very sharp watch and the quality matches the price, I would recommend this watch.  This is also a medium sizes diesel so it can be worn in many settings.

B004C5U5FY.A12DNIQUB6U9YO.reviewText: Diesel has some pretty unique watches, and this is one that I really has some design elements that stand out.  I was looking for something thoroughly modern, so this digital display really separates itself from many of the others in their SBA line.  It's sleek, technical and stylish.  It's big and the case is quite heavy, and the band narrows toward the clasp so the overall weight tends to be out of balance a bit.  Still, the look is amazing and is perfect for what I wanted...actually better than expected.  Very high quality watch with a great look.  Lots of comments when people see it.  Great watch at a great price.

B004C5W96M.A3I3H76GXNXAL7.reviewText: Had to return this item. Numerals actually dropped off face.  Never seen this happen even in a cheap watch. Amazon gave an instant refund to purchase again as this was a gift.

B004C5W9D0.A2FL0CGXE34Z5N.reviewText: I bought this as a nice, going out watch.  I like the build quality and the band especially.Pros:- color is nice (purple and black)- easy to set- quality feel to itCons:- Hard to tell the time before 3 PM (no dashes)- impossible to see in the dark- band is rather large, I have normal size wrists and I'm two up from the bottomOverall I'm not disappointed but do an image search online so you can see what you're getting

B004JF56QU.A15T7OICUPDI6.reviewText: This dress is very representative of Diesel's style...edgy, unique and contemporary.  It fits true to size (I am 5'2 between 110-115 pounds, ordered a size XS, which is still a smidget big but fits fine), but if you are short like me it will appear longer than what's pictured on the model.  I took 1 star off because the back didn't sit against my body as nicely as it looked on the model...the big keyhole on the back was a little slouchy on me.  I think this is because the dress itself fits loosely on me, plus with my height, the back part scrunches up.  Not a big deal except I definitely need to wear a tank or tube top inside to cover up the bra strap.  Otherwise, it looks great with nude pumps!

My only real complaint with this watch is that the leather feels very cheap, and I expect to have to replace it in the not-so-distant future... However, my rating does not reflect this, as I intend to use this watch more as a nice time-telling bracelet. ;)

B004JW0DMK.AASCRQ29RBAV1.reviewText: Just bought it at Macy's. Funny story. Ive had my eye on a few of those big, Invicta chronographs. And was close to buying one on line, before I decided it would be best to just buy one in a store. So,  I go to a mall near me...go to the watch retailer...and I dont see any Invictas. Matter of fact, they have every damn kind of watch BUT the Invictas. Im a HUGE fan of the HUGE chronograph, and there are several of different brands that I dig.I tell the guy what kind of watch Im looking for and in a milli second, he spins this case around, with all of these Diesels in it. Many, if not most of them, are showcased here on this site. Immediately, I see this 'black on black' chronograph, and I knew I couldnt leave the store without getting it.I put the thing on and it felt like someone strapping a brick to my wrist...and I fell in love with it, right there on the spot. I was fawning over the thing so bad, the guy literally gives me another Diesel that a guy had dropped on the floor, right before I approached the seller!!!!...it was a HUGE white chronograph!!!..exactly like the black one, here. Anyone could see the scratch and very slight dent in it on the side, only if they held up right to their eyeball. Otherwise, from a distance, there was no way anyone could see it. So, I bought the black one and this guy gives me the other one for free!!...I COULD NOT BELIEVE WHAT WAS HAPPENING!!So, I must be living right, because Ive never had that kind of luck....for a VERY fleeting moment, I almost refused it, when the guy offered it, but couldnt bring myself to do it. I love this watch, and I would recommend it to those who love huge-faced watches, with an edge. This watch is about as edgy as it gets in the time piece world, dude.
B004JW0DMK.AASCRQ29RBAV1.summary: cant argue with the quality of the thing...

B004JW0DMK.A1E4QYPGBPK3G5.reviewText: I'm a really big fan of TW Steel (TW Steel Men's TW821 Canteen Black Dial Watch) watches, and I get a lot of comments - usually positive - on how big mine is (at 50mm). However . . . it isn't even in the same league as this Diesel. This is a really gigantic watch, 65mm (literally more than 2.5 inches for those who are unfamiliar with the metric system). Any bigger, and the strap wouldn't fit because it would be wider than my wrist. The TW Steel watch is a bit heavier and more solid than this one, although this one *looks* every bit as solid. This one is signficantly less expensive if you were to look at both in a watch store (I noticed Amazon has some pretty good deals on TW Steel right now).While it *does* have 4 different time zones (one is digital), I only use two of them. It also has a fifth clock which is hour-only that shows military time for the main clock (also helpful to tell how to set it so the date changes at midnight). The main draw for me was the size and the look.Considering all of the dials on the screen, it is painfully easy to set. There is an old-fashioned pull-knob for each of the 3 analog dials, two buttons for the digital clock and two buttons for the stopwatch (yes, this makes a total of four buttons and 3 knobs). Each button or knob is right next to the particular dial you need, so it is very intuitive.I only have two complaints, both of which are extremely minor. One, while not a wildly expensive watch . . . I don't think that it would be THAT difficult for Diesel to put a manual for the specific watch in the box. It has the 400-page all-in-one manual. However the watch is SO easy to use I can't imagine why you'd even need the manual. The second complaint is that it doesn't have a light. Again, extremely minor . . . but since it has a digital clock on it I would think that there would be a light for it. I don't expect one for the analog sections. :)I technically have a third complaint, although it is my own fault. I just thought that I'd throw it in here in case it might influence your color scheme choice. The black watch with black everything (which is my kind of style) *is* a bit hard to read in a lot of lighting situations. The background is matte and the hands are shiny, so in direct light it is easy to see.Scott

B004LFYW54.A2FARGJ27YB6HB.reviewText: I already owned the blue thermal watch before purchasing the green one, so I was shocked to find that the green only turned yellow with heat. Quite the opposite effect from the blue thermal watch, which only changes color and turns purple when it's cold.  It's a pretty cool watch to own because the color changes so dramatically as if having two watches. I think people in wintery areas will best benefit from the blue watch, while people in tropical areas will see more transition between colors with the green watch. As far as the pink thermal watch goes, I have no idea unfortunately. Just don't expect a complete transition of color. . . When I wear mine, the color changes are always only partial because of the uneven exposure to varied temperatures.

From hitting things (foliage, desk corners) when I walk.Living in a hot tropical climate, the watch stayed yellow indefinitely in places that rested on my skin after two months.I still wear my watch after two years, but the yellow does look dirty. B004LFYW86.APJZU9KDBOIHN.reviewText: If you're looking at this watch and considering the purchase, then you're probably looking for something that's fairly fashionable and maybe with some European styling (it is square instead of round.) Let me say this - if there's a watch that would have been appropriate for the movie The Matrix, this might have been it. (If you don't like The Matrix, don't despair.)This watch is somewhat modern with its digital readout, but classy with its clean lines and leather band. It is a combination of vintage and contemporary. If you're looking for something that will go well with dark colored clothing, especially long-sleeved apparel, this might be it.The watch is fairly large, but when compared to something like the Diesel DZ7125, it doesn't feel large on your wrist. This has to do with the square shape - it runs the length of your forearm versus taking up a large space right next to your hand. It's not heavy - most of the time, you won't realize you're wearing it.The digital readout is difficult to read when the watch is at angle, but if you're holding the watch squarely to check the time, you won't have any trouble.The manual that comes with the watch is huge and it covers a number of Diesel watches and is in a variety of languages. While consolidation is good for Diesel when it comes to user assistance, the users are paying a bit of a price trying to hunt through the manual to find the right model and even then the instructions are pretty sparse. (With some time and patience, you'll be able to figure out how to set the time, alarm, and date.)I own a large watch "collection", and this is my second Diesel, so I have a bit of experience when it comes to watches. I knew right away that this watch was exactly what I needed to go along with stylish (or trendy) clothes. This watch will garner a lot of attention, so be prepared.
B004LFYW86.APJZU9KDBOIHN.summary: Classy, retro, big all in a single package

B004LHA0CG.AZ6EE36C8AZU8.reviewText: I have three Diesel watches and I love each of them.  The quality is on par with watches costing 3-4 times as much and they are all unique and very attractive.  It's a heavy watch, which I like and has a fairly large face, also to my liking.  This watch is good for wearing to the movies with the kids or wearing out for an expensive dinner date.  The black ion coating on this watch has held up nicely so far and I've gotten compliments on it's looks.  The reason for the four star vs. five star review is it lacks a date function.  Yeah, I knew that when I bought it, but still it would be nice to have.  Also, the additional hash marks and green hashes are just for looks.  It's basically just an plain analog watch in a nice looking case.  It does have illumination, which is actually not that common for an analog watch.  It has two red LEDs at the top and bottom that light up the watch.  Looks-wise, it's a very cool light.  It's just adequte for seeing the watch in the dark though.  It gets the job done, but you still have to strain a bit to make out the hands.  All-in-all, very attractive, high-quality watch with one so-so feature.

B004MUOMIU.A188MLMMTEAJQF.reviewText: I asked for this as a gift because of the styling.On arrival, two of the three dials were not working.I was getting ready to return it, but I decided to read some other reviews first.I discovered that each of the clocks is a separate unit with a separate battery.Since there was no enabling strip to activate the units, they were all running all the time and the batteries must have run down prior to purchase.I had one battery on hand which got the LCD working, but I ended up having to spend $8 to order batteries for the smallest dial.Removing and replacing this battery is very difficult, requiring magnifiers and fine tweezers.  I have not yet received the replacement battery.I plan to keep the watch, but I would not have ordered it for the price if I knew it was a collection of three cheap units in a single case.
B004MUOMIU.A188MLMMTEAJQF.summary: Distinctive Style - Not a great value

B004PVT8KS.A1FF4TYK2JE7NI.reviewText: - This is a great shirt, the styling is fantastic in a way that Diesel is particularly good and pulling off. Sadly this little issue meant the return of several shirts before finally getting one that worked.- In the end it is a great shirt - once you get a size that fits.

I shipped it back without difficulty and changed to the 2x which still fits a little snug but is much better overall.

B004T99NR4.A33VC0ONEJS38W.reviewText: Diesel makes a cool, funky watch.  This one takes it a step further with a glow in the dark band.  I love wearing this at Disneyland while on attractions.  Many of them have portions where it's pitch black.  It's really cool to see a watch seeming to float in the air.  I have a number of Fossil/Diesel watches, but this is one of my favorites.

B004T99NR4.A1XBXX8L5E72K2.reviewText: I purchased this watch as a novelty item, because it advertised that the band glowed in the dark.  When the watch arrived, I was surprised at the quality of the watch itself.  The detail on the face of the watch in contrast with the simplicity of the watch band makes for an interesting look.  The square shape stands out from the traditional round shape of most watches.  It is a big watch, but it fits me very well and I am not a big person.  Then there is the band.  WOW, it glows.  I forgot about it over the weekend and we went to the movies.  The band glowed the entire time we were there.  I have many items that glow in the dark, but this band put GLOW in the word glow!  I have had more people ask me about this watch not only in the dark, as a matter of fact,  most of the comments I have received are in daylight when the watch band is not doing it's thing.  White is kiind of an in color right now and it looks like an upscale black and white watch, but with a surprise.  That glow in the dark band.  The brightest glow in the dark product I have ever seen.  This novelty watch is quickly becoming my favorite watch!  I have not taken it off since it arrived.  LOVE IT!  This watch gets a 5 star plus rating from me.  It looks better in person than it does in the picture and the strap is almost white, not light green.  WOW! I am so glad I decided to get this watch.  Thanks Amazon and Diesel for this F U N watch!

B004TREJUW.APH5FNOADM1N4.reviewText: The watch arrived as planned. Opened the box and found that 1 battery was dead (the watch takes 3 batteries). Next, the wristband is a men's standard and did not fit (I am 6'4" and 320 pounds). So I have to decide, send it back or fix it. I took it apart and put a new battery in the LCD watch. Then I bought a men's extra long watch band on put it on. Now I can wear the watch!  It does look impressive and I have had several compliments on it. I am disappointed that it is a 5bar but says you cannot wear it swimming.  That is one of the reasons I bought it - so no swimming with it. So 3 disappointments right out of the box. I still think I will keep it because it looks good and has 3 time settings (one is military on the dial). Overall  I give it 4 stars because of the problems.  Otherwise this would be a 5 star watch.Update: I am returning the watch. The more I thought about it, 3 problems out of the box is too much for $150+ watch (1 of the problems is not a problem with the watch, the band is just to small - a mens regular). I would expect it to be perfect for that amount of money. I still think it is a very nice watch.

B004V3HKTQ.A225L51XNAJG5S.reviewText: I bought my boyfriend 3 pairs of shoes for Christmas. When he put these on he immediately commented on how comfortable they were. B004V3HKTQ.A2ZYGBNZK8JBBJ.reviewText: My first diesel shoe. I got these for Christmas along with a few other pair. These are nice and a little dressy, which I like. They are comfortable and slip on with ease but show a little class. No complaints, I think the toe shows a little speck of white glue which I always notice when I'm already out the door and can put a sharpie on it to black it out.

B004V3HKTQ.A2FZHCA7LYG5Z5.reviewText: I've been a huge fan of Diesel Jeans and shoes for about 10 years. In those 10 years I mostly purchased Diesel jeans and could only find a few pairs of shoes that I really enjoyed. However over the last 2 years, I've seen Diesel shoes return to the style that made me like them originally.The Diesel Eagle Loop On Athlesure (White) shoes fit exact to size for me (US 11) and are extremely comfortable. The inside padding is thick, and has an almost pillow like quality surrounding the heel, arch and inner sides, making the shoe a very snug (in a good way) fit. I have ample toe room so if I'm sitting or driving for a prolonged period of time, I can wiggle my toes and even "stretch" them if they get tired. While I have room to move my toes, its not because the shoe is too big, it is truly one of the only brand of shoes that actually fit true to size for me, the other brand being Dr. Martens.The style of the shoe is exactly what I like in a casual, designer shoe. The shoe is designed with sharp angled stitching and soles that complement the soft rounded silhouette/shape of the whole shoe. They go great with a pair of Dark or Light Jeans, cargo shorts/pants. One of the great features of this shoe, and some other newer Diesel's are the honeycomb tread. It looks great and it actually is very comfortable/safe when driving a manual car. I bring driving up because where I live, the winters can be extremely snowy and icy, and other pairs of casual shoes I have are a little sketchy if they get wet and I start driving making me come to the point of being worried about my foot slipping off the pedals, but not with these.I would like to say this is my favorite pair of shoes, but every month I get a new pair of Diesel's and I keep being surprised at the quality and style of the newest pair I get, which is hardly a problem!Not only are these affordable, but they look great, feel great and get compliments almost every time I slip them on! A+++
B004V3HKTQ.A2FZHCA7LYG5Z5.summary: A sports car for your feet!

B004V3HKTQ.AS4LJZ4TM8G33.reviewText: I purchased this shoe because I was looking for a classy, but casual black shoe.  This shoe gives me exactly that.Since receiving these shoes a week ago, I have worn them every day. I enjoy the slip-on function of the shoe - my foot stays secure while in the shoe, but I can put them on and take them off with ease.  Inside the shoe, the interior sole (part that your foot rests upon) is extremely comfortable.  It is made of a soft (what looks and feels like) silicone rubber and is covered with high quality cloth.  The shoe is very well cushioned.I have to say that this is my first pair of Diesel shoes, but it certainly will not be my last!

B004W1HPIS.A5YF1OK4F8M5R.reviewText: I've had these a little over a year and they have held up well. Diesel has many of these sneaker/dress shoe hybrids, and this "Eagle Loop" version is one of the cheapest. As of April 2013 I've owned:Diesel Men's Excurse Athlesure (bought in 2009, trashed in 2012)Diesel Men's Eagle Loop (bought in 2011, still wear)Diesel Men's Korbin II Sneaker (bought in 2012, still wear)All three of these are good with jeans or business casual. The material used in the Excurse and Korbin II may be better quality, but in my opinion doesn't look any better.The main downside to the Eagle Loop is that they are not as breathable. In the summer they can't be worn many days in a row without starting to smell (that's true with any shoe, but the Korbin's breathe better). The Eagle Loop's also had a squeak on every step that lasted for a couple months after I got them but it eventually went away.Overall because the style is just as good as the versions that cost 2x or 3x the price, the Eagle Loop is probably better value.

B004Z2DCW2.A13C6Q6LWGT5ZM.reviewText: I received this watch December 2012 and am writing this review June 2012. I have worn it almost daily for 6 months. As such, it has incurred some serious wear and tear as well as what most people would call abuse. The watch has broken on me twice, once when the band broke unexpectedly and once when I was swimming with it and the largest dial broke off and the face filled with water. I purchased through Nordstrom and each time they have replaced the watch free of charge. I am fairly sure that the manufacturers warranty would also have covered this, but no way it would have been as easy as simply walking into a Nordstrom and changing it out. Each time I went for a new one I was given the option of getting a different watch and I spent a great deal of time trying on several other Diesel models. Each time I chose to stick with the DZ4207. The face is also available for slightly less with a leather band that doesn't require the watch to be sized. I prefer the stainless steel linked band, but that's personal preference.Yes, the watch is BIG. It is definitely a good idea to try it on in person before purchasing. I have somewhat small wrists and the watch face takes up my entire wrist. Nevertheless, it grows on you. Some people ask if it is heavy, but after a minute of having it on I don't notice the weight.All in all, great watch. I love it. And special thanks to Nordstrom's customer service (granted, it is another $100 to buy from there, but that has more than paid for itself.)
