B004Z2DCZY.ADG33WELAQRZJ.reviewText: This hulk of a watch puts most other similarly-sized ones to shame. Others are of crappy quality or are obscenely priced or mega-uncomfortable. I picked the raw steel (silver) with a black face because a)it's a classic b)doesn't have any plating to be scuffed off by friction, time or scratches -just pure stainless steel all over-and it's the cheapest of their line to boot !! I weighed it and it's 235 grs with all the links before resizing the band, which has the diameter to fit the paw of an elephant.Case and bracelet are extremely well machined, matter of fact this is THE best bracelet I've ever had on a watch, and I've had a lot !! Not only are the links extremely thick but smooth to the touch making the band extremely comfy to wear. The clasp has a single spring-loaded lock system and no security lock but clicks firmly in place and feels durable.Now to the watch itself : the design of the case is stunning; it's the only one in the market that can be worn on a 6 3/4  wrist like mine with no overhang of the lugs (yes I tried it at the mall first). Matter of fact the lugs are very short and curve down but very little away from the case for this purpose. Diameter is 50 mm (not 51-52 as advertised) but lug to lug it's just 55 so it will fit most wrists. Word of caution : on wide wrists the lugs may sit and dig on the flesh resulting in discomfort since they end below the line of the caseback. To my pleasant surprise the bezel is not only rotatable but unidirectional with a 120-click ratchet system as oppossed to fixed like stated on the description. The caseback is engraved with the Diesel mohawhk logo in big size.The watch features a functional chronograph in that it can measure laps of time, but the markings on the subdials are too many and lack a logical arrangement, which paired to the tiny size of the dials render the chrono function very difficult and impractical. On such a big-faced timepiece this is paradoxical to say the least. A minor annoyance to me since most of us buy these watches for the looks alone. I've had it for just a couple of days and it has stayed on the second. Bad quality movements may exhibit appreciable variations within just 24 hs. My wish is that it's equipped with a Miyota movement but in most cases the backcase would boast japanese movementon the backcase in capitals so I guess it just has a good chinese movement which aren't bad nowadays.The chrono buttons have a precise and firm engagement action with an audible click and the crown has the most precise operation I've seen on an analog quartz; minutes needle don't move when it's pressed in . I managed to set the time PERFECTLY at the very first try. Upper 24 hs subdial keeps in synch with the hour needle -displaying 24 hs. or military time if you call it that way- and has no relation to the stopwatch noror can be used as a GMT needle which would have been a nice touch. Lower subdial accumulates up to 60 secs and on the left dial minutes up to 30 are displayed. No date which is a bummer especially when the crown has a dead  fist click out position that is typically for date adjustment so the movement is one with date but sorry no date window.CAUTION : 50M is not waterproof, do not wear this watch while swimming. Do not shower or bathe with it or it will fill up with water to the brim. The manual states the fact clearly.get a 100M/10 Bar watch if you need to immerse it in water and have it resealed/repressured every two years.Granted this watch seems as if it were built for the Hulk but it wouldn't look out of place on Bruce Banner ;-)

B004Z2DCZY.A3FBIG0APYAU9D.reviewText: Received this as a Christmas gift and couldn't be happier. This watch is a behemoth, which is typical of most watches in Diesel's product line. It is a watch that demands attention and rest assured, you will get it while wearing this watch. When I unboxed it, my jaw dropped at the sheer size. Diesel and Nixon are the reigning champs of the oversized watch industry, and this model is no exception. The color combination of brown leather and gunmetal colored steel really works well with this timepiece. The numerals on the face are a dark gray which provides a good contrast. Be aware that this watch is difficult to read in low light conditions, especially since the hands have no illumination. The ends of the hands have silver paint though, so that helps a good bit. This is a great casual watch that would look great with jeans, khakis, or other sport/casual wear but it is definitely not a dress watch. There is a functional chronograph as well, which is an added bonus for functionality. So far, I absolutely love this watch and it is already one of the favorites in my collection of watches, which now stands at 16 LOL. If you want a watch that demands respect, attention, and probably some jealousy, do not hesitate. Get this watch! I guarantee you won't regret it.

B0051BOMGG.A21L0WF0LDXELD.reviewText: I'm a larger, more muscled individual with a large frame (wrist diameter is 7.6") than the general populace.  Watch is fantastic, very versatile and clean look, easy to set without instructions if you are of [at least] average intelligence.Only downsides are the obviously large face (more surface area susceptible to scratching) and with all links and minor adjustments "maxed out", I still wish it had about another mm or two more slack (for those with larger wrists than I);  but for me,  it's bang on when maxed out.  Only other perceivable downside I can see is some "watch on skin sticking" is due to the large surface area of the case paired with situations where one may sweat (or in very humid environments).

B0051BOMGG.A11K49B1BCK94C.reviewText: So far so good. This watch is huge, just as I had expected it to be. Have wore it for about 50 min and that's the reason it gets 4 stars. I have not had it long enough to give it 5. The service was great from WatchInGo and great delivery time. Now, as for the watch itself, it has a glow in dark function available so it glows automatically at dark, the time zones are perfect since i'm a frequent traveler. I especially love Time 2 which is a digital 24 Hour time display. You will have some trouble changing the time in Time 2 in the beginning because you have to hold the side button for a few secs. Other than that, the watch is great.

The funny (ironic) thing is that in spite of the size of the actual watch face, the various dials are sized pretty small; even an average-sized watch would have a larger face than the biggest one. That said, the watch is still read-able. Lamentably, as others have commented, no nighttime light.I say buy this sucker and you will be glad you did! B0051D3E40.A3JG2GE24M7M8A.reviewText: Normally I would hesitate to spend this much money on a pair of pants.  However, I happened to nab these on Amazon at a significant discount, so I thought I'd give them a try.I'll admit, I'm a little finicky about the pants I buy.  I probably try on about twenty pairs of jeans for every pair I purchase.  Since I walk a lot and ride a bike around town a lot, I want the pants I buy to be made well and to fit well so they'll last.  I also want them to look good, but not overly trendy.  So if I find a pair I that fits the bill, I purchase them, and I wear them until they're completely worn out.Having had these for about 7 months, and worn them quite a bit, I have concluded that these might be the best jeans I've ever bought.  They are extremely comfortable, although they have to be worn and washed a few times to get that way (although, really, that's generally true of any pair of jeans).  I cannot over-emphasize how comfortable they are.  They fit perfectly, not too tight, not too loose, no bunching, and no chafing.  I've walked plenty of miles in them with no discomfort at all.They also feel light and breathable, but somehow they're still very sturdy.  I've had other jeans that were very comfortable, but wore out very quickly.  Not these - somehow they're comfortable but still very tough and durable.  Having worn and washed these probably something like 100 times (yes, I wear them all the time) in the past seven months, they still look factory new - no signs of wear, no loose threads or seams, no rips or snags, no problems at all. I have no doubt I'll be wearing these for years, and I'll be sad when they finally kick the bucket.  However, that looks to be quite a while in the future.As for stylishness, I'll be honest, I don't care for really flashy, super-trendy jeans. Yes, these are designer jeans, but they look fairly conservative, which suits my taste.  I prefer understated quality to avant-guard in the style department.In summary, these jeans are as close to perfect as anything I've bought.  I only wish I'd ordered four more pairs of them while the price was low.  Still, knowing what I know now, I'd buy them again at full price.  In fact, I may go ahead and order more anyway while they're still available for when these eventually wear out.

B0051D3FTY.A3DANLZDS1L6WC.reviewText: These are my least favorite pair of Diesel jeans.  And they're still 5 stars.  I thought my other jeans sat low on the waist, but these sit even lower - belt required!  They look good, wash well, and are built like Wranglers or Carharts, sans ugliness.  And with Amazon I only paid like $90.

B0051QGCIW.AQ38G3RRXHKYN.reviewText: I was skeptical of buying this product from another company besides Diesel. However, I received the product and was highly pleased. The product matches the description and was brand new. No scratches and runs perfectly. I received my order in a white Diesel box with the watch strapped to a small pillow. This was a gift for my boyfriend and he LOVES it. I would recommend highly because it's cheap and great condition.

B0051QGCIW.AIJ6YEARV564X.reviewText: I'm just starting to get into watch collecting and really needed one that I can wear casually but still convey a sense of class.  And in this sense, this watch delivers.  It provides a rugged look with it's silicone strap and yet offers a sleek, refined look with it's dark colors.  It's a solid piece of machinery and feels very well put together. I am very satisfied so far!

B0051QGCIW.A3NWKBA9ZXWH5W.reviewText: This watch is awesome. I get compliments on it all the time. I'm a big guy with bigger wrists so I liked the size of it because most normal size watches look feminine on my big frame. I wanted a bigger watch but not one of the ones that look like a Flava Flav clock on your wrist. Perfect. Get it.

B0051QGCIW.A2GB52X5U7YWLY.reviewText: ...but it did not fit my wrist which is my fault as I didn't measure my wrist before ordering.  I do have a rather thick wrist and wish this would have fit.  It looks great, has a comfortable rubber wrist band, and it's a shame I have to return it.
B0051QGCIW.A2GB52X5U7YWLY.summary: Exactly what I was looking for!

B0051QGCIW.A2XFTYPDQTCAZW.reviewText: I bought this watch last year. The dial broke after a few uses. It kept running slow so I had to keep adjusting until the thing broke.

B00520HLCI.A19Q4AT500WCBW.reviewText: Saw this watch at Macy's and tried it on but it had a different band that I didn't like very much. Got home and checked out the models on Amazon and found that this had more of a plain, silicon band which I like more than metal for my watches and it fits great. The face is pretty big but maybe not much bigger than your average watch. Prior to this I had a G-Shock watch that was both digital and analog which showed the date and had a bunch of different functions but the one thing I miss from that watch on here is the date. I really like the weight and feel of this watch and it feels like a quality build. Hope to own more Diesel watches in the future if this one holds up. Goes great for both business and casual dress as the other reviewer stated.Great watch and great price!

B00520HLCI.AZRW58IDWBJDY.reviewText: Pros:+Great style & look+Good weight. (I like my watches to have some heaviness to them without being overbearingly heavy)+Bold- Many people say how much they like the watch+It can be dressed down for casual wear or dressed up for business attire+Extremely durable. I have accidental smashed it into a wall, leaving not even a scratch on the watch, but a dent in the wallCons:-The watch stops while in flight. Roughly 75% of the flights I've worn the watch on had this issue come up. Although I fly frequently, the time zones change anyways so it's not a large hassle

B00520HLCI.A1JT9XB0O0M1N5.reviewText: It is amazingly beautiful and classy. The straps are comfortable and it fits perfectly on the wrist. The watch is highly recommended!

B00520HLCI.A22LV18351W4NV.reviewText: Great watch..and I lve it ..good I like so much love love it ..big star for this watch and to buy the other one

B00520HLCI.A36ANLHFENSYKC.reviewText: Great men's watch! Shipped fast and great price. This is a very nice watch for men who aren't into silver bands any longer. You can dress it up or dress it down to use as an every day watch. It arrived in perfect condition. Can't wait to see his face when he opens it!
B00520HLCI.A36ANLHFENSYKC.summary: LOVE this watch! Classy and practical!

B00520HLCI.A3MHOO4QXT6W6R.reviewText: This watch is built very well. After a few months of using it, I really like the silicone band, the heft, and face.I usually have destroyed the face by now, but this one seems to be holding up very well. I wear it while working in the garage and it still looks brand new.

B00520HLCI.A3BVL96PPLWM4G.reviewText: this wacth are so free, has elegance and comfort at the same time, it fits perfectly, good stuff, would recommend that only the type of belt is replaced by leather material

B00520HLCI.A1JY9TFBBODFMX.reviewText: I highly recommend this watch to someone who is looking a good quality, beautiful and good price watch. I'm really pleased with my order, my boyfriend will be very happy with this gift i got him for his birthday, can't wait to give it to him!

B00520HLCI.A3PDB3KEQ0OU8N.reviewText: Got this watch for a Xmas present for my bf when he asked for a, "black on black on black" watch. The only complaint he has is that the silicone straps easily clings to lint and other fuzzy materials, but he also prefers this to leather.

B00520HLCI.A15Y89YX9M1UQ0.reviewText: Awesome watch!  This watch is very GQ-ish, classy and can be go with any look whether business or casual.  First Diesel product purchased and impressed with the quality of this watch.  Will recommend.

B00520HLCI.A3MW2E32YELYPU.reviewText: Its a good product, beatiful. Very nice apresentation, but need external light to see what time it is.Its a bit black, so its difficult to see the time in darkside.

B00520HLCI.A2AI7AUYC8KVG1.reviewText: I just got the watch today, and it looks amazing. Its both for casual and formal wear and at that price I don't think you can get a better watch.

B00520HLCI.A1AQLQWAE42A3Z.reviewText: This watch is awesome!!! I'm very picky about many things, and this watch is something I can't take off. I have had many people ask me too see it!! You will not be disappointed!

B00520HLCI.ARL0NSMNQKUW0.reviewText: The item is just as advertised and a quality watch in my opinion.  I received the item very quickly.  The watch seems to be well constructed and I have received several compliments.  I like the look of it but it is a black out watch which makes it difficult to read in low light conditions.  A button for a back light would be nice.

B0052CHIF6.A1Z1MRUFRR00OD.reviewText: I'm writing this review mostly to encourage women who are on the edge of a small to a medium to try the medium of this dress. I normally wear a small, but the medium doesn't fit bad, and the dress is very cute and well made.

B0052CHM9S.AT8240GCQACPM.reviewText: I bought it for my oldest daughter. I see that fabric has high quality, but tee is very big, more the than specified size. Though she likes it also she wears it with jeans.

B0052N71LG.A1N3JSDN0H23P6.reviewText: not the color I ordered, and it is too hard to read at night or in a dark environment  i am disappointed

B0052N71LG.A3DBI486OJQQNQ.reviewText: I just got the watch about a week ago, I'm enjoying it and have already gotten a few compliments on the snazz factor of it.The thickness of the band stays that width all the way around and its a well constructed leather strap.  I feel like the strap will last while with how thick it is.That line down the right on the face of the watch is actually a recession so they can fit an extruded 3 on the right; it adds a little something to the design of the watch.Although it is a little hard to read at night or in a dark environment. But the face is shiny with the matte black hour ticks and hour, minute, and second hand makes it easier to read with just the slightest glare of light in dark areas.It feels like it will last a while, I guess I'll see in the coming months.

B0052N71XE.A39ZZ304JUPY9H.reviewText: Big and elegant. The weight and strip is comfortably suit. The design was great except that the date is a bit too small. Would be a better design if the hour and minutes hand is of different color.

B0052N71XE.A3BL052K79X1DP.reviewText: Great big white watch, everywhere I go people comment on it. eye catcher for sure!! If yu are a fan of big watches or g-shocks this is a must buy

B0052N73L4.A1AS4FKDG29SBK.reviewText: This watch is very cool looking for the white band trend and very affordable. Its definitely gotten more use in the winter as I wore it several times this summer including Minnesota Twins outdoor baseball games and when you get sweaty the wrist strap gets sticky and slides all over the place. Always with Amazon it was lowest price and the fastest shipping but I do not think that I would buy this item again unless I was just going to wear it in cool weather and who knows if the white band trend will be around next year.
B0052N73L4.A1AS4FKDG29SBK.summary: Great looking watch, not so comfortable...

B0052N751W.AK1Z2U10SU0TX.reviewText: The watch is made of really cheap material, I had to return it. Don't but it. You will be disappoint.

B0052N77PQ.A1JPNGC6GOJ8ES.reviewText: I received it in Colombia.It looks better in person (it's prettier).Excellent product and presentation.Thank you very much!

B0052N77PQ.A1OJBZB8ZHU35D.reviewText: I've just received the product in Colombia. Definitively a great watch, it has the perfect size, trendy. And no words on Diesel watch's quality. You won't regret of buying it

B0052N78O6.A2W21959RA0I5L.reviewText: it arrived 2 days before expected and its amazing. its the same bright red as the picture and the box it came in was brand new. all around great service. the only thing that wasnt that great was it was dusty when it came, and its a silicone based band and it was hard to clean, but once cleaned was amazing.

B0052N78O6.A9W56YR4H3CGD.reviewText: goods do not conform to the description destroyed very fast shipping. recommend and I am happy with the object.goods do not conform to the description destroyed very fast shipping. recommend and I am happy with the item. Very high quality merchandise

B0052N78O6.A1FKYX6FNIZMFR.reviewText: I love this watch!  I have five or six Diesel watches already, and this one is just as cool.  I got a compliment on it just hours after putting it on.  The silicone band is comfortable, and looks sharp.

B00541XXF4.A2KMEX7MAJ2EKR.reviewText: Great and elegant product. Bought them for the summer and after 3 months of use, I am still satisfied. Note that they are pretty low so maybe they are not the best choice for really long jeans.

B0054K34LI.A2HSF35QMOHD6W.reviewText: I had been dreaming of getting this watch for a long time and i havent been disappointed. Great design! The only probable downer is that you might avoid using it during hot weather because the band will probably wear out, but that~s the thing with leather wristband watches.

B0054K34LI.AI0NOOH2MN3ZE.reviewText: I have had this watch for about a year and a half and i can assure you that with proper care this watch lasts. Granted I have a few watches so I wear this one 2-3 times a week on average but still looks new, besides the normal wear on leather band.Leather band color of brown is slightly lighter than pictured but very close. Case and face are not as grey as in pic. Overall the color combination is very nice and I get compliments all the time.Great with suit or with t-shirt and jeans.

B0054K34LI.A3CK5I89HU7WGW.reviewText: This is a very nice watch. Its very good looking and high quality watch, just as like the other Diesel models. The brown band is a little bit clearer than it shows in the picture. If you buy it I can tell you that it's worth it!
B0054K34LI.A3CK5I89HU7WGW.summary: Very good looking and high quality watch!

B0054PBJ2Y.AJSJZ9ZLL9DTB.reviewText: I found it hard to get excited ordering a watch before trying it on. This thig is freakin awesome. It looks even more impressive in person. Great diameter, as long as your not opposed to bigger watches. The face looks like a dash guage out of a Lambo/Ferrari. The actual watch is slightly lighter in color than the picture depicts.

B0054PBJ2Y.A2SNWOBXF38N9E.reviewText: This was a perfect Christmas gift, my boyfriend loved it! the gum metal is such a unique color for a watch lover/collector, and it was a nice, large frame!

B0054PBJ2Y.A1SR6GY37QO81G.reviewText: My wife bought my first Diesel watch three years ago (similar design).  I lost it during the holidays and I've been searching for a replacement over the past month.  I purchased one through Amazon a few weeks ago and it didn't look authentic.  This watch is supposed to have a stealth appearance not stainless steel.  I returned it to the seller and decided to take another shot at acquiring the original.  I hit the jackpot on the second try.  I receive compliments on this watch everyday.  Great purchase for a nice price.

B0054QSXSG.A2E3DGJ3027B7I.reviewText: Diesel is my favorite brand and this watch is really cool... it's better than I thought and its size is perfect.

B0054QSY7Q.A26YFGY8BDEN2U.reviewText: I bought the watch in the end of 2011 as a present to myself. The thing that caught my attention was its BIGNESS, and it looked like a classic radio. I found that interesting.For functionality, the watch had 3 ways to tell time. We have the analog, digital and the "radio dial". However on 2nd thought, its abit meaningless for a watch to replicate same function in 3 different ways. It sure was going to impress anyone as a conversation starter.Among my friends, they did take an interest on the watch. But due to its lack of functionality, its not much of a conversation starter, unless you are really imaginative. Post purchase feeling was that the watch was not as interesting as it appeared. There was a slight regret. I would give it only 3 out of 5 stars.

B0055MNVLS.A124GJ3HOOKBJF.reviewText: Looks great and fits well. Generally true to size - we got a 2T for our fairly large 19 month old. Also the fabric is really nice and it washes well. One of my favorite tops.

B0055UD57U.A1P27BGF8NAI29.reviewText: Honestly, I think that the boyshort panty is the most exciting thing to come along in woman's fashions in a while. They are comfortable and durable, but also decidedly feminine. I highly recommend these wonderful panties to all women!(Review of Diesel Fresh and Bright VIP Fashion Boyshort)
B0055UD57U.A1P27BGF8NAI29.summary: Comfortable and durable but also decidedly feminine

B0056985TS.A2PJRQULPX92Z4.reviewText: Perfect stylish jacket.High quality. Nice design. Please note: Diesel sell European sizes. If you are US L you should probably buy EUR XXL.

B0056986U6.A3G573VFEAFB3M.reviewText: When I ordered the item, I have already heard of the reputation that Diesel shirts gernerally run small.  Hence instead of ordering a large size (the usual size I go for), I chose XXL instead.  Well, think I might have overestimated.  The XXL shirt seems a tad large for me, XL would have been perfect.  However, it is still a decent shirt.  I quite like the way Diesel tailors their shirts, esp the tapering around the waist area. Overall still a good buy.  Recommended.

B0056K3YA2.A1FJGWXZG3236B.reviewText: My girlfriend loves them, it's fun and playful to wear them. Typical Diesel quality, fits nice. Not saggy in the rear. The material and construction seems like it's going to wash very well over the years.

B0057FLL24.A9DDVKQAC2MRB.reviewText: Super stylish and masculine.  Great quality! Good packaging and shipping speed.  I love Diesel and this watch didn't let me down - very nice.  The photo doesn't do it justice!

B0057FLL24.A1OEMY3MOQKVAF.reviewText: Amazon had a much better price on this watch than our local department stores. It's the perfect size - fashionably large, without being overwhelming. It has stayed very clean, even with lots of wear. It's my hubby's favorite watch! Highly recommend.

B0057FLL24.AVIKV0RD4FHZS.reviewText: Watch is beautiful, light and goes with a lot of combinations!Good quality for the price paid and the straps are firm.I loved it and I recommend.

B0058BU6OQ.A2F681808YW8S2.reviewText: This T-shirt has a very soft and high quality fabric, it fits perfectly on me as was expected, The only unfavorable point was the long delivery time taken by the saler.

B0058XHMMS.A1OH085DC04FU6.reviewText: Great quality. Right choice for using something "formal elegant". This is not as fine as an Hugo Boss or Tumi but is great quality and very well made. Very comfortable and great zipper and quality. The material seems to be from a very good quality and feels great when it is used. Buy it !!! It approves all my analisis

B0058XK8EC.A3G723TQ0QLILG.reviewText: This is the perfect travel bag that I found.  Good quality that I expected and perfect size for carrying all my travel stuff.

B0058YAPUS.A2D5X7M7JJLNEV.reviewText: I ordered a bag with green color with a size 28x 38 x 12 cm (W x H x D). However I got a product of gray color with a size about 17 x 22 x 6. Strongly suggest the sellor to contact me and to allow me to change or return the bag.Thanks.Sean

B0058YWECA.A2I8BYIM7D4PIP.reviewText: The jean is excellent, great denim quality, beautiful colours and of course it fit perfectly! Awesome! Very recommendable and also good price

B0058YY0QS.A22O7JI9J2W4YI.reviewText: VERY NICE PAIR....VERY PLEASED...PERFECT FIT. WILL SHOP AGAIN.THE MATERIAL AND COLOR IS PERFECT. THE SHIPMENT ARRIVED SUPERFAST. ONLY PROBLEM CANNOT EXCHANGE IF NOT PLEASED.

B0058YY2CU.A158N9GEE83318.reviewText: I ordered this sweater in size M. What arrived was some ugly sweatshirt in size L. I can/t exchange it because the sweater I ordered is..out of stock. It wasn't when I paid for it. I guess they decided to send anything. They also claim they have two days to respond to my email about the refund. Very unethical and annoying practice.

B0058YY2CU.A1F4STFF5VB40A.reviewText: This sweater is very nice and clearly high quality.  Not at all itchy, but very comfortable and looks great.  Color and look are true to the image.This sweater does run small though, I purchased an XL because I am in between a L and XL, however this sweater is more like M-L.  I did exchange for a larger size.

B0058YYRUM.A37KJ0QD8HYF7A.reviewText: i love diesel watches. great design and well-constructed. not too expensive, not too cheap either, just right. and it's always a conversation piece.
B0058YYRUM.A37KJ0QD8HYF7A.summary: one of the best diesel watches  bought

B0058YYRUM.A2XIDGVGERCH4U.reviewText: This watch is an eye catcher! Everyone from 8 to 80 is going to ask to see it. They will all say it's the neatest looking watch they ever saw, and they will all like it more than you.  I say that because you will soon find that form does not follow function like the science professor taught. The jump hour is cool but needs focus to read time.  The led date and time is not visible in the sunlight and there is no light for night reading. The fastest time read is the analog hands, and those are small and only great for an approximate time.  My advise is wear it out on a  day that time is not important, like a day off.  It's perfect for a lunch with no time limits and hanging out meeting new friends.
B0058YYRUM.A2XIDGVGERCH4U.summary: The watch everyone likes more than you

B0058YYSRY.A28P25XCSPPSTI.reviewText: I purchased this watch because its an awesome feeling watch but when it arrived the battery was dead. I spent an extra $30 for a new battery. WTF!!!!!

B0058YYT7I.A1CYE9RXAYWT3B.reviewText: I have owned many Diesel and Fossil watches and this is by far the most comfortable watch I have owned. Also has different display modes. The watch was dead when I received it and I had to change the battery which is the reason it is only getting 4 stars.

B0058YYV44.A257Q9NQQSPYU3.reviewText: I love Diesel watches because they are not fussy, and do what they are suppose to.  I chose this unusual colour, because it does add some flare to this mostly functional watch.  I quite pleased with my purchase and would recommend this product to anyone who is a collector of watches.

B0058YYV44.AETMOEFXZU4WX.reviewText: I love the watch however, the blue part gets nicked easily with tiny scratches... Be careful when you wear the watch to not bang it or scratch it.

B0058YYV44.A2VI8QAMJ2RXEQ.reviewText: The watch arrived and looked like the picture except for one thing. It was totally unviewable indoors. When we tried the light it was so dim we couldn't be sure at first if it was even on. Purchased this watch with the idea that the lcds would be easier to see, but that isn't the case here. Outside in very direct sunlight it was much better, but not perfect as it picked up glare very easily.

B0058YYW5W.A1W5IPOS5HTK7Z.reviewText: It looks gorgeous, my only downside is the limitations on water.  According to the manual, you cant take this in a pool.

B0058YYW5W.A2DL835LWZKFU.reviewText: This is the latest edition to my collection and it's a very solid watch.  With a stainless steel case it is slightly heavier than other timepieces that are roughly the same size but doesn't feel bulky when on the wrist.I'll trust what the other review indicated about what the manual says regarding the waterproofness of the watch, but on the back is imprinted 5 Bar water resistant. I've had it for a month or longer and after going to the bottom of a 10 foot pool several times and dozens of showers, I know that it is completely waterproof.  Another source online says the watch has a scratch resistant mineral crystal, quartz movement, and is waterproof to 40 meters (168ft).I wanted to write this review to expand on the functions of the digital portion.  The digital  functions include calendar with date, year and day of week, world time, a chronograph with 50-lap memory, two daily alarms, countdown timer and light.  It also has another setting for the light to turn on briefly when any button is pressed. (Electroluminescence on/off)This is presumably to be used in dark environments where the light is needed for an extended time while using the alternate watch functions. (Light button is also 'set' button)After seeing this wristwatch priced at close to $200 on other sites, I think ~$100 is a great price for very solid and stylish Diesel watch.
B0058YYW5W.A2DL835LWZKFU.summary: waterproof to 5 Bar and lots of digital functions

B0058Z0JOO.A1IHAYLN7JSFN0.reviewText: My Husband love Diesel watches and he was thrilled when he was surprised with this one. He plans on buying the blue one as well.
B0058Z0JOO.A1IHAYLN7JSFN0.summary: Great looking Watch My Husband was thrilled

B0058Z0JOO.A2CXDRDS83DH2Z.reviewText: A very nice looking watch. It's durable and seems like it will last for a long time.  It will match anything red and black really well.  It is an eye catcher.

B0058Z0L6K.A2YCLJNOE7JGCW.reviewText: Big! This watch is big! The biggest watch I've ever seen and bigger than I anticipated. However, it is unique and I do really like it.

B0058Z0L6K.ARS9O1DTSXB5A.reviewText: I bought is for my husband for Valentine's Day and he absolutely loved it, well buy from them again!! :)

B0058Z0L6K.AP1MHB1QN38HU.reviewText: Every time I wear it I get hand full of  compliments on this watch thinking of getting it an other color! My favorite watch I own

B0058Z0L6K.A2JEG3TCMGNB6E.reviewText: I really don't get what some of these people say about their review of this watch, yeah I get it, it's "your" opinion. However, the description clearly says it's plastic so what the heck do you expect, platinum?Anyhoot, the watch is very nice and I have the white one already so it's just a nice compliment to that one. It's a conversation piece for sure, but Diesel makes great watches and this one is great for me. The Italians do everythig big!!

B0058Z0L6K.AFUJDB9WFFM5P.reviewText: seriously,its really big. im 6.3-----------1.87m. and it looks big on me, i really like it.ill definitively buy other colors if there were any.

B0058Z0L6K.AKN33LMJ1G73Y.reviewText: This is the real deal. I have gotten plenty of compliments on this watch and is def. An eye catcher

B0058Z0L6K.A2F2MXOS5ZU1PK.reviewText: Clearly, you are paying for a "name" with this watch. As some of the other reviewers have stated the watch feels somewhat cheap and is in fact made of plastic, however, not all things that are plastic are cheaply made. The face "feels" substantial and solid, with the glass face, the band is a little "light" but doesn't feel like it is going to break or anything. The face is HuGE, about 2 3/8"  and isn't for the timid, you are going to get noticed and people will comment often with mixed reactions, if you aren't confident and "own" it you won't be wearing for long, this watch has been surprisingly controversial but I think that is fun :)As for the "name" you aren't getting a particularly fantastic watch, yes it tells time and is accurate, but other than that its no-frills time keeping. What you are really buying with this watch is a big bold fashion statement and the "DIESEL" name

B0058Z0L6K.A1ROVVSVBP16G2.reviewText: I don't remember what the case diameter was on this watch but I'm guessing 63 mm (a little over 2 ")... I some some reviews about it being "plastic" and "cheap" and while it's not a linked metal band, it doesn't feel cheap or like it would break easily.  I actually prefer it as it keeps the watch light.
B0058Z0L6K.A1ROVVSVBP16G2.summary: If you like big faces, you'll like this one.

B0058Z0L6K.A20O3Y8EFQCWDP.reviewText: This is the third Diesel Men's DZ watch we have purchased and he loves it!  Wish we could find another red one as his frame cracked.

B0058Z0L6K.A3CD9VAFVB52CZ.reviewText: Great service but not the product I thought it was going to be. Face of watch was 3 times the size it looks on picture.

B0058Z0L6K.A1M3H6L28CJWBR.reviewText: Bought a black and a white and I love it. Light and classy, good for someone like me with big hands. Acrylic doesnt scratch, I would recommend.

B0058Z0L6K.AD9FS49DEN1S5.reviewText: The watch is works well,  shipping was fast.  It made it here before Christmas.  The watch is light for it's size.  Big numbers easy to see.

B0058Z0L6K.A3FEHE5B688WY5.reviewText: I like big watches and I wanted an all white one.  This one fit the bill nicely.This was a great purchase and I would highly recommend it to my friends and or family.

B0058Z0L6K.ANJJ79P6CF5FE.reviewText: The watch face is HUGE! No trouble with purchase or delivery but this watch was just not what I expected. The face is just so big, like abnormally big. A little oversized is ok but this is supersize!

B0058Z0L6K.A1OJBZB8ZHU35D.reviewText: It's really nice! It's a litlle big than I thought but for me it's ok!It arrived in perfect conditions to Colombia and in very short time.

B0058Z0L6K.AOXWCABDVIXF3.reviewText: I bought this because I wanted a watch with a larger face than usual.  However I didnt expect this watch to be so cheaply made for $120.  It's a nice looking watch, but like I said the only problem is that it's klnda cheap & made of plastic.  This watch in my opinion should be priced at about 50 dollars at the most.  I do however think that this watch is unique and sharp looking.  Not sure if I would ever buy a Diesel brand watch again even though I do get alot of compliments when I wear this watch out.  Cool watch just not worth the money.

B0058Z0L6K.A3FOQABPE99BQU.reviewText: I'd be lying if I said I owned this because I don't. I was in the market for a new watch and browsed around looking at different "oversized" watches. I like a larger face than the typical 44mm watch. This watch however is of Flava-Flave proportions. I am not a small guy at 6'1, but this watch was just a little too much for me. Besides that, it is important to mention it is plastic. It is not metal or ceramic or anything. Just plain plastic. Because if that it will lack protection and overall feels cheap. It's extremely light if that is what you are looking for, but to me it's not worth the 120 price tag. I don't even think I'd pay 50. Try it on first.

B0058Z0L6K.A3TTO9XLBKWKLB.reviewText: The watch is very big, the face is at least 2 inches in diameter. The color red is a bit darker then the picture but it is a nice red. Once again the watch is huge, kinda looks like a novelty watch from a far. very noticeable, not suddle, makes an impression at very first sight. Would not have purchased if I knew how big it really was. Once again I can't stress it enough the watch is huge covers a large portion of the wrist.

B0058Z0L6K.A13RINCW7J5ZZ6.reviewText: The face is really big and of course its all white so be ready for that. The band, however, is plastic and feels light and cheap. I liked the watch but ended up returning it and getting the all metal version of the same thing, which has worked out great for me.
B0058Z0L6K.A13RINCW7J5ZZ6.summary: Feels too light for its size

B0058Z0L6K.A2IZJOOYVVG7HY.reviewText: Love it!! Head turner! Good conversation starter. Really like it. Solid quality. Great price. People ask about it a lot.

B0058Z0MGY.ABTX99Z9XVSGU.reviewText: The watch arrived in a timely manner and was pretty much as described. I thought that there was an LCD background that moved or changed color shades with each second or something. Unfortunately, it was just an illusion.  I still like the watch and will keep it. Thanks.

B0058Z0NPY.A2045OZJQ130BD.reviewText: I've been eyeing this watch for a very long time and I finally got it for $50 cheaper than regular retail price. (love u amazon). Anyway, this is a beautiful watch. Simple in design but definitely a statement piece. Perfect large dial size I was looking for too. Took it to a kiosk at the mall to have some links removed for just 5 bucks. I also love the textured detail around the edge of the face. Beyond pleased with this purchase. If you're on the fence get it! Ladies I know Michael Kors watches seems to be the in thing right now but this watch knocks em out of the park. Plus I haven't heard anything about the gold plating rubbing off of these watches which is a big problem with the Michael Kors watches. Buy buy buy!

B0058Z0NPY.A2XLVT0E8SWLOF.reviewText: I love this watch. I wear it all the time. It wasn't as heavy as i thought it was going to be be i love it.

B0058Z0NPY.A1MPX42ZP80PBY.reviewText: Perfect gold watch! I was looking for big, gold watch, and this perfect!!! Very satisfied! Arrived right on time, not disappointed.

B0058Z0NPY.A2JSRD4GJI3YH8.reviewText: I had my eye on this since I saw it on the Nordstrom website, but I wasn't too happy about the price ($180). When I saw it on Amazon for $50 less, I knew I had to purchase it for my boyfriend for his birthday. I was super excited for him to see it! It came in a nice, white box and the quality of the watch was excellent. I have to admit that I was quite skeptical at first about the authenticity and quality of the watch, but I definitely changed my mind after seeing it. The color of the watch is a soft gold. I'm not sure how else to describe it, but it's not like a bright gold. My boyfriend, of course, loved it! It fits him perfectly and he gets compliments on it all the time. It was well worth the purchase!

B0058Z0NPY.A7LZ02RLN3CZX.reviewText: The delivery time was fast, the watch is amazing. You make no mistake buying this watch. Just keep in mind that the watch is big and it suits better on a non skinny arm

B0058Z0NPY.A24X0VD16PAWJS.reviewText: Great looking watch! The size is perfect, not too flashy but def an eye catcher. Very glad with this purchase, can't wait to get it resized so I can wear it. Shipping went over my expectations too, delivered 3 days before scheduled delivery date!

B0058Z0NPY.A2YFRVV908IRQ6.reviewText: Shipped and delivered very quickly and I'm so pleased with it. Brand new, amazing quality. The watch is such an eye-catcher... I purchased this watch as a gift for my boyfriend and he has received so many compliments on it. Totally worth the price! Plus, this watch is much cheaper on amazon than any other website or department store.

B0058Z0NPY.A1W7UCG7RMOR.reviewText: I am very pleased with the watch because I was looking for something that was different than all other watches.

B0058Z0NPY.A38E9GEXLTVTPW.reviewText: I had no idea what to get my boyfriend for Christmas, I saw this & thought he might like it. Feeling a bit worried if he would like it & actually wear it. HE LOVED & LOVES IT. He's so happy it matches with *everything* and can wear it *whenever* & with *whatever* outfit. PERFECT GIFT!

B0058Z0NPY.A380VAN09NO1R8.reviewText: Flashy not to big and classic a must have for a first time gold watch hunter ... I was so thrilled with the purchase

B0058Z0NPY.A3CJSYIKOX2WPM.reviewText: The quality is great and the gold really stands outs.It is not rose gold has it states. Just a nice solid shiny gold.The watch also isnt that big. I'm skinny at 5'10" and 135lbs and this looks great on my wrist.Definitely a great price as well.

B0058Z0PH0.A2TMC570TDP1Y2.reviewText: Amazing look, very light weighted. I do like the heavier watches but this is a great watch, so if you like lighter time pieces this is perfect for you. The only con I have for it is that it scratches pretty easily. I'm really careful with all my watches but you will almost always accidentally bump it off of something somehow, and this one is easily scratched. But over all its a perfect watch for those wanting a styling piece for your wrist.,

B0058Z0PTS.A3M7WBKKAK3G2X.reviewText: CAME TO ME DEFECTIVE. SOME OF THE PAINT WAS MISSING OFF THE DIAL. IF IT WASN'T FOR THAT, I WOULD HAVE GIVEN IT 5 STARS.GOT A FULL REFUND WITHOUT A PROBLEM.  RMS

B0058Z0PTS.A5QGSEUW3BMU.reviewText: This is a great jeans and t-shirt watch, perfect look for dressing down.  In person, the band is not as bright as it is in the picture.  It is a very rugged, militaristic looking watch that is surprisingly light and easy to wear.  I have a large wrist so the bigger dial does not seem enormous, I got it offline and pleased in its size, not seeming too much bigger than a standard wristwatch.  I love it, I have several watches but am still surprised how much I wear it, Great Buy!!!

B0058Z0RH8.A35M2PCFKDZRO6.reviewText: This watch is GREAT! I was attracted by the large face, laser etched model name on the side and canvas strap! It never fails to grab someone's eye.  I wish there were more band colors to choose from. Its not an everyday wear though. the band seems like it will start to fray and fade it i wear it too much.

B0058Z0SP4.A7BXK95KVU4DG.reviewText: Great style that gets more compliments than my much more expensive watches. Nice and simple with only 1 function - telling time.

B0058Z0SP4.A35M2PCFKDZRO6.reviewText: This watch catches eyes! Its sturdy and for the most part the glass is scratch resistant. The only down side is that it is not luminescent like the DZ1470.

It's a very large faced watch which looks better on men with bigger builds. He was wearing an small watch of mine prior to this and it kind of got lost on his big hands. To my surprise, it glows at night. Had to have it sized to fit him properly, but that's normal for a watch. Highly recommend.

B0058Z0TKI.A2XOEPI1TX77MD.reviewText: I am happy with this watch. It is rather simple though. It is big and it is sturdy. I wish it had some titanium though. I believe it would have complemented the look a lot, even if it meant a slight increase in the price tag. The hands can be a little bit confusing to read at first, since they sort of blend with the background, but you get used to it very quickly. I'd recommend this watch. It is my first Diesel watch and it certainly won't be the last.

B0058Z0TKI.A1EBI9FZ0JI6WG.reviewText: Wow!!! One of my best watches that I bought. . No regrets enjoy the beauty of a great watch. Wow!!

B0058Z0TKI.ATPJAWCFMJMXI.reviewText: Bought this for my bf and he loved it. It came as advertised and I would definitely suggest to others.

B0058Z0TKI.A7PYDL0D039TB.reviewText: A gift for my boyfriend. He hasn't seen it yet... But u absolutely love it. You can dress up or dress down with piece.

B0058Z0TKI.A37O382D9GC96I.reviewText: This watch is very beautiful and works good. I use it all day.Its weight is heavier than majority, but it's ok for me.Great watch! I like it!

B0058Z0TKI.AJA14CCK31AV6.reviewText: I bought this watch for my husband and he loved it, This watch really meat our expectation, looks great on his wrist , we love it :)

B0058Z0U02.A33OEE2SOU6Q4E.reviewText: I purchased this product for my military husband who has a very particular taste; he is honestly pretty picky and likes what he likes. He loves the look of all-black and is a big fan of G-Shock watches. I thought he could use a more dressy watch and after considering other brands, I came upon this one and it was the perfect choice. The first thing I noticed was that the dominant time is military on this watch, which is kind of difficult to find in a watch. Also, I can't complain at all about the price, I got it for much cheaper than I've found at other retail stores! It arrived in perfect condition, the battery still worked, and in the original Diesel packaging/watch box one would get if purchased at the actual store, which I was a little worried about not receiving as it was a gift. All in all, we are very happy with this purchase.

B0058Z0U02.A1FBQ5EGTIHI73.reviewText: I ordered this watch for my husband but after receiving it, I quickly changed my mind and bought him an Invicta. I love the stylings of Diesel but they really need to work on the feel of their straps. This watch appears tough and I love the face but the metal strap rattles and has that cheap feel to it. Would not recommend.

B0058Z0U02.A2EYBOS117TB9S.reviewText: I have had this watch since January 17th, 2014. The date ALWAYS WAS OUT OF SYNC. I have tried OVER AND OVER AND OVER AND OVER to have the date correct on this watch. Now on March 4th, 2014, the watch has stopped working. I paid over $180.00 for this AND JUST OVER 1 MONTH IT HAS STOPPED WORKING. I am beyond pissed off at this point. Oh and to make matters worst.... I got it on January 17th and I am being told I can't return because "the window for it to be returned closed on January 17th". ABSOLUTE BULL!!!!! so don't waste your money and time buying this watch on amazon. You're gonna get robbed of your money

B0058Z0U02.ATKJS49AGKEZX.reviewText: Beautiful watch. Although it's diameter is quite big, it is discrete and classy. The weight is also OK, even for a girl.

I would recommend this watch to any guy looking for a sleek black on black watch that will grab someone's eye.

If you look into the Diesel products more, this same face is also available in a steel or silicone band on Amazon.I do agree that this watch has a large face and that buyers should take that into consideration. My husband is 6'2" and an athletic guy so I knew the extra large size would suit him well.The watch feels substantial and of high quality. I liked the three dials down the right side and size of them, adding to the bulk of the piece. If you're looking for a manly watch, this should be on your list of possibilities.

B0058Z0V5Q.AUYT7X6KIPITB.reviewText: This watch is awesome! Everyone admires this one. I love the black on black. Face is just big enough and i have huge hands.Cant beat the price.

I get lots of compliments on it, people seem to like the big 02 03 04. It is very large, so if you have small, skinny arms I would not recommend it. But otherwise, great watch, I am 100% satisfied with this buy.

However the minute and hour hands are black so it gets a little bit difficult to read it especially in dark.The band: nice, but i cannot tell if it is genuine leather or not.Overall it is a nice watch and it is matched with my black ring.. :-)

B0058Z0V5Q.A28GV4UDX7JF0W.reviewText: This is a beautiful watch.  If you like the picture, then you'll love it when it arrives.  It's a real attention grabber.Part of the reason it grabs attention is, this is one of the biggest standard round watches you will find. It falls in Diesel's line of XL watches and actually is even bigger than Diesel's other 020304-style watches.  With a case diameter of 56 mm, it's not quite flava flav but I sorta felt that way while wearing it.  My advice would be to go to the official Diesel Timeframes website where you'll find the official Diesel Watch Fit Guide, a PDF file you can print out and then cut out the watch diameter you're looking at and see exactly how it will fit on your wrist.Personally, it was too big for my taste and I retuned it. Really, it was just too big for my wrist. If you like the style and are cool with he size, however, I'd definitely recommend it.
B0058Z0V5Q.A28GV4UDX7JF0W.summary: Just be aware of how big this excellent watch is

B00596GDGA.A15SGYZZNJFZUR.reviewText: Purchased this Diesel Watch, thinking that the picture of the watch is what I was getting (Military Style.)  However, when I received the watch it was NOT AT ALL THE WATCHED PICTURED.  I was very disappointed, as the watch was a 2012 Christmas gift.  Thank goodness I ordered early as I was able to return.  So make sure you're paying and receiving the watch that is pictured.I'm giving this product one star because the picture is very deceiving and does not picture the Diesel watch with a silicon wrist band, which I received and is described in the written description box, however, some customers look at the picture and pay according to what the picture looks like. I happen to be one of those consumers "sometimes"...lesson learned.

B0059DTSVK.A2E39OZCDM7LKU.reviewText: Ah yes, my toddler still bows to my fashion whims.  These shoes are insane (ooo, shiny!), and make me look like I'm some kind of awesome hip (ok, hipster) mom.In reality, I'm lucky if my kid wears clothes at all, so for the realistic:They have a zipper to get them on a squirming twisting wiggling kid who refuses to fall for the "look! look!  An exciting squeeky thing!" trick yet againThe velcro strap at the top is prime keep-it-on territory for the kid who can deftly remove himself from a diaper with eyes closed and one hand in a cracker bagThe sole is tough but not angled (the exercise and sport science nerd is getting the best of me, and I slightly lament the lack of completely flexible sole, but it seems to not make a difference in his gait).Awesomely great for the ladies and the gents alike.Overall, the pretty great shoe!

B0059MSZCO.A2DEL9ACQ4OC7Z.reviewText: Overall, I really like this jacket. It's cool looking and has a great sleek feel to it. As previous reviewers have mentioned, the sizing is a bit on the smaller side, however, I usually wear x-small (mostly) and small (sometimes). I got the small and find that the fit is perfect with the sleeves ending right at the wrists and the bottom of the jacket coming down to the belt line. I only have two gripes with this jacket: 1. The cut of the jacket, specifically around the top/outside of the shoulders and the bottom/armpit area are awkwardly constructed. When I put on the jacket and wear it, it looks fine, but the second I raise my arm above shoulder height, the jacket tightens up on the bottom and the top shoulders ruffle around and bunch up. This phenomenon is hard to explain but I think its due to the fact that the width of the shoulders is made with a lot of jacket material where as the armpit area is not. Since the ratio of material on top the shoulder vs. the armpit area is so huge, it feels like I could rip my jacket if I make any sudden drastic arm movements. 2. The collar is very rough against the neck. The label says this jacket is 100% nylon which may explain the faux/synthetic looking/feeling collar which borders the neck line of the jacket giving it a rough feeling on the neck. Having said that though, the Jurlo jacket is a really nice light weight jacket that gives the wearer a dapper look. I look forward to wearing it this summer and highly recommend it!
B0059MSZCO.A2DEL9ACQ4OC7Z.summary: An awesome look to a weirdly cut jacket..

B0059MSZCO.A3K147FV726RF8.reviewText: Omg I bought this jacket in medium and i'm usually a small but it still fit perfectly! Looks so sexy and is amazing. So happy this jacket was only $150! Couldn't find anything like this anywhere else! HAPPY 18 YEAR OLD HERE. =)

It fit well on the arms and waist, but it was too snug accross my shoulders. The jacket does look as pictured and it is a great looking jacket.

B0059MSZCO.A2JP9E1H0SF392.reviewText: It is a lightweight jacket with mesh lining--good for cool-warm weather.  The nylon cloth is very thin and drapes nicely.  There is high design quality and attention to detail.  You will get compliments as most lightweight jackets seem to be of a generic design and contruction.  For $150 retail, this jacket is definitely worth the money.Only problem is fitment.  If your regular size fits you loosely or "relaxed" you might be OK getting the same size.  For the other 75% of the people out there, order one size up.  I am 6', 185lb with average joe to athletic build.  I usually order large but the Jurlo jacket is tight in the pecs area.  Unfortunately, the next size up, XL, is a little baggy for my taste but large is too tight up top and should be reserved for the thinner man.  Once you get the size right, you will love this jacket!

B005BNGDRA.A3BUJNLWBIKMH7.reviewText: im big FAN of diesel and i was surprised when i saw diesel shoes for 55$ and i order immediately. after i receive i can tell that they can be anything else except authentic diesel shoesso uncomfortable in your feet and they look so cheap.make sure before you purchase diesel shoes online and dont expect original/authenic diesel shoes for 50$the worst order so farand if you already purchase these shoes dont think that this is DIESEL they are totally different then how diesel shoes fit , look and materialBTW I LIKE DIESEL SHOES BUT not Vietnamese made one (this one)

B005BNGDRA.A1DLTZC1HHP7B5.reviewText: Have always loved the diesel brand shoes.  They are stylish and comfortable and its hard to find shoes that offer both.

B005BNGDRA.A1OK1OKZ2IUXNM.reviewText: This is the first time I've ordered shoes online, as some styles a 9 1/2 fits better and some styles a 10.  I went this route because I couldn't find anything stylish like these in the stores.  I used the Amazon sizing chart for my initial order and when the shoes arrived they looked exactly like what I wanted, the only issue was they were a half size to small.  I had tried them on and walked around the living room, packed them up and returned them and ordered a half size bigger replacement.  My replacement order arrived yesterday.  I tried them on and it's a perfect fit.  The shoes are very very comfortable, and soft which surprised me.  The sole is a bit thin, which I expected for shoes of this style, but I figure if it gets to be a problem, I'll get some Superfeet inserts.  I got those for my snowboard boots, even though the original sole was pretty comfortable, but the Superfeet were just a couple of levels better, and they were one of the best purchases I've ever made.  These shoes are so comfortable I'm planning on order another pair in a different color.  My advice, if this is your first time buying shoes online and you use the sizing chart, order a half size bigger, or just order the size you'd normally wear.  P.S. Getting the replacement pair was no issue at all.  I just went to the Returns section, and entered these were too small and ordered the half size bigger pair.  Amazon provided the UPS labels and I didn't have to pay anything.  It was an even swap.  Hope this helps.
B005BNGDRA.A1OK1OKZ2IUXNM.summary: Exactly what I wanted, but Amazon sizing chart a little off

B005BNGDRA.A1IPCS9AKT878H.reviewText: i have bought Diesel Shoes at other ocations, but in this case the size of shoes does not fit. This item does not contains the correctly sizing, is somewhat small.

B005BNGDRA.ANXEB77NSEWJD.reviewText: Wow, just got these in Black and have to tell you all how awesome they are.  They feel very well made and cushioned compared to this same style from Asics or Onitsuka.  They are a little on the narrow side, so I'll have to wait and see if they "break in" a little wider over time.  Style is cool as hell, but understated enough to be subtle.  Be warned the product pictures don't show a difference between the "Black" and the "Black and Paloma", but the Black and Paloma's are mostly grey.  If you're looking for the one pictured on Amazon's page, order the straight "black".  No problem though, because Amazon easily sent me the color pictured after the snafu (god love Amazon).Diesel is among my favorite designers, and the only thing they do better than shoes are their jackets.  So if you dig the footwear, trot over to their website and have a look at their outwear.  Be prepared to drop some serious cheddar though, quality and style come with a price tag.

That means they'll last longer than cheap-arse skivvies.Most of my jeans are DIESEL, and I still have pairs from 10 years ago which look brand spanking new and fit like a glove, no joke.Great find, great price, Great buy. B005ME7WU0.A22OXOSWHQG6I0.reviewText: I almost always get a 9.5 M or W size, both for dress and for athletic shoes.  When I tried on the 9.5 M of this particular shoe, I could only just get it on, so I sent the pair back and ordered a 10.  This size works provided that I wear socks on the thin side as opposed to basic athletic socks.  I expect the 10 size will expand slightly with wear; I certainly hope so.  However, I do wonder if the 10.5 M would be an even better fit. Otherwise, as it the case with most Diesel products, the design quality is exceptional, also the finish detail.
B005ME7WU0.A22OXOSWHQG6I0.summary: Diesel Sizes Run on the Small Side

B005ME7WU0.A3D2DJEHR4U7HC.reviewText: With age I have developed a foot problem that runs in my family--I have developed a bunion, which is a bony deformity of the joint at the base of the big toe. This makes it difficult to find stylish shoes that can encompass the enlargement of the bone that has occurred at the base of my right big toe.  Sigh.  I can't even stand to say the word, "bunion", so you might imagine how I felt about trying to wear "sensible shoes" LOL!Diesel to the rescue...I love the Diesel brand and their ultra cool italian style sensibilities.  I wear their jeans, which fit like they were made for me, and last forever, and I also have had many, many shoes from the Diesel line that I have loved and worn to death.  So I was very happy to find these shoes, which have plenty of room in the area across the toe to encompass the slight to moderate enlargement of that area of the bone on my right foot.  I keep the shoes loose in that area, flexing my foot when lacing them so that I have plenty of wiggle room so that the bone doesn't become compressed and cause me pain and suffering while strutting with style.I have found these shoes to be very resilient clean-wise.  I even knocked an oil lamp off a table in my foyer, causing it to break and splatter oil EVERYWHERE, including on a pair of these shoes.  I simply took a hot wet washcloth and soaped it up with dishwashing liquid, and proceeded to clean the surface of these shoes until they looked great again.  They were the Black Night/Black style, and I couldn't believe that they cleaned up so well.I love these shoes so much that I actually own the aforementioned style, as well as the Black Multi, and Bungee Cord/Black/Brown.  In addition, I've bought them in the Raketier style, which is just the same exact shoe with smooth leather accents instead of suede in the Dress Blues/Classic and Bungee Cord/Latigo Bay/Coffee Bean, which I paid way too much for at right about $125, but they are my favorite pair.  The colors are different enough that I don't think anyone would notice that they are the same style--every pair is quite unique.  I absolutely LOVE these shoes!!I have always ordered a whole size larger in Diesel shoes, even before my foot problems, as I find that they run small.
B005ME7WU0.A3D2DJEHR4U7HC.summary: Great, stylish shoes for anyone who needs extra width across the front of the foot...

B005ME89LG.A4R2XN9B6VHEV.reviewText: Though they are pretty looking shoes...Stay away. They are not durable at all. The leather at the side torn after one month of normal use.

So, I am waiting for that special day when I know someone will be seeing me with just this item on. Hasnt happened yet, but I will keep you updated.

B005MZPCBA.AQL6Q01GSWF9O.reviewText: I love the masculine fit to these pajama bottoms. They are comfortable while adding a sporty look. They have a slim fit to them so keep that in mind when ordering.

B005NGPS1M.A1AL4R60L5NA5X.reviewText: This jeans are good quality and look great, one important note on this particular item: the size on this page says just 34, by ordering it I expected to receive 34x34 but received 34x30, just keep it in mind when ordering.

B005NGPUWY.AEO8J1Z91SXGD.reviewText: Why would one ever consider spending that kind of money on jeans...esp. if they are not made in America?  That is way too much money for a pair of mail order jeans.  OR, I need a better paying job.
B005NGPUWY.AEO8J1Z91SXGD.summary: Are you freakin' kidding me?  $200+ for a pair of freakin' jeans.

B005NGPUWY.A338169O96E88N.reviewText: Diesel knows how to make a pair of jeans, no question about that. The material is butter-soft, the distressing is just-so. The problem is that most of their jeans seem to be made for the fashionable Italian young men, read thin. I am not thin. I'm not particularly fat, either--the problem has never been with the waist, but rather the thighs and..ah..bottom. Enter the Larkee-RELAXED (caps mine). I usually wear a 33 waist comfortably, but having tried these on at a brick and mortar store, I realized that due to the relaxed cut, I needed to go down to a 32. These are comfortably snug. Why 4/5? Well I'd give a 4.75/5 if I could. The only complaint is the illusion of a flare at the bottom. They don't actually flare out, I think they are pretty straight. But, the trend towards a slight taper in the leg lately gives the illusion of a flare. Maybe I'm imagining that though. Best bet, try them on at a B&M.

B005NGRLB2.A1H44DSQ5UC70C.reviewText: As usual with "D", the sizing is inconsistent in terms of waist, rise and inseam. Good design but I have moved on to other brands because of the inconsistent measurement quality of this brand. PS: I have 8 pair of "D" jeans that are supposedly the same size and the all fit differently! DRW

B005OAE93U.A2OH5YABEFWSSL.reviewText: I have several pairs of Diesel denims and I prefer the brand.  That being said, these are an inch longer in length than advertised so I will have to have them shortened.

B005OAE93U.A2WHFJLN0R2PD6.reviewText: This is my first pair of Diesel jeans, I really liked them. I got 30x34's and they fit like a glove, good leg length. A little snug on the thighs, but I've got somewhat muscular thighs, so thats fine, and it shows them off a little bit.  The material is very high quality as well of course. They're my new favorite pair of jeans.
B005OAE93U.A2WHFJLN0R2PD6.summary: Very nice, fit like a glove

B005OAE93U.AW7YSWHPOHRYE.reviewText: Read previous reviews that said they fit small. I ordered one size larger (36/32) and guess what. They were one size larger. So I had to return them. Order you true size. They're stretch fabric. Very comfortable. The only reason I didn't give them 5 stars is there was no mention they had a button fly.

B005OAE93U.A3B3WX7B4WA2GE.reviewText: This is my second pair of these. I wore the last pair so often that I wore through the, um, crotch. I had them patched, and then wore through the patch... No doubt this new pair will eventually suffer the same fate - made worse by the light weight of the denim. But they look so good and are so comfortable to wear (due to the slight stretch in the fabric) that I don't care!

B005OAE93U.AF17U0FOH6SC6.reviewText: Now I remember why I love to wear this particular brand and style of jeans. The fit is impeccable. The material has almost a light denim feel to it. And the most important thing is that my girlfriend loves how I look in these jeans. If I need another pair, then I'm most likely going to purchase from this seller because the item arrived earlier than the expected delivery date and was in the as-described condition.

B005OAFMJA.A1N40I9TO33VDU.reviewText: These jeans are in stone-washed or sanded heavy blue denim, as accurately depicted in product photos. They have a lowrise hip-sitting style, and straight-cut full leg.  They are well-made, in Tunisia, with strong stitching and rivet reinforcing in the right places, and double belt loops for ease of wear with wide or thin belts. Consistent with the grunge fashion look, washing or sanding has been taken to the stage that the fabric is threadbare or has a couple of actual holes for an instant well-worn appearance. The fly closure is by metal buttons: I prefer zippers. Button fly closure and the relatively high price ($145.99 when I purchased) are the only features of this garment that stop it being five star for me.One of the most notable aspects of this product is that it is offered in longer than regular leg lengths. My 36x36 size is hard to find in men's casual pants or jeans - typically 36-inch waist pants come only in a 34-inch inner leg measurement.Recommended to men with similar problems to me in finding long leg lengths in casual pants, and to anyone looking for this general style.
B005OAFMJA.A1N40I9TO33VDU.summary: Well-made heavy denim jeans with long leg sizes and an instant grunge look

B005OAFMJA.AAZ6B5VUFH7AT.reviewText: I have been a long time Gap jeans guy.  Looking for something more stylish I found Diesel calling.  I loved the Amazon price of these and ordered away.  When I looked in the mirror I was very impressed how well these fit.  They made the Gap jeans look baggy on my back, and while these sit rather low on the hips, I really enjoyed the feel.  My wife doesn't want me in any other jeans and comments regularly how good they look.  I am not really a fan of the roughed up partial holes that are supposedly stylish, but they came exactly as described.  Beyond the awesome fit they are very sturdy feeling with double belt loops that make you feel they were designed to withstand guys ripping their belts off.  (Perhaps this happens with women enjoying the fit so well, but I'm married so nothing happens at that speed anymore.)Sadly, I have been looking for a more solid color Diesel jean without scuffs and have had 2 pairs that were not even close to fitting as well as these.  I am likely about to buy a 2nd pair of these.  This is a plus for this pair, but too bad for the brand or other vendors.

B005OAFMJA.ARK8JTMYVYJ8N.reviewText: The left trouser leg is destroyed by a knife, An incision longer than 5cm is a fashion design by DIESEL ??

B005OAG01E.A1DTNINGJLWOHU.summary: ITS DIFFERENT ITEM ITS MADE IN TUNISIA INSTEAD OF ITALY AND STYLE ITS NOT SAFADO ITS LARKEE REGULAR- STRAIGHT!

B005OAGZ9G.A3EXKQN42DEWNJ.reviewText: I have purchased this pair of jeans for my partner who wears a 40/32 size. I've bought many jeans for him in the past, and they all fit, more or less.This pair fit him at the waist and lengthwise, but it failed to cover his butt entirely, leaving the "cheeks" half-exposed. It seems like this cut is suitable for guys with flatter butts. I had to return it. (The return was not processed yet, I will update my review when it is).Too bad - the pair appears to be very well made, with good, sturdy fabric and clean seams. It looks like one of the best jeans brands I've purchased.Also note - this model has buttons, not zipper. I did not realize this until I got the shipment. I think the photos or descriptions should include mention of this, as some guys hate buttons.

B005YNVSPE.AAQC9GZJPHIJQ.reviewText: I remember owning a pair of Diesel shoes a long time ago and they fell apart right away. I haven't purchased another pair of footwear from Diesel in years, but when I started looking for a pair of flip-flops, these showed up. I figured I would give these a try and I'm glad I did. The quality of the flip-flops is excellent. How can rubber flip-flops be "well made"? You will know when you pick these up. They are very comfortable and they feel sturdy. To be honest, I find them much more comfortable than Rainbow flip-flops and there's no breaking in period. However, because the sole is very thin rubber (thinner than most flip-flops), I would not recommend these for long treks anywhere. These should be worn strictly to the beach, grocery store, etc. whenever you don't expect to do too much walking because they offer little protection against the elements. They are expensive, but they look nice and are one of the few things you will find made in Italy. Ordered another pair in black just for some versatility.
B005YNVSPE.AAQC9GZJPHIJQ.summary: Great flip-flops for extra casual wear

B0063NTJKK.A1HGGD1DGAUWNJ.reviewText: I *love* these jeans-- the flared bootcut looks awesome on skinny guys with bigger feet-- de-emphasizes your feet nicely.The really low cut rise also makes long legs look more proportional- the thighs are not loose, but depending on the type of denim can be kinda snug-- I love them. Very shapely.The people whining about the fit didn't read the description or try a pair on somewhere before shooting off about how poorly they fit THEM.It is important to do a search for each color/style online to see how the jeans actually look-- sometimes the stock images don't precisely match the actual jean.All said, I've been wearing these for nearly 10 years (over 10 pair), and they're far and away my favorites-- AMAZING!!!!

B0066T354M.A2HR6BHRUTGYF7.reviewText: Just wanted a nice watch for every day/semi formal occasions. Came across this one on amazon. Looked nice in the pics, when I received it, it was even better. The construction is simple and solid. The band is a great width with the right adjustments. It's slightly oversized, but not to the point of overkill. The wife even approves of it. Def worth considering if you are in the market for a similarly priced watch.

B0066T354M.A1X7VXGTAXF4MJ.reviewText: It has a great dial and a sporty look. obviously the brand has a huge impact although the strap seems mediocre.

B0066T364G.A2PJYTDF5FRMAK.reviewText: This watch was beyond nice. It is genuine quality leather and fits big wrist men as well. It is very white and it has a modern clean look. It comes in a fancy leather like box so no need to gift wrap and it is encased sitting upon a fancy leather like pillow in the box. It also comes with a warranty of craftsmanship and I made in Japan. This is a top quality, top notch, smooth, clean, watch that will make any man happy! Get it! It looks even nicer in person!!!!Also about the shipper, very quick service. Legit business!
B0066T364G.A2PJYTDF5FRMAK.summary: The nicest leather male watch on Amazon for the price!!

B0066T364G.AT5J080CQNR.reviewText: As other reviewers have mentioned this is a big heavy watch, which was just what I was looking for.Great design, clear to read and looks good on the wrist.But, the leather strap is a little too short for people with big wrists. I have a normal size wrist and with only 3 hoops left on the strap the retaining band is only just covering the end of the strap. I feel that the strap needs to be at least half an inch longer.The strap is a good quality piece of leather - I was surprised how thick it was, but I am happy with it like that.Those with big wrists be warned you this watch strap may be too short for you.For everyone else - great watch, yes it is heavy, but great all the same.

B0066T364G.A31K5U7GL0YOMV.reviewText: I'm a female who has fairly small wrists, but I love big watches. Therefore, I found this watch to be the perfect size, incredibly stylish (for someone who is style challenged), and has earned me so many compliments. The leather looks very nice, has so many size options, even adjusting as small as my wrists, and is easy to set.I've always been a lover of Fossil watches, and I'm not exactly sure how Diesel connects under the Fossil brand, but I see them sold together. Thus, this product is made with great quality and I love it just as much, if not more, than my other Fossil watches.The metal and face has resisted scratching for the occasional bump into walls, which I appreciate. And the calendar, which includes the day of the week, is fabulous. One of my most basic requirements is for the watch to have a calendar, but this one goes a step above with the day of the week. It even offers this is multiple languages.

B0066T364G.A1PXJQ70TAZMPS.reviewText: Wow for the price and looking nice and everybody asking me where I got this from ?As I requested received.

I will have to wrap two gifts now dang it :)

Anyways, I just wanted to point out that they run long. I ordered 30x32 and I had to have them hemmed. I am 5"10 150lbs. Waist was fine but to long so I would recommend ordering them a bit smaller in length. Tailor said they were actually 34" long when she measured them.

But it was just a trivial thing and I only sent them back because I'm really picky about things like that. Most people wouldn't have even noticed. The map of Manhattan on the bottom is my favorite thing about them. Awesome deal for a pair of Diesels.

B006GVP04I.A1APYRYG5KILUR.reviewText: I bought this watch for my husband who loves big watches.  Holy cow - this might now be the biggest watch he owns.  The face almost covers the palm of my hand.  It is also very thick, much thicker than other large faced watches.  This size of watch is for the guy who can definitely pull it off, otherwise it will overwhelm his arm, hand, wrist, etc.  It comes with a dictionary sized instruction booklet that strangely enough, doesn't even include this model (there's a helpful instructional video on setting it on You Tube).  You can set four different times on it if that's your thing, and has a chronograph if you ever really need it.  The dials are pretty hard to read, but it's more of a fashion statement than anything.  And a pretty hard fashion statement to miss.  I wouldn't get it as an only watch or anything - like I said, it's pretty hard to actually read the time on it.  Get it for the watch aficionado.  That being said, my husband just ran out in a blizzard to get it adjusted so he could wear it to dinner.  I think that means he gives it 5 stars.

B006GVP04I.AVBZW0C0RKETP.reviewText: This is a very big watch!!!! but i thought it would be kind of goddy looking...but actually looks nice on the wriest...and fairly comfortable for a watch this size......the only reason I'm giving it a 4 star is if you do a fair amount of physical work its easy to snag the crown pull it out and mess up the date....one day i must of reset the date 6 or 7 times...other than that great watch......

As a man of 6 feet 200+ pounds this watch is not too big but could be for anyone who's shorter or evn taller and thinner. Had to have one link removed so it could sit like a watch and not a huge bracelet. Took it to the diesel store and ended up buying a wallet... Which I also love.One issue. If you have low or no ambient light you will not be able to read the time as the watch has no luminous qualities... beauty at a cost of some practicality.

B006GVP04I.A2OY9L41PYEKZQ.reviewText: I've had this watch for 14 months.  It looks fantastic.  It feels great on my wrist.  It's heavy like you'd expect from a watch this size and people notice it and comment on it.  But, with a watch this size, I'd expected the components to be a little heavier duty.  They aren't.  The crown of the main movement broke after about 9 months.  The post of the crown seemed very small for it's size.  Diesel did fix it under warranty, but it cost me shipping to get it there and back.  Now, several months later, a screw that holds the band to the watch fell out and went missing.  I tried to purchase a replacement screw from Diesel but they refuse to sell me one.  Apparently only their licensed repair technicians are qualified to tighten a screw into place on their brand of watch.  No one else could possibly figure out whether the righty-tighty/lefty-loosey rule applies to Diesel watches.  So now I have to send it back in to be fixed, though they are footing the shipping this time, and it will be another month before I can wear it.  It's too bad really, because this watch is very attractive but I wish I'd bought a different brand.  The quality of the components doesn't meet the demand of the heft of this watch.
B006GVP04I.A2OY9L41PYEKZQ.summary: Looks great, feels great, but build quality not there...

The color of the watch is very nice as well as it isn't your run of the mill black nor is it a tacky Gold or Silver/white color.The watch is big in all aspects. I'm not really big myself if you were worried like myself about the size of the watch in regards to band length most watch repair places will do it for free. I had 2 links removed to make it fit well for free.TL;DR: The watch is high quality and big and will get you noticed.
