This design trend seems to be an interesting one that has been coming out of some really fun Italian design houses (Diesel, Welder, etc.) for awhile, so, as Diesel says, "only the brave".  I was looking for something in the brown-bronze class with a sense of age to the case.  That is exactly what this has.  I got a second band for it, custom made by Old-School Leather that is wide enough to shift the look to something to more US road warrior and a better balance on the wrist.  Look, this is a good, big, tough, unique watch that makes a statement, nothing subtle about it so just know that going in and then own the attitude that comes with it!

B006GVP2VY.A3AF1Z0WJVH9M9.reviewText: I ordered thiswatch on a whim. I have many wonderful clients but this couple standvout es especially lovely; she is easy to gift tonbut I didn't know what to get him. While cruising the website for something for myself - I have 3 Deisel watches so was in there... this watch leapt off the pagecat me for this gentleman. He loves cool watches - not expensive,  more interesting multi-functional is his style. He's not big but is buffed from sports. They were leaving Kauai where they have a wonderful home and this thing came earlier - the day of departure! So I was excited. When I opened the familiar Deisel box that changed to panic! I freaked at the size!  Then I got my senses back and became excited to see if he liked it! One look and it was love in his eyes. He took off the neat watch he had on; put on the new acquisition and declared he had the plane ride to Phoenix to get familiar with the watch. We can call him The Deisel Man now. So it eas a great success and everybody wore a warm glow... as other reviews say, now that you know all about the size just keep this fascinating watch in mind as a gift for them; they will love it and I think you are especially bold and a risk-taker- ehile being so ingenious. Short version: this big watch is nicer than you thought it would be, better looking, and your gift receiver will think you are ready for that next big job! Take the chance...

B006MWQWVG.A2EHYCA29NSQLU.reviewText: Like other Diesel jeans I have, these are wonderful quality with rich effects.  I love the slightly-stretchy cotton fabric.  They also come in the rare size that I wear.HOWEVER, there is nothing relaxed or straight about these.  They are tapered jeans, more like a skinny fit.  I have very long legs and I workout almost every day, so I don't have skinny legs, and I don't want a skinny fit jean.  My other straight-leg Diesels are straight and one of my favorite jeans (and other people comment so, too).  Don't know what happened with these jeans.Another ding is that these ride pretty high.  I have a proportionally short torso, so I need low-rise.  These are pretty conservative and thus also don't fit me well.As far as size, I found the waist to be spot-on while the inseam was a fairly long, which actually suits me better since I am closer to a 35 inseam.

B006MWQWVG.A1YO6XDM2MR3AZ.reviewText: I bought Diesel Men's Larkee Relaxed 8W7 Relaxed Straight Leg Jean, Denim, 30x30 for myself.It's High quality material. I like the button fly.

Also, order one size down in the waist.

B006MX56JY.A1WX6SDHV25UXM.reviewText: I have a confession to make, I am a Diesel fanatic, I absolutely love these jeans. Sure they may be a little on the pricy side but you get what you pay for. I've had the same pair of diesel jeans for nearly 8 years and they are still in great shape, no holes, no rips and no fades. These jeans really hold up so if you add up all the years that you may buy a pair of $40-$50 jeans compared to one pair of diesels, then you will probably end up spending more on the cheaper jeans. Whats more is that Diesel jeans fit and they fit extremely well too. I have large muscular legs, yet I look fantastic in my Diesels. Can't go wrong with them.

B006MX6IW8.A2IHDSWGOJBZ2Q.reviewText: I bought a pair of Diesel Saffado jeans a while back.  They were too big. I washed them to see if they would shrink.  They didn't. I called Amazon, they said to return, no problem.  When I looked at my bill they had charged me 25% of the retail cost because I washed them.  These arrived and are too large too.  So do I return them and get screwed out of another 25% or just keep them and have them bunched up with a tight belt.  I won't be buying any clothes from Amazon.com again.  With this return policy, if it doesn't fit as soon as you pull it out of the box, put it back in box with a big note saying it hasn't been worn, washed or anything...and hopefully you'll get a full refund, but don't count on it.  Amazon seems to think this way of doing business is ok.  They won't be earning any more of my money on clothing.  (Please read Amazon's return policy on clothing, it states, once the product is opened it it considered used or will charge a restocking fee.)EDIT UPDATE:  Talked with Amazon, not going to charge the 'restocking' fee, which come to find out was $67.00 on the previous pair of Saffado Diesel Jeans.  (the most ridiculous thing I've ever heard)So I went ahead and ordered a size smaller.  It's 3 days later and the jeans have STIILL not been shipped.Amazon is great on some of their in stock items, but some of their items are just slow and turn into nightmares.
B006MX6IW8.A2IHDSWGOJBZ2Q.summary: Sizes are large, Amazon's return policy is deceptive

B006ZMLAJC.A26WERB3EL2JD3.reviewText: I have always been a watch person, and finally decided to find myself a "nice" watch. I spend days looking for the perfect watch (i even went to some stores in my area, with no luck.) I looked at many Diesel, Fossil, Nixon, and more watches and finally came to this one. I'm not too big on the "fancy watches" with all the nonsense dials, in which i'm sure the majority of the people that buy them don't know how to read them, or even try. (just an opinion, to each their own though.)This watch is perfect for someone who wants a really nice, but yet a simple watch.It looks much nicer in person as well, the black finish is great, and looks good with pretty much all clothing. I can't really comment on the durability considering i haven't had it for too long, but it feels like very high quality. The metal, glass, and the leather band all feel great.Pros:Elegant looking. from the dials, matte-metal finish, leather band, etc.Nice weight to it.Doesn't feel, or look cheap what-so-ever, but also doesn't look like a "try hard" watch.Branding isn't obnoxious.The leather box it came in is even nice? lolCons:Doesn't glow in the dark (minor con, i guess).Leather band replacements are half the price of the watch (about $25-$35). After finding that out, this is just my "casual" watch.With the leather band, its hard to put on/take off (very minor, since this is most likely with any leather band watch).(Obviously i'm just trying to find cons, lol. since there isn't much to NOT like about this watch.)Overall, this watch is definitely worth the money.

B006ZMLAJC.A27TRXKVO0M82J.reviewText: The image on my computer makes the band appear medium gray, it is actually black with nearly an all black face, so it doesn't look like the image on my computer. Still, it is beautiful.

I don't know about you but I sometimes feel when one is a guy looking for swim wear today one is torn between trying to select something that looks like a pair of jammer or pajamas that practically hit my knees or a speedo that shouldn't be worn by anyone over 20 years old. I was fortunate to find a more sane middle of the road design that looks like some of the better swim wear from the 1980's. I am not sure what has happened to swim suits over the last decade that has made them look more and more wiggerish and clownish but it is nice to see a nice solid retro design that fits well, looks good, and is comfortable to wear. Well worth the price.

B0076IVKSU.A1MUQISDPK8DZI.reviewText: I got these for a cruise that I was going on because I find most bathing suits to be extremely long and wanted something to help get as much sun as possible without being completely inappropriate in public.I was comforted by the picture that these came down to mid-thigh... maybe I was too busy looking at the model's abs and tan skin but wow.. this is a bit shorter than I was expecting; especially considering I have fairly short legs.I'm about 5'9" and this only came down about just past a third the distance from the inside of the groin to my knee which made me a little leary that I was about to show small children things that they shouldn't be seeing.I definitely like the styling and the material, and wouldn't mind the length had I not been on a large cruise ship. Just wanted to warn people about the risk of exposing themselves.. Oh, they do have a liner though.. so you won't accidentally flash your manhood to an unsuspecting passerby.. that would be embarrassing/slightly illegal.

B007AR8CA6.A1DOTQ0GGTP79H.reviewText: Absolutely fantastic wash and fit. If you're looking for a no-fade color treatment Diesel jeans, but still an awesome chromatic and visual texture, 0888Q I believe is a unique wash. Much nicer and richer than 8880K for example, which is also a pretty good wash. As far as the fit goes, it is relatively consistent with Diesel sizing, maybe a little bit on the snugger side. The fabric is of course firmer than some of the intensively treated washes, which is only natural, but it's nowhere near what the other reviewer claimed. All in all these are great jeans with a unique wash and awesome fit.

I would not recommend you buy these if this will be your primary or one of the primary sneakers you wear. B007C88NHK.A2H1FWWCT0FQQX.reviewText: Wasn't expecting much when I saw this as an Amazon Goldbox Deal of the Day. Usually you expect it to be of items that haven't sold well and that Amazon is just looking to remove from stock. However, these sneakers are pretty darn nice for the price. Consisting of several brown leathers and the customary Diesel strap, it is both stylish and casual. I've worn them out a few times when out with friends at night and have even received a compliment or two on them which is quite rare since I don't even get compliments on my Gucci, Janoskis, Toms, or Costume National sneakers. Its just something about the design of these sneakers that says out to have fun, but with some class I guess.Very comfortable and the Diesel tag does say they will fade and obtain a vintage look over time when worn regularly, but personally I prefer the modern sleek and shine look, so I'll have to keep these guys well-maintained.It also comes with red and brown shoelaces, which is a nice bonus if you want to make these pop a little more with the red. Excellent sneakers for the price and I'll definitely have to look towards buying more shoes from Diesel in the future.

B007C88NHK.A2Z5S6CA3QVC19.reviewText: Really nice sneakers.  I've received several compliments for them.  Fit and comfort is very good.  The suede parts are nice, but the biggest part of the side is a cheaper looking semi-glossy woven nylon or polyester.  For the price that is disappointing.My green shoes came with both white and green laces, which is nice.
B007C88NHK.A2Z5S6CA3QVC19.summary: Great sneakers, slightly disappointed in materials

B007C89NTC.A2Z143QC5T90WG.reviewText: Black part of the sole peeled up in the back after literally 3 days of light wear.  They're going back.Update:  they're not going back <grin>, and he's going to glue them, which irks me a bit (ok, a lot).  But, it does seem lame to waste the fuel to ship them back and get a new pair, which could also be faulty.  Easier and less wasteful to just glue them, but I resent his having to glue new shoes I bought him as a gift.I think these layered soles are probably prone to split and he likes the look.  WTF ever.  ;-)  You should probably consider a more durable shoe, unless you just love the look and like gluing.  He says they're ridiculously comfortable,which is great, so I changed the rating to a 2.  That's as generous as it gets after gluing shoes <shudder>

B007C8B174.A1WPT6YV1GDWGI.reviewText: I love Diesel shoes. They always fit me well. I have the Color: Black-H4416-PS873H4416.  I really think this black leather looks like a very dark Navy, especially on the sides.  I got this shoe for the blue material (non leather), so I could have a blue shoe in my wardrobe without it being overwhelmingly blue. This pairs great with jeans, and their pretty narrow, so they look good with slimmer jeans. Most my jeans are relaxed and these look good with those too.  The tan is a nice touch to keep it light.I haven't had them very long, but I seem to be going to them a lot, and not just because they're new, but because they're the shoe that fits my style most often.  I have other Diesel shoes that have held up pretty well, so I expect to have these for a long time.UPDATE:  I have had these shoes over a year now and the tips of them have peeled off quite a bit, so I used shoe glue to fix them.  This would make me give them 4.5 stars instead of 5, but I'm rounding up and keeping the 5 rating.  I expect the shoe glue will keep them in good shape for a while.  I wear these shoes probably more often than any other shoe because they just match so much.  These haven't held up as well as my other Diesel shoes, but maybe because I go to them so often.

B007C8CC2W.A7ISTG9S8X5MX.reviewText: I have been very happy with these shoes, in terms of their fit, durability.  They can be worn with casual attire, and business casual as well. In a stretch I can even pull off business decorum with them on as well.

B007C8CC2W.AJ8PK32ABUPRA.reviewText: No doubt they would win 5 stars from me if it was just about looks. I love them. But there are a couple of not-so-great points I need to deduct: they don't breathe very well. Your feet could get sweaty if you get too warm. Also, the navy (ebony?) color textile on top wrinkles too easily when you walk. I'm not talking the permanent kind of wrinkle when your shoes get old, just the wrinkle that appears when you bend the shoe: the top layer of the textile is very thin (nylon?) and it will show too many of those wrinkles whenever the show is not perfectly straight (stretched) - you can actually see it in the pictures. All in all, those are minor points, but something good to know about when you buy online, since you can't touch it. Overall a great purchase, I'll keep them.

B007C8NF8M.A3H3UDTD2XGJG5.reviewText: I get lots of compliments on these.  Very comfortable, and adds a little extra height and are very stylish.  I've had them for 6 months, and they are holding up well. I wouldn't want to stand for too long in them, as there is not a lot of cushioning.  I like the outside zipper--adds some style.

B007C8NF8M.A2F16RQITJE4S2.reviewText: Awesome boots. Nice leather and the diesel emblem above the heel is barely noticeable. The sole of the boot is very sturdy and makes a great sound when your feet it the floor. These are definitely not work boots or a pair of kicks you'll want to whoop the day's ass in. The leather bottom has no traction is extremely slippery which will most likely provoke you to attempt to moonwalk your way around for a bit until you scuff em up enough to hold the earth. The zipper is fantastic; it makes me want zippers next the laces on every pair of shoes I own (not really). I like the high tongue as well, cool for holding some slim fit pants into the top of the boot. I would recommend these boots to anyone that has the style and wardrobe to pull them off. Also they are quite skinny boots, probably very comparable in width to a pair of sperry topsiders. If you have wider feet they'll most likely stretch with time like the leather sperrys, but you know the blisters you'd have to endure on that fratty adventure.
B007C8NF8M.A2F16RQITJE4S2.summary: Diesel Men's Mil Boot,Coffee Bean,12 M US

B007C8NF8M.A2P5MYBUK1QNTY.reviewText: It's hard to rate something fairly that you bought and couldn't use because the sizing was so off. Everything about the boot seemed to be of quality. The leather was nice and soft, like they had been your favorite boot for a while.But, the fit was not even close to right. I ordered up a size 12, which is guaranteed to work for me in all types of shoes/boots. A size 12 may be even a bit large sometimes. These 12s were extremely snug. Lenghthwise, they may have been OK, but right below the bottom of the eyelets, the boot didn't have nearly enough vertical room for my foot. I really had to step on it to jam my foot in there. The size was printed on the sole of the boot, so it should have been what they considered a 12. My foot is normal in size and shape, just a little wide.
B007C8NF8M.A2P5MYBUK1QNTY.summary: Nice Boot, but a Poor Fit for Me

B007C8NF8M.AUT948KG29EM7.reviewText: Diesel has a reputation of producing quality products.  Based on this, I was willing to give these a shot and bought them online.  However, I was very disappointed with what arrived.  The quality of leather used was much lighter than what I expected.  Granted, I was looking for a fashion alternative to combat boots - and did expect them to not be as rugged as traditional combat boots, but this was much lighter construction than what I'd even expected.  Additionally the zippers on the outside of the boot turned out to be more difficult to deal with than traditional jump boot zippers located on the inside.  I'm not sure why Diesel elected to put the zippers there, but from an ergonomics and  convenience standpoint, their choice is flawed.  The biggest flaw in the construction however are the lace hooks.  First, they are made of cheap pot metal that bends when you put stress on them ...like when you lace up the boots!  If the hooks bend out just from the stress of the boots being worn - something is wrong.  Second, one of the hooks actually just pulled right out of the leather.  The rivet section holding the hook in place is far too small and the leather is far too lightweight to do the job.  This was the tipping point for me ...to pay that kind of money and get that kind of quality was shocking.  So i returned these Diesel boots and will not go back to that brand.  I did find exactly what I wanted however in the GBX Bould.  It was less expensive, better made, devoid of hooks and had the zippers on the inside of the boot.

B007C8NF8M.A2BTOB0QYZIWV1.reviewText: I have another pair of Diesel boots that I got a over three years ago and they are much heavier (heftier?) than these.  I don't know to what this is due but I hope the newer ones are not of lesser quality.  My older boots were worn every week and have been through a lot (snow, rain, etc) and they have endured and weathered well.  I'm concerned that the leather on these new ones is much thinner and they may not take the same beating as the othersl.  Time will tell.  Other than that, they are true to size and look great.

B007C8NF8M.A1VB7O2W2CKPDP.reviewText: I wouldn't go so far to call this pair of boots girlfriend material, mostly because you can't date a pair of boots.They're comfortable, they fit really really nicely, and they're made well. With a small caveat: the soles are leather, with rubber heels. And within a week these rubber heels fell off. It's not like I was running or kicking or anything in these, they're dress boots!So I had to fabricate little replacement heels out of flexible plastic and epoxy them in place of the broken rubber ones. It was a little ghetto but it was better than getting the boots replaced with new boots with defective heels. I don't know.
B007C8NF8M.A1VB7O2W2CKPDP.summary: Beautiful yet flawed, like most girlfriends

B007C8NF8M.A2IHDSWGOJBZ2Q.reviewText: After putting these on, they could easily be worn as dress shoes. They are very nice and very well made. The leather heel is also very nice. The only reason for 4 instead of 5 stars is I had to return these as they do run a bit narrow.  It could be possible that they stretch out to a comfortable fit after a while, however, they were so narrow on my foot that they were hard to put on and take off.  Really was sad to return them with no wider size available. I will be searching the web to see if they do come in a wider version! The leather is soft like a glove, and the "Diesel" logo is very understated and does not detract from the casual to almost formal look of these boots.
B007C8NF8M.A2IHDSWGOJBZ2Q.summary: Very nice, well made, soft leather

B007C8OYMI.ACVX1RIBDI2OE.reviewText: I got the right size and color in my case at least.  It arrived in under a week.  The shoes are very light and comfortable. B007GO7UJ2.A32GY8K4T8Y33V.reviewText: I had been looking for a plain gold watch for a long time but didn't want one that I had seen everyone else wearing. I stumbled across a picture of this one on Instagram and tracked the make and the model number for it. Watch arrived within the dates promised, but it did seem like it took longer than normal. Could have just been my excitement though. Watch was brand new with tags and everything still on. Couldn't be happier! However, the gold has started to rub off on the band in certain parts, but I figured this would happen since it isn't real.

B007GO7UJ2.AK6R7G3K02Z0S.reviewText: Very impressed with this watch.  The detailing on the watch is lovely.  Love the matte gold color and that is not a shiny fake-looking gold watch.

B007GO7UJ2.A3TJVEWMFEHXOP.reviewText: As described and as in the picture. I was able to resize it to fit perfectly (given them my wrist is very small, my bracelet size is now 5.5inches)I just started wearing it and hope the gold color will not peel. Will update if any problemsI like the big size of it, very stylish.

B007GO8HC6.A29KJ1B32SL5FD.reviewText: When I first bought this watch I was concerned about the idea of silicone coating over stainless steel, thinking it may wear off. I am not worried anymore after receiving the watch. It has a thick coating that is soft and comfortable on the wrist. This feels like a quality watch that is worthy of a higher price tag, in my opinion. Comes in a nice unique box neatly packaged.+ Black Silicone Coated Straps, Yet the Sides Expose The Stainless Steel+ Comfortable+ Very Wide Case....Very Bold!!+ Great Price/Value+ Entire Seconds Hand and the Tips of the Hour and Minute Hands Glow Well in Darkness+ Excellent Feel Given the Size. Much Lighter Than Other Large Case Watches I have and Thinner. Excellent Fit!!+ Blue Hands On Chronograph Provides a Unique Look- No Cons_Bottom Line_ Yes, I would definitely recommend this watch to a friend. The watch is bold and catches the eye. I love the two-toned black and silver. The exposed sides on the strap are my favorite feature. FYI, Some images make the numbers 02 03 04 appear white. The watch I received is a dark grey. Not sure if there are other similar watches with white numbers and marks for each hour or not. I chose this one because I wanted the grey. Highly Recommended! Easy 5 Stars!
B007GO8HC6.A29KJ1B32SL5FD.summary: Excellent Quality, Beautiful Watch, Huge, Love it!!

B007GO8HC6.A12SM1BHG7SXKQ.reviewText: I bought this watch because of its size. I thought since my vision is not getting any better, a big watch would allow me to see better. Well, I was right about the size. It is big, but it time and date are not clear. The gray/dark blue tones on black make it hard to read and require glasses if you need glasses to read.The watch is also extremely heavy.I definitely have buyer remorse.

It's not everyone's thing, but that's to be expected when your watch is 52MM wide.It's comfortable and easy to set, but the chronograph dials are almost impossible to read; they are really just for decoration.  Minus one star for this.I can't really call this a "con" because the watch isn't advertised as having one, but I really wish it had a date display.

The white rubber band on the watch feels great and not at all cheap and is styled to the likeness of a tank track (IMO). The yellow hands used for the chrono timer on the silver face are very striking. The watch is heavy and solid feeling. An overall stunning watch.

A shout out to MrWatch and the US Postal Service for shipping it in a very timely matter. MrWatch also gave me a 10% off coupon towards my next order through them which I will take advantage of because they have impressed me very much. The watch was in perfect condition and looks great. It is definately the most attention grabbing watch out of my other 2 g-shock watches and a fossil watch. This watch is worth way more than it is selling for here and it is my new favorite watch. I hope this review helps!

B007H91NVW.A1JPV38OJAA104.reviewText: Yes, they are olive drab.  Haha.. okay, perhaps it wasn't quite that funny.  YOU come up with your own title and pretend my little bit of amusement was just an accident.  Now, are we ready for the review?Okay then...I like these shoes.  (DONE---- finished, time to go walk the ferret)No seriously.People comment on these shoes.  Normally this might be an unwelcome development but the comments come mostly from attractive young women so while I'm not saying that these shoes make me a chick-magnet, they do however attract attention from a demographic that is fun to talk with, even if the topic never goes beyond shoes.They make me look a little more casual with black pants, a sort of hipster-bohemian chic, although hipsterism is vastly over-rated, I already spoke of the social benefits of these shoes, and the aesthetic lies in the eyes of those who behold and/or wear them.The shoes are slightly comfortable though I cannot imagine anyone wearing these shoes without some sort of insert-able insole  I use a gel insert and suddenly they are nice and lush and soft inside.  The shoes are not made for comfort or distance, but can be made comfortable despite themselves.  Your actual mileage may vary depending on the tenacity of your feet.A good looking shoe. Unusual. Somewhat eye-catching.  Set yourself apart.  Stop trying to be an individual for goodness sake, capitulate to your inner Imelda Marcos!  (just kidding)  Don't hide your inner sole (get it...?)I like these shoes.  (I wrote that before didn't I....?)The end.
B007H91NVW.A1JPV38OJAA104.summary: These sneakers are the olive in my martini

B007ZHW46E.A27EN7AZCBJVJ2.reviewText: In terms of appearance this watch is at the more conservative end of the Diesel style scale but it still offers that dash of forward fashion so much associated with the brand. Perhaps we should think of it as a good "entry level" Diesel timepiece. :)In person it is more striking than the pictures here convey. The face is more of a bluish-grey than the grey shown here, and overall it catches the eye in a way that does not come across in the stock photos.The functions provided are basic -- current time along with the day of the month. But what else do you need in a casual watch? The stainless steel case has just enough heft and the brown leather strap is attractive as well as extremely comfortable on the wrist. And, important for me, the time is easy to read at a glance.This is a masculine and stylish timepiece well-suited to those who tend to be more cautious and traditional, like me and maybe like you too!

B0081XTI9C.A2R1JZGI53KSM5.reviewText: This style solves so many fashion problems. These are a good mid-weight for Spring and Fall and a great classic color with no distressing.  I work in retail, and the Highkee is my favorite jean that I've bought in years! Which is why I had to buy a second pair. The higher waist lengthens legs, makes my butt look awesome, and~ is the perfect rise to wear with all of the shorter shirts in my wardrobe! (The trend right now is shorter tops, so get ready.)  These are more comfortable than other high-waisted jeans I have.  I'm about a 26" waist, 35" hip, and these fit like a glove at first, and then give a little. Enough to be comfortable when lounging around, but still flattering. I'm 5"5", and they are a little longer on me than on the long-legged model in the picture. By the way, I sold the black Highkee in the store I manage, and I got rave reviews from ladies who got them.

B0083G0PTY.A120XCEVZVX87W.reviewText: I ordered these from Amazon directly, not a 3rd party vendor, so I was confident that they would be authentic.  I had done research about confirming authenticity, plus I had been in the Diesel store in Miami, but unfortunately at the time, I wasn't paying much attention to the tags themselves.  They didn't have my size in the pair I wanted, I came to Amazon and placed this order.  The jeans were absolutely gorgeous, a bit too small in the waist, but I knew I could exchange them.  Unfortunately, I checked out the inner tag of the waist and discovered they were fake.  They did not have the microstitching that authentic ones are supposed to have had and there was no set of numbers above the indian head.  In addition, the description said made in Italy, yet they were made in Tunisia.  I know that authentic Diesels are also made in Tunisia, Romania, etc, but given everything else, I felt I had been duped.  Even though I got 20% off, I paid $174.  So as pretty as they were, I returned them instead of an exchange.  I then went to Diesel's official online store and they were having a 30% off Spring special so I ordered some there, knowing there would be no issues of authenticity.  I get the jeans and guess what?  Same thing.  No microstitching, no numbers over the indian head, made in Tunisia.  So for any of those using any of those examples to confirm a authenticity...don't!!  Apparently that is false information.  New real authentic Diesel jeans do not carry the special microstitching or the hard to read set of numbers above the Indian head.  My Amazon purchase was authentic all along and as long as you purchase straight from the, you should feel confident that they are the real thing.

B0084DESFI.A3610KQJTX9CCH.reviewText: Love, love, love these jeans! For me, certain styles of Diesel denim can always be counted on for a near-perfect balance of flattering fit, weight, wash and detail. These Zathan regular bootcut jeans have a gorgeous deep indigo wash that looks lived in but still rich in depth - a nice workable color that can transition easily from casual day to night. I hesitated before ordering because the bootcut thing seems so "done", depending on who you talk to, but these feature a modest leg opening that equates to more of a "wide straight" than an actual flare. I figure, once I get these hemmed (my only gripe with any designer jeans is length - I'm a short 5'9") the leg shape will work perfectly.

B0084DESFI.A27KEEAM47DS6A.reviewText: My friend had me try on a pair of Diesel Zathan jeans at the Diesel store in Seattle in August, 2008. I had never in my life spent $200 [or whatever they were] on a pair of jeans. I recall saying "Dude you're crazy" to which he replied, "You'll thank me". Funny enough, not only did I buy that pair because I freaking loved them the second I pulled them on, but I bought a pair just like them at the Santa Monica Diesel store in Dec. 2009 - I thought it was a good idea to have two pairs of the same. Subsequently, I lost 20 pounds so the 32x30's don't fit any more. When I switched to 31x30 I ordered them through Amazon and they fit as expected - didn't need to go to my Diesel store in Chicago and worry about taxes and commute time. Again after losing additional weight I moved down to the 30x30 and ordered online....they fit perfect and look great. If any of you are reading this you're probably annoyed but are seeing a common theme - you can expect a great fit and a great look no matter where you order these from. In other words, Diesel makes a consistent product and I've since purchased a different jean from them called New Fanker. A little bit of a step away from the Zathan but again, good look- good fit. The advantage to ordering online is obvious - find free/cheap shipping and avoid in-store taxes.
B0084DESFI.A27KEEAM47DS6A.summary: Brand loyalty continues here and will remain...

B0084XOTL6.A3M89SQFGAHGP3.reviewText: I mostly wear Levis 514 jeans but decided to try something different.These jeans look nice and are quite comfortable.  One thing I didn't expect was that each belt loop is actually 2 loops, which I both like and dislike.  On one hand it's nice when you hang other things off your belt loop, like a keychain (I have my keys on a carabiner).  On the other hand it's a pain trying to get the belt into the inside loop all the way around.When the jeans first arrived the material seemed stiff, but it loosened up without changing shape after being worn a couple times.  I ordered the 34x34, which is what all of my 514s are, and the waist on these jeans are a bit larger, more like 35 than 34.  If I were to buy another pair I'd get the 33 waist instead.Overall these are nice jeans that look great.  But I can get at least 3 pairs of Levi 514 for the same price, and with similar washes that look just as good.  Are these jeans worth the price?  Let's just say I'm glad I didn't pay full price.

B0084XOTL6.A3MFY26KDKSDW5.reviewText: I am the proud, and broke, owner of several pairs of Diesel jeans, as well as good ole American Levis.  Despite this, I saw these on a friend and commented on how good they looked, without knowing the brand immediately.  I immediately bought a pair (on sale) and haven't looked back.  They fit well, hold in the right places, aren't too tight to be considered "skinny" but fitted enough to pull of a stylish look with a collared shirt (or Polo), blazer, or t-shirt.  I abhor the "distressed" look, so they are a nice departure from that.  Dark indigo, with a few stitching details that are subtle, but appreciated.  And, best of all, as a traveler, jeans tend to be THE heaviest weight in an overnight/weekend back (next to shoes).  These are surprisingly lightweight!Stylish, form-fitting without being tight or skinny, lightweight, dark rich color, can be found at a (Diesel) bargain.  I found my new go-to jeans!

B008BTS6W6.AO2FXIAM4EKOS.reviewText: This is an awesome and big watch that looks incredible. I especially like the shade of gold used: it's neither too light nor too dark but just fantastic. The chronograph and 24 hour subdial feature is subtle and enhances the bold look of the watch. The actual watch looks much better than the picture.I like the quality Japanese movement and the quality made bracelet made in China. Everything about this watch exudes quality build. I was looking at the Nixon 51-30 gold for $500 but it does not have the second sweep hand, no chronograph and no 24 hour analog dial. The Nixon is rated 30 bars vs Diesel's 5 bars but since I am not going to use this watch to go scuba diving I am saving about $300.So, look no further for an awesome big gold watch - you won't regret it.Update: I just purchased the Nixon - 51-30 Chrono - All Gold and that is the ultimate gold bling watch. Although, this watch is incredible at half the price. Nixon is an actual divers watch and this watch is a fashion watch. Both are awesome, although the Nixon is the bomb.

B008BTS6W6.A32FBLOPNKAFS.reviewText: if you want people to be looking at your wrist this is the watch to get. its really big and shiny and it gets a lot of attention. i love it

B008BTS6W6.A25HJINTOZPTM2.reviewText: This watch is really sick. Starting with the design, it is clean and simple, but has a chunky feel to it, which is nice. Then the gold just sends it up to a high note. It looks better in person than it does in pictures because of how reflective it is. It is quite large, but not too large compared to some of the other Diesels. With that, it is about as heavy as you would expect. Not feather light or lead heavy, but a hefty few ounces. The timepiece and chronograph work well, but is that really the reason you buy this watch? Not really, but they are effective and clear to read (glow in the dark hour and minute hands), which makes it great for wearing at night. Overall, the watch looks great and performs at a high quality standard. Good buy.But seriously, this watch has gained me so many compliments in so many places. Random people come up to me all the time and tell me how awesome this watch is. I thought for a long time about buying this watch before I did, wondering if it would be too bold, but I have received nothing but positive feedback. If you are considering buying, but aren't sure, just do it. As Diesel says it's "only the brave" that will wear it and there is great satisfaction in doing so.

B008BTSBBW.A2M7XEVIV9E0Y5.summary: Beautiful watch and solid BIG watch !

B008BTSBBW.A1VJBXLQK8VSF7.reviewText: Bought this watch as a gift for my boyfriend. He wanted a large face on it and had been looking at a Seiko that runs about $400 instead. I saw this and chose this for him --about $200 less than the one he wanted. Plus, the face was larger. I love the watch---all the dials work, they have their own functions. I hate to see a watch with so many extra dials for aesthetics and NOT WORK. My boyfriend didn't like the watch when he first put it on, but now its his go to time piece for just kickin' about and loves it. It is a huge watch and a tad heavy, however, it is a solid made watch. Another plus, it has a 2 year warranty.

B008BTSBBW.A3L9Z3PULP7PCV.reviewText: I purchased a Diesel a month or so ago and became addicted to the brand.  They make amazing watches.  I couldn't take it any longer and bought this one.  First off, it's a MAN'S watch.  It's large, steel, and tough looking.  I wore it for the first time the other day and people couldn't stop complementing me on the watch.  I had people begging me to know where I got it.I absolutely love this watch, it looks amazing, and if you are into watches, as I am, as this is the 26th watch in my collection, you need to purchase this!!  Don't fool yourself, it's a large watch, so understand that it's big, and not everyone can wear that.  However, BUY IT!!!  It's amazing.

B008BTSBBW.A3O2FT7Z1UGC5G.reviewText: This is my second diesel watch purchased from the same seller and fulfilled by Amazon,  The first one did not keep accurate time and the crown fell off after 1 week.  My second one does not have the crown problem, but still loses > hour per day (sometimes).  I'm a white collar worker, so the watch never gets put in rough situations.  I wish the problem was consistent so I could blame the battery.  I love the style, weight, and feel of the watch.  I'll probably try to buy it again from a different seller or maybe find a store local to me to purchase.  If you just want it for fashion and you are a bigger guy, go for it.  I just hope you have better experience than me.  Also, people who buy the watch and don't realize how big it is, you need to own a tape measure.  It is very easy to figure out how big the case is.  Stop giving the watch bad reviews because you fail to do 5 seconds of measuring on your end.
B008BTSBBW.A3O2FT7Z1UGC5G.summary: Second Diesel watch, does not keep accurate time.

B008BTSBBW.A3VM51HUCBDVD0.reviewText: Very nice watch if you like big watches. It's rather big so not for people who like slender or small dials. I loved it. But we had a problem that within about a week of wearing it I noticed moisture on the inside dial which should not be the case in any watch leave alone a water proof 3 bar watch. Points to faulty manufacture / sealing. Maybe due to high humidity weather though it's cold where I am nowadays.I would definitely recommend the watch but be sure to check it to see you don't have the same moisture issue.But Amazon WAS AMAZING in the way the death with my issue. I am over seas for the next few months so could not return it in time. I just dropped them an email and they refunded the amount immediately. Even though this was an order from Zensar a retailer and NOT Amazon themselves .AMAZON just sets a new level customer experience and the speed of resolution and empowerment to their customer service staff is just best in class.KUDOS to Amazon . you have made an already loyal customer into a customer for life.
B008BTSBBW.A3VM51HUCBDVD0.summary: Good looking watch but could have moisture issues

I love the watch and I just had to buy it and hoping that if its too big I will either sell it or give some but that wasn't the case as it fit my size of person and it's really masculine .

No one aspect of it is big enough to match the size of the watch in my opinion but overall I am happy with it and as a fan of heavy big watches, this is the biggest and heaviest I have ever had. It is almost too big!

B008BTSBBW.ADSASXB5LKE8T.reviewText: It looks better when you wear it, it look big the first time you wear it, but after you start getting nice looks of others you'll never want to leave it away.

B008BTSBBW.AKT7NMMKXRPK6.reviewText: This watch is absolutely Gorgeous!! It looks very nice and masuline on. You definitely should not second guess buying this watch.

B008BTSBBW.AXMOSR732BBRP.reviewText: I received this watch for Christmas and I love it.  I have an average size wrist and I had to remove one link on each side of the spring release clasp for a perfect fit.  The band also has three holes for fine tuning which would equal one link.  The watch is accurate with two time zone settings, a calender and a stop watch with second display and 30 minute dial.  The face also includes a 24 hour dial that matches up with the main watch movement.  The finish is perfect, with polished, brushed and knurled textures on the stainless steel.  It is water resistant to 3 bar (3 ATM) or 110 feet but it should not be worn while swimming.  In other words it is water resistant for all normal daily water contact such as perspiration or rain.  The watch is beautiful and it will definitely get noticed.  I like the feel and the weight and the huge face of this Diesel watch.  It is easy to set and is adjusted just like any other watch.  I highly recommend this look!

B008BTSBBW.AIQF9JR56XHFO.reviewText: It is unique looking and is easy to use and to read.This is not a watch for a small wrist!

B008BTSBBW.A3N9E2LV6D9SCV.reviewText: It's a really nice watch. It is big and looks good. I just have to read the manual to see what else I can change on the watch as far as display goes.

B008CE67M6.A3DGGVZIS0QCQ9.reviewText: PROS:- price varies by color, but for <$40 it is a GREAT value- material is very durable, will not snag, color will resist fading- material is resilient and thick, stitched very securely together- not see through wet or dry- extremely comfortable and fitted to your anatomy and movement- great attention to detail with high quality draw string and branded, accent colored eyeletsCONS:- quite high-waisted. the aim of this style is to be stylish and exude some confidence and flamboyance. the high waist band, although thick and very well made, is less flattering- personal preference, but i do not like the rubber/neoprene diesel brand patch that is sewn to the shorts. i prefer branding to be minimal to nonexistent.  the patch is rather thick and raised, approximately 3mm or 1/8".

B008CE67M6.A2PTN22V8DWJD1.reviewText: I really liked these. They fit great, the material is comfortable and the color is really nice. However, even with the double layer in the front, they are still a bit too revealing. One can see the contours of his body a little more than one would like. I kept waiting for people to try to slip dollar bills in them.

B008CE67M6.A3QRMBRVEQWKZ.reviewText: I bought these trunks as my oartner and I are off to South Ametica at the end of the year and I wanted to look hot hot hot @ Rio!They fit right and enhance my package!  I also love the colour.i recommend them

B008CE67M6.AFX2DPDD0YGLY.reviewText: It fit perfect, the style is nice, the material feels great and i really like the color. This swimsuit is worth the price

B008CE67M6.A2AGCSFC9IT3KN.reviewText: This is my 2nd pair of the Diesel Aloha swim trunks.  I really like the look and style of the square leg shorts.  These provide plenty of coverage and the navy blue color doesn't produce any "revealing" areas.  I typically wear a 31/32 waist.  I ordered the medium size and it fits well.  Not too tight that I look like i was poured into the suit, but plenty tight of swimming laps.  They are awesome but only seem to last a few months in heavily clorinated pools swimming a few times a week.  I really like these shorts and plan on ordering a few more pair.

B008CE67M6.A2GF10ERWOGMYP.reviewText: The lining is excellent, the fabric is thick, very good stitching, the cut is very good, I ordered a size up on the advice of others, it feels a little loose, but considering that I bought it to be on the beach and not to practice competitive swimming is ideal, it is very comfortable, not too tight, not so loose, in the part of your ass, if you swim, tends to drag a lot, you know, the typical bubble between cheeks, but when you get out of the pool, everything is back in place.The logo came printed in my suit, not a patch like someone else said.Came well packed with all tags. I love it ... I will buy another pair. Sorry for my mediocre english, we speak spanish here in Central America.
B008CE67M6.A2GF10ERWOGMYP.summary: I LOVE IT! Best swimsuit to date! Perfect for fun, not too much for swimming laps

B008CE67M6.A23TY1SADV3F9W.reviewText: Bought a small as my body size is anywhere between a 28-30 in my waist depending on manufacturing of pants/shorts..  The legs would ride but overall i would definetely get again.  Very Comfortable.  I'm 23 and have no shame.

B008CE67M6.A2Q63FT8Y6SEME.summary: They looked weird on me, but maybe they're good on someone else.

Even if they were if you wear this type of suit you shouldn't be shy. Nice quality and a pretty great price for Diesel.

B008CE67M6.A3SWTA89MUH1A2.reviewText: While on vacation in Mexico, my fiance and I saw a lot of fit men wearing this type of swimsuit and he felt that he could rock it. When we got back I researched it and decided on this particular pair of shorts, based on the other reviews. He just wore it this weekend at the beach in Florida. His friends made fun of him at first, but after thirty minutes they all said they wanted one.As far as size...he wears 32-34 pants, and M-L underwear. I went with Large because I wanted him to be comfortable. They fit perfectly. They aren't obscene looking at all, and I personally find them sexy. He's in really good shape, but I think the shorts would still look great on someone who wasn't necessarily a hard body. You just have to wear them with confidence!

B008CE67M6.A159CBWEG65L18.reviewText: I ordered these early because I live in San Diego and summer comes quicker then normal. When they came in the mail I was 100% satisfied they are made very well and are double lined and the material is heavier then I was expecting and I Love that! I didn't want light thin material to show all my goods. I definitely recommend getting these! AND they run true to their sizes(I am pretty slim and I got the medium) they fit PERFECTLY!

B008CE67M6.A1Q0G10P01KVJA.reviewText: the patch on the bottom is actually a rubber thingy that sticks out instead of just graphic on the shorts. fit a bit too small for comfort and it rides. would be great if I wanted to show off my package and rear end but not quite my fit. nothing was wrong with the product, just not my style

I normally wear a medium, but because I know the brand runs small, I ordered the large, thinking I would be safe.I was wrong.Putting them on I could tell they were incredibly tight and once they were on, I didn't move for fear of ripping them. The paper sales tag on the shorts claimed Large, but I couldn't find a sewn on tag with any size.My fault here is that I didn't try to return them immediately. I assumed since most stores won't take swimwear back, this would be the same. Definitely should have tried anyway.What irritates me and makes me feel better at the same time is that my boyfriend who wears a S or even XS wears them and they fit perfectly. Nice unintentional gift for him.

B008CE68IO.A3VXBO00Q2R8AD.reviewText: My husband loved it so muchGot another color & will order another oneVery comfortable & great designExcellent

It was still the same style boxer short and I did not care enough to return it for this reason alone, but it could be an issue if you want the exact pattern/color.I like the design, but as far as the material goes, I have to agree with Tyler M's review.  The fabric or the material feels "cheap" compared to other Diesel boxer shorts I own.  To be more exact, it feels like these are made of thinner and more rough material.  This material is again tolerable to me, but if you are looking for similar style boxer shorts with softer, thicker fabric, and don't care much about the printed pattern, I'd recommend Diesel Men's Divine Fresh and Bright over these.

B008FHTGC8.A3N35VMFZ85U38.reviewText: The shirt was not well made for the price and the sizes do not run true to size. The shirt was much smaller than expected for a large. The material was flimsy. I returned the shirt

B008FOZJAY.A3IABTZMDK7C.reviewText: Bottom Line:1-Quality: A+2-Style: Stylish / modern ( its just Awesome).3-Size:Fit just right, HOWEVER.....if you are a Bodybuilder and / or a guy with wide shoulders, beefy back & big guns, that jacket is not for you, why?The jacket fits perfectly all around, except for back, shoulders and arms ( really tight) by design ( not a bad thing).For a slim fit, go for it!Finally, I wish they made more of these but with "Athletic fit".I had to return the item.

B008FOZJAY.A85G1R0JXEAMA.reviewText: I had been trying to get my teenage son to step up his wardrobe with a casual sport jacket.  Gave this one a try and he loved it. Casual, young, and for me not grungey.  He is 6'2" slim build, has long arms so sleeve and torso length are always a problem.  We purchased the XL to compensate for sleeve length, but over all even the shoulder and body fit was good.  I know he loves it since its not in his closet.

B008FOZR38.A17LZ5G649PBKO.reviewText: Really odd fit, really tight around the chest and arms, but long in the body and sleeves. Buttons also loose.

B008FOZR38.AS33C355AV4GK.reviewText: I liked the coat. but it was way too small. The way it fit to other XXL coats I tried on--I would need a XXXXl to fit properly.

B008FOZR38.A2M4PDJ53WUP7W.reviewText: Purchased for one of my kids and he loves it. They do tend to run smaller for a tighter fit, so be sure to know what size you'll need prior to your purchase.

B008FOZR38.AOWGFORGB070F.reviewText: Awesome coat. High quality very nice. Read other reviews stating that the coat ran small. Ordered a larger size and it fits great. Love it.

B008FOZR38.A29LT3LT8LU871.reviewText: This jacket run a little small, don't expect to get a lot of layers on under it.  But it looks so smooth and slim fitting.  Very nice jacket.
B008FOZR38.A29LT3LT8LU871.summary: Love the looks of this jacket!

B008FOZR38.A1BZQ53X9PJBEF.reviewText: The jacket is great, the only complaint I would have is the sizes run small. I had to send one back and get a replacement.

B008FOZR38.A27NKBFQDLJ8PI.reviewText: The way the buttons are attached seems flimsy.  One of my buttons was pretty much ready to fall off and while I've vowed to just have it fixed locally (instead of dealing with a return) so far I haven't gotten around to it.  I do really like the coat otherwise though.
B008FOZR38.A27NKBFQDLJ8PI.summary: I like it, but those buttons...

B008FOZR38.APXL8NI0TPBRO.reviewText: I am 5'8" and 150 average/athletic build and this jacket fits me perfectly! This is a true slim fit and hugs my body perfectly. Not like the wide cut coats of modern american brands. This is likely international small so more like an XS in american sizes. The fit is like a 36 H&M; peacoat and slightly more snug than Schott Slim-fitting small (not the black slim fit coat with leather trim). For those wanting a slim fit, go with either this or Schott slim fitting ones. Sterlingwear coats are cut for giants. I have a 37 chest by the way.Not really a peacoat in terms of warmth but more so in the contemporary styles. I am a fan of the throat latch though. Never gonna use it but it has similar feel to the pre-WW2 peacoat throat latches. The coat material is interesting in that it feels almost leathery/plasticky/wool-y all at once. Warm but because i bought one that fits me so well I'm not gonna be able to layer with heavy sweaters, which I never was going to anyways. This is pretty much a shirt and that's it kinda jacket. There are also leather ascents through out which i like.

B008FOZR38.A2M5RCRCZGKDDV.reviewText: although the material is rough and made in China, this Diesel jacket is quite sexy. I can feel its warmth and rugedness that means many promising years. im very happy with it..* if you have a heavier/bigger build, you should go with a size larger as it is restricting in the arms/ torso section.I am a size 38 chest (can wear slim mediums) and this slim fitting jacket hugs my body well. (5"8, 165). so for gents withslimmer builds, go for your usual size.get a nice haircut (maybe a fade like me) and put on a pair of sunglasses to bring out the Diesel in you. ;) cheers!

B008FOZR38.A1OHYV8175GGYA.reviewText: Two of the buttons fell off the first time I wore the coat out. The left pocket was sewed in. Once I had the coat repaired I liked the fit and style.
B008FOZR38.A1OHYV8175GGYA.summary: Poor quality for a Diesel product.

B008FOZR38.A2PCUPLCOT3D55.reviewText: 5 star all around. Get complimented everytime. I'm 5'10 200+ and got a size large and it fitted perfect. The jacket is well made. Had to unstitch the pocket that was the only negative but guess it was stitch for safety reason from the manufacturer

B008FOZR38.ANU54AY29EWPH.reviewText: I am 5'7'' brought a size M. I guess at least I need a XL....The size of this one is way too small.....I asked a refund, because of the size.......Besides that, it is a very nice jacket, I really wish I could keep it...
B008FOZR38.ANU54AY29EWPH.summary: Handsome Jacket, but way too small.....

B008GKI350.A1TQW2B9K8CL9Q.reviewText: This Diesel watch is so beautiful in person. The photo does it no justice; in fact, the photo pictured here is not even how it really looks like. For a clearer image of what it really looks like, Google the watch model number for additional pictures.The face is a perfect size for a girl's wrist. It's a relatively larger face without being bulky. The leather band material is pretty nice and very comfortable to wear. It's lightweight without feeling flimsy. The face design and material is excellent. I can't stop staring at my watch when I wear it!

B008GRO8C0.A2TFUWOU0ASSRB.reviewText: broke in the crotch several times, is the worst I've bought in my life, the material is so bad that at first use was broken into several parts.

B008GRO9JM.A3DK2LWJOY7QNY.reviewText: I own at least 10 Diesel leather jackets, and this is yet another amazing addition to my collection. The price was unbelievably low, 70% off of the retail markup. The leather is supple - yet durable. It is very comfortable; a perfect jacket to be worn in the early Spring weather and fall - until it gets really warm or chilly.Useful notes:- Just to give you an idea of Diesel sizing as compared to other designers. I wear size medium Ralph Lauren and Tommy Hilfiger, but need size XL in Diesel Jackets.- The white line running down the front of the jacket isn't so pronounced in person; it is milky, merkey white, not as bright as it appears in the photograph.- The little detailing on the jacket is exquisite, making the jacket look expensive.

B008H1MLOW.A2L9TVQIREW49K.reviewText: I buy many Diesel shirts online and in stores and I have to say the quality is always there, this shirt in particular is double lined which keeps you warm through fall into early winter. I highly recommended this shirt and the diesel brand to any one looking for high quality stylish clothing, one thing I noticed about the diesel slim fit shirts is that you normally need to order one size larger than you normally are ex: size mediums should order size large for a tight fit, if possible I recommend trying some on and purchasing them in store first then buying then online just to be safe . Overall I could not be happier with this shirt and I hope to be able to wear it for years to come in comfort and style.

B008H1NERA.A3J4711R92AUJ2.reviewText: This jacket looks amazing and it's Diesel.  So how could I go wrong?  I ordered the black color.  Well my first time wearing this coat out, my friends immediately began to smell an offensive odor that you can only equate to a "wet dog".  We tried to figure out what it was and then I realized it was my coat!  I immediately wrote Amazon and told them about the situation.  They had me send the jacket back and they sent me a replacement.  Same smell!  The jacket tag says the filling is real down feathers, however, I began to wonder if it was really dog hair.  I immediately returned it and obtained a refund.  Very disappointed.  It looks great, but no one will want to be around you with it on!

B008HUZ1G8.A2K7I3BRA0JF8Y.reviewText: Overall a very comfortable and supportive fit.  The material feels great.  The only negative is that they will shrink a little.  I don't think it's so much that a larger size should be ordered, but it's just enough that they go from a perfect fit to being just a little tighter.  I ordered a few of these and after drying the first pair with high heat and getting some shrinkage, the other pairs I dried with low heat and just air.  I didn't experience  the same shrinkage effect as the first pair.So, very nice boxer briefs with nice material, a solid waste band that won't roll, not much "ride up" either, but avoid drying with high heat if you don't want a tighter fit.
B008HUZ1G8.A2K7I3BRA0JF8Y.summary: Nice fit, but they will shrink with High Heat

B008K7CZPS.A1G60ANYI0HMEU.reviewText: That spells HAWT, HOT, HOT-T-T.That is how I feel about my husband in these lo-slung buttonfly jeans. Fortunately, I got them on sale here on Amazon, so I didn't have to pay the exorbitant retail price. But if I could afford it, I probably would anyway. These babies enhance both the front view and the rear view. Not in a ridiculous hipsterish way, just in a subtle, yet manly way. Kind of like Levi's 501's, just heightened. I don't know why anyone should have to pay so much for jeans, but these have some kind of magical asset-enhancing cut and finish, so if you've got the money, or if you can get them on one of Amazon's periodic sales, they're worth it.

B008K7CZPS.A2JRGPNY26YHCW.reviewText: Great price for Diesel quality, Same pair of jeans are 188 at Macy's and 200 plus at Nordstrom. No regrets.

I also received the wrong size, "29x32" instead of what I ordered which is "29x30" and that didn't help either. So I returned the item.

I highly recommend this jeans and very especially if you like low-waisted, boot-cut jeans.

I ended up returning it simply because it looked way too big on my boyfriend's arm, but that's one of those things that's difficult to gauge when ordering online. All in all, a very nice watch, just a little too large for us skinny-armed folk.

B008KA9XSC.A4OLUNDQF8J8Q.reviewText: I love these jeans.  I bought a size 33 for my husband.  His usual jean size. They fit great except a little tight in the thighs and slightly loose in the waist. B008KA9XSC.A3BRA7S2ADOFLS.reviewText: QUALITY: Diesel jeans always last twice or three times longer than any other designer jeans I buy.FIT: The fits a little snug but they do stretch quite a bit when you wear them.CARE: Machine wash cold. I NEVER dry my jeans unless I need to shrink them.

B008KA9XSC.A19FHD2SPHHTKE.reviewText: Fantastic - good quality fabric and construction; stylish stitching and fading, brilliant fit (for skinny guy). I will buy another pair for sure.

B008KA9XSC.A1HGGD1DGAUWNJ.reviewText: I am tall, slender, kinda muscular, with longer legs than torso.These are the only jeans that have ever blown me away- from word "GO".The near bell-bottom boot-cut of these incredible jeans not only adds width below my knees to mask my skinny long legs and 11.5 feet, but the fit at the LOW-rise waist, crotch, and rear is freaking amazing! You'll look awesome in these.I swear, I've owned 10 pair of these jeans over the last decade or so, and I've worn every pair until they were destroyed.Look around, they are available in several (some limited edition) washes and fabric weights. Not all are the same feel--- but my God, they are well made regardless of the weight of denim or color.Worth. Every. Penny.Advice though: Wash these jeans very sparingly-- the dyes are not generic blue-jean style. They will fade relatively fast. I only wash mine when it's genuinely necessary, and that will vary on season and circumstance.Turn them inside out in the laundry and use the least detergent for maybe four minute cycle to extend the "new" appearance longer. I hang/air dry only.IF you are a skinny guy, with a shorter torso than leg length, I promise you you will look sexy as hell in these. I'm just being honest- every girl I've dated has complimented them. The low rise is low, but it will mitigate the long legs by sitting lower. Coupled with the subtle flare at the bottom (as opposed to the retarded 80's skinny jean dweeb look currently train-wrecking fashion) you will have exactly the kind of "set-apart" image you're looking for without being ostentatious.
B008KA9XSC.A1HGGD1DGAUWNJ.summary: Best jeans I've ever owned almost 10 years running

B008KA9XSC.A1735GS9LRSY1L.reviewText: So I hated paying the price for a pair of jeans but I have to say I do feel as though it was money very well spent.  They fit very well just a little tight in the thighs but I am built like a stump so for me it was just a little tight but I love them.

B008KABYZM.A2ERAB4NVLZUFU.reviewText: The jacket is nice compare with the picture. I like the design plus it look durable. Definitely worth the price I paid for it. I got it earlier than the estimated delivery date. I am glad I got this and I know it is not a waste of money. I recommend this product who are looking to buy a leather jacket. Amazon is really great with customer.

B008KABYZM.ADHR5QDBFP91Q.reviewText: I won't knock down the rating because Amazon has misrepresented the brown in the picture. I thought I was buying a rich, brown on the red end of the scale... I didn't spend much (well, any) time researching other than already knowing this jacket is 2x the price being asked and is a current jacket (this season). I read a couple reviews that mentioned color and thought perhaps an interpretation of the reviewers. I received mine a couple days ago and it is not brown - it is called "dark olive". Visit Diesel's Ireland (IE) site (store dot diesel dot com slash IE) and look under jackets - you'll see the actual color. Mine is a little darker with a little more brown than the picture on the IE site... color variation to be expected by design but not from Amazon's picture to the actual color... Amazon must have gotten their brown picture from a time when a brown color option was available BUT as a luxury designer, when Diesel runs out of a seasonal item, it's out - the majority they don't make more.Great quality leather with manual hand process that will make each jacket unique (ish) - there isn't as much variation to the Lagnum as the L-BHAL for example - when I picked up my L-BHAL I had a few to choose from and each was very unique due to the design whereas the Lagnum is a more consistent color. HOWEVER, if you receive one that has imperfections, this is by Diesel design to have unique articles (primarily certain denim and leather jackets). Personally, I wouldn't mark it down for designed-in uniqueness.In the end, this jacket is very soft, semi-body conscious, and looks great. It isn't too heavy. I have the XXL and it fits fine - 6'2", 230lb (solid - the weight is muscular from years of time in the gym). It is tight on my arms, shoulders and chest - anything is in XXL though... I'd say a XXL will work for anyone 6' - 6'4" between 180 and 230... if you have a big gut, this most likely won't work with the fit of the jacket.
B008KABYZM.ADHR5QDBFP91Q.summary: Great quality - color is actually "dark olive"

B008KABYZM.A34S3T0ENWI7WZ.reviewText: Stylish, and what I love best about Diesel is that their sizing is made for the trimmer more in-shape wearer, so the clothes just look nicer on your body.  Leather is supple too.  Can't complain.

B008KABYZM.A3KFGYLKBKOHMR.summary: Not as described color and condition

B008KABZLK.A1L6XUJOM71N43.reviewText: I chose this rating not because of any failure in the product itself, but because I did receive a different Diesel leather jacket model.  In fact, the model I received was the "Lordid" jacket, in stead of the "Literal" jacket, which is what I formerly order and is different: the Lordid jacket has a spread collar and more pockets on the chest, while the Literal jacket has a raised collar and has a more juvenile overall look.Upon receiving the wrong item, I notice this big mistake and returned it to Amazon right away.  My refund arrived in three days, so on that respect I have no concern at all.  What worries me is that the label on the jacket I received designed it as the "Literal" jacket, which is wrong, and which means Amazon --or whatever the third-part provider-- has this jacket listed on its records as the wrong jacket.So, bottom line, if you wanna order this jacket from Amazon, make sure somehow that they send you the right item.

B008KAC0E6.ARI66M8JGJLQA.reviewText: You pay for what you get; absolutely no complaints whatsoever! Time went into this shirt - with proper care Diesel clothing will last a long time; and its the little things that make Diesel clothing stand out from all the rest. Excellent fit (at the size you would normally purchase). Very modern, European look. Longer button line; very cool and original.  I can say with some sincerity that you won't see anyone else with this shirt (other than me, hehe)... Clothes don't get any nicer unless you really want to spend even more!
B008KAC0E6.ARI66M8JGJLQA.summary: If you're going to spend the extra $$, buy Diesel!

B008KAC0E6.A2TUJ8W8UCIROQ.reviewText: The shirt was fine quality was wise but these Diesel shirts run smaller than Calvin Klein or even Abercrombie.  So if you were an XL or XXL in those, these shirts won't fit you.

B008KAC0E6.A146X6FEWX7Q0D.reviewText: In normal American sizes what Diesel calls a XXL in mens shirts actually = L this is because the company is based in Italy. Not all the products are made there (in fact I think pretty much all the shirts are made in China) but the designs still come from Italy. The sizing difference is fine for us because we already knew about it when I purchased this shirt so it fit. The fabric is nice and lightweight and the pocket placement is perfect.

B008L01NCU.A1KDHPSV52MKMV.reviewText: The washing is somewhat dull than I expected; there is not much contrast/gap in colors between lighter and darker parts of the pants.  hope it was slightly more vivid.

B008L01NCU.A2MYO5H5U2EOXZ.reviewText: these jeans are one of a kind they have a unique painted look they are basically blue jeans wit a ash coloured coating which is very unusual but it instantly gives an individualistic look to anyone who wears it...Bet you these jeans can't go unnoticed fits true to size but its a low rise and tight leg jeans  people with meaty legs should watch out you may need the next size apart from that fantastically finished jeans. ..

B008MXNSWE.A2O1PPFGFUJ2RU.reviewText: This watch is amazingly dope, yeah its big and HEAVY, it took a little getting used to. So yes if you are looking for a watch with instant time reading capabilities this watch is not for you, go get a digital. But if you looking for a watch that makes a statement, this one definitely does, bold, strong, nice but not flashy. I have always believed a man should always have a nice wallet, a nice watch and nice shoes. This watch definitely fills the nice watch gap. But again it is a rather large watch and is not right for everyone, and i suggest if you weigh below 180lbs this watch is not for you.I originally purchased this watch at Nordstroms for a total of $318 but found it on Amazon for $242 flat with free two day shipping ( the prime member ship is more than worth it if you buy a lot of amazon stuff, you will save on shipping and get it overnight and make back the membership cost within your first 3 or 4 purchases, and we all know Amazon has the BEST (did i say BEST) Customer Service in all the 9 realms) so I promptly returned it and ordered it here.Overall hands down one of my favorite items I ever purchased!

B008MXNSWE.AX4QPKFZ0LDGD.reviewText: Got it for Christmas, got my first compliment the next morning, by maybe the first person who saw it... It's far and away the biggest watch I've ever owned, and at first i thought it looked almost too big for me... But within a day or so I was in love with it, and a few weeks later I still find myself staring at it and admiring it regularly ... I am already planning on getting another diesel watch because  i like this one so much.The band is a nice dark brown -- in my online research I had become a bit concerned it would be too bright and light (as some online pictures color balance and exposure makes it seem like that), but its exactly what i wanted... nice and dark... i would liken it to a trees bark, or maybe a baseball mitt when wet with oil... And the gunmetal is just that, also dark and nice... To be as a concise as possible, the name is quite apt -- the whole thing is super bad ass.

B008MXNSWE.ATL4E7GXEA56P.reviewText: This watch isn't for anyone; in fact, it takes a pretty big pair of stones to pull this off.  My wife surprised me with this piece for my birthday.  At first glance you can't help but notice both its size and its engineered aesthetic.  I've only owned this watch for a short while now, but it's had some unique effects.  First, this watch draws attention and demands respect.  I've been confused with the Dos Equis guy several times already, because that's the kind of class and appeal this watch exhumes. I've also noticed my I'm two inches taller, with a slimmer waist, and now have broader chest & shoulders.  I can do twice as many push-ups as I could before I obtained this watch, and I now don't have to wait in any line at the grocery store (female cashiers instantly open an empty register for me).  Many may think these all are false claims or merely coincidences.  However, I'm writing this review after having just returned from my doctor's office with the results of my routine bloodwork which indicate my LDL cholesterol is down, HDL is up, and my free and unbound testosterone levels are markedly increased. I can't attribute these recent changes to anything other than the aquisition of this masculine time piece.

B008MXNSWE.A272MP6HXK6ZJL.reviewText: I had my eye on this (and the entire Diesel SBA Series) for a while now. So when someone offered to buy me a present, I asked them to get me this. B008MXNSWE.A2X4904FNWDH9P.reviewText: I have had this watch for 4 days and received dozens of complements from both guys and gals.  I took quick trip to the mall and everyone from the salesfolks at the high-end jewelers to random folks in a clothing store wanted a look.A few comments:- This watch is big (51mm x 60mm), but not so big that it looks like you are carrying Big Ben on your arm like the Diesel Big Daddy.  To know if it will fit well: put your arm on a piece of paper and use a pencil to draw a line on either side of your wrist.  If the lines are less than 60mm apart then it it is probably too large since it will stick off the sides.- The face is all gray -- that means it is hard to read in anything but bright light and even in afternoon sun it takes a second to find the hands.  You're not wearing this watch to tell the time though, are you?  The diamond pattern on the face catches the light in neat ways and the little screwheads scattered about the face are great details.- I wouldn't call it a durable watch.  The crystal is super thin and sits slightly above the bezel. I imagine an accidental whack against a door jam could cause some damage.- This is an inexpensive watch, so the fit and finish isn't perfect.  If you look carefully you can see grind marks on the crystal edges and imperfections here and there.  But ... if someone is looking that hard at the watch they have way too much time on their hands or you're not entertaining them enough.

B008MXNXP6.A26WD63WEIPLZH.reviewText: The Diesel Ref. DZ7257 (quartz movt., AR-coated mineral crystal, black leather strap, black PVD coating on case) is one of my favorite fashion watches.  While I own a few high-end brands (Rolex, Omega and Hublot), this watch fills a gap in a watch that is relatively inexpensive, looks good and wears well in a casual style.  The watch is quite large.  However, it wears quite well and it is comfortable.  It is fairly light on the wrist as well.  Because there is no distinctive color on the hands - and because the dial is off-set - it takes a few seconds to search out the time.  Perhaps, if the hands were colored differently, it would be more legible.  The leather strap is of very good quality as is the buckle and excess strap keeper.  An impressive feature is the fact that the strap is attached to the lugs via a substantially large screws and NOT the usual spring bars.  This area is typically the weakest part of the watch and it is where it will usually fail should the watch get caught on something.  In this case, this area is quite strong.  The anti-reflective coating on the inside of the watch crystal give it its distinctive "bluish" tint and it a neat feature that makes this watch stand out.  Finally, this watch features a large mineral crystal.  I am normally biased towards crystals and prefer "tried-and-true" synthetic sapphire.  However, mineral crystal has a very good impact resistant quality about it that I benefited from just last week when I dropped this watch on my tile bathroom floor - crystal down - and nothing happened to it.  I am very positive that synthetic sapphire would have sustained damage.  This watch also features a nice GMT function that is set via the crown at the 9 o'clock position.  Essentially, you put the other timezone there and it will represent the additional hour difference.  It is interesting that it does so at 30 minute increments so that you can even set weird time zones (like Kabul, Afghanistan, for example).  So, overall, this is a neat watch and its worth the price if you can get it at around $200 - $250.  In some rare cases, I have seen it for $169.

B008MXNXP6.A10YL1KGHJI0KD.reviewText: This watch it amazing!  I have purchased several different watches for my boyfriend (Fossil, Guess, MK etc..) and this one takes the cake! It is a large faced watch but that is the kind that he likes to wear.  This was my first time buying a diesel watch and I am very happy. The box that it came it was very cool.  Delivery was on time and everything was packaged very secure so that the item would not be damaged.  The leather band seems like a nice quality (but I do not know that much about leather watch bands) and the face of this watch is just amazing.  The face of the watch does have this vibrant blue color that catches your eye but if you are looking down at the watch you can still see the time, date etc.. very clearly.  When looking directly down at the watch, it is like you are looking through clear glass with just get a hint of the blue but when you tilt the watch just a little bit you get that beautiful blue color over the entire dial (you can still read the time etc..clearly through the full blue color it just bright blue).  Needless to say I am very happy with the purchase and would tell others who are looking for a different, eye catching watch to buy this one.  I don't think you will be disappointed.

B008MXNXP6.A2XDR1802HGXRI.reviewText: Just like someone said "great packaging"! Yes, the box and the little cushion that came encasing and protecting the watch deserve 5 stars too.So far, I have 2 Citizen Eco Drive watches, one for diving and one for dressy occasions, but..., I've got mine on a Friday, on Saturday we took our little to see the doctor, and he was wearing a gold Rolex, but kept on looking (when he thought I wasn't seeing) at my watch, and we went to Downtown Disney late on the same day, and guys could not stop looking at it, and even one guy elbowed his wife and said:" Honey, that's my birthday gift, ok?"It was a little on the expensive side, but, all in all, it is a solid hunk of metal with a function, and very good at it.My only complain, and that's just a matter of taste, the band is beautifully made in fine leather, but if you sweat a little, will soak it up fast, but in time I will find a good rubber band ( and it deserves the best!) to replace the leather one, so far, I am happy with it.

B008MXNXP6.ANMOFIE6MN2YO.reviewText: It definitely turns heads.  And its big enough to see.  The yellow numbering is perfect for EMS/FIRE/Healthcare professionals with the easy to read hour, minute, and second hands.  Plus the iridescent coating on the glass helps to illuminate the yellow.If you're not using it for public service, it is still a nice dress up watch, or just wear every day watch, sure to get people looking at your wrist.  The face is big, but doesn't over do it. The leather band is high quality, and it is covered by Diesel for 2 years under warranty.Spend the money to get the quality.  Diesel wins again.  Nice watch.TIP:  The only problem is the booklet for time setting on your watch DOES NOT contain information on this watch specifically.  If you are having any sort of problem/question about how to use the functions, look it up on the internet because you won't find it in the provided Diesel booklet.

B008MXNXP6.AHWVTOXGM4SZ9.reviewText: I bought this watch from 'Zenbuy' with 2 day shipping. Shipping was completed exactly in 2 days!!The moment after unboxing, I'm in love with this watch!! The watch looks much more beautiful & elegant than in the image. It also feels great in hand. It was a gift for my friend & he loves it. You will definitely earn attention & positive comment after wearing it; I'm 100% sure about it :-).Now, its a big watch with big display with almost $200 price tag, I would like to have more than just a watch in this price. Thats the negative part about this watch, its PRICE. Yeah, it is a good brand watch, but I can get a good smartwatch in this price!! I can get new 'Pebble Steel' with leather strap in $224! or a Sony Smartwatch 2, or a Galaxy Gear!& 1 more thing I didn't like about the watch is the box. Yes, its a nice box with 'Diesel' branding. but there is no lock or no magnetic thing or no push button for the top part in the box.But I'm still in love with the watch. The way it looks, the way it feels in hand is just 'awesome'!!! Thats why I'm giving the watch a '5 star'.
B008MXNXP6.AHWVTOXGM4SZ9.summary: Diesel DZ7257; A great gift to surprise your close friend

B008MXNXP6.A3NZ41HXLRJ3ZY.reviewText: OK so the thing is because of this glass reflection it catches the people eye and they go" what kind of watch is that"?..I am very impressed with the watch. the strap is comfy and no its not  a huge watch its just right for this kind of a watch.buy it if you have the money and this is the best price i could find..so great price excellent watch and free compliments..
