B008S3HEYG.A3PTFVCVZ8M34N.reviewText: These are beautiful and well made boots.  They seem to run true to size and maybe a tad on the narrow side but not enough to bother my normal to slightly wide foot.  I did not keep the boots though because they were really unstable and hard to walk in.  I love platforms and wedges, but these have a sharp angle.  The heel is too thin.  When you try to go downstairs in these, you feel like you're falling forward.  Buyer beware:  They are higher than they look, and the heel is thin like a stiletto.  I love the look of the boots, and the padding in the footbed seemed adequate  But my fear was I'd fall and break my ankle while walking down the street so these were returned.  I will definitely try more Diesel shoes in the future, but I will avoic skinny top heavy wedges such as these.

B008TT9G9U.A2JK5M8IZM6SHJ.reviewText: Well, when it comes to shoes the comfort is the most important factor - I'm sure you'd all agree. And by saying comfort, I mean every little bit counts. I rate this 2 out of 5 and not 1 out of 5 only because it didn't fall apart after a week or so me wearing 'em. The construction is all right. BUT... The upper of these shoes is made of some sort of polyester fabric and has no breathing holes. My feet feel like being wrapped in a plastic wrap and sealed while I wearing them.  The manmade sole.... no many manmande soles are well made. It has poor shock absobshon. I had "Pass On" Diesel sneaker, and I have no idea what kind of sole it has, but those I have for third summer season in a row and they are still alright and comfortable. Do yourself a favor - spend more and get either leather upper and rubber sole sneaker or make sure that good reviews mention "comfortable shoe/sneakers" and not just "oh, it looks so cool and modern"...

B00903X776.A3DE0SNPHU1RZG.reviewText: I'm a 8.5-9 so decided to order in both sizes to ensure I'd get a good fit--I loved the look of this sneaker so much and typically adore all things Diesel.Unfortunately, I still didn't get anywhere near an ideal fit. The 9 was too long and slipped at my heel w/every step; the 8.5 absolutely squashes my toes! I have a pretty easy-to-fit foot so I have no idea why there's such a stark difference just between half sizes. I ultimately returned the 9 since even with a thick sock they swallowed me. As far as width, they feel like a standard 'M' (B).My biggest gripe was how inconsistent the denim treatment was between the two pair. The pair I had to return was nearly identical to the online image--a cool black faded denim, even toned. The denim on the other pair is super splotchy w/way too much white. Think: early 90s acid wash jeans. Not a good look. The jet black laces just exacerbate all the white, uneven splotches.However, the stud/screw details are up to par. It's edgy without screaming STUDS! They're applied securely and placed just right.There's a little cushion in the footbed; compared to some Chucks and Betsey Johnson hi-tops I own, I'd say they're better designed for comfort...should they actually fit well.The rubber that surrounds Exposure is a nice matte black; the outsole is quality.I can't claim this shoe fits TTS, it's a crap shoot with the denim treatment, and I think they're a wee bit overpriced. Although I kept the smaller pair, it's pretty telling that they've been sitting in the box for 3 weeks, unworn.I'm unwilling to return/reorder/return a shoe that doesn't fit that well just to get the pair I really want: the one in the picture.

B00903X776.A2DF721LYL3DCG.reviewText: Very cool as you would expect from Diesel...very on trend with the studs on one side too...I love these super comfy high tops.

B009041BAK.A3HE8T26KCDV9J.reviewText: I just love these sneakers.  I love the style, I especially love the color, and the fit is very comfortable.  The first day I wore them they went to work where I do a lot of running around, then made a Costco run, then went to the food store and out for a bite to eat.  No soreness, no discomfort, no blisters, no rubbing anywhere.  The shoe runs true to length, with plenty of room for toes, and is amply wide enough so your foot can rest comfortably.  The leather is thick, so I don't think these will be good for outdoors in the hot weather, but maybe that's just me.  These are nicely made sneakers.  The stitching is well done, the rubber is glued solidly, and the coloring, which is very unusual, is even and you don't get dye rub-off on your fingers, which I was worried about.

B0090O86IK.A3SGA21CJZM2VV.reviewText: Bought these for working out and on the weekends to keep me cool.  Its been a hot summer already this year in NJ. They didn't move; the let straps didn't go anywhere, the band didn't roll or move, the pouch stayed nice and tight.  Like I said, forgot I was even wearing them.My waist is a size 35 and I got mediums.  I probably could get away with a large also, but for working out you want it snug so I got mediums.  I'm also...well endowed and the pouch kept me covered the whole time.One final note, I have very big legs (football thighs that squat 500+ lbs).  I used to wear compression shorts under my gym shorts, but it's too hot now.  Briefs usually are too constricting around my thighs in my groin area, so I've taken to wearing jockstraps under my gym shorts.I got these for $16.99 for the 2 pack but after I got them the price went up.  At $16.99 they are a steal.  Definately recommend.

B0091M4ZHW.A2IFNKNP7C7XZ7.reviewText: Great looking watch.  Very big, but not obnoxious.  I already got several positive comments.  People will notice this watch.  A little on the heavy side, but that's what you get when you go to a larger face and band.

B0091M4ZHW.A19WDOEJYYA27S.reviewText: This is a beautiful watch. Yes, it lacks some features that might be nice, like luminous hands and markers and a date window, but it's a big, bold, gorgeous watch. I'm a large guy -- 6'2" and about 250lbs. It is almost too big for me, recognizing that appropriate watch size is really subjective. I come from wearing standard 43 mm or so round dive and dress watches. I have one 46 mm round watch I wear often and it seems tiny in comparison to this watch. It's an industrial fashion statement and the large size seems just about right for pulling off the look Diesel is going for. I have not found a consistent measurement of width online and haven't measured it myself. It is wider than 46 mm that's for sure. I'll update this post once I measure it. I like that the band is the same width all the way around. It does not taper. This is one seriously manly watch and I plan on keeping it. If you're a professional, be prepared for some of the old school people around you to comment on how massive the thing is and maybe even look at you like you've lost your mind. But keep the watch on, man! It's a rare find.

B0094E54NQ.A16SA3CROCFWDJ.reviewText: I LOVE the design of this watch, so the reason you may be wondering why did I only give it 3 out of 5 stars my explanation is below. The color face design blends with the numbers giving it a rainbow effect at night on the black background. (Love that) After all that's what drew me to it in the first place. As much as I love this watch I was very disappointed in the way the hour and minute hands blended into the black background so much that they seem to have disappeared. I couldn't see them even at different angles. I literally had to twist and turn my wrist towards the light to read the thing. After wearing this for one day I had become so annoyed not being able to see the time that I was ready to return it. The reason that I didn't? I love the design, the shiny look, the smooth color and feel on my wrist, not to mention the complements I've received in just one day of wearing this watch. So I decided to take a chance with it. Now I still struggle to see the time but I'm hoping to work this out somehow.

B0094NCZL6.A3VNZYRZL0Z7XN.reviewText: If your not sure if this is big enough and are considering an XXL instead of an XL, lets just say, the XL is plenty big without being over done.  I am 5'11" 190lbs.  athletic build and am very glad I did not get the XXL, this one is perfect, makes a statement.  My wrist is exactly 62 mm across the top where the watch lies and this watch lines up perfectly there.  Where the pins go for the band is right on the money to line up with the edges of my wrist so it doesn't over hang at all.  I feel the XXL would have overhung and looked a bit obnoxious.Looks great, gets many compliments and is built very well.  Everything about this watch is masculine from the size and look to the leather band and buckle.I would caution to NEVER wear this if your are doing anything that is manual labor, yard work, construction etc.  I do believe you will beat the lens up quite a bit if you wear it while doing any kind of physical work.  I have accidentally banged it a few times, it is a big watch, so far no damage, but I can see it getting scratched if not very careful.

The waist is a bit tight and the rise is very high, indeed. I'm 5'6" and the inseam is too long, but since they're so soft, it doesn't bother me at all to have some 'gathering' at the hem. The color is rather soft black and looks a bit brownish if worn on the brightest, hottest days. Overall, can't be happier about my purchase. And of course, Amazon gives a great deal on the pants.

B009MQY176.A1Z2ZSWU9QIBT8.reviewText: I have long collected high end watches and will often purchase other brands because they both look good and are made well.The Diesel watches fall into the last category. These time pieces are very well made and are extremely stylish at the moment.This is a HEAVY piece of jewelry but it is the way it was thought out and designed. The watch is not plastic but excellent quality metals and crystals.This watch keeps excellent time on all four modes/date features. Having the four (4) time features allows me to easily keep track of the times in the major times zones in the US as well as overseas.Diesel has come a long way since its humble beginnings and had evolved to the point that I love having their watches sitting along side of my Rolex's, Omega's and Patek Phillippe's and love wearing them as well.Just the shear size means you "will" get comments and these watches will get noticed. But aside from this, they are great quality and fun to wear.Just a note: If you were to purchase this exact same time piece directly fromt he "Diesel" Store you will pay almost $100.00 more then you will if you buy from the dealers here at Amazon. You will also get the time piece just as fast. Almost every model the Diesel watch offered directly from the company can be found here on Amazon and also for a "much"  better price. I also feel even more secure in knowing that as a Prime Member of Amazon, they (Amazon) will stand behind my purchase should anything happen to the watches I purchase from the site.The "ONLY" draw back I have with the Diesel Watches on Amazon at this time is that they do NOT qualify for the PRIME MEMBER shipping. I would much rather have the watch I order getting here in 2 days UPS *(and would even love paying the extra $3.95 as a Prime Member and getting the watch in one (1) day). But even without the Prime Member shipping the watch arrived in a short time. I ordered it on a Sunday night while on a trip and it was waiting for me before I arrived home that Friday.I am already preparing to add even more of the DIesel watches to my collection with at least three (3) others that have caught my eye.

B009MQY176.A2RLASC66UWCZ9.reviewText: The only thing that I don't like is the way the band sounds when it moves.  If you wear it as a bracelet and not fitted to your wrist it is  a little annoying.  Because it is plastic it sounds like little kids toys or bracelets.

What can I say, I'm not into fashion.So...when I saw the same pair on Amazon for $89 on a lightning deal it was a no brainer. I got the same size, almost the exactly the same style, they were Prime eligible...perfect, easy, and a great price for these IMO.I'm not a skinny jeans kind of guy, I'd say these are a tad tighter of a style than I'm used to, but very comfortable and the ladies in the office can't stop commenting on them, my wife loves them too.I bought a 33 waist, 32 leg - waist seems spot on with Diesel, but a 32 length seems more like a 34 on most other brands...so my normal 32X34 from American Eagle turns into a 33X32 with Diesel (if that helps).Great quality overall, great look, I would highly recommend.

My job sometimes requires me work out in the field and occasionally out in the brush, so my cheap jeans are good for getting destroyed out there on cat claw and cactus, but these jeans are so damn comfortable that I don't mind risking getting them destroyed... plus they look good on me.  If you're fairly good looking, somewhat skinny or even average, I recommend you wear these with a black v-neck T-shirt out on the town, I'm not much of a chick magnet but these jeans really do heighten my attractiveness.  Just note, and this goes for people like me who don't really take care of their things well, wash these in cold water... which saves money on the electric bill. B00A367O0A.A34RZH5603ITW6.reviewText: Simply an impulse buy as I was looking for a casual brown leather watch. I am typically not fond of Diesel watches as they are generally over-sized and unnecessarily busy looking despite offering minimal features.  In addition, like many other fashion brands that offer watches like Armani, Burberry, and Michael Kors; Diesel watches are made by Fossil.  While there is nothing wrong with Fossil watches, I am not keen on purchasing a Fossil watch with a "luxiurious" fashion brand name as you are literally paying a premium for the name alone.Considering the significant discount on the watch at the time of purchase, I made an exception to my above sentiments.  Now on to the particulars of the watch...The watch sports a very clean design, which is particularly rare for Diesel watches. Everything from the brushed silver-tone hour and minute hands which match the silver-tone bezel to the monochromatic dial add to the classic look of the watch.  Subtle features like the over-sized crown and the yellow second hand provide enough visual interest to make it contemporary.The 44 millimeter case diameter and 10 millimeter thickness is my go-to specs for sizing and a very proportionate size for most wrists in my opinion.  The distressed calfskin band looks well made, but the watch is only a couple months old and has yet to stand the test of time.Overall, I am very pleased with the watch and would recommend it to anyone that finds the aesthetics as pleasing as I do.  Again, it is manufactured by Fossil, so don't expect anything more than you would from a Fossil watch in terms of build quality.  The one distinct negative I have is that the luminous accents are not particularly bright even after direct exposure to sunlight.

B00A3RJWRC.A363DB08146FWS.reviewText: I don't have the chest hair, muscle or gold chains to wear something like this.  I returned it.  All my diesel jeans are great, all the tops run two sizes too small.I'm not that guy.

Got a size 12 in these and they're super snug unless I go sockless but who does that. What's more important though is the upper is not made of just leather and suede. I've never encountered shoes made with what looks like a poly sheet on top so I just automatically assumed the materials based on the pictures were leather/suede. However, the vamp and the sides actually are this synthetic polyester-looking material which cheapens the overall look of the shoe. I got this on a lightning deal so for $40, it's passable. I don't consider it a deal at that price, so certainly anything higher would be tricky to justify. Since the tone of this review is negative, I'll end on a positive note. Shoes ought to be light and Diesel got that correct on these.

B00AEFCRKM.A1QEXNZ426E4ME.reviewText: This watch is big, heavy, and terrific.  As my close up vision gradually fades with age, I have gotten larger and larger watches.  Can't get much larger than this.  It's a sharp looking design, and I find the strap comfortable once fitted.  I thought this watch might not work for my not-so-large wrists.  Happy to report - not so, the watch sits on my smallish wrist just fine.  My only slight ding with this watch is that I found the date window a bit difficult to read.  Would recommend this watch to anyone looking for a jumbo sized timepiece.

B00AF767AU.A3TWON58BQR1XX.reviewText: My previous diesels have legs that are now too big; started looking for something trimmer, and in black. These came first and seemed too stiff (raw means stiff raw) and were not black ("denim" as color name means very dark blue despite Amazon's photo appearing as black). So I decided to return them. Then another pair of Diesels I ordered from Amazon came in and I wasn't so sure about which to keep. Long story short, I kept both, and this one (0807R) is my favorite. Wash inside out and the "denim blue" hangs in there. Wash them once and the raw mellows, without losing it's essential texture. I grew up on Levis 501s in shrink-to-fit style, so my tolerance for raw may be higher than others, but these also adapt to your body quite well and get better with each wash. About Made in Romania: Quality and conformity to style standard are very good; and it's good to see the former East Bloc state getting some industrial ramp up.

The design on the rear pockets are a bit subtle and rather generic for "Diesel" jeans (IMO) when you consider why people buy high end designer jeans these days (to show off that they spent $$$ on their jeans).  That's probably why these jeans are marked down.  But they are a good deal.

It seems the seem is too short and they ride up my backside like a pair of old lady underwear.  The waist and length are right and I have normal to slim proportions, so I trust the cut is off.NOW...when my wife saw the jeans on me she told me not to return them and I was crazy.  She thinks they look amazing, so I kept them.  While I do not think they fit like the first pair, they are truly snug like a glove and my wife says they are better then any jeans she has seen me in.  Given my wife's feedback and how they are perceived by others, I've bumped my review entirely.

B00AOAQLN6.AKTQVBT37NQMA.reviewText: The material is super comfortable.  I am 6'3 and walk around at about 190 pounds, and these (size 34x34) fit quite well, but I do need a belt to keep them from creeping south.  These jeans aren't inexpensive but they seem well made.  The belt loops seem as though they will hold up.  The button fly has fairly small buttons, so you really need to make sure you trust and verify when re-buttoning after using the facilities.  The coloring is very nice, as is the stitching.  This is my first pair of "high-brow" jeans, and I wouldn't wear them to mow the grass or milk the cows (I don't have cows), but I am happy with my purchase and would recommend if you're looking for a nice "going-out" pair.

B00AOARAM2.A57X5H5OK0VPE.reviewText: They are nice, but the color is not so dark that you see in the picture. Good Quality, nice design!

These are probably good for someone, but it's not me, and they're going back.

However, when I want to point out that when I claimed, company expressed their concern about this fact, answered promptly and respectfully and gave me a fair partial refund (I am overseas and its quite expensive to return an item).

I usually wear an 11 but took the chance and it worked out.  They are comfortable and unique looking without going overboard.  Excellent shoe for the price.

B00AQ4I6X8.A3ROV2UYKLJTI5.reviewText: Let's start with the look. These things are absolutely beautiful. I get compliments everywhere I go when I'm wearing these. They look awesome with jeans, kahkis and casual dress pants. They are built very well and feel like they will last a long time. They also give you two sets of laces. Brown for a more subtle look and sky blue for a more bold statement. I usually use the blue. As for the fit, the sizing is spot on for me. They are a little tight until you've worn them awhile and break them in. This took a little longer than other oxfords but now they fit and feel pretty comfortable. I love these. These are the second pair of Diesel shoes I've purchased and both are fantastic.
B00AQ4I6X8.A3ROV2UYKLJTI5.summary: Very Stylish. Well built. Comfortable after an extended break in period.

But this isn't any problem; the combination of beige and black looks great. Usually I wear an 8.5, but with these shoes I needed a 9. Be aware of that the black fabric bleeds in the beginning so that your feet get stained in the first couple of days. Also it takes a couple of days before they stop pinching. Due to the bleeding fabric and a little pinching in the beginning, I give 4 stars instead of 5. But all in all they are very cute flats, and I only can recommend buying them.

B00BB92LNI.A3LVWYKQE2P7KT.reviewerName: Jimmy Pops "Once you Pop the fun don't stop"
B00BB92LNI.A3LVWYKQE2P7KT.reviewText: Alright Amazon. I will be honest. I've been working out for quite some time and the results are starting to show nicely. So when I go to the beach I want to show off. Yes I said it. So what better way to do that than some short, bright red, fashion designer swim shorts? A couple of my lady friends loved them so, I daresay they are eye catchers to say the least. I own these in addition to the equally short Diesel Barrely swim shorts and I really enjoy walking around in this bad boy. Few things will make you feel as confident than strutting around in just enough clothing to cover what matters and knowing you look darn good doing it.Now that my egocentric rant is over, Diesel makes high quality clothing no doubt about that. There are no flaws whatsoever in the shorts. No rips or tears, the stitching is great, and the details are subtle, but well done. The fabric is a nice nylon that follows the countour of the body very nicely, especially if you work out your legs (which I DO, 205 pound squats ladies and gentlemen), but doesn't cling. There are two side pockets, and a back pocket outlined by silver trim with a silver metal accent hanging from the zipper. Again, subtle, but nice. The shorts read "Diesel, Take a Ride on the Freaky Side" on the back. No comma, granted. That's kind of a funny statement, I have yet to whip that one out on a beach girl, but I'm sure the opportunity will present itself in the future.These are great shorts if, like me, you've been feeling good about your physique and want to work it a little bit, as much as a guy can work it I guess. I make no apologies for that choice of words. A note though, these go by European sizes. I am normally a 30" waist on US sizes but I was a 28" with these shorts and even then I wish they were maybe a quarter of an inch slimmmer in the waist.So, if you're feeling ballsy, order, and have fun!

B00BEN3EEQ.A3KBIT6NORBYA6.reviewText: Asthetically speaking, after awhile, one simply gets to the point where Speedo, even the jammers versions, are no longer a good idea, even if one still swims laps quite a bit. But, I don't like baggy legs that fill with air when you enter the water. I don't like over the knee-cap length boardsuits. I dislike plaids, stripes, flowers, etc. The outside string ties at the waist and the "underwear" protruding above the waistline look is not for me. This, of course, doesn't leave much to choose from these days.  So, this swimsuit is okay as a fairly decent compromise. They obviously look like cut-off jeans, though the pockets, being unzippered, are really pretty useless for keys, etc., if one actually swims in these shorts. The belt loops are unnessesary as well. The legs, while not skin tight, aren't baggy or too long. To me, the buttoned waist looks much nicer than a shoe-string tie. Because these ride a bit low on the hip, I'd not recommend them to anyone carrying a significant "spare tire". Finally, the sizing is not quite what one might expect.  I've always worn a size 30" waist regarding jeans, shorts, etc., but this was too large for me regarding this swimsuit; I had to return it for a size 28".

B00BEN3EEQ.A1E1OGB9C4PUOY.reviewText: Great look for the beach and comfortable fit. Color matches exactly from what showed in picture. Get confidence when you wear Diesel.

I ordered my usual size in normal pants and it fit good, not tight nor loose.The design is very nice, I have wearing it not only for going to the beach but also everywhere.The color is cute.

B00BEN3EEQ.A7ZJQGV21OFZ5.reviewText: I usually can get my beach shorts in a size 30 and they are just right. These 30 size diesel shorts hang so low , I definately need the 28

B00BEN3EEQ.A2HIQAPBSOF6YF.reviewText: I would recommend these to anyone.  I can use them as everyday shorts as well as swimwear!  I LOVE THEM!  The fit is perfect!

B00BEN3EEQ.A3LVWYKQE2P7KT.reviewerName: Jimmy Pops "Once you Pop the fun don't stop"
B00BEN3EEQ.A3LVWYKQE2P7KT.reviewText: I've been slowly transitioning over to designer swimwear lately. Why? Because designer fits so much better than a cheap pair of board shorts from a superstore; more often than not it's like wearing a boat sail around your waist. The amount of excess material is just insanity.Diesel's Kroobeach Board Short is another example of the high quality, well fitting clothing Diesel makes. What's even better is catching deal on Amazon where you can acquire designer items without burning a hole in your pocket. Actually in most cases with designer prices, taking a flamethrower to your pants. Or wherever your house your wallet. The shorts look exactly how is pictured, perhaps a little looser closer to the knee for me as I am still working on bulking up my legs in my weight-lifting. If I had to sum the fit up in a single statement it would be just enough material. Not baggy, but not tight. A reviewer seems to be unaware that these come in a Size 28 which I recommend getting if you are normally arounda 30" waist in American sizes.The fabric feels a little thinner than swimsuits I've had in the past but honestly thinner doesn't mean lower quality. Diesel is well known for making superior fabrics in their items and I feel the Kroobeach is no exception; the shorts are very well-made from the fabric to the stitching and I have no doubt they will last for a long time. Aesthetically, there's the belt loops (just for show), back pockets and a button front which is a nice change from a drawstring. As far as the pockets go, I wouldn't expect them to function too well. Diesel was obviously shooting for the look of actually wearing some type of shorts which is kind of cool in my opinion. Other than that there's not much more to review than what you can't already see. As far as board shorts go these are pretty "no-frills".These are great board shorts. If you like the look definitely snag a pair!

B00BEN3EEQ.A15ROWX9YJ75R.reviewText: I've giving it 4 stars because it's a bit larger than I wanted, though I've bought the smallest size they've got (30).The mesh inside is a nice touch and it comes off very easy if you don't want it. B00BGFXWXA.A311ZIK2YBA3KG.reviewText: Overall, this boot gives off somewhat of a dressy but relaxed appearance. Very suitable for younger adults keeping up with the trends. Plan on buying inserts if you fancy the design of this boot. Overall, it is a decent shoe, but it was clearly designed with a focus on fashion more than comfort or high quality. For lovers of ankle boots, pay $100-$200 more and get a boot that will last you 5+ years and not force you to choose between destroying your feet and looking good.

B00BGFXWXA.A3LTJYQXPN4FWP.reviewText: Firstly will point out that I usually wear a size 10.5 US/45 EU/29 CM, but the box reports these are 12 US/45 EU/29 JP. I've compared this to online size charts at diesel.com and can only guess Diesel uses non-standard sizing, at least on these boots.Needless to say, I haven't been too concerned about the size discrepancy because a boot is secured around your ankle and lower leg, not just the foot. One size smaller might provide a better fit (it's hard to tell), but a boot won't drop off your foot and as the width is fine, I've had no issues with blistering.The sole is largely leather with a bit of textile in the heel for durability. I'd recommend getting a topy applied by a cobbler after you wear in the boots. This should cover a lot of the leather sole, providing some protection from wear and the elements.The best part of these boots is the zip - you only need to tie the laces once, and the convenience of donning and doffing with a quick zip is great. One small negative is that I expected the boots to have more of a 'dressy' appearance than they actually do, but in black they are still smart enough to wear at the office. I haven't done extensive walks in these but have no complaints about support or pain - they are as comfortable as any other shoe as far as I'm concerned.

B00BGFXWXA.A2RJVHM3LWI751.reviewText: I've been researching this boot up and down. When I buy items online, I look for best deals, and proper reviews. Hands down, Amazon had the best deal (& you can usually obtain a discount by searching promo codes on google) vs. the lowest price I found on Ebay ($130). Anyway, The boot is more of a matte color and not as shiny as the photos, definitely not disappointing though. It is a bit stiff at the ankle, however I am still breaking them in. The black color on the bottom sole will come off once you walk outside, however this isn't a huge deal. The zippers are a bit stiff- I had to lubricate mine with wax, not to mention one zipper is a bit defective and gets stuck here and there. Had to use a pliers to zip it back, but I received a discount for this as It was defective, but still useable. The size is proper to what you normally wear, however I'm sure It wouldn't have hurt to go down another half inch. Overall, I'd expect greater quality from Diesel, but it's a great boot for the price, just lube your zippers!

B00BGGR7YE.A15J0LH5EQJHL8.reviewText: A few have mentioned that these boots are difficult to put on...and yes they are a bit difficult to put on and take off, but they are very form fitting so it makes sense. I'm actually going to order a second pair in a different color. To find great boots like these at this price (currently 119.98 on sale) its totally worth it.

B00BGGR7YE.AL9296K53F0GE.reviewText: I got these for my husband and he LOVES them. He is on his feet 14 hours a day and was having so many issues finding shoes that were comfortable that were appropriate for work. I used to have to rub his feet every night (wife award...) and now I almost never do. He loves them so much he bought a second pair! One for work in the hospital and one for going out, they really are great for almost everything! I HIGHLY recommend these boots!They are a little narrow. He has a normal width foot and after about a week they were broken in just fine, but it does take a minute to slip your foot in and zip it at first. If you have a wide foot I think this would be a problem.

B00BGGR7YE.A2TYTIJF3W87K2.reviewText: I bought these for my son who is a senior in high school. As you probably know, it's very important to look cool at that age. I was afraid he wouldn't like them, but they look much better in real life than online. Very masculine boots that are versatile. They look like a high end leather athletic shoe if you wear your jeans over the boot. If you tuck your jeans into the boot it adds a masculine sense of style.  These are made of very nice leather, they are cool because they are both rugged and athletic looking.  As far as sizing, just loosen the laces a bit before unzipping and trying them on, they fit true to size in my opinion.  However, if you have a very  wide foot you may want to go a half size up from your normal size.  I like how they look with the "skinnier" jeans that are in style now, they add that missing touch, but in a very masculine way.  It's nice to have something besides the typical hiking or work boot. Trust me, if my son likes these, they are "in style" and masculine. He would not wear them if he felt they emasculated him in the slightest way. That young man would have loved to tell me that he hated them and that I have no idea what is cool these days....but to his dismay he really did like them, ALOT!!  Ha, his mom isn't so "uncool" after all LOL
B00BGGR7YE.A2TYTIJF3W87K2.summary: These look much better in real life than online; the picture doesn't do them justice.

I will purchase this boot again in a different color; I highly recommend this product.

B00BGGR7YE.A49HEL1A1J7K3.reviewText: I almost never review my purchases.  But these boots are awsome!  Very comfortable!  If thay had the Brown in 13M I would certainly buy a second pair.

Very easy to put on and take off due to the zipper no need to untie every time. Overall they fit true

B00BGGR7YE.A23U1IKIWL436O.reviewText: I love diesel ! That said, I would love these boots if they weren't Diesel.  I am always reluctant to buy shoes on line but after reading the good and bad reviews I decided to order them. I have to say these boots surpassed my expectations.  Some review said negative things such as the laces are cheep, etc......this  couldn't be further for the truth! These boots are the top quality, comfortable, fashionable, etc.!  I have several gucci boots and I'm loving these more!They can be dressed up or worn with jeans. Look killer and I would recommend them to family, friends, and you. I  purchased black and I love these so much I'm ordering a pair in brown tonight! They do run a little small, about half a size, so I ordered half size larger than normal and they fit perfect!Get 'em! You won't regret it!!!

B00BGGR7YE.A314KZTXAM5B04.reviewText: They are very nice fits just like they were supposed to and very comfortable walking around in with the tennis shoe type bottom. Looks great too

B00BGGR7YE.A2X4A3J7G8YUSM.reviewText: Well made, the only thing that bothered me was some of the stitchign at the top edges of the boot that was scratching my leg. Brought to a show guy, who fixed it for $5. Other than that is super comfy, durable and I have gotten some great reviews on them.

B00BGGR7YE.A2C6LTT2XBHEG4.reviewText: I love these leather boots. They are comfortable and sturdy. You can tell they were made with quality in mind.

B00BGGR7YE.AE98CCDDRI5EZ.reviewText: Hi,my first experience with amazon service was very good. It was very sercure, i could track my order all time and it toke only 5 days being delivered.The size of the boots its a few small for me, but now i kwnow that my size is 8 and not is 7,5, hahahaharegards

B00BGGR7YE.A16PJUOJPJZY7J.reviewText: Comfortable very nice fits exactly best price no wonder my size sells out so fast I waited a month till it was available again

B00BGGR7YE.A33EFBMVGGIR7L.reviewText: Awesome boots, no complaints. soft real leather, nice semi worn out look, easy zipper entrance. I like the high rising toe tip, because I bend that part of the shoe a lot so I think it'll help with any sole detaching problems in the future.

B00BGGR7YE.A3534258R57CHO.reviewText: I decided to buy these boots when I saw my friend wearing them. Then I got the replacement and wore it once, bam!, zipper slider detached immediately when I tried to unzip it. I am going to get my refund this time.When I told my friend about my issue, he said his boots' pull loops snapped twice.I plan on investing on more expensive but sturdier boots.

B00BGGR7YE.A1F2VHANX8604X.reviewText: After having a pair for some time I realized that these boots are perfect for everyday use, that's why I bought two more pairs so I have new ones when the old ones get worn out.

B00BGGR7YE.A1X8O9BPQKKCR8.reviewText: I loved these boots but they simply would not fit my size 12 foot and I ordered and received size 12 boots! B00BGGR7YE.A37EKN6CU9ROPO.reviewText: The boots are nice, except for the zipper which wasn't that hard to break. And the fact that once it breaks you can't really use the boots at all, well, it says a lot.but cool boots, not as cool as on the pictures. too much photoshop on those pictures.

B00BGGR7YE.A3VCSPVRN9I4FO.reviewText: This is a fantastic, comfortable boot. I have a couple pairs of Diesel sneakers that are all size 10, so I went size 10 in these because of the sneaker-like sole, and although they are a bit of a chore to get on out of the box, they fit perfectly. One thing I was disappointed in was the color of the Bungee variant I ordered: it looks like a weathered gun metal grey (like a bungee cord) in the product photos, but in real life they appear very brown to me. I am keeping them, but I probably wouldn't have ordered if the brownish tone had been apparent in the product photos online.
B00BGGR7YE.A3VCSPVRN9I4FO.summary: Excellent casual boot. Bungee color not as expected.

B00BGGR7YE.AQVU2X4NK5V31.reviewText: What a marvellous product!  Diesel certainly has it's pulse on style and fashion with this boot.  A near timeless design that will have it in my wardrobe for a few years to come!

B00BGGR7YE.AHC5V0LEKN2II.reviewText: Based on some comments, I ordered a half size larger than usual to make sure I had plenty of room in the toe box. They fit well and are comfortable. I love the look, and it's nice to zip in and out of them without bothering with the laces.

B00BGGR7YE.A6H86AQF13UQW.reviewText: The size is perfect but it has absolutely no tread so I slip all over during the winter- I guess I'll have to wait till summer to wear my boots? The front of them scuffs pretty easy too

B00BGGR7YE.ARZP2QXEAX546.reviewText: Like the way they look but it was difficult to put them on. Also, they are very light and I'm not sure how long will they stand the beating.

B00BGGR7YE.A2BOK6WQ1GM8Q5.reviewText: I wear a size 9 in sneakers. This is a hybrid boot and after reading many other reviews I opted to go 1/2 a size larger than normal. They look great, fit great and I haven't had any problems with them at all. Leather is a little stiff but after a few wears they start breaking in. I read many complaints about zippers breaking but I don't wear casual boots the same as I would a work boot. I wear them half open with the laces slightly expanded so I don't fear zipper failure. They are a bit narrow so going up a half a size will also help them fit more comfortably.

B00BGGR7YE.A2JNF1MQA3L0DM.reviewText: I wear shoe size 12-12 1/2 wide. I purchased this boot in size 13. Fits very well and broke them in almost immediately.Turns out these look more formal than expected. If I was to buy again I would go for gun metal grey instead of black.They look dressier from the top as my past cover up the more modern side zipper, also the blue rubber isn't so obvious.These fit best with thin socks. Nice light books - works great for my daily commute to work on my motorcycle.Overall, I am very satisfied, good comfort, quality seems good, and style is cool. I would recommend to a friend.
B00BGGR7YE.A2JNF1MQA3L0DM.summary: Comfy, fits as expected - very impressed.

B00BGGR7YE.A2ZOQZRUY2LVBV.reviewText: Bad zipper riped the first time I put on the shoesBut the shoes are nice quality and comfortable style is nice too

B00BGGR7YE.AE2MSRQJSMTJ2.reviewText: I wanted these boots so i tried it on at Macy's for size before ordering it here on Amazon.The Boots are great. Comfortable. Light.I like these Boots because the sole is like sneakers and the rest of it is a leather boot.It's hybrid of a sneaker and a boot.It's very comfortable and great for walking.You can go wrong with these.

B00BGGR7YE.A6G1RJL0WQ2R9.reviewText: Great looking boots sizes are pretty accurate. I ordered a size 10 because it was 70 bucks but I am 10.5 11 ans had to return them. Size 10.5 up was 160 bucks!!! Too bad they look good and rhe color (bungy cord) looks great too.

B00BGGR7YE.A1BQGY0P53NFDP.reviewText: I just got these, arrived right on time (thank you Amazon.com), and they look amazing.  Contrary to what many have stated here, they do not run small at all.  I watched a youtube video review and the reviewer gave some great tips on how to get these on and off, I followed his instructions and they are easier to take on and off than many of my other boots.  And a note about the size;  I normally wear a size 9.  In most dress shoes I have to go up to a size 9.5 so they will fit my slightly wide feet, so I ordered a 9.5 in these since many were saying they ran a tad small.  The 9.5's fit me perfectly!Build Quality:  They are very light weight and the zipper feels a bit cheap, but I hope by following the suggestions I received to always make sure they are not laced up so tight it puts pressure on the zipper, they will last a very long time.  If the zipper fails early, I'll update this review.  The laces "feel" cheap, but I suspect it's due to the style, they are very light and FLAT laces with a coating on them.  Again, if they prove to fail on me earlier than they should I'll update.Looks:  They look amazing!  Love these boots, they moved up to my favorite footwear instantly as soon as I pulled them out of the box.Comfort:  From putting them on and walking around the house, they feel like a pair of sneakers or deck shoes.  Good arch support but not a whole lot of cushioning.  I'm not sure how they will feel walking around in them all day since the padding is much less than my other boots, but as mentioned above, I'll update if there are any issues.  The leather is very soft, so I don't think there will be much breaking in needed, they are very comfortable right out of the box.For the price I paid (about half price through Amazon.com) these are an exceptional buy.  Not sure I would pay full price for them though, but if they hold up well they will certainly be worth it.

B00BGGR7YE.A3TJKKVI5F0DZL.reviewText: Great quality...You can feel the smell of leather, really nice leather. This shoes look awesome. Don't wanna even wear them, that's how good they are. Just enjoy having them in my closet:)

B00BGGR7YE.AIENORVDGDLAW.reviewText: Best shoes i bought so comfy and stylish. i saw them at the diesel the store and they were so much money.. i looked around and found them on amazon so happy.

B00BGGR7YE.A34E6IYI40IL28.reviewText: These are fine, fit better than expected based off the other reviews. But they make my feet look like tiny elfen hooves.And so I don't really wear them.

B00BGGR7YE.A2WOKNHKG76534.reviewText: The boots were too tight for me. I had to struggle to put my foot in. I was also not much thrilled by the shape. I ended up returning the $130 shoes and went for $77 Hit Men from Kenneth Cole, which are much more stylish, and go very well with jeans as well as dress pants.

B00BGGR7YE.A3DST7ZNJDMGTD.reviewText: I originally noticed these boots in the Diesel store while visiting in Washington DC. You could tell that these boots were well made, but at first glance, I was not 100% sure that I would purchase them or not. The blend of sneaker bottoms and leather upper was so new to me that I needed some time to think it over. After returning to my home in Rochester NY, I quickly regretted not buying them, Here is the good thing;  DC, they were 160.00. When I found them here on Amazon, they were 149.00. So at this point, THE PRICE WAS RIGHT!!! These boots may be a little tight when first putting them on, like most boots can be, but as soon as they begin to break in, you will quickly find yourself wearing them all the time. These boots can fit every occasion, and stick out in terms of unique fashion. I like to tie them half way and let the upper flap fold out over my jeans, it looks solid with these boots. Definitely buy these boots from Amazon, Great boots at the best price.
B00BGGR7YE.A3DST7ZNJDMGTD.summary: Will be one of your favorite pair of boots

B00BGGR7YE.A6GOF8R35I1B2.reviewText: The price is good comparing with researching~~ even better than the price of my local diesel store.The size is fit as expected, as the design itself is slim, but I am sure the size is Fit as my expectation~~

I ordered two and the second one fit.  It just needed to be a centimeter bigger in the hips to fall properly.  I'm glad I ordered the second one.  It is perfect.

B00BI1XE1W.AZ8I0WNABZZAK.reviewText: It's a great color and gets lots of compliments.  Watch face is large enough to read without glasses and works perfectly all the time.  Have not had any problems and the cost was reasonable.  Couldn't ask for more.

B00BIGEKLA.A3Q3GUKUTUFFH3.reviewText: Usually I use size M in other brands, but for Diesel I always buy L or XL. This t-shirt appeared huge.

B00BIH2SBS.A3FTA7UKI8C2TA.reviewText: i LOVE this jacket. lesbian fashion 101 has me shopping in the men's department often. this was one of my favorite finds! great deal on an awesome jacket! the material is very soft and the hood in the collar is great!

B00BIHZU2M.A19UDKD3OE0GBA.reviewText: You need to know how Diesel fits.  I've drooled over these jeans for a year and was ecstatic to find them at this price.

At the time of purchase they were, in my opinion, good value.

B00BJ78MA8.A1DLSHBIJUKZSL.reviewText: somewhat happy with the product. the shade of orange is different in pictures. it's actually more neon and bright. the sides have a ribbed texture which doesn't show on the site. also, the fit is a bit larger than the usual size "small" that im used to when i buy diesel. it's still a good product though especially for the price.

B00BJ78MA8.A19QL6OJ1D0AHH.reviewText: Nice quality and surprisingly comfortable.  Took a little getting used to but once you are these are really very functional.

B00BJ78MA8.A3FHUOJJKC0UKE.reviewText: I have worn the Speedo Shoreline suit in the past.  This Diesel trunk seems to be higher quality material and has a great fit.  Seems true to size, as I ordered a medium as I usually wear.  These trunks are a bit shorter than the Speedo suit, but that is what I was looking for.  Overall, seems like a great product.

B00BJ78MA8.A523IUO463O8E.reviewText: While I really liked the sensuality of the bathing suit it was too revealing for me to wear in public. If you have privacy and or are not as private as I am then yo for it as it is a sharp suit.

B00BJ78MA8.AW4UBWINHD6IA.reviewText: Fit perfect and happy with the purchase.  I have had Diesel before, I knew I wore a Medium, fit as expected.

B00BJ78MA8.A8X8EO9BSUYNU.reviewText: Love them! The color really makes it stick out, very bright nice color. NO shoes, no shirt..and I still get service in these.

B00BJ78MA8.A2S03AGB5EWZ0E.reviewText: Spent quite a bit of time looking for box cut swim trunks for the beach/boat season, and got a little lucky with this high quality item.  Great look and fit.  Nice details as well.  Certainly not for everyone, but if you got the moxy, these are the way to go.
B00BJ78MA8.A2S03AGB5EWZ0E.summary: Just what I was looking for...

B00BJ78MA8.AM1F9B7BLSBR3.reviewText: So, I've never worn anything but board shorts and decided to try these. They are very comfortable and the sizes is true. I was a bit unsure about wearing them but wife insisted on it and even I got many compliments. I was surprised myself since I'm a skinny guy and that was at a community pool. These are very well made with heavy fabric. Overall, I would recommend them.

B00BJ78MA8.A2OUJ2U6BWKYXW.reviewText: I'm in mid 20's and growing up in the baggy clothes were the norm. Prior to buying these I only owned board shorts. Looking for a change I pulled the trigger on buying these despite laughs and statements like "really?" and "seriously?" from my wife. I really like these shorts but be aware they leave NOTHING to the imagination. Great quality, very form-fitting and attention getting (if you're looking for that). I wore them all last week on a vacation in Jamaica and although my wife was embarrassed I got the best tan of my life! Live life to the beat of your own drum!
B00BJ78MA8.A2OUJ2U6BWKYXW.summary: First trunks for a board shorts guy - these are not for the modest!

B00BJ78MA8.A2WYMDQQQXV1Q6.reviewText: First sunga ever and i like it a lot!! High quality and european design swimwear!! Very satisfied with this purchase!! :D

B00BJEDYD6.A13DH0GJ37PYBV.reviewText: it not the best jean but it  a good quality product well every time clen on cold water. the colors are weak

B00BJEGEN8.A2HT84OPL8ZI71.reviewText: this is top line shorts by diesel. my wife likes it a lot. fits well as well. good buy as there was sale on this,

B00BJEGEN8.A3I94OWAI6UZ8Z.reviewText: The quality is good and I like the style. However, the size is too large for me. I should wear size 27 or 28 so I ordered 27 but it's still large for me. I'll give it 5 star if the size is fit.

B00BK30EVG.A2GF10ERWOGMYP.reviewText: They used exactly the same fabrics but the cut in this brief is a little larger, I own LARGE on both swimsuits, a SMALL would have fitted better.Now the review: those Diesel briefs and boxer swimsuits are very comfortable, soft, the stitching are well done, the cut is sexy yet sporty, has perfect coverage for the private parts, the elastics seem to be very well placed so you don't have to worry about your "stuff" coming out, haha!... this kind of clothes are really funny. They show a lot of your "masculinity", so you have to be very sure of what your doing wearing those.Buy them, wear them, enjoy them!... comfort, a perfect suntan and compliments from your girlfriend/boyfriend will pay the price of showing your "stuff" haha!...

B00BK30EVG.A1HWG4C5H0VE62.reviewText: I'm right on the line between medium and small so I ordered a medium and couldn't be happier. These fit just a little big but the elastic is so tight that even with a few wrinkles in the waist and the leg holes the elastic holds them in place better than any other speedo I've worn except a really tight water polo spacific one

B00BK30EVG.AA9CEBORAM4AW.reviewText: The briefs are super cute the sizes run a bit big though i had a ton of space In them

B00BK30EVG.A3N30BT7TQJBJY.reviewText: I ordered these for my trip to South Beach. I have a pair of the same style from a couple of seasons ago, but I've lost some weight and wanted a size down. This pair of Diesel swim briefs are pretty cool. They have a fuller cut and cover a little more than european style swimwear, a little too high in the back. Also, not enough room in the seat though. Although I liked this pair, I returned for a refund due to not being the fit I was looking for. They also have a rubber Diesel logo on the back right side panel.

B00BK30ILM.A1TOJA5LFYHRXP.reviewText: This has to be one of the best fit swim trunks I have ever bought online and on Amazon for that matter....I'm a size 34 waist and the trunks fit perfectly....if you're like me a size XL is best.....it looks great I'm not falling out of myself, can't wait to visit the pool or spend some time on the beach.....definitely would buy from the seller and the brand again.
B00BK30ILM.A1TOJA5LFYHRXP.summary: Words cant describe how impressed I am

B00BK30ILM.A37APYLUU8062R.reviewText: This brief does not look very sporty, so I will use it at the beach instead. It looks much more luxurious and expensive than a trainning brief. Will look mazing at the beach.

B00BK30ILM.A1ZDBMDNMP0R1G.reviewText: Exactly as expected, look great on and the Orange color is striking/interesting.  Would purchase again.  Diesel swimwear is the best...

B00BK311ZO.A3U845IPP8FDVU.reviewText: "Let's just say it was an "extra small" Extra large..... I could not fit these over my hips, the other extra large swim trunks I bought from another company fit fine and I am keeping them. On the plus side the return was quick and easy."

B00BK311ZO.A38NVMXFUMJ85F.reviewText: I purchased these along with the parke & ronen redondo poplin shorts. Fit on these was right on, with more than enough room if you have thick thighs/quads. Highly recommended. Lots of compliments from the ladies while rocking these. Not your typical down-to-the-knee boardshorts, so if you are unabashed in showing off your body and legs, these are the way to go. In fact, I just ordered the black ones to add to the blue that was previously purchased.

B00BK311ZO.AKOR4ZMU52PJ0.reviewText: Nowadays where all the clothes are "slim" or "fit" (I hate that) you have to buy clothes one size bigger.

B00BK311ZO.A1YPSQBAIJDDKX.reviewText: These shorts look great and are exactly as per the listing.  I'm a 34 waist and the large is a 'snug' fit on me.  The main criticisms I have are: 1) Fabric is 'stiff' and not stretchy at all.  Other shorts I have are made from a supple, slightly stretchy material that makes them much more comfortable to wear. 2)  You are paying about 30% of the price for the label - these are a cheaply made pair of shorts.  H&M sell much better made shorts for $30.
B00BK311ZO.A1YPSQBAIJDDKX.summary: Nice, but slightly overpriced and less than ideal material

B00BK311ZO.A1IG4NTUI9VMFE.reviewText: Perfect just what I wanted the fabric is great, fits nice, and the color is very pretty, planning on getting all the colors

B00BKF6SMI.A2GCBDBIXYOV0G.reviewText: It wasn't initially clear to me from the photo, but there's an intentional "bleed" pattern on these, meaning that it kind of looks like the dye bled onto the white parts after being washed. At first I thought I'd gotten a bad pair, but when I came back and blew up the picture, I could see that it's in the photo as well. It's grown on me, but make sure to check out a big version of the photo.Also, these run small, so order a size larger than your usual. I have a 30 inch waist, but large thighs and butt, so I usually go with a small to medium, depending on the brand. I probably should have gotten a large - the medium just barely fits, and I definitely won't be putting them on or taking them off quickly!
B00BKF6SMI.A2GCBDBIXYOV0G.summary: nice swim trunks, but blow up the photo to make sure you'll like them

B00BLEO01Y.A1FSN9Z3Y5GW5D.reviewText: I've bought 31 size (according size chart), but they are too large for this size.I have centimeter ruler at home, and actual waist length is 88 cm (34.65 in).You can see how they look at me if you select "denim/blue" color at 2nd picture.// UPDATE: They've updated this 2nd picture, so the new one is not large at all.They are very large for me at this area. Other reviewer said 28 size fits perfect. May be there is some differences.But in overall, these shorts are very stylish and feels great. I want to buy size 30, and sell this (31).

B00BLEO01Y.A10FOCC5SP7V6M.reviewText: These shorts are really nice! I'm a 28 waist and ordered a 28 and they fit perfectly so they didn't run too small or too big. They went a little below my knee which shortens my already short bod but I just folded them up like in the pic. Awesome shorts to get if you're thinking about it and aren't sure.

B00BLI2HX8.A2KZQ6ZK98FSI7.reviewText: This is very stylish and Made in Italy!  Its linen so ve careful to hand wash it only.  The fit is athletic and looks great.  I am 5-11, 175 pounds with a lean, muscled build.  I ordered a large and it fits perfect like the model in the picture.  Great shirt!

B00BLI2P8A.A3FTA7UKI8C2TA.reviewText: I am a 5'7" size 4 female and the size small fit me perfectly. the sleeves are a little long (which is to be expected) but the buttoned up fit is perfectly snug.

B00BLI2P8A.AO65E4IHXNXWV.reviewText: Its fabric quality is amazing, I love it. You should be carefully because cardigans are small, for example, if your size is MEDIUM you should buy LARGE

B00BLI2P8A.A17Y9KP2CO9UF6.reviewText: Shipping was decent. The item itself seems cheap, maybe not authentic?Runs super small which is pretty typical for Diesel products. Still not sure about authenticity.

B00BLIT01U.A35I9ABTA9T5P2.reviewText: The Item looks and fits great, but not please with quality. After a month button on the sleeve has already fallen off and also notice a tear in inner liner.

B00BLIT01U.A1ZGR2B1ALU668.reviewText: Needed the next size, exchanged for X-Large.  Received the X-Large yesterday very pleased with quality & fit.Amazon once again did a great job of Return  Service.I'm getting better results online w/Amazon than I do shopping in Department stores.Thanks for caring Amazon,R.Pergola
B00BLIT01U.A1ZGR2B1ALU668.summary: Item runs a bit tight ,..slim fit,..

B00BLIT01U.A2GKQNC68OYMN2.reviewText: This jacket is a slim fit, which I love. It will look good on anyone who is lean. I would definately buy more items from this family of Diesel clothing.

B00BLY9KJQ.A3L5TGXVJJQUMP.reviewText: I usually wear a size 31 waist, so I bought one. As soon as the product arrived, I tried it on, and was disappointed that the waist size was way too big. For this Jeans, I should have purchased a size 29, maybe even less. That's too bad, because this pants looks good.
B00BLY9KJQ.A3L5TGXVJJQUMP.summary: Way to big on the waist

B00BLY9KJQ.A22D8RTMR01RGH.reviewText: I am 5'10.5" 165 lbs, proportional, with a somewhat athletic build especially around legs. I usually wear 30 by 31-32 pants.This pair is low rise, sits on your hip bones. But STILL, the size I ordered (30x32) was at least 1 inch loose on my hip bones, with lots of extra material bulging out in the buttocks area. And the length was 2-3 inches longer than 32. Not sure why the length was so much longer than the advertised 32". I know most designer jeans need to be altered, but to highlight that, they usually do not provide length measure and make them extra long.I attempted to shrink them by washing (turned inside out) on recommended cold setting and drying on 3/4 of max temp half-cycle and then 1/2 of max temp setting the rest of the drying cycle. Temps on my drier are: low, med, high, very high.The jeans did not shrink from drying by a lot, if at all. The color did fade a bit though and became uneven.Also, there is this little pocket under the belt on the right of your back, trimmed with leather. That leather warped after washing/drying.  Hopefully it will become straight and smooth once worn again.Otherwise good quality and nice design.If you are looking to get these, order one size smaller in waist area and prepare to have them altered for length.You COULD order 29 length if you normally want 32, but then I suppose they will be sitting way too low on your hips.
B00BLY9KJQ.A22D8RTMR01RGH.summary: As others said, not really a normal slim fit, too large

B00BLY9KJQ.ABLLVQ3XQGNS7.reviewText: Great pair of jeans to have for day to day wear. totally recommend it.easy and very comfortable to wear.
B00BLY9KJQ.ABLLVQ3XQGNS7.summary: Great fit, comfy and every day wear

B00BLYCG74.A30P63MNB5ZX5K.reviewText: the material was awesome but it was tooooo large waist 32 i ordered which it was perfect but the length was  tooooooooooooooooooobig

It's the same style and everything, but the picture you can't see orange spots.The jeans quality is great and it's the italian made one, but I'm very disappoints with the orange spots. I wish companies would just make NORMAL jeans, not fill it with weird stuff.Gonna return it.

B00BN2INKI.A385QRIQRGQQRM.reviewText: When I opened the package my excitement of buying jacket disappeared. It was clearly been used as it has some weird perfume smell, used stain marks on neck. Returned it, pretty disappointing as this jacket in new condition would have been a great addition to my wardrobe.

B00BN365N4.A1BBROZGAIS4UN.reviewText: This bra is very nice but has no support. I'm 34 C and size 3 fits well. I send it back, because of the fabric. Its too thin. But still great quality and very unique.

B00BN3677I.A1BBROZGAIS4UN.reviewText: I bought the bra together with the hipster. Wasn't sure about it until I try it on. It is very nice bra, fits well and has very good quality. It is also very unique. I like Diesel style. I'm 34C and size 3 fits me well.

B00BN36AMK.A1BBROZGAIS4UN.reviewText: This hipsters looks much better in person than on the picture. I'm 5'3 125 lb. and size 2 fits perfect. Diesel has usually smaller size.Great quality and even better price.

B00BN36EF8.A13JJL2EE9F45.reviewText: It's all good except that I hadn't realized that the strings on the side to tie it were leather-like looking. It doesn't bother me but it wasn't obvious.

B00BN36EU8.A237V26LHEYISM.reviewText: The fit is wonderful. They are a terry cloth material (I didn't know that when I bought it). They make my legs look fantastic (I'm pretty petite so all take all the length I can get!).

B00BOFI9SA.A20J4VMJN2BR7J.summary: I love the pattern and the fabric but these are quite slim in the thighs.

B00BOFI9SA.A195OX02RPBBPE.reviewText: I normally wear a medium or large, I ordered Large's hoping they wouldn't be too big.  When I received them I realized that in Diesel sizes I apparently wear a 5X-Large.  I literally could not fit into these as they were so small.
B00BOFI9SA.A195OX02RPBBPE.summary: Size Large is equivalent to Boys Extra Small

B00BOFI9SA.A37L5PDP9ZJZB8.reviewText: Iam size 30 waist and the medium fits me perfect. Very nice fit. Really like the double button on the fly. Would buy again! !!!

B00BOGKQYE.A313PXD0T9BU81.reviewText: I am biased---I love Diesel products. The clothing is cool and fits well. Most items are of good quality. This bracelet is smart looking and matches many outfits. I highly recommend this product.

B00BP3OQ7O.A3TP8I1DY9LZ1D.reviewText: These swim shorts are for the in shape guy. Then have an excellent fit. I have larger thighs (and no not fat) and they fit nicely. I did try them on the minute I received them and boy do I have to loose the gut. Very cool looking pattern and the color is tropical orange.The packaging was perfect for the shorts. I am glad I purchased them as I am going to get in a bit better shape. Can't wait to get them on again. Don't get me wrong they fit nice...It's just that Diesel is for Diesel Bodies.

B00BP3OQ7O.AW1WGU01MUMT6.reviewText: The print is cute, but the cut is unflattering. There is simply too much material so they ride up like granny underwear. Will be returning for something that sits below the hips.

B00BP3OQ8I.AKWLKL62QXOKT.reviewText: Its a gorgeous well made swimsuit. Comfort and fashion. Sizing is accurate for most- however if you're muscular i would go up one size.

B00BP3OQ9M.AZIDWASLKKBTM.reviewText: Really comfortable brief. The colors are brighter than the picture shows just making it more eye catching. This suit is for the guy that's in shape & comfortable with there body.

B00BP3OQ9M.A1ZDBMDNMP0R1G.reviewText: I purchased these for a European summer trip - the fit is excellent.  I'm a 31" waist and medium was fitted but not ridiculously tight.  While these are white (gasp!), they don't "show" anything, and are great for wearing along the beach to accentuate your summer tan.  Comfortable, stylish - I would purchase again.  Well done, Diesel!

B00BP3OUPC.A30EFKREVFSWUG.reviewText: These definately look better in reality (got myself white/blue ones). Pleasently surprised. Size seems to be on the bigger side of 32 (my size), but not too far from 'true to size' definition :)

B00BP3OUPC.A35PT05J3I5NRT.reviewText: Im very happy (like always ) whits this order,My size in diesel is 31-32 ,i order 32 and fits perfect,the color is awesome, excellent quality-design... once again DIESEL-AMAZON thanks for the  great job-price....i highly recommend it......

It's not comfortable at all,because the soleleather is too tough for feet. Despite all these, it's very stylish and elegant...Thank you!!!

B00BPZZN56.A1HGLC0FQ5KUOP.reviewText: I like diesel products and this tote bag does not disappoint at all.  it's not a very sturdy bag,  but I only got it to carry my books to and from church.  it doesn't have a smooth finish and that adds so much character to the bag.  would buyagain if there were other colors available.

B00BPZZN56.A1E2JQF3QMIS9B.reviewText: I love the soft leather on the inside and the chic semi-shiny yet textured look on the outside BUT this bag has started dying my wallet and phone case and tablet sleeve BLACK. So do not buy if you have an expensive wallet or phone case or tablet sleeve.

B00BQ01AW0.A4XJQ600BTD4C.reviewText: I hesitated before purchasing this item because of the price and the fact that I am a woman 60+ years old!  But I needed something for an upcoming trip and the backpack/ bookbags weren't working for me.  This was a perfect size to hold all the items I needed while on tours and hikes all day long and it was comfortable to wear.  I could wear it cross body and switch sides when one shoulder was tired or I could shorten the strap and carry just on one shoulder.  The camou design might be more appropriate on a young male, and if I could have found the exact bag in a solid color, that would have been nice, but now that I have this one,  I will use it for all future trips too!

B00BQ7OETE.AZQ4GW5CMQ0UG.reviewText: This pair of under looks great.  Has a great design and fits well,  even though it is a tad small.  I would definitely buy this again.

B00BQ7OK70.AI4GCCVOO3DAF.reviewText: I thought its really small but its large and didnt fit him not a good choice im not gonna buy online boxer again

B00BQ7OV4W.AINFC1NJ3ALN0.reviewText: I would have loved to get the trunks but this is at a better price. Nice snug fit. Not as comfy as CKs but this design is way way nicer.

B00C0E6BY8.A1E9WL60CH0NIS.reviewText: when i recieve the shorts i can hardly believe it's from diesel, the material is too... thin, so much like something wear at home.the second time i wear it i found a hole in the button，and i can't return it!so please consider carefully for this, it's not in good quality at all!

I decided to return based on the unnaturally slim leg opening of 9.5". The material has zero stretch and isn't terribly comfortable. At this price point I'd like everything to be spot-on. If you got spindly, daddy long legs go for it, otherwise, not so much.

B00C1ZSLSK.AXD36Q3DRW10T.reviewText: Way too large. I usually wear a 32 in "European clothing so prompted by a very helpful review I ordered two sizes smaller and the fit is a loose 32. Just drop two sizes.Otherwise the shorts are nicely tapered and well made.

I ordered a 32 & had to exchange them for a 31 (honestly I could go for a 30, but just don't feel like the hassle of another exchange). B00C1ZT62A.A1MIDGCJLVQW4D.reviewText: the pants fit as expected, but when i tried to brush out some dirt on the pants the color faded and now there's a visible white spot and can't be worn anymore. i tried brushing it more and it only made it worseThe pants have also ripped in the crotch after only being worn 4 timesVery disappointing for a diesel product..

B00C1ZT62A.A3MXRO06EO50EM.reviewText: What a great purchase. They fit as expected, look and feel comfortable at the same time and it is worth the price.

B00C40WIU4.A3LVWYKQE2P7KT.reviewerName: Jimmy Pops "Once you Pop the fun don't stop"
B00C40WIU4.A3LVWYKQE2P7KT.reviewText: Now these are some comfy undies. These Diesel Microfiber Briefs might be the most comfortable things to ever have encased my boys. They are well made, comfortable, very well priced especially for Diesel, and are stylish to boot for activities in which pants are not necessarily a necessity. Try saying THAT five times fast.For those who don't know, Diesel is a European fashion clothing company renown for their high quality, well-fitting clothing; jeans especially. This quality and fit comes at a premium however and most items of Diesel clothing will make your wallet cringe in fear. So considering each of these pairs of briefs are about $14 apiece, that is a steal. Now you might be thinking "Well okay, but for that money I can get multiple pairs of Hanes at Target or something." To which I say shame on you. Treat your equipment with some respect okay? For pity's sake.Diesel made the Blade Microfiber Brief with every once of quality the company is known for. The Microfiber material is very soft and lovely to the touch and no I don't mean with your fingers. The material stretches very well and doesn't feel like the threads will come loose, the fabric will be damaged, or that the waistband will fray, nothing like that. These are very well made briefs. So while yes each one comes with some premium, you get your money's worth.The fit is also spectacular. I have a pretty small waistline so a small was the go-to choice. I ordered seven colors and every single one fits perfectly. The briefs are not too tight, but not too loose, and I think have a bit of a low-rise. The only complaint I have with the fit is that the waistband feels like it could use slightly more cinching but the briefs don't slide down or ride up (briefs in general don't really do this due to the lack of material that can ride up your leg which is why I like them so much) so I can't really, nor want to, dock any stars off for that. These briefs also have the the fly opening for when nature calls. This is a nice touch; many briefs don't have this so more points to Diesel on that one.Gentlemen, quality underwear matters. Don't buy the cheap stuff just to have something. Spend some money and build up a nice underwear drawer you'll be looking forward to wearing and wearing in front of the ladies when, not if, when that crucial time comes. Your junk and your confidence will both thank your brain and your wallet. Wear them proudly my friends!

Moisture is whisked away allowing for a more airy, comfortable wear; no more damp cotton briefs caused by sweat--I can be as active as I want, even on the hottest, summer days.

B00C6N6DVE.A3U1ELEE2B33UF.reviewText: Best Boxer Briefs I've ever had the pleasure of wearing. Love the colors and love the fit. These are AWESOME. Diesel brand rocks!!

B00C6N6DVE.A3CNC70B2OGYUG.reviewText: Diesel is a brand name that you can really trust. You get what you pay for here. High quality and well made. I have a pair of Diesel boxers that I still wear that are over 8 years old and they still look and feel new.

B00C6N6DVE.A1QI1X8W7DHVU1.reviewText: This pair of underwear is really well made (definitely made to last you a while).  The waistband is soft, the fabric is stretchy and comfortable, but also durable (not thin and see-through like some other brands of underwear).  I didn't experience any ride up with this pair of underwear.  There is a large assortment of colors available, which isn't always the case with men's underwear (so if you are into that, you have many to choose from).  I do have one gripe, the pouch could be a little bigger, but I suppose it could be considered very supportive.-In short-Pros:Very comfortable fabric with a stretchy feel to itSoft and flexible waistbandExcellent construction (made to last you a while)No (or minimal) leg ride upA nice assortment of colorsCons:Pouch is a little tight for my liking

B00C6N6DVE.A1DDVG04WDHXSI.reviewText: These boxer briefs are extremely comfortable. They provide excellent support without being tight, the pouch is perfect. They move with your body without stretching out and becoming loose. I would definitely buy these again.

B00C7OI234.AGZ1J2KEFSFLA.reviewText: I bought the camo in the brief and in the athletic trunk in Large.  The brief is sized incorrectly it is 2" smaller than the Athletic Brief in the waistband.  It is not a Large but a Medium.  Manufacturers mistake.

B00CRZBDAM.A13AV90WTHGJQ8.reviewText: BIG! Wifey got this for me for Father's Day from Macys. tried it out and returned it. Just knew I could find a better deal as always online as opposed to paying full price. Sure enough amazon carries it for much less. We spent the difference for a sushi night, and believe me, it wasn't cheap. lol! Now back to the watch, definitely an eye catcher. very handsome and elegant yet versatile. I am starting my collection of big watches and this one is definitely one if not my favorite. I am stocky and my wrist though not gigantic fits just right with 50mm and above watches. As the other reviewer stated, and also talked to a co-worker about big watches, ones you go big, there's no going back. Yes it's a watch and it tells time but nowadays, why not use it for fashion as well. I'm very happy with this gift. One of the better purchase made.

It also looks and feels good (not too big but a tad bigger than most; neither too conservative nor too flashy). I've given it four stars because the bracelet lock does not fit as snugly as I think it should, but it detracts nothing from overall looks and feel. Moreover, Macy's was happy to adjust the sizing for me. I'm very pleased.
B00CRZBDAM.A34458YJ6UO0SX.summary: Neither too conservative nor too flashy.

Great job diesel.

Not sure if they will break in much, since they are rain boot material, but it's not so bad over socks and leggings, and I imagine over jeans it might not even be a problem.  The buckles are a little noisy when you walk, so if you hate that, these might not be for you.

I have several shirts that are medium-tall & slim-fit that fit me perfectly, but this shirt is too snug even in an extra large. My New Year's resolution is to fit into it!
B00CZ6L9XO.A67J385IQHEZI.summary: Very nice shirt; I'll finally get to wear it when I loose some weight!

B00CZ6L9XO.AINFC1NJ3ALN0.reviewText: Great looking shirt. The pattern stands out more then it appeared in the pictures but it still looks good. The material is nice and thick and buttons came embossed with the brand name, Diesel. Small detail but it makes a difference in feel. I do not like translucent materials. Fits well overall but as the sleeve length cannot be selected, they are marginally long like my other shirts from Ted Baker and Ben Sherman. Could have altered it but I don’t feel like incurring the cost but it's not a big deal as overall, the other aspects like the material and design more than compensates. As I am ard 1.7m, I had to shorten the length of the shirt as I wear it tucked out. I like to wear it 25 1/4 inch long, with the shirt ending around the pockets of my jeans.

B00CZ6LFL0.A3ATMDY4031Q0X.reviewText: The shirt is slightly darker than what's shown online, but it looks sharp and stylish. The shirt is pretty comfortable too. I noticed a review mentioning that Diesel shirts have a slimmer fit, so I ordered a large. Being just slightly over 5' 9" and around 158-160 pounds, I'm fairly slim, so I was hesitant at first. It's a good thing that I bought a large since the shirt actually fits like a regular US medium! I didn't give it five stars because the tag says this is a "dry clean only" shirt. I would expect this for sweaters, suits, and trousers, but not for a casual button down. Tempted to wash it, but for now I'll have to send it to the dry cleaners to avoid ruining a new shirt. Overall I'm satisfied with this shirt and will wear it for a while.

B00CZ6LFL0.A146X6FEWX7Q0D.reviewText: I ordered the blue tone for my husband and while we still love it the color is different than what is pictured, it's darker and almost greyish. As with all Diesel shirts the sizing runs small so you should order a size bigger than you normally wear. The company originated in Italy so any shirts by them run smaller than normal US sizes.

B00CZ6LOI4.ADHR5QDBFP91Q.reviewText: I was too busy looking for Diesel's FW13 collection jeans and didn't notice these were "sweat jeans" - they seam nice if you want sweat pants that look like jeans - I honestly have no clue why one would wear them or what possessed Diesel to make these.... I guess to each their own. Seems 3 stars is a fair rating because quality is great (they are Diesel after all), but as much as I want to like these or think of a use to wear them, I don't.
B00CZ6LOI4.ADHR5QDBFP91Q.summary: Be careful! These are a "sweat jean"

B00D08KOTG.ACT28PZAHU5YW.reviewText: I bought this 0814E in size 32x32 (100% cotton, made in Tunisia), and I bought Waykee 0886Z (which is 98% cotton, 2% elastane, made in Tunisia)The difference in feeling is significant... black 0886Z is absolute perfect very tight(!) and I do not feel it is tight at all and needs any break-in.However, this one (0814E) is super tight and I even think I can destroy it by wearing it...Unbelieveble, both are Waykee, both are made in Tunisia, 32x32.I tried to compare it by laying it down on a flat surface, one on another.Absolutely exact match in size, except that 0886Z has maybe 1 inch higher waist line, and this explains everything... and although it is with elastane, it was just first try of wearing it...BTW, I am athletic fit, with bigger than average quads and butt, 178cm height, 90kg weight. I used to wear jeans sizes 38x30 from Walmart, but this year I started with Safado 36x30, then 34x30, then realized I need longer size (it won't touch ground) and I lost 20 pounds in body weight this year (2-3 inches in waist line).I rate this item 5 stars, excellently built; I hope my review will help. If you have athletic legs then lower rise... is for flat butts ;)Thanks

If he didn't need the length I would have say we should have gone down a size but our guy is a tall boy and a shorter jean would have been too short.

B00DN59HVC.A3D2DJEHR4U7HC.reviewText: With age I have developed a foot problem that runs in my family--I have developed a bunion, which is a bony deformity of the joint at the base of the big toe. This makes it difficult to find stylish shoes that can encompass the enlargement of the bone that has occurred at the base of my right big toe. Sigh. I can't even stand to say the word, "bunion", so you might imagine how I felt about trying to wear "sensible shoes" LOL!Diesel to the rescue...I love the Diesel brand and their ultra cool italian style sensibilities. I wear their jeans, which fit like they were made for me, and last forever, and I also have had many, many shoes from the Diesel line that I have loved and worn to death. So I was very happy to find these shoes, which have plenty of room in the area across the toe to encompass the slight to moderate enlargement of that area of the bone on my right foot. I keep the shoes loose in that area, flexing my foot when lacing them so that I have plenty of wiggle room so that the bone doesn't become compressed and cause me pain and suffering while strutting with style.I love these shoes so much that I actually own them in Dress Blues/Classic and Bungee Cord/Latigo Bay/Coffee Bean, which I paid way too much for at right about $125, but they are my favorite pair. In addition, I've bought them in the Aramis style, which is just the same exact shoe with suede leather accents instead of the smooth leather of the Raquetier in Black Night/Black, Black Multi, and Bungee Cord/Black/Brown.  The colors are different enough that I don't think anyone would notice that they are the same style--every pair is quite unique. I absolutely LOVE these shoes!!I have found these shoes to be very resilient clean-wise. I even knocked an oil lamp off a table in my foyer, causing it to break and splatter oil EVERYWHERE, including on one of the pairs of the Aramis shoes--the Black Night/Black ones. I simply took a hot wet washcloth and soaped it up with dishwashing liquid, and proceeded to clean the surface of these shoes until they looked great again. I couldn't believe that they cleaned up so well.I have always ordered a whole size larger in Diesel shoes, even before my foot problems, as I find that they run small.
B00DN59HVC.A3D2DJEHR4U7HC.summary: Great Diesel style, and plenty of room in the toe area.
